comments:
Appartement très propre, calme et bien situé du côté de la Lausanne.
Nous avons passé un bon et agréable  séjour.
Eric est un hôte très accueillant que nous recommandons sans hésitation.
name: Quiet bedroom, private bathroom

comments:
I spent recently two days by Eric's home and it was definitely a great stay.
Eric is a very welcoming, kind, helpful and polite guy. 
He made me feel at home since the beginning and put special care in making my stay be a very comfortable one in all details.
He is an amicable guy, open to exchange and conversation.
He gave me also practical information about public transportation as well as a map of the town. 
Everything in the flat was very clean, tidy and cared of.
The flat and the buidling are of a high standard in a very nice and quiet location in Lausanne. 
I would no doubt recommend to stay by Eric's to anyone who wishes to have a great stay in Lausanne.
Luigina
name: Quiet bedroom, private bathroom

comments:
Éric est un hôte chaleureux et arrangeant.
L'accueil est parfait et son appartement est agréablement décoré et très bien équipé.
La vue sur le lac est vraiment superbe.
name: Quiet bedroom, private bathroom

comments: Excellent comme les fois précédentes.
name: Quiet bedroom, private bathroom

comments: We enjoyed the place. Thank you!
name: Your little piece of Paradise!

comments: This was the third time I stayed with Maria Luisa and it was excellent, just like the previous two times. The room with bathroom is clean and comfortable, the coffee and breakfast were first class, and Maria Luisa is a super friendly and considerate host. The location of the place is very convenient, walking distance to the railway station and to the center of Nyon. Highly recommended for anyone who needs a quiet, comfortable place to stay in Nyon.
name: CHARMING, LIGHT ROOM close to Geneva

comments: Maison idéale, nous nous y sommes senties immédiatement bien..Isabelle est accueillante ,disponible et serviable. Je recommande ce gîte.
name: Gîte des Sauges, CH

comments:
Isabelle a été un hôte très sympathique même si je ne l ai pas rencontré.
Elle a su répondre à toutes mes demandes.
Endroit calme en pleine nature.
Cafe thé pain confiture... merci.
Très bonne adresse si vous cherchez le repos et le calme.... ce matin les chamois étaient devant la fenêtre.... super
name: Gîte des Sauges, CH

comments:
We had a very good time in Isabelle´s place. Isabelle was extremely helpful, facilitating everything we needed.
The house is a lovely location around 2 Km from Ste Croix. We could walk the distance through a pleasant country side route. From Ste Croix we could take the bus to Les Rasses for skiing.
The house itself was very comfortable and again Isabelle kindly made every effort to make our stay enjoyable.
Definitely recommended, even if you don´t have a car!
name: Gîte des Sauges, CH

comments: Really nice place to stay
name: Gîte des Sauges, CH

comments:
Alles hat super geklappt. Die Wohnung ist sehr geschmackvoll  eingerichtet.
Es hat uns an nichts gefehlt.
Zum Schneeschuhwandern ist die Gegend ein Traum,wir werden sicher wieder kommen.
Herzlichen Dank Isabelle
name: Gîte des Sauges, CH

comments: The description and photos are accurate. The location is truly brilliant - in the vines and overlooking the lake. The pretty chateau / main building is in front of you, so it’s a partial lake view but still great. There’s amazing hikes and cycling trails around. Anne is very easy to deal with and very responsive. The bathroom is new and very clean (but not big). Bedrooms work well and are big enough. The dining room is small and the only common area, which means there isn’t room to sit and relax on a couch. The CHF 50 extra charge for doing the dishes seems very harsh. We always do them anyway...Overall a lovely stay in a unique place.
name: Castle in the hill. Stunning view 1

comments:
Spyros was a fantastic host answering our queries very quickly.
His house has a very unique view you cannot get tired of enjoying, during day time or even night time. It is certainly one of the best views overlooking the vinyards and the lake. Highly recommended.
David
name: Luxury 4BD villa, 240m2, amazing  views

comments: We thoroughly enjoyed the beautiful setting of Spyros’s home. Steep driveway so be careful! I especially appreciated his quick responses and always being available to assist with any information even when it did not relate to the accommodation.
name: Luxury 4BD villa, 240m2, amazing  views

comments: Aris' place was perfectly positioned, stylish, and very neat. It was a great location for our trip to Montreux. I would recommend it to friends!
name: Beautiful modern apart w/terrace

comments: L'appartement était jolie et calme.
name: Centré 2 pieces superbe appartement

comments:
Merci à Ines et à son mari pour leur accueil très chaleureux.
Le logement au charme désuet, était confortable, très propre et bien chauffé. Les doubles fenêtres isolent très bien du bruit de la rue.
name: Centré 2 pieces superbe appartement

comments:
It is a very nice room 

Also , Elisabeth is very nice friendly host.
name: Spacious room - private bathroom

comments: We stay 4 days in here, perfect view, perfect kitchen, but the location is a little far form Flon, the advantage is quite at night. My mom like it very much.
name: Great lake views and beautiful modern flat

comments: I can totally recommend this place. Good access by public transport, nice rooms, good wifi, well-equipped kitchen and a breath-taking view on the lake and the mountains. Moreover, I want to emphasize the very good and friendly communication with the host, who answered to all our questions within a very short period of time and provided very clear information.
name: Great lake views and beautiful modern flat

comments: Appartement d'un beau volume, extrêmement lumineux et une vue splendide sur le lac et la montagne....très calme et serein.
name: Great lake views and beautiful modern flat

comments: The house is in a unique position and has fabulous views. It is very quiet and peaceful. During our stay over Christmas and New Year we were blessed by largely sunny weather. The house itself has everything needed and the stove in the 'snug' saw frequent use. It is a good example of a 'rustic' Swiss chalet. The house is 100% wood and therefore warms up fast. The family was on hand to welcome us on arrival (many thanks for the wine, cheese and cake!) and after that gave us the privacy that we greatly valued. We would like to return in a future summer season!
name: Heidi Chalet Alps - Unique Experience

comments: Magnifique séjour dans un chalet magique... L'accueil y a été parfait après le trajet, une belle surprise : feu de bois allumé, bouteille de vin, tomme vaudoise et chocolat pour les enfants. Tout était prêt pour passer notre première soirée dans ce havre de charme. Toutes les petites attentions, la vue à couper le souffle ainsi que la gentillesse de nos hôtes nous ont fait tellement plaisir, que nous y retournerons avec joie !
name: Heidi Chalet Alps - Unique Experience

comments: alles super!
name: Heidi Chalet Alps - Unique Experience

comments:
Das Heidi Chalet verfügt über einen besonderen Charme. Mit Kaminfeuer wird die Stimmung abends besonders gemütlich. 

Kommunikation mit Gastgeber funktioniert ausgezeichnet!
name: Heidi Chalet Alps - Unique Experience

comments: Tolles Haus in gemütlicher Atmosphäre.
name: Heidi Chalet Alps - Unique Experience

comments: Endroit sublime et chalet à la hauteur de nos attentes. Parfait pour passer quelques jours tranquille .
name: Heidi Chalet Alps - Unique Experience

comments: L'hôte a répondu très rapidement à ma demande, et m'a expliqué clairement le trajet depuis la gare jusqu'à chez elle. Chambre petite mais très bien aménagé, lumineuse et agréable (et bien chauffée!). Cuisine et salle de bain très bien également. Accueil très chaleureux et sympathique d'Inès, je reviendrai avec plaisir !
name: A4C3Coeur de ville, chambre privée

comments: Lieu magnifique et tout ce qu'il faut pour dormir comme une marmotte. Hôte au petit soin!
name: White Double room in Cully Village

comments: We had a lovely time at Claire's place. The rooms were charming, very clean and comfortable. We would recommend staying here to anyone!
name: White Double room in Cully Village

comments: Inès est une hôte très gentil, le chambre est propre et central. et le lit est vraiment très comfortable!
name: A3/C2 Coeur de Ville, Magnifique chambre

comments: Trés bien
name: A3/C2 Coeur de Ville, Magnifique chambre

comments: Great
name: A3/C2 Coeur de Ville, Magnifique chambre

comments: Bon rapport-qualité prix . Merci
name: A3/C2 Coeur de Ville, Magnifique chambre

comments: La chambre (située dans un appartement annexe) était propre et bien chauffée (je suis venue en janvier), bonne communication, accueil sympathique, tout ce dont on a besoin est à disposition et le rapport qualité-prix est tout à fait correct. Merci à Ines et à son mari!
name: A3/C2 Coeur de Ville, Magnifique chambre

comments:
Un cour séjour à Saint Cergue chez Jillian & David. Rien à dire. Très accueillant et aidant.
L’ appartement  a tout le comfort nécessaire pour que vous vous sentiez chez vous après une journée en pleine nature. Pour toute personne qui aiment le contacte proche avec la nature c’est l’endroit idéal. Pour les autres aussi d’ailleurs. Car non loin de Genève avec toutes ces commodités. 
Chez Jillian et David vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés, ça serait comme même dommage pour les beaux paysages.
Marc
name: Modern apartment in the mountains!

comments: Odile und Finn sind sehr freundliche und zuvorkommende Gastgeber. Man kann mit ihnen auch ohne Probleme englisch sprechen, wenn man noch nicht so bewandert in französisch ist. Ich habe hier mein Auslandssemester (EPFL) verbracht und die Lage ist sehr entspannt und ist optimal, wenn man gerne Zeit an der frischen Luft verbringen will. Gleichzeitig kommt man auch sehr schnell mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln in die Innenstadt von Lausanne und auch an den Universitäts Campus. Es ist wirklich eine sehr gute Lage, für jemanden, der entweder nur eine kurze Zeit oder längere Zeit dorten verbringen will.
name: Face to the lake and the Alps!

comments:
Odile et Finn m’ont très bien accueilli et étaient disponible pour répondre à mes questions.
La chambre était propre et spacieuse.
L’emplacement de leur maison était idéale pour moi : a 15min à pied du centre de Morges, possibilité de garer sa voiture gratuitement à côté de la maison et quartier très calme.
name: Face to the lake and the Alps!

comments: Magnifique Chalet historique très confortable et rénové avec beaucoup de goût. Séjour relaxant pour les amoureux de calme et nature.
name: Historical Chalet Gryon-Les Plans

comments: The host canceled this reservation 346 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Historical Chalet Gryon-Les Plans

comments:
Magnifique chalet historique! De superbes chambres avec chacun une petite touche personelle, un salon avec une magnifique cheminée idéal pour les apéro, un cuisine super bien équipé! Rien a redire tant à la qualité du logement! Je le recommande vivement. 
Cependant, pour information, le papa y habite aussi bien entendu tout est séparé.
name: Historical Chalet Gryon-Les Plans

comments: Excellent séjour dans ce chalet très authentique.
name: Historical Chalet Gryon-Les Plans

comments: Nous avons passé 1 mois dans ce très agréable loft rural. Avons BEAUCOUP aimé le style contemporain et l’ambiance rustique de l’endroit. D’immenses fenêtres inondent l’appartement de lumière. La cuisine et la salle de bain sont modernes et bien équipées. Il y a aussi un foyer. En rentrant en fin de journée, nous avions l’impression d’être à la maison ! Nous avons été accueillis TRÈS chaleureusement par les hôtes, le chien Lola et les chevaux! Nous recommandons fortement. En pleine nature, mais à quelques minutes de Lausanne, c’est un endroit idéal.
name: Loft en milieu rural à Eclagnens

comments: Nous avons passé une semaine en Décembre dans ce charmant chalet avec trois enfants. Ben a porté un attention toute particulière aux communications et aux informations lors de la préparation de notre voyage. Ce chalet est extrêmement bien situé, à deux pas des remontées mécaniques, des loueurs de matériel de ski et des commerces. Avec sa terrasse sur la vallée, sa déco très soignée et son coin cheminée, il présente un cachet très appréciable, et une ambiance chaleureuse. La propreté, le confort, et l'équipement sont irréprochables et nous avons eu la chance de profiter de la nouvelle salle de bain tout à fait moderne : un vrai plus pour 7 personnes au retour des pistes. Aussi nous remercions très sincèrement Ben pour cette offre à Leysin, un excellent chalet Suisse dans une ville particulièrement bien équipée, tranquille et offrant toutes les activités pour les vacances et un restaurant et musée spécialité de fromages très appréciable.
name: Ski in/out Retro modern chalet w/ stunning views

comments: Excellente situation géographique du chalet, tout proche du télécabine et du village tout en étant très calme. Vue magique à couper le souffle!! Chalet propre et bien achalandé. On recommande sans hésitation!
name: Ski in/out Retro modern chalet w/ stunning views

comments: Ideal location near ski lifts and shops, fantastic views of the mountains. Cute retro decoration, comfortable and well equipped.
name: Ski in/out Retro modern chalet w/ stunning views

comments: Merci à Anton pour son accueil des plus chaleureux ! Pleins de petites intentions nous étaient destinées dans la maison. Un hôte plein de gentillesse que je conseille vivement.
name: Two level Villa - Swimming pool- 8 min to MONTREUX

comments: Great place! Located remotely yet within only short walk from La Tine station. You have a feeling like being in the middle of nowhere which I loved.  The communication, attention to detail, kindness and help during the whole stay - first class. And freshly prepared delicious breakfast. Overall fantastic experience, thanks a lot Caroline and Cecile! Keep doing the great job to delight the guests.
name: Chalet in Pays d'Enhaut  - A

comments: Michel est très gentil, et prend bien soin de ses hôtes. je recommande.
name: single bedroom in Morges - Minimum stay: 3 nights

comments:
Great little wooden house in the low mountains of Les Avants
super nice location . descrete nice and helpful host
 Its near  the train station where you can take golden pass to ride along the valley toward Zwissimen

Recommended 1000 %
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments: Nice and quiet little place in the heart of the prealps mountains but only 15 minutes from the shops and the lake
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments: Kristyna war genial, zuvorkommend und sehr hilfsbereit!
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments: We had a great experience at Kristyna's house. She is a great host!! It was winter time, snowy outsite but the place is cozy and very warm inside!! Beautiful landscape outside... Recommended!
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments: It was a very nice experience to stay at Kristyna's place. It is super calm and very good if you need to get away from city life.
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments: L'appartement de Kristyna est simple, mais très chouette. Il est très bien placé (proche de la gare des Avants, mais attention ça monte!), avec une belle vue sur les montagnes, calme et lumineux. J'y ai passé 3 très bonnes nuits. C'est un bon endroit où rester si vous êtes friants de randonnées, mais aussi simplement pour déconnecter et se ressourcer!
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments: An amazing apartment with a breathtaking view! Very clean, neat, and cozy, we loved it. It is also great for star gazing! We loved it and we would definitely love to be there again.
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments: good
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments:
Le voyage à été parfait. Le logement était parfaitement pa conforme, dans un cadre magnifique et très agréable/apaisant 
Kristyna a été une hôte très agréable, disponible et très serviable 
Nous reviendrons avec une grande joie pour d'autres vacances !
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments: nice, calm place in the mountains. i would take it again.
name: Studio Les Avants sur Montreux

comments: Joanna’s place feels just like home. The 805 bus runs every 15 minutes during the day just down the road. We enjoyed our stay!
name: Great comfy Studio in Nyon / Geneva

comments: A really comfortable and nice flat in a quiet neighborhood very close to the lake and to the city center. Djamel is a very kind and thoughtful host. Highly recommended!
name: 65sqm w/balcony in heart of town

comments: Excellent apartment, identical to pictures and description. The location is great and offers excellent value for money. The apartment itself is stylish, though sparsely furnished. All amenities were as advertised. One issue, which unfortunately is beyond the control of the host, is that the walls are pretty thin and do not insulate properly against noise from neighbouring flats. It was a problem for us as the bedroom was located next to a very noisy neighbour’s living room (especially late at night). Djamel is an excellent and attentive host. Communication and checkin/checkout were seamless.
name: 65sqm w/balcony in heart of town

comments: Bonne adresse pour loger à Lausanne. Appartement très propre et hôte très réactif.
name: 65sqm w/balcony in heart of town

comments: Appartement moderne, bien décoré, bien équipé, literie agréable, très bien situé à proximité des transports en commun et de la gare centrale. Nous y avons passé un excellent séjour. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir.
name: 65sqm w/balcony in heart of town

comments: very comfortable place, clean and warm, spacious with a bed room, a living room and kitchen, short 5 mts walk distance from Lausanne train station, also 5-10 mts walk to the lake side, super location, Host Djamel has been very responsive and we really enjoyed the stay and his hospitality!! Definitely recommend for couple or family stay...
name: 65sqm w/balcony in heart of town

comments: Super spacious apartment with lots of windows (good natural lighting). Comfiest bed we’ve stayed in so far. 12 minute walk to the train station, 20 ish minutes to old town Lausanne & close to lake Geneva as well. There was a nice grocery store (coop) 5 minutes walk away that had a lot of good options!
name: 65sqm w/balcony in heart of town

comments: The apartment is very cozy and with magnificent views to the town. Very recommendable for anyone seeking a real home-away-from-home experience. My family of four spent three unforgettable days in Lausanne. Perfect!
name: Grand appartement avec vue panoramique

comments:
Tout s’est très bien passé, votre appartement est très chaleureux et ce séjour était fort agréable, nous avons aimé ce côté artistique et apaisant bravo pour la déco et l’ambiance. 
Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir !

Merci  encore. 

Morgan et Sarah
name: Grand appartement avec vue panoramique

comments: Sono tornato per la terza volta da David, e mi trovo sempre bene. La casa è spaziosa e luminosa, e l'ospite sempre molto gentile.
name: 2 rooms apartment in Lausanne

comments: L'appartement de Grégoire est central, très agréable et joliement décoré. Gregoire est très sympa et communique clairement. Je vous recommande vivement cet hôte.
name: Cosy Bedroom in spacious flat

comments: The flat is very nice,clean and comfortable, the position is perfect to go in the city center or at the university UNIL/EPFL and Nat is a great host, helpful and very friendly. My stay in nat's flat was pleasant, in case of need I will definitely come back in her apartment.
name: Room for rent in Lausanne center

comments: Nat hosted us at the last minute and responded to messages quickly. She was very warm and welcoming. We were able to use the kitchen to cook meals and have breakfast. Supermarket across the road very handy. Walking distance to old town. Overall, an enjoyable stay.
name: Room for rent in Lausanne center

comments: Nat est une hôte formidable ! Elle nous a directement mises à l'aise et s'est montré tout à faire chaleureuse ! Nous recommandons cet endroit, très bien situé à proximité du bus, très propre et cosy !
name: Room for rent in Lausanne center

comments: Nat ist eine sehr freundliche Gastgeberin und ermöglicht ein geschwindes und entspannendes sich Wohlfühlen in ihrer angenehmen, wohnlichen Unterkunft. Sehr empfehlenswert.
name: Room for rent in Lausanne center

comments: Un très beau chalet, confortable et chaleureux. Idéalement situé dans une région magnifique. Je recommande fortement.
name: Chalet en montagne près de Villars

comments: Charmantes Chalet direkt am Wasser mit wunderschönem Blick. Klein aber mehr als aussreichend für ein Wochenende zu viert. Die Sofas am Kamis laden zum gemütlichen Abend ein. Küche und Bad sind klein und geben ein wenig das Gefühl von Camping, aber es ist alles da, was man benötigt. Die Pizzen im Restaurant oben an der Strasse sind allerdings auch sehr gut. Die Lage ist wunderschön, im Winter locken die Langlaufgebiete, im Sommer der See.
name: Chalet pieds dans l'eau lac de Joux

comments: Eine wunderschöne Lage direkt am See gelegen, wo Ruhe und Erholung im Vordergrund stehen. War gemütlich. Gastgeber ist sehr sympathisch
name: Chalet pieds dans l'eau lac de Joux

comments: Ein wirklich sehr schönes Haus! Wir waren 3 Paare mit insgesamt 3 Kindern. Es hat viel Platz für alle, ein zweiter Kühlschrank sorgt für ausreichend Stauraum aller Lebensmittel. Der tolle Kamin im Wohnzimmer macht die Abende sehr gemütlich ... Wirklich toll!
name: Big Chalet in Gryon, Switzerland

comments:
Nous avons passé  une super semaine. La vue est, comme promis, absolument incroyable. Le chalet est parfaitement aménagé pour plusieurs familles. Nous étions 6 adultes et 5 enfants et avons eu toute la place nécessaire. Trea était disponible pour nous si besoin. Il a neigé  pendant la semaine et nous pouvions descendre en luge jusqu'au village, ce que les enfants on beaucoup apprécié.
Tout était parfait.
name: Big Chalet in Gryon, Switzerland

comments: The Chalet was brilliant for the 3 families. It was super clean, spacious and very well situated. It had the most amazing views and a wonderful homely feel. Will def book Trea’s Chalet again when we go back to Gryon.
name: Big Chalet in Gryon, Switzerland

comments: L'appartement est magnifique et idéalement situé au centre-ville pour se déplacer à pied. Mes parents viennent d'y passer un mois et se sont sentis comme à la maison. L'accueil et la disponibilité de Maira et sa famille a été parfaite. Ils reviendront...
name: Appart au coeur de Lausanne

comments: Maira was a wonderful host. She replied to all emails really quickly and when there was a hot water issue (with the entire building, not her fault!) she kept us in the loop, got it resolved super fast. She gave us lots of useful info about the place and how to get there too. The apartment is very cozy, warm, and clean. The kitchenette includes an electric stovetop, a microwave and a portable mini oven which was really handy. The couch is also the comfiest thing ever. Overall a fabulous stay and would highly recommend it to most - only exception would be those with disability/ trouble with stairs as you have to climb two flights of reasonably steep stairs (no lift). For us it was no issue at all. Thanks Maira!!!
name: Appart au coeur de Lausanne

comments:
Le séjour était court mais fort agréable, il est vrai que nous ne sommes pas restes beaucoup de temps dans l'appartement mais le peu passe la bas était très bien.
Je remercie notre hôte de nous avoir si bien accueilli!
name: Appart au coeur de Lausanne

comments:
L'appartement de Maira est très agréable, propre et joliment meublé. Sa situation, très centrale et dans la vieille ville, est définitivement un atout.
Je n'ai pas vu Maira qui était au travail lorsque je suis arrivée et repartie, mais elle avait tout organisé, laissé des capsules de café sur la table et mis des fleurs dans le vase. Pour les détails, nous avons communiqué par SMS. Elle a toujours répondu rapidement à mes demandes.
name: Appart au coeur de Lausanne

comments: très bonne adresse, on y reviendra
name: Appart au coeur de Lausanne

comments: Un très bon séjour. Bien équipée , et dans une bonne situation.
name: Appart au coeur de Lausanne

comments: The host canceled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Appart au coeur de Lausanne

comments: The host canceled this reservation 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Charming apartment with parking

comments:
Valeh & Sebastien are great hosts, with good tips & very helpful.
The apartment was ideal for us, well located (with close by bakery, shopping center, banks etc.) and access to the highway not far.
Quite neighbourhood.
Ideal for family.
name: Charming apartment with parking

comments: Appartamento dotato di ogni comfort, basta solo portarsi gli indumenti.
name: Charming apartment with parking

comments:
In agreement with what has been presented in the description Aïcha provides a spacious and lovely room for your disposal. Upon arrival I was met with fresh linen and towels and in the morning a served breakfast. The bed is dangerously comfortable and large so it easily fits two people.

As a traveller, the apartment is perfectly located with a 5 minute taxi ride from the central station and a walking distance to just about everything else in the city. 

The apartment is also shared with Aïchas two lovely children who are very helpful and well-behaved. The members of the family are all very easy-going people and you will find yourself liking them all in no time at all.

I had a great stay during my five nights and I strongly recommend this place to anyone visiting Lausanne.
name: Comfortable room with balcony & breakfast

comments: I came to Lausanne for few days to find a place to stay for the next months. Aïcha’s place was super convenient for me as it is very closed to the city center and Aicha was very kind with me. Thanks for hosting me!
name: Comfortable room with balcony & breakfast

comments:
L'impression d'être chez soi, une maison absolument chaleureuse, Aïcha m'a mise très à l'aise, de même que sa petite famille. 

A refaire dès que possible !
name: Comfortable room with balcony & breakfast

comments: Everything ok. Great place
name: Comfortable room with balcony & breakfast

comments: Aïcha et sa famille sont adorables et accueillantes. La chambre est spacieuse et le balcon très mignon. Tout est très propre et l'emplacement est idéal. A refaire!
name: Comfortable room with balcony & breakfast

comments:
Very nice place, cosy, clean and stilish. Aicha is very nice, helpful and makes you feel very welcome. She gave me a lot of information about Lausanne, our talks were very nice and she also adjusted the breakfast to my preferences. The location is very good, 5 min walk to the center, also served by a near bus station. I would highly recommend this place for people who want to feel welcomed and part of a 'family'.
Thank you very much Aicha, you will always be part of my cosy Lausanne experience.
name: Comfortable room with balcony & breakfast

comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Nice flat close to lake

comments: Appartement sympa, et bien placé.
name: Nice flat close to lake

comments: Great Location. Quite. Big room. Direct access to the bathroom. Le is a great person to exchange with. Will surely come back when I am next in Lausanne.
name: Cozy corner close to everything

comments: Second time I stay at this place. Really nice place and host was very hospitable. Highly recommended.
name: 012 Room in a flat in Villeneuve

comments: Perfect home  for stay neat and clean. Host is also good person friendly. And most important thing is  near to Villanova train station.
name: 012 Room in a flat in Villeneuve

comments: Perfect
name: 012 Room in a flat in Villeneuve

comments: convient particulièrement à un étudiant devant se retrouver au calme pour ses examens et son mémoire, tout en pouvant profiter de la beauté historique et naturelle de Rolle
name: 043 Nice room small budget in Rolle

comments: Studio pratique pour quelques nuits sur Lausanne.
name: Joli studio refait à neuf plein cœur de Lausanne

comments: Très bel espace accueillant et chaleureux ! Merci à Cécilia !

comments:
Inès est quelqu'un de très accueillante et compréhensive. J'ai eu des problèmes de transport et je suis arrivée très très tard dans la nuit. Inès a su m'arranger pour que je puisse entrer dans l'appartement. 
L'emplacement est bien situé, l'appartement est propre, et il y a tout ce qu'il faut. Je recommande vivement

comments:
Camera confortevole, calda e accessoriata...
Accoglienza calorosa e proprietaria molto disponibile.

comments:
The rooms are clean, there's a kitchen and a bathroom in common with other people, and a prepaid washing machine downstairs for the laundry.
It's close to anything one might need, general less than a 5 minute walk
name: A6C2 Grande chambre centrée

comments: it was great, want to come back one day)))
name: A6C2 Grande chambre centrée

comments:
Although I booked A6C3, I stayed in A3C3 and so didn't have to walk up another floor.  There were two other bedrooms for other guests in the apartment.  It was sort of like an Airbnb motel since the host(s) stayed in a different apartment.  I was greeted by Inès' husband, a polite gentleman.

The very modern induction stove and digital convection oven worked well, although one pot was not compatible and so remained cold.

The toilet flushed everything the first time.  The sink and shower had good water pressure, but the bathtub drained slowly due to hair, etc. left by other guests.

Although it was non-smoking, there was often a smell of cigarette smoke inside even though the windows and doors were closed.  Don't know from where it was coming, perhaps from the apartment below.

Double-pane windows blocked almost all of the outside traffic noise and could be easily opened for fresh air.

The bedroom had it's own thermostat to set the temperature to personal preferences.  Two large, plush towels were provided.  The bed was comfortable with a warm comforter.

Overall, it was a pleasant 3½-week stay.
name: Chambre A6C3 centrée su centre ville

comments: Schöne kleine Wohnung in Lausanne Ouchy mit allem was man braucht für einen komfortablen Aufenthalt.

comments: I attended a program at IMD. The apartment is extremely well located (about 5 minutes walk to the IMD). Djamel is a very uncomplicated host with whom communication is very easy. Very easy check-in and check-out, which made the arrival and departure day very relaxed.

comments: Amazing apartment would recommend it for sure.. Close to everything and very quite and safe building

comments: Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour dans l'appartement de Talisa à Lausanne. L'appartement est très confortable et très joliment décoré. Nous avons particulièrement apprécié la cuisine qui était parfaitement équipée, ce qui nous a permis de nous sentir comme à la maison :) Nous avons été très bien accueillis, avec toutes les indications utiles à notre séjour, une propreté impeccable et même une boîte de chocolats! Talisa a été très réactive et a répondu à toutes nos questions pratiques avant et pendant notre séjour. Enfin, l'emplacement était idéal, dans un quartier calme à 10-15 min à pied du centre et de la gare.

comments: Our stay was just perfect in this gorgeous Chalet. We can recommend it to anyone who wants to visit Leysin en the beautiful surroundings as a family or friends. All rooms where beautifully decorated, the kitchen was more then well equipt, the living room cosy with pretty views and bathrooms where perfect. Everything was clean and felt as we where coming home to visit good friends. Avtar sent us all the details about how to reach te house and nice things to do in the neighbourhood. We had a great time and rest in this peacefull part of this little town which you can reach by foot if you like a walk (20 minutes to the center) and everything you need is close by. A big thank you Avtar for letting us stay in your wonderfull home high in the mountains!
name: Beautiful cozy Chalet in Leysin

comments:
We spent our ski holidays in early January in Avtars chalet. Unfortunately, at the beginning the snow was missing and so it felt more like late autumn holidays ;-). Nevertheless, we could very well relax and time passed quickly: The house is very clean. It offers a great, homely mix of new and older furniture, and the mountain-view is simply breathtaking. The location of the chalet is quiet, at the same time, Leysin and the shops are good accessible by foot. 
In the surroundings we could use various leisure activities: The Tobogganing parc, a ride with the cog railway from Leysin to Aigle, hikes (with and without snow), skiing, a visit to the swimming pool of Leysin...
Also, the price / performance ratio of the chalet is very fair for Swiss standards.
name: Beautiful cozy Chalet in Leysin

comments:
This house is magic. We absolutely loved our time here. The house is super comfortable, warm and welcoming. The photos are great, but the house is even better in real life. We had everything we could possibly want, including a great little kitchen, a stunning bathroom, a beautiful place to eat with the family, a comfortable lounge area, and a place to store and dry all of our ski gear. Perfect. 
The views are magical. We loved early mornings watching the sun come up over the mountains. The kids thought the house was amazing too - plenty of space for fun and the area outside of the house was just the best. So much space to play, toboggan and jump in snow. 
In summary - we loved every minute at this magical house in this magical village. Happy times.
name: Beautiful cozy Chalet in Leysin

comments: Ce séjour dans le chalet de Maj a tout simplement été parfait : l'emplacement du chalet est idéal : proche des commerces de la Barboleuse, proche du télécabine. Le chalet lui même possède de grandes chambres agréablement aménagées, deux salles de bain acceuillantes et propres et tout le comfort et l'équipement nécessaire. Maj et sa famille ont également été très disponible à nous acceuillir et conseiller. Une de nos meilleures experiences AirBnB !

comments: Chalet très sympathique et chaleureux. Le seul bémol est l'espace de vie un peu trop petit pour plus qu'une famille. Idem pour la table du salon (pour manger). Sinon les chambres parfaites. Cuisine un poil petite.

comments:
The house from Nicolas is a great choice to enjoy time with your friends or family! It's "far" away from other houses that you're definitly for yourself. 

The living room is the higlight of the house, because it's very spacious and chillfull. The chéminee helps to make the atmosphere perfect.

The house is very well equipped (it has a lot more than written) as example there where 3 fondue caquelons and a lot more of usefull things.

comments: We were two separate family (one couple with a 17 year old) and one couple with 2 boys (8 and 12). The layout was perfect for all of us. The master bedroom has beautiful views and balcony. The fireplace works very well. It is warm, cosy and stunning views. Very quiet. Really felt at home and loved it!!!!

comments: Lovely stay. Perfect for skiers

comments: Perfect stay with most warm welcome from Monika, the equipment and furniture is excellent and could meet all your need
name: Cozy holiday flat in 16th cen. home

comments: Monika was such a lovely host who went out of her way to pick us up from the station and send us detailed information on various day trips etc. The house is wonderful and cosy with the most amazing views. It has everything you need and is a short walk to the train station. A fabulous stay thank you!
name: Cozy holiday flat in 16th cen. home

comments: Monika is a gracious host. Kind and generous. Her flat has everything you may need and is only a 15 minute walk from the train station.
name: Cozy holiday flat in 16th cen. home

comments:
Our stay at La Tranquille was an amazing experience, thanks to Monika’s thoughtful touches, practical and well organized approach and well informed recommendations and local tips. 

The house was just like in the pictures, a charming and super comfortable space in a small village in the hills overlooking gorgeous Lake Geneva. It was very well organized, clean, supplied with everything necessary - even games that our 9 year old daughter loved. As stated, the stairs leading to the bedroom are steep, but to us it added to the charm of the house, which dates long back - as one can see from the thick walls that keep it nice and warm. 

Monika was friendly, helpful and flexible. She recommended places to see that we enjoyed very much, as well as places to eat in the area, hikes and so much more!  She was very responsive and helpful with everything we needed, but also took time to listen, understand our preferences and then make recommendations that really added to the beauty of our trip. 

The house is a short ride away from Montreux, La Gruyère (a big yes for cheese lovers and medieval settlements seekers) Moléson, Gstaad, Lausanne and many hiking areas and ski resorts, affording lovely day trips in many places in the area. We spent five days at La Tranquille and we did not run out of things to do in the area. The sunsets at the house are out of this world, with splendid views of Lake Geneva surrounded by misty mountains! 

We highly recommend La Tranquille as a destination for your vacation in Switzerland, and we plan to be back and explore the area further. Thank you Monika and Danielle for making us feel at home and treating us like family. You made our trip not only comfortable, but also unforgettable!
name: Cozy holiday flat in 16th cen. home

comments: Très bien
name: A5c3 lumineuse chambre centrée

comments: This room was very nice and comfortable and the house is lovely. Be aware that if you do not have a car it is somewhat far away from transportation and EPFL/UNIL campus. That said, the hosts are very nice and welcoming people, and the area is beautiful.
name: 006 Home stay room 15min to EPFL #1

comments: 5 stars for sure. One of my best experience in airbnb.

comments: All good as it has been the times before. Thank you Beatrice and Roel.

comments:
Maurice is an amazing Host, very helpful Person and his House is super comfortable and good!
Thank you Maurice for your Sympathy!
Great to meet you!!!
I willcome back again for sure!

Best regards!

comments: Great hosts and great Villa.   Would recommend to others.    We loved it here it was the perfect location for our holiday.  The place is gorgeous and the beds and bed linen so comfortable.  The hosts are just fabulous, really helpful.
name: Villa de standing Le Haut des Vignes Lutry/Lavaux

comments:
La maison correspond aux images du site. Pas de mauvaises surprises. Très bons conseils de Jocelyne et Jean Michel pour les visites (dégustations de gruyère, de chocolat et de vin chez la fabuleuse Jeannou, raquettes, luge). 
La maison est très propre, contient suffisamment d'ustensiles cuisines, verres etc.  Emplacement pour se garer sans difficulté adossé à la maison. Vue superbe sur le lac, les montages et la vigne depuis toute la maison !!!
Je recommande +++
name: Villa de standing Le Haut des Vignes Lutry/Lavaux

comments: The property is amazing.  The house is impeccable.  We had a concern on the train after reading someone's review, but it is a non-issue.  Not only is it not a noise concern, but at night is it incredibly beautiful to watch it snake around the mountain.  Anyone who is looking to stay in this area, This is the spot to be.  Only one way to describe it...Outstanding!!
name: Villa de standing Le Haut des Vignes Lutry/Lavaux

comments:
Michelle a été très disponible pour nous indiquer le meilleur itinéraire à suivre pour atteindre le chalet le 27 décembre 2017, premier hiver bien enneigé depuis quelques années. Ses précieux conseils ont été également très utiles pour "brancher" l'eau courante et mettre le chauffage en route.
Cuisine bien aménagée avec matériel de qualité et en quantité suffisante : agréable de cuisiner. Salle de bains avec baignoire très "cosi" et WC séparés ont été appréciés.
Salon avec cheminée, très utile, pendant cette période hivernale froide.
Chalet meublé et aménagé avec goût. Pièces confortables et spacieuses.
Magnifique vue depuis le salon et encore plus belle depuis les chambres à l'étage.
Calme et quiétude au rendez-vous. Deux chalets en contrebas et le club alpin plus haut derrière. Havre de paix propice au ressourcement loin du tumulte habituel.
Adresse que nous conservons pour un prochain séjour.
name: Vue panoramique sur le lac Léman!

comments: Wow, super, tres manufic are just some words that describe our lovely stay. A great clean and well presented chalet, perfect for our needs. The view is breathtaking.  Nice living room and kitchen was fully equipped and made making any meal a pleasure. Rooms bright and warm. Thank you Florence for having us stay and will certainly want to visit again soon.
name: GRYON appartement chalet vue unique

comments: What an incredibly fantastic week! From Florence and Didier's very warm welcome, to fabulous blue skies, our stay was pure bliss. A walk away from the chalet is the best bakery in the area (stop by for a green tea and walk home with a baguette under your arm). Our favorite place to eat is "L'étable" and the walk trails around the house are endless. Keep your eyes open for deer and squirrels. The air is champagne and the kitchen is very well equipped (don't forget your Nespresso capsules!). Leaving felt like we were leaving our second home and that we had made new friends. A bientôt L'ESTIVE.
name: GRYON appartement chalet vue unique

comments: L’appartement correspond parfaitement aux photos : moderne, propre, cosy, décoré avec goût, bien équipé, lumineux, vue magnifique ! On s’y sent comme à la maison et on a envie d’y retourner !
name: GRYON appartement chalet vue unique

comments:
Everything was perfect. The apartment and especially our host were exceptional. The apartment is super nice and very well equipped.
We had a great time and we can totally recommend a booking.
name: GRYON appartement chalet vue unique

comments:
Nous avons loué cette ferme pour passer un nouvel an entre amis. Ce lieu magique et coquet nous a de suite mis confortables et enthousiastes ainsi que l'accueil plus que chaleureux de leurs habitants ! Cuisiner à 5 pour le 31 a été un régal dans cette immense cuisine, de même que faire de longues parties de jeux de sociétés dans le salon très cosy avant de dormir profondément sur les très bons matelas des nombreuses chambres. 
Merci encore à cette famille de nous avoir prêter leur belle maison pour passer un formidable moment, nous n'avions plus envie d'en partir !
name: Chigny Above Morges

comments: Everything was perfect . The Communication with her was fast and easy. I would recommend everybody who wants to stay in this area her house.
name: Luxury 4-bed house with stunning views!

comments: Bonjour, Nous sommes enchantés de notre séjour à l'appartement de Souad. Un accueil très agréable par leur charmante fille. Un appartement clair, très bien entretenu, avec cinq fenêtres et bien situé pour ceux qui sont intéressés par l'opéra. Le contact avec Souad est facile et sans obligation. Je recommande sans réserve cette location

comments: Souad's flat was perfect for our short stay during silvester in Lausanne. The communication was fast and useful.

comments: Awesome place to stay in Lausanne! Central location, short walk (however uphill) from the train station and super comfortable for a good trip. comments:
Central Location. Very easy to park cars. A train is 2 min walk away to connect all villages and downtown train to Lausanne and Geneva.  Ideally located near end of ski slopes. about 30 min drive from hot springs. 

The chalet by itself is awesome ! It has some style with all the wooden furnitures. Balcony offers a nice view on mountains. Fully furnished with kitchen, sofas, a lot of mattress ( the mezzanine is above the ceiling), even some ice skating shoes are left for us to enjoy! The check in system is smart and convenient ( we did not meet Florence).  

This year, the snow was very few but we could do a lot of activities in Gryon/Villars and down the valley. The place has a lot to offer ! 

I highly recommand the place for anyone looking for Alps' beauty while looking for a connection to transportation and cities.

comments:
I stayed at Rue Caroline for 9 days for a business trip, and overall had a lovely experience. Below, I've outlined my perspective for other business travelers considering this option.

Pros: 

1. The management team was very responsive and accommodating -- even letting me check in early on a Sunday morning after an overnight flight from the US.

2. Location! The apartment is just a few steps away from a bus stop, metro station, and grocery story. It was incredibly convenient to everything in Lausanne.

3. The room itself -- was clean and well-heated, with beautiful decor.

Cons:

1. Missing a few amenities that I would expect: there were no washcloths, only 2 flat-ish pillows (the photos shows 4), no carpet/rug (as shown in the photos), and most importantly: NO CURTAINS. (There was a mostly-transparent screen that you could pull across the window, but there was no privacy. People could see in, I could see out. Be prepared to show the neighborhood a little skin.)

2. Tiny kitchen: The tiny kitchenette is beautiful, with the basic amenities, but has only 6 inches of counter space. Trying to cook a pan of pasta with sauce was like a slap-stick comedy -- I ended up "storing" things in the sink, on the bedside table, etc. while I was cooking. This kitchenette is great for making a pot of tea or reheating something in the microwave, but simple meal preparation is tough. I even had to prop up the cutting board on the sink to cut a piece of bread.

3. Fickle elevators: I was on the 7th floor. One of the two elevators in the building was out of service for the entire 9 days. The final night, the other elevator went out of service too. Of course, it was the night I was bringing up a heavy bag and a bunch of groceries. Climbing those seven flights of stairs was not my favorite part of the trip. (Note: the elevator was working again in the morning.)

4. Unexpected service: I wasn't informed about the cleaning schedule, and so was surprised to arrive home one night to find the room tidied with fresh linens. A couple of days later, it was clear that someone had been back (towels folded, but bed not made). Be sure to ask about their schedule so that you can be prepared!

Overall, this corporate apartment was great value for the money and my small complaints do not outweigh the positives. I recommend this apartment to others -- just be prepared to get dressed in the tiny bathroom and to eat out for dinner!
name: Grand Studio Apartment

comments:
Jay was a fantastic host.  He picked up us form the train station and after explaining the ins and outs of the apartment, we were settled  within minutes of arriving in Leysin.  The apartment was clean, spacious, bright and chockful of information about bus schedule (free shuttle every hour to main lift), ski passes, ski lessons, sports centers, etc.  

For those who aren't inclided to ski, fret not.  Leysin has two sports centers that are accessible with a family pass (one has a pool, the other has a skating rink, and both are free with the pass, excluding skate rentals).  There is also the tobogganing park next to the skating rink, open all day, every day.  These extra activities (there is also hiking, always free) saved us as there was not a lot of snow during the 2015 holiday season.   

As far as location is concerned, here's the breakdown for walking, all of these with two kids in tow:  
- 15 minutes to the COOP grocery store
- 20 minutes to the rink
- 20 minutes to the pool
- 25 minutes to the lift
- 5 minutes from hiking trails.

Jay made himself available for any help or requests and he even made us some homemade shorbread cookies, an old recipe from the Pennsylvania Dutch, as a welcome treat.  

In short, a delicious vacation in the Swiss Alps.
name: Swiss Comfort, Villa Maria 2

comments: Jay made us very welcome, explaining how everything worked and even picking us up from the train stop in Leysin.  He drop us back to the station when we left, despite it being an early start.  The apartment is beautiful, very spacious and lots of little extras.  An excellent stay, thank you.
name: Swiss Comfort, Villa Maria 2

comments:
Jay was an absolutely fantastic host! A real gentleman! He was helpful and friendly through our trip! The apartment was also fantastic. It was beautifully presented and had some of the best views you could ask for from the windows! The rooms were very well presented and comfortable, it felt like a home away from home! The snow was a beautiful addition through our trip and transformed the whole village of Leysin into a wonderful winter wonderland. The shops were really conveniently located as well as the train station and the bus stop. This is a real gem of a place and I would recommend it to anyone who wants to get on holiday to Switzerland! 

Thank you again Jay! I hope Nazuna is back soon and that we get to meet her next time we stay!
name: Swiss Comfort, Villa Maria 2

comments:

Très bon accueil de Maguy, logement confortable pour 2 personnes dans une belle résidence, bien chauffé et au calme.
Le parking à l'arrière est un atout.
Jolie vue sur Montreux et le lac.

comments:
Really comfortable and cosy apartment ideally located in Gryon.  If there's snow you really are less than 100 steps away from the gondola !
Great host - recommended

comments:
Un appartement "comme à la maison", pratique, sympa, propre et littéralement au départ du télécabine.
Anne rend les choses faciles et sans aucun souci.
name: WINTER SKI, OR SUMMER IN THE ALPS

comments: Super appartement, conforme à l'annonce et à deux pas des remontées mécaniques, ce qui est parfait avec des enfants. Anne est super sympa et très réactive! Merci!
name: WINTER SKI, OR SUMMER IN THE ALPS

comments:
アパートの部屋はきれいで可愛くとても快適に過ごすことができました。バルコニーからレマン湖とアルプスの山々をみることができました。駅にもスーパーにも歩いて行けて便利でした。素敵な滞在ができました。ありがとうございました。
The flat is very pretty and comfortable.The view from balcony is wonderful to see the lake of Leman and the Alps. We enjoyed to stay. Thank you very much.
name: Appartment to subrent for 3 weeks

comments:
ｱﾊﾟｰﾄの部屋はきれいで可愛くとても快適に過ごすことができました｡ﾊﾞﾙｺﾆｰからﾚﾏﾝ湖とｱﾙﾌﾟｽの山々をみることができました｡駅にもｽｰﾊﾟｰにも歩いて行けて便利でした｡素敵な滞在ができました｡ありがとうございました｡
The flat is very pretty and comfortable.The view from balcony is wonderful to see the lake of Leman and the Alps. We enjoyed to stay. Thank you very much.

comments: Best place near Lausanne!
name: Verdure et Lac

comments: My trip was announced last minute and Wilber was very quick to reply. I found the place as last time, very clean, very well organized and everything I needed was available to me. Wilber is an amazing host and I would come back every time.
name: Modern/spacious room with individual bathroom.

comments: Wilber is a very nice host. The apartment was perfect for my needs. Always a pleasure to return.
name: Modern/spacious room with individual bathroom.

comments: Merci Heike pour votre accueil <3
name: Charming, comfortable, quiet rooms close to lake

comments: Heike is a very hospital and kind host. I failed to arrive on time and appeared at midnight but Heike was very kind and welcomed me.
name: Charming, comfortable, quiet rooms close to lake

comments: Ce logement convient parfaitement pour une famille avec deux enfant. Le GPS a été utile pour trouver la maison alors qu'il faisait nuit au moment de notre arrivée. Accueil sympathique de Daniel et Heike dans un quartier très calme.
name: Charming, comfortable, quiet rooms close to lake

comments: Merci Heike & Daniel pour votre excellent accueil, tout était parfait !
name: Charming, comfortable, quiet rooms close to lake

comments:
Très bonne expérience dans les appartements de Visionapartment. Nous avons très bien accueilli à notre arrivée malgré notre retard. L'appartement était propre à notre arrivée.
Je conseille Visionappartment à Lausanne.
name: Junior Studio Apartment

comments:
Logement bien agencé et fonctionnel, très bien situé dans le centre de Lausanne. 
Point négatif: rue Caroline très bruyante.
name: Junior Studio Apartment

comments: It's very close to metro station and grocery store “COOP”.
name: Junior Studio Apartment

comments: Nous avons passé notre nouvel an dans cet établissement. Il ya eu une coupure (ou une panne de chauffage et une absence d'eau chaude. Il n'y a pas eu de communication, pour nous informer de l'absence de chauffage et d'eau chaude. Pas de proposition de chauffage d'appoint et/ou de couvertures. La disponibilité et le service sont des qualités qui n'existent pas dans cet établissement.
name: Junior Studio Apartment

comments: The Vevey studio was great for our short break away. The terrace is really fantastic and the house has a great comunal feel. Unfortnately we could not meet Hans-Jurg but he made everything to make us feel welcome and at home. He sent us a lot of tips of things to discover in the area. Its also quite nice that you are able to cook in Vevey in the studio.
name: Studio on the Lake with Terrace

comments: Nous avons passé un excellent week end. L'appartement est très agréable et la vue sur le lac est magnifique. Hans-Jürg nous a donné toutes les informations nécessaire pour trouver l'appartement et il a su être présent si nous avions des questions. À refaire !
name: Studio on the Lake with Terrace

comments:
Die Unterkunft ist genau so, wie auf den Bildern zu sehen. Die Lage ist perfekt, der Ausblick auf den See und die Berge einfach traumhaft. Auf der Terrasse lässt es sich dank der vielen Ruhemöbel prima erholen. Durch die Fußgängerzone vor dem Haus gibt es auch keinen Verkehrslärm. Die Musik in der Bar nebenan hat uns auch trotz Wochenende nicht gestört. 
Das Studio ist mit allem notwendigen ausgestattet, insbesondere die Spülmaschine ist super!
Die Kommunikation mit Hans-Jürg war sehr nett und hat super funktioniert, Antworten kamen unverzüglich. Vorab gab es ein Informationsblatt mit sehr hilfreichen Tipps. Danke dafür! 
Absolute Empfehlung!
name: Studio on the Lake with Terrace

comments:
Hans Jürg propose un lieu qui est en fait un petit havre de paix. Appartement cosy, bien équipé  offrant une vue imprenable sur le lac et les Alpes. Les informations post entrée sont fiables et utiles. 
Merci à notre hôte pour sa souplesse et sa compréhension. Il nous a permis de passer un nouvel mémorable.
name: Studio on the Lake with Terrace

comments: The studio is really nice and cosy. You can wake up and look our at the mountains which is sensational. Hans-Jürg was great, as soon as I booked he emailed me all the necessary information and made the effort to meet me the following day to chat.
name: Studio on the Lake with Terrace

comments: Sehr schönes Appartement. Allerbeste Aussicht auf den See. Mitten im Zentrum.
name: Studio on the Lake with Terrace

comments:
The apartment is very clean and comfortable. It is very close to the train station, so it is easy to visit other cities (like montreux) and return.

As you can see from the photos, It is not a big apartment. The kitchen is in the same space of the bedroom. Thus I would not recommend for long stay but I definitely recommend for  a short stay 3-5 days.
name: Mini Studio Apartment

comments: Good studio with all the amenities necessary, however a bit small. Enough for two people and ideal for short stays. Staff is very responsive and helpful. We complained about our mattress and they replaced it immediately. Recommended!
name: Mini Studio Apartment

comments:
Lea is a wonderful host. This is my second stay at her place, and I wouldn’t hesitate to always stay at her place.
She goes far and beyond to help her guests and make them feel as at home.
The location is perfect. 3 minutes walking from the subway, a supermarket around the corner, and IMD (for those that goes to study there) at a 3 minutes walk. You also have very good places to eat around.
name: Beautiful flat near the lake

comments: It was wonderful experience to stay here. Very clean, spacey room and access to IMD is very good.
name: Beautiful flat near the lake

comments:
Leas Wohnung war perfekt für uns! Wir fühlten uns sofort wie zu Hause und wohl. 
Die Einrichtung gefiel uns, die Kunstgegenstände und Dekorationen, das viele Licht....
Die Wohnung hat einen tollen Schnitt und sehr viele Fenster. 
Anweisungen für den Umgang mit Vorräten und Müll waren einfach, klar formuliert und sinnvoll und wir hatten immer das Gefühl, als Gäste wirklich willkommen zu sein.
Gewürze, Küchenmaterialien, Handtücher, Toilettenpapier alles war zur Genüge da. Wir brauchten nur ersetzen, was wir verbraucht hatten. Das Wohnviertel ist sehr ruhig und wir hatten für unsere Familienbesuche vor Ort kurze Wege. Einfach perfekt!
name: Beautiful flat near the lake

comments: Great stylish place. Clean and very close to IMD
name: Beautiful flat near the lake

comments: Roger is very nice and fast in communication. The location is great and the studio is cozy and convenient. We enjoyed our stay!
name: Cozy studio in Lausanne downtown

comments:
L'appartement est bien situé au RdC à 100m de la gare des roches grises pour rejoindre les pistes à Bretaye. A 5 minutes à pied du centre où se trouve la plupart des restaurants et commerces. 
L'interieur correspond bien au descriptif avec wifi, lave-vaisselle, chaîne-hifi et lecteur dvd. Un micro-onde aurait été le bienvenu pour les petits déjeuner. Une des chambres à sa propre salle de bain.
Bien que la gestion est confiée à une agence immobilière, Philip suit de près par mail votre installation et s'inquiete que tout se passe bien. Nous avons eu un problème de radiateur durant la semaine et il nous a mis en relation avec cette agence rapidement. 
Villars est toujours un bon choix pour du ski en famille.
name: Apartment in Villars Switzerland

comments:
Tha apartment is perfect.
Impressive location, 3 real minutes to the Roche Grise trainstop to the slopes. A short walk to the Village.
Very well mainteined, very warm in the freezzing winter nights. Everything tidy and very clean.
Very good comunication with Philip even in the distance, who did his best to make us fell like in home.
Lots of useful info provided, doctors, emergencies, taxis, what to see, what to do,...
A pleasure!!!!
name: Apartment in Villars Switzerland

comments:
Maria's demi-chalet in Les Diablerets is a quaint and perfectly agreeable place. All in all a lovely location for a family of 5 to take a ski holiday. Les Diablerets is a rustic Swiss ski village, and this chalet fits in perfectly. If you are looking for an authentic Swiss experience (rather than high profile resort) you will find this meets your needs very well.
Maria communicated clearly with us, and her property matched our (Website hidden by Airbnb) nasty surprises, just a great place to spend quality family time.
Thanx again, Maria!
name: Les Diablerets,  Sleeps 6 - Sunny Chalet - Parking

comments: Very lovely place to stay for skiing and relaxing and enjoying a week with friends. Thanks
name: Les Diablerets,  Sleeps 6 - Sunny Chalet - Parking

comments: Chalet très joli et confortable, ensoleillé, au calme, à deux pas de la navette. Nous y avons passé une très belle semaine.
name: Les Diablerets,  Sleeps 6 - Sunny Chalet - Parking

comments:
Superbe chalet.. Bien ameneger… Beaucoup de chambres a coucher et de lits. 2 salles de bain + 1 WC séparé. Coin salon et cuisine au top. Machine a laver et séche linge a dispo enfin tout était parfait… 
Grand garage, place de parc … Merci pour tout.
name: Les Diablerets,  Sleeps 6 - Sunny Chalet - Parking

comments:
Nous avons été accueillis avec chaleur et convivialité. 
La chambre correspond bien à la description. La maison est calme.
Le petit-déjeuner est copieux.
Nous avons été ravis et espérons bien revenir et profiter de la table d'hôtes.
name: Small room with breakfast - Colombo

comments: Bien situé, la literie est fine ...
name: Chambre à Bussigny EPFL (5)

comments: Costel & Pili have a nice cozy place where you can stay and enjoy Lausanne. We very much appreciated easy and automatic check-in that enabled us to come, practically, at any time. We recommend this place to anyone who is ok with a smaller room, but very cosy one, very clean one, with very simple check-in and parking. For us it was ideal!
name: Chambre à Bussigny EPFL (5)

comments: Really nice appartment, great place to stay! Very welcoming and helpfull host. Clean, broght room. Parking space available.
name: Chambre à Bussigny EPFL (5)

comments: parfait comme toujours!
name: Chambre à Bussigny EPFL (5)

comments: parfait. logement tres agreable. je recommande.
name: Chambre à Bussigny EPFL (5)

comments:
Super chambre , excellente adresse 
Je recommande sans hésitation
name: Chambre à Bussigny EPFL (5)

comments: Endroit très propre et très calme. Divers commerces et restaurants accessibles à pied. La place de parc en option évite de devoir tourner en rond. Bon contact. Endroit agréable pour un court séjour ou si l'on a pas besoin de cuisiner.
name: Chambre à Bussigny EPFL (5)

comments: Une déco plaisante,  un appartement très propre et fonctionnel et un hôte disponible .  Parfait
name: Special Business & Organisation

comments:
A clean and quiet place, so quiet that we had some of the best sleep in a long time. Very comfy bed!
Perfect for short or long walks in the countryside or to town. We walked about 11 miles every day , some of the views are beautiful.
The nearest COOP grocery store is 8 minutes walk away, very easy.
The kitchen is well equipped.
We would certainly return there.
name: Special Business & Organisation

comments: L'appartement est magnifique et en plus tout proche des pistes de ski, je recommande.
name: Charmant duplex

comments: Logement est parfait, très propre, vraiment agréable. Il est idéalement situé pour le ski. Beaucoup de choses à faire aux alentours.
name: Charmant duplex

comments: Appartement super sympa ! Chaleureux, joli avec accès direct aux pistes !!!
name: Charmant duplex

comments: Emplacement idéal pour le ski: l'appartement se situe à proximité directe d'un téléski. Cuisine fonctionnelle et bien équipée.
name: Charmant duplex

comments: Séjour parfait. L'appartement de Ludovic est très agréable, très propre, très bien situé, une vue superbe etc.. Ludovic est très attentionné et réactif. Nous avons découvert les pistes des Mosses très agréables aussi , une petite station très chaleureuse. En bref, un séjour idéal à tous points de vue, merci Ludovic!
