comments: Lieu paisible, endroit cosy, très bonne literie.
name: Charmant duplex

comments:
Appartement très sympa au pied des pistes. 
Ludovic est très attentif à ce que tout de passe bien. 
Très facilement joignable.
name: Charmant duplex

comments: beautiful apartment with a breathtaking view and nice fireplace.
name: Charmant duplex

comments: Un logement très bien placé, à l’identique aux images que Ludovic a mis sur le site, les voisins était sympa en vers nous, je confirme que c’est lieu idéal pour passer quelques jours en amoureux....
name: Charmant duplex

comments: Super toll und sehr ruhig gelegene, saubere Wohnung. Vom (guten) Bett zum Skilift sind es 100m :) . Der kleine Lebensmittel Laden ist zu Fuss erreichbar. Bestens auch für die Anreise mit dem ÖV. Wunderschönes Familien Skigebiet. Sehr netter Nachbar. Nur zu empfehlen !
name: Charmant duplex

comments: Pour la 2ème fois nous sommes venus chez Ludovic. C'était top.
name: Charmant duplex

comments:
Accueil très cordiales et sympathiques! Costel & Pili ont au répondre très rapidement aux questions et transmis les informations nécessaires à temps.
Studio propre et cosy!
name: Chambre Bussigny-près-Lausanne 6

comments: Excellente nuit passé dans ce logement, je recommande et je reviendrai
name: Chambre 2 Bussigny Unil-EPFL

comments: Nice place quiet, clean, nice price and parking just in front of the building.
name: Chambre 2 Bussigny Unil-EPFL

comments: Chambre tres propre, tres proche de la gare. Un peu de bruit vendredi soir du bar juste en dessous mais pas jusqu à tres tard.
name: Chambre 2 Bussigny Unil-EPFL

comments: Très agréable appartement, bien équipé, joliment décoré avec vue sur le lac ! Seul bémol, malgré des radiateurs en fonte qui fonctionnent, il n'y fait pas très chaud, deux radiateurs d'appoint certes sont utilisables mais une sensation de froid, sans doute due au fait que c'est une maison ancienne à l'isolation incertaine. Dès les beaux jours, ce doit être avec son petit jardin un vrai havre de paix et un bonheur d'y loger !
name: 1890 flat garden & vue in center

comments: Great appartement with style and a lot of charme, in a wonderful old and quiet house, all in an easy-to-access location. Perfect place to wind down and certainly even better in summer when you can use the garden and enjoy the view on the lake and the mountains. Thank you for being a great host too Octavio.
name: 1890 flat garden & vue in center

comments:
The apartment is on the ground floor of a grand building c.1900. There is a garden which is only available to the apartment.
The bus is a 6 minute walk, the bus then will get you into the city center in about 10 minutes. The neighborhood is in a very nice residential area. One small convenience shop nearby which sells sandwiches, bread,  canned food, basic items like cheese, salami, toothpaste, beer, cigarettes, etc. Otherwise there are larger grocery stores in town.  The wifi worked great.  I was very happy with the place and would definitely stay there again.
name: 1890 flat garden & vue in center

comments:
Très bon et malheureusement trop court séjour. Je serais bien resté plus longtemps.
Chambre impeccable, accueil parfait, et soirée discussion avec Celine très sympathique autour d'une petite tisane.
Merci et qui sait peut être aurais je à revenir...
name: Charming Attic Room.

comments: Es war ein toller Aufenthalt. Das bzw. die beiden appartments waren schön und funktional eingerichtet. Die Austattung war sehr gut.
name: wintersport Alpe des Chaux

comments: Great experience; nice flats (I recommend to rent both units to feel the "chalet"atmosphere); available and nice hosts!
name: wintersport Alpe des Chaux

comments: Tout était très bien.  Vue magnifique! Pour information les transports en train sont gratuits si vous justifiez de votre hébergement.
name: wintersport Alpe des Chaux

comments: Прекрасный дом для отдыха семьи. Три удобные спальни. Очень хороший интернет. Укомплектован всем необходимым для комфортного отдыха. Изумительный вид из окна на Женевское озеро.
name: Sunset House (Option jacuzzi)

comments: The house has the better view of all Montreux. I stayed with my family for new years eve and we had a wonderful time there. Very clean, confortable and the host are very good helping us with everything we need. Karine even took us to the market. It's a huge climbing to arrive but you still love everything because the house is wonderful. Thanks Yan to let us stay in your paradise.
name: Sunset House (Option jacuzzi)

comments: The host canceled this reservation 49 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Sunset House (Option jacuzzi)

comments: Our group of 4 were very comfortable and happy with Yan’s place. Waking up to that amazing view was everything we hoped it would be and soaking in the hot tub overlooking Lake Geneva was great too.  Recommended!
name: Sunset House (Option jacuzzi)

comments:
Zero room for improvement, an amazing home away from home!

Highly recommended!
name: Sunset House (Option jacuzzi)

comments: Wir haben uns in dem gemütlichen Appartment sehr wohlgefühlt: Es hat eine sehr persönliche Atmosphäre und ist mit allem eingerichtet, was man benötigt und den Aufenthalt angenehm macht. Der Blick vom Balkon auf die Alpen ist traumhaft !
name: Studio avec vue à Villars-sur-Ollon

comments: This is a great place with beautiful views of the mountains. The room is comfortable and very clean and tastefully decorated. It is only a 5 minute walk from the train station and the center of town, very peaceful and elegant. The hostess is very friendly and went out of her away to help us and provide information about Villars. I highly recommend it.
name: Studio avec vue à Villars-sur-Ollon

comments: Com que vem arribar tard al vespre, la recepció de les claus va ser  correcta. La neteja de l'apartament era prou correcta. El pis és més petit del que vem imaginar en les fotografies.  Tenint en compte que hi vem estar quasi dues setmanes,  la roba de casa va ser clarament insuficient. Només hi havia dues tovalloles molt petites. Tampoc no hi havia  gens d'espai lliure a l'armari per deixar la nostra roba. Tot i que es diu que l'esmorzar està inclòs, a la nevera només hi havia dos petits envasos de cafè caducats de feia 2 mesos, a més de menjar mig començat. La nevera no estava gaire neta.  Igualment en els armaris de la cuina, hi havia envasos començats i un desordre considerable.
name: perfect studio In Lausanne center

comments: Très joli séjour sur Lausanne. Appartement très bien agencé, on s'y sent vite à l'aise.
name: perfect studio In Lausanne center

comments:
The apartment was nice, very clean and similar to the pictures.
However, we were a bit disappointed by a couple of things. Firstly, Carolina told us where to find the keys but forgot to mention that we needed a code to enter the building (so we had to wait outside until she answered the phone 15 minutes later - which is a pretty quick answer, but she should have given us this information in our previous exchange). Secondly, it looked like she expected only one person to come (we were a couple): there was only one pillow on the bed, and only one towel (quite a small one, for three nights!) in the bathroom.
So we had to look around to find another towel and a bed-sheet to fold around a pillow from the sofa.

Apart from this, as said, the apartment was satisfying and I recommend it. It is 10 minutes on average from the centre: Lausanne is quite steep, so it actually takes 7 minutes from the apartment down to the center but 13 - and some sweating - from the centre up to the apartment!!! But there were also a tram and a metro station very close to the apartment (although we never used public transportation).
name: perfect studio In Lausanne center

comments: The house is very good. It is very convenient for travellers to live. Just feel like at home and enjoy the time.
name: perfect studio In Lausanne center

comments: Studio très agréable et lumineux, on s'y sent bien! Merci à Carolina pour sa flexibilité au sujet de mes horaires d'arrivée et de départ!
name: perfect studio In Lausanne center

comments: Accommodation convenient
name: perfect studio In Lausanne center

comments: Hugo's place was perfect for us. Everything was very nice, comfortable, and very well put together. The view of the lake was great and the walk to Le Pont was only a few minutes. This is a wonderful cozy place for two- possibly three. Hugo was very nice and made sure we had everything we needed.
name: Room

comments: La vue est imprenable, le calme est absolu, la décoration étudiée : un nid douillet face au lac. Propreté parfaite du studio ; grande réactivité d'Hugo.
name: Room

comments:
The room was better than expected from the photos online - underfloor heating, remote-controlled blinds, cooking facilities and best of all; the view on to the lake. The location of the house was perfect, right by the lake with only a short walk to Le Pont or L’Abbaye. Would be a perfect base for both summer and winter adventures.
Hugo himself was brilliant, responding quickly to any questions and providing us with everything we needed and more - when there was a large snowfall overnight he provided us with snow-shoes without us asking, ensuring we could still adventure!
Will definitely be returning to the area and Hugo’s house in the future, couldn’t have asked for more.
Thank you Hugo!
name: Room

comments: Logement extrêmement propre très bien agencé. Hugo s'est fait un plaisir de nous renseigner sur les randonnées raquettes et pistes de ski de fond qui sont très proches.Nous vous recommandons cet hébergement !
name: Room

comments: Nous avons passé un super séjour chez Hugo. Studio très confortable et aménagé avec goût. Vue imprenable sur le lac en prime. Je recommande chaudement.
name: Room

comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: 093 Nice Room in Prilly

comments:
Un veritable havre de paix! Le chalet est somptueux, la vue magnifique. Nos hits ont su nous mettre tellement à l'aise qu'on se serait cru à la maison! Nous étions un groupe de 6, et l'espace est tellement grand qu'on ne se marche pas dessus. 
À recommander sans hésiter.
name: Top level family chalet/apartement

comments: Great place. Good location. Family had a lovely weekend there. We will stay again
name: Top level family chalet/apartement

comments:
In dem ruhigen Ort Fiez inmitten von Landwirtschaft und Rebbergen haben wir ein grosses, gut beheiztes und eingerichtetes Appartement angetroffen. Es hatte genügend Platz für unsere persönlichen Sachen.
Camille war sehr zuvorkommend und hat sich sehr um unser Wohlergehen gesorgt.
Herzlichen Dank Camille - die Unterkunft ist sehr zu empfehlen.
name: Comfy 3bd between lake and mountain

comments: My stay at Camille's home was very excellent!  This was my first Airbnb stay, and I was impressed!  Camille's communication was excellent throughout the process.  The apartment was comfortable and well equipped.  Thank You Camille!
name: Comfy 3bd between lake and mountain

comments:
Nous avons passé une semaine très agréable au chalet. Caroline et Cécile sont très accueillantes et le chalet est superbe. Nous avons bcp aimé voir les albums photos de leur travail de restauration du bâtiment après l'avoir acheté.

Il est vraiment bien situé. Facile d'accès avec un grand parking, juste un escalier en bois à monter et les voies de chemin de fer. D'ailleurs les enfants ont adoré regarder les trains (Goldenpass) passer.
C'était très pratique pour rejoindre Chateau-d'Oex ou le Col des Mosses.
Malgré le manque de neige nous avons pu trouver de quoi nous occuper avec la patinoire, les randonnées, la visite de la chocolaterie Cailler ou les fromageries.

Caroline et Cécile ont été des hôtes adorables et on aimerait beaucoup revenir chez elles à nouveau si nous devions revenir dans la région.
name: Appartement sur 2 étages

comments: Nettes, charmantes Chalet. Die Zimmer wurden liebevoll renoviert und eingerichtet. Liegt direkt an der MOB-Linie. Das Chalet ist ziemlich abgelegen. Im Winter kann die Zugangsstrasse sehr eisig werden, weil nicht schwarzgeräumt wird. Wir hatten in dieser grössere Probleme.
name: Appartement sur 2 étages

comments: Un grand chalet agréable à vivre avec 4 grandes chambres et un grand salon. Parfait pour un grand groupe ou 2 familles.
name: Appartement sur 2 étages

comments: gemütlich
name: Appartement sur 2 étages

comments: Logement très agréable. Accueil sympathique. A recommander pour découvrir cette très belle région.
name: Appartement 4 pce, vue sur le Lac

comments:
That apartment is great, the beds are really confortable and the space just as described. The view is awesome and the location too if you have a car.
Marlyse was nice, always available and kind, we left with a great experience
name: Appartement 4 pce, vue sur le Lac

comments: Appartement spacieux, très propre et au calme. Accueil parfait.
name: Appartement 4 pce, vue sur le Lac

comments:
We enjoyed our stay. Marlyse and her family are truly great. They waited for us until midnight as our flight was delayed and provided us with food. Marlyse's husband also gave us a ride to the airport. 

As for the place, it's exactly as it looks in the pictures. Spacious and clean. 

The location of the house is great as well. 15minutes to 1hr30 drive from lots of touristic sites.

Very recommended.
name: Appartement 4 pce, vue sur le Lac

comments: Perfect place to check out this nice area.
name: Appartement 4 pce, vue sur le Lac

comments: Great place to stop for our crew, we were working, so no chance to take in the sights 😕 great views of lac leman..
name: Appartement 4 pce, vue sur le Lac

comments: Great place to stop for our crew, we were working, so no chance to take in the sights  great views of lac leman..
name: Appartement 4 pce, vue sur le Lac

comments: Très bel appartement. Nous y reviendrons avec plaisir.
name: Joli appartement, vue magnifique

comments: Patricia est toujours très sympathique et la communication ainsi que l'organisation du séjour parfaits. Merci et à la prochaine :-)
name: Joli appartement, vue magnifique

comments: Très bel appartement / Patricia est à notre écoute / Le Wifi est un plus
name: Joli appartement, vue magnifique

comments:
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour.
l'appartement est encore mieux que sur les photos.
Patricia s'est montrée très arrangeante et facile à contacter.
Nous recommandons à 100%.
Sonia
name: Joli appartement, vue magnifique

comments: Nous venons chaque année dans ce très bel appartement. Il est spacieux et très fonctionnel. Nous passons toujours un excellent séjour.
name: Joli appartement, vue magnifique

comments: Je recommande vivement Patricia et son appartement à Leysin. Patricia répond très rapidement si vous avez une question. Son appartement est bien situé, très chaleureux. L'espace devant la maison est idéal lorsque nous sejournons avec des enfants. Nous avons passé un super séjour à Leysin
name: Joli appartement, vue magnifique

comments: Nice apartment. Great location. Amazing view.
name: Joli appartement, vue magnifique

comments: Patricia's place is super cozy and perfectly situated for going skiing. It has everything you need and is very homely.
name: Joli appartement, vue magnifique

comments: C'était ma première expérience sur airbnb et elle réussie car la maison de Nicolas est spacieuse et dispose d'un équipement complet pour passer un séjour agréable avec un plus le jardin pour les enfants  et une vue imprenable sur le lac leman et les alpes. Essayer c'est l'adopté !
name: Arzier House, Alps View, 30min to Geneva/Lausanne

comments: Accueillis chaleureusement  par Mirjam. Logement calme, propre et reposant. Idéal pour se ressourcer. Mirjam et son conjoint sont très disponibles et discrets. Agréable proximité avec la nature. Rapport qualité prix très correct. Nous recommandons cette adresse!
name: Holiday flat - Lake Geneva region

comments:
Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable chez Juana Maria et son mari, dans un chalet très bien situé pour la vue et le calme (même si une rote est juste en contrebas, très peu de circulation). De plus le chalet est très bien équipé, et il fait bon chaud.... il est très propre aussi. J'ai aussi beaucoup apprécié la disponibilité et la confiance du couple.
Ne pas hésiter à louer.
name: Chalet Gryon - vue spectaculaire

comments:
Witam serdecznie, Spedzilem wraz z moja rodzina kilka dni we wspanialym apartamencie u Christine. Wszystko bylo zgodne z wczesniejszym opisem Gospodyni: Kuchnia rewelacyjnie wyposazona, ogromna przestrzen, duzy taras, czysta toaleta oraz lazienka, komfort 100%, poza tym miejsce parkingowe przy wejsciu do budynku, sasiedzi spokojni i sympatyczni. A propos Christine, bardzo mila, ciepla, serdeczna i w kazdej chwili pomocna takze troskliwa po prostu super kobieta. Z cala odowiedzialnoscia baaaardzo polecam. 
Slawek
name: Comfortable apartment in small Swiss village

comments:
Appartement très propre, spacieux, idéalement situé,avec balcon et vue panoramique sur le Léman 
Accueil au top
name: 103 Beautiful apartment in Pully

comments:
We stayed at this location from Jan 9th to the 25/16. It was everything that it showed on the website. We found it to be pretty close to all modes of transportation and also close to a couple of nice restaurants the we ate at.  And less than 1/2 a block away was a great bakery that we visited often, we could see the bakery from the kitchen window.
There is a clothes washer that you can us and some drying racks so this came in handy for us. Very  close to the lake to go for a walk and feed the birds.
name: 103 Beautiful apartment in Pully

comments: Chambre agréable et bien située par rapport au centre ville de Lausanne. Je la recommande.
name: The perfect stay in Lausanne :)

comments: Very nice stay in Lausanne! And Giulia is definitely a very nice host! She made a little video to help me find the place, which is super helpful!
name: The perfect stay in Lausanne :)

comments: Giulia is responsive, she has a great and very easy to navigate check in process. Her roommates are very friendly. The room and apartment are very clean and just as pictured. Great place to stay for people wanting to socialise and meet new people.
name: The perfect stay in Lausanne :)

comments: The location is great, very warm. Perfect for family or friends.
name: High Mountain Chalet - Great Views!

comments: Très bon acceuil.
name: Cozy room 20 min away from lausanne

comments: Des hôtes aux petits soins, très attentionés, et extrêmement disponibles. Le logement se situe dans le centre de lausanne. Je recommande vivement ce logement.
name: Cozy bedroom, Lausanne downtown

comments: Very nice couple and very helpful people. I had a lovely breakfast with valéria and her boyfriend. The appartment is quiet old and cold and they smoke inside.
name: Cozy bedroom, Lausanne downtown

comments: Valeria n'a pas pu accepté ma réservation car n'était pas présente pour remettre les clés. Elle m'a appelé pour me prévenir et s'excuser. Je la remercie pour son appel. Tres bonne communication et personne très agréable
name: Cozy bedroom, Lausanne downtown

comments: Très bon moment passé chez Valéria et Anton. Ils sont avenants, serviables, absolument pas envahissant. Je recommande.
name: Cozy bedroom, Lausanne downtown

comments: Esperienza negativa da non ripetere per le condizioni generali della stanza letto e servizi igienici, sporchi
name: Cozy bedroom, Lausanne downtown

comments: Un accueil chaleureux et sympathique accompagné d'une très bonne ambiance.
name: Cozy bedroom, Lausanne downtown

comments: Accueil très chaleureux. Valeria et Anton sont très amicaux, nous avons partagés deux bonnes journées ensemble. Ils nous ont donné plein de précieux conseils sur Lausanne. Nous recommandons cet Airbnb, bien placé, bon rapport qualité prix. Aujourd'hui, nous sommes devenus amis.
name: Cozy bedroom, Lausanne downtown

comments:
Hubert nos deu informações precisas sobre como chegar ao apartamento e estava lá esperando-nos para explicar como tudo funcionava. O apartamento é novo, as peças são amplas e tem um banheiro para cada quarto, o que nos ajudou muito já que viajamos com  2 filhos adolescentes!
As camas são muito boas e a cozinha é muito bem equipada. Mas nada se compara a vista da sala de estar, para os Alpes!!!!
Há pontos de ônibus bem em frente ao prédio, que levam a todo lugar. Tivemos uma estadia ótima, recomendo muito! Obrigada Hubert!!!!
name: 120m2-modern/view -Ouchy/ Lausanne

comments: The location is very convenient, close to the train station, shops and restaurants. Noe was very nice and easy-going. He shared the food he prepared with us. We had a very nice time in Lausanne.
name: Right at the station, calm and cosy

comments: Excellent property. Sarah and her family have so many fantastic amenities and they made us feel very welcome during our stay. Property is clean and location is very convenient.
name: Le Vieux Chalet,Château-d'Oex:Authentically Swiss!

comments: Tip top avec Markus, il a su être très compréhensif et patient, nous l'en remercions grandement. La maison est très chouette, avec une très belle vue. Nous ne manquerons pas de faire revenir les collègues chez vous si l'occasion se présente. Merci !
name: Au coeur de la nature, à deux pas de la Ville !

comments:
Yogini est une hote parfaite, arrangeante et flexible.
Elle sera toujours a l écoute.
name: At a stone s throw from the city centre cosy flat

comments: Very convenient place, near the bus 1 and 3 make it easy to commute. It is near the pibar, a nice bar to try local beers. Yogini is very responsive and make everything to make the check in and check out very easy.
name: At a stone s throw from the city centre cosy flat

comments: The apartment is very very well located (btw. Lausanne & Geneva, near some beautiful spots of the Jura mountains) and in the heart of a typical Swiss village. The apartment is new and light-flooded, the dormitory and private bathroom are proper and clean. Last but not least, Sophie is the perfect host - cordial, honest and generous! I can fully recommend the place to anyone.
name: Pretty room with a balcony

comments:
logement très propre accueil agréable 
Pas de soucis pour les frileux le chauffage est intense
Nous retournerons sans problème si nous sommes de nouveau dans la région
name: Pretty room with a balcony

comments: Darren is a great host and he is going to make you comfortable while you stay at his place. When I arrived in Geneva, Swissport took more than 2 nights to deliver my luggage. Darren gave me all support to cope with that situation. I really thanks Darren for the pleasant stay in Nyon. Moreover, his apartment is clean, it is in a very good location and the room has plenty space. Great deal.
name: Rive du Lac

comments: Frank et Florence m'ont très bien accueilli dans leur spacieux appartement en attique avec TV dans la chambre d'invité. Ils sont sympas, disponibles et bien organisé.
name: Chambre, coin salon TV, Douche/lavabo /WC privatif

comments: Location très agréable pour le tourisme et la détente. Couple très sympathique et chaleureux. Je recommande
name: Chambre, coin salon TV, Douche/lavabo /WC privatif

comments:
Kind host, nice family atmosphere, nice room according to description. I stayed there just for one night but I guess it would be a great place to stay longer for a ski holiday. 

Parking is a little far... but if you are able to ski, you are able to walk 5 - 10 minutes :)
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: I was late but Merlin was there and carried my bag up. He answered all my various questions with patience even though he's probably answered them many times before. Chalet is a hostel: shared kitchen etc.  But organised and tidy. No parking and you can hear people moving about. Ensuite bed very comfy, big pillows, clean linen and towels. Shower basic.
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: Tout d'abord le lieux n'est pas facile d'accès.  200m de sentier à monter si on arrive à se garer le long de la route la plus proche. Le chalet en lui même est très joli, mais ne mérite à mon avis pas une note très haute du simple fait de sa mauvaise insonorisation. Je pense que c'est un très bon endroit où aller quand on est seul, ou à la limite avec un groupe d'amis mais certainement pas pour un week-end en amoureux.
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: Merlin's place was fantastic! Spectacular views, comfy beds, and a well stocked kitchen. I would definitely recommend it!
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: Endroit ideal pour venir en groupe d'amis, en bande de copains skieurs, pas vraiment pour escapade romantique car l'isolation entre les chambres n'est pas bonne! N'hésitez pas a demander des bons plans à Merlin, c'est un puit de bonnes idées et très disponible !
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: There is nothing like Chalet Martin! Merlin is the most easygoing and friendly host and the chalet is a warm, cozy place to meet wonderful people and get plugged in to local activities and excursions. The mountain view is breathtaking and we were able to get terrific advice on local ski areas (even rented skis on-site), hiking paths, and the thermal baths. We loved cooking dinner each night in the massive kitchen and celebrating New Year's overlooking the Alps around a campfire. Chalet Martin gets better each time we return - highly recommend staying with Merlin and seeing this extraordinary place for yourself!
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments:
Die Unterkunft ist zentral gelegen. Das Ambiente ist gut. Keine Parkplätze vorhanden. Wer viel Gepäck hat, ist schlecht bedient.
Aber ansonsten ist ein internationales Feeling zu spüren. Wir würden wieder hingehen.
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: It was my second stay at Merlin’s place and it was as great as the first time! The difference was is that this time we stayed in an ensuite and it was lovely. Merlin and Katie were extremely accommodating and helpful. Merlin responded to my messages almost immediately. The place was very cosy, atmospheric and a great value for money. We will definitely come back again in the summer.
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: It was a great experience at Merlin’s chalet. The chalet is located in the perfect location, the view is unbeatable! Inside the chalet it was very clean and organized. Everyone was welcoming and nice! Over all a great experience! Thank you !
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: We spent a very cozy and awesome time at "Chalet Martin". The hostel in the old wooden Chalet is super charming and we spend some incredible relaxing hours in front of the chimney or outside on the terrace in the sun. We met a lot of interesting and inspiring people there. Even if it was quite full around New Years the area next to Gryon (Solalex, Villars) was wonderful. Our double room was perfect for a short stay. For longer stays we would have missed a place to store our clothes (a shelf or a dresser would be perfect). Furthermore you should be aware that "Chalet Martin" is a hostel and not a superclean hotel. So for example every guest can prepare the meal in the kitchen and has to clean by oneself afterwards, wich works out perfectly well most of the time and we really liked it, but maybe it is not the right thing for everybody. Besides the old house is poorly soundproofed, which means that you can hear the other guests especially in the morning hours. But at night it was quite silent. If you don't care to much about those things you will have a great stay at "Chalet Martin". The unbeatable prices (for Swiss conditions) should be mentioned as well. So even if you don't have too much money you can spent a wonderful and cozy time in the Swiss alps. Thank you guys for an unforgettable New Years in Switzerland!
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: Great place to stay, the place makes you feel at home immediately :)
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: The room is very clean, the place itself is an Hostel. The host is very welcoming and the view on the mountains is breathtaking.
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: If you are looking for a relaxed atmosphere with a community feeling, you will find the right place at Chalet Martin.
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: Cosy bedroom in a beautiful and friendly chalet. We do love the Swiss Alps ! Thank you for the warm welcoming.
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: Great place with amazing views and a wonderful family, parking is a bit annoying but totally worty it
name: Chalet Martin En Suite

comments: Malgré des problèmes de parking, le Châlet Martin est un lieu chaleureux avec des hôtes sympathiques et attentifs. Très chouette séjour :-)
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments:
Awesome Place to stay for weekend or holidays!! 

there is everything you need and the people are very friendly and sympatic!!
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: Great place that's convenient to ski lifts and is very cozy. Was perfect to spend one night in the midst of the trip. Loved the view from windows and room balcony. Recommend to other travelers.
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: Great chalet in a swiss mountain city. Very cosy and the people are super friendly. I definitely recommend to stay here.
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: Wenn man bei Merlin eincheckt, sollte man wissen, das dies ein Hostel ist. Hat uns zu keiner Zeit gestört, im Gegenteil! Alles sehr nette, tolle Leute hier!!! Man trifft wirklich viele unterschiedliche Nationen und alle sind sehr höflich und interessiert. Wir kommen auf alle Fälle wieder, nicht nur im Winter! Ach so, Auto braucht man hier übrigens nicht unbedingt. Alles ist auch sehr gut mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen.
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: Très beau chalet. Accueil agréable. C'est un lieu de passage pour les voyageurs qui aiment faire du ski ou de la randonnée. Quand nous y sommes allés il y avait du monde, c'était la fête mais dans le respect des autres et il n'y avait plus de bruit après 11 pm. Merlin est très sympatique. Tout est bien organisé, sauf peut être le parking qui est loin. On vous conseille ce lieu, un voyage dans le voyage.
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: Great place with amazing atmosphere! An ideal option for budget travelling. The host was nice and helpful and made my stay very comfortable.
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: great experience!
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: Simple et cordiale, une auberge espagnole pleine de vie
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: we really enjoyed our stay in Gryon. The host was very friendly and organised. There were a lot of other guests in the house and all of them were sooo lovely. The area is beautiful even though we didn't have any snow.
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: The hostel has a beautiful atmosphere of warmth and life. Great conversation, great kitchen as a hub, and comfortable, decent sized beds, I slept well. And you wake up to a breathtaking view of snowcapped mountains rising infront of you. Not going to forget this place.
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: Nice and near the slopes! You can even rent ski stuff
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: This is a great place to stay for a few days in a very relax atmosphere. We came with 2 small children and they really loved it, playing with other children, close to the snow. Great value for money.
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments: I had a very pleasant two-week stay. Everyone was very friendly and hospitable. The chalet provided an excellent stepping stone for this newcomer to Switzerland to explore both the mountain villages and Lausanne and Montreaux, thanks to the convenient tram that regularly passes by. I would definitely recommend this wonderful home- away-from-home to anyone!
name: Chalet Martin Hostel Dorms

comments:
Je recommande, sophie est très sympathique et acceuillante.
Bonne propreté.
name: pour professionnel ou sportif

comments: Une semaine très agréable en compagnie de Sophie, toujours à l'écoute et très arrangeante. Si vous avez envie de tranquillité je vous la conseille vivement.
name: pour professionnel ou sportif

comments: Simple et efficace. A refaire
name: pour professionnel ou sportif

comments: Sympa!
name: pour professionnel ou sportif

comments: très bon accueil
name: pour professionnel ou sportif

comments:
Très heureuse rencontre, merci pour l accueil chaleureux
Une chambre, très confortable
Je conseille
name: pour professionnel ou sportif

comments: Un accueil chaleureux et une chambre très confortable. Sophie est une hôte très attentionnée.
name: pour professionnel ou sportif

comments: Ameline was a fantastic host! The flat was in a great location and had all the necessities.
name: Lovely flat in town center

comments: Amelines flat was very comfortable and located very close to the metro line. About 100metres from Ours station. The pictures were very accurate and Amelibe was very helpful with information. I would recommend staying here
name: Lovely flat in town center

comments: Excellent location just off the metro M2 and near the city centre!
name: Lovely flat in town center

comments: Very pleasant stay. Practically located,  very clean and comfortable
name: Lovely flat in town center

comments: Très belle prestation pour cet appartement propre, fonctionnel et idéalement situé. Je suis ravi d'avoir pu partager cet agréable séjour et discuter avec Ameline qui m'a très bien reçu.
name: Private Room - City center

comments: Very nice and central place, moments away from the metro. Ameline is a kind and helpful host - highly recommended!
name: Private Room - City center

comments: Ameline is super host, her apartment  is spacious and clean, very close to the Metro station. There's lot's of the shops and supermarket near by. Highly recommended.
name: Private Room - City center

comments: The house was very clean and it is located in a very good position. Highly recommend!
name: Private Room - City center

comments:
This is a lovely accommodation in a great location. The chalet is very well-equipped and all our needs were catered for.

Marcel was extremely good in communicating with us before we arrived, and recommended some really good restaurants and things to do. He was also very responsive during our stay whenever we had any questions.

Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and we would highly recommend Marcel and his chalet to anyone who wants to stay in the area.
name: Charming Swiss Mountain Apartment

comments: Place has wonderful view! Air balloons could be seen from the living room! Very nice, roomy, clean place with well equipped kitchen Wonderful stay!
name: Charming Swiss Mountain Apartment

comments: Très bel endroit entièrement conforme aux photos. Vue majestueuse, parking couvert appréciable, bon équipement et agencement de l’appartement. Marcel a fait preuve d’une tres bonne communication. Nous reviendrons sans hésiter !
name: Charming Swiss Mountain Apartment

comments:
This year was our second stay and it’s still a gorgeous flat with a beautiful view. It’s very clean and well equipped for a couple or a family. With the responsiveness of Marcel, it’s very easy to have some tips about what to visit or good places for a meal.
If we come back in the region, we will come back for sure.
name: Charming Swiss Mountain Apartment

comments: Excellent communication and punctuality  from the host. Place was sparkling clean and in outstanding condition, every little detail was taken care off. Fully equipped kitchen, overall excellent experience and highly recommended. Absolutely recommended.
name: Charming Swiss Mountain Apartment

comments:
Superbe chalet datant de 1909 avec des prestations à la hauteur des photos et un hote très friendly. 
A recommander chaudement !
name: Chalet Martin Rustic Room

comments: Unkomplizierte Übernachtsmöglichkeit, faires Preis-Leistungsverhältnis & top Sauberkeit.
name: Chalet Martin Rustic Room

comments: Me and my friends spent just a night at Merlins place but we loved the whole stay. Atmosphere between the house community and guests is nice and everybody is helpful. Next skiseasson I would love to spent my time there!
name: Chalet Martin Rustic Room

comments: Un endroit idyllique pour un séjour dans cette belle station :) ! Merci pour l'accueil et le confort de la chambre privée !!!
name: Chalet Martin Rustic Room

comments: Отличный хостел с отдельными комнатами. Уютный огромный шале в маленьком швейцарском городке с невероятными видами. Город вызвал неописуемый восторг и стал одной из жемчужин в нашем путешествии по Европе. Само шале расчитано на большие компании туристов или любителей активного отдыха в горах.
name: Chalet Martin Rustic Room

comments:
Notre séjour dans ce joli chalet de Rougemont était très agréable. Une semaine en janvier avec notre petite fille. Nous avons été très gentiment accueilli par un cadeau de bienvenue (vin & fromage, merci beaucoup !). Moriya et Ira ont accepté de décaler d'un jour notre venue car nous avions un empêchement important.

Le chalet est meublé de manière chaleureuse. Nous avons beaucoup aimé la cheminée et la belle vue sur les montagnes et la vallée. 
Au 1er étage, il y a le petit salon cosy avec salle à manger et cuisine toute équipée + 1 chambre avec deux lits simples (déco simple) et salle de bains.
Un couloir non isolé descend au rez-de-chaussée où il y a 2 chambres (une simple est une double bien décorée) et une salle de bains-douche.
Au sous-sol un garage fermé pratique pour la voiture et le matériel de ski.
Si vous avez un enfant en bas âge, un baby-phone peut être utile pour entendre l'enfant le soir si vous êtes au salon.
Merci pour cet agréable séjour :-)
name: Alp Sunrise - Top View Cozy Chalet

comments: Wir hatten einen bezaubernden Aufenthalt im Chalet. Das Ziel unseres Abstechers war 2 Tage zu entspannen und dem Alltag zu entfliehen. Dies hat hier wunderbar geklappt! Die Kommunikation verlief reibungslos und prompt. Sehr gerne wieder!
name: Alp Sunrise - Top View Cozy Chalet

comments: Moriya’s place is very comfortable and cozy. Didi was very helpful in letting us in and showing us everything. The chalet is very close to the mountain lift and the little shop. I would totally recommend this place.
name: Alp Sunrise - Top View Cozy Chalet

comments:
We have resided in Ramona's apartment for 4 days to spend New Year in Lausanne. It's very clean, comfortable, beautifully decorated and convenient. We were 3 (2 adults and a child).
It's on the lake and close to the various places to visit. Everything is exactly consistent with what is described. Hospitality is really friendly and warm, you feel very well and you want to come again. Ramona is really a great host, helpful, accessible and always ready to give informations. She really wants to make you feel well. We highly recommend this place and its host.
name: Charming&cozy flat, unique location by the lake!

comments:
I stayed at Ramona's appartment for one week. It was just perfect! The location couldn't be better, it is right next to metro (Ouchy) and the lake. Also, there are plenty of restaurants around a bakery literally downstairs. 
Ramona was out of town when I arrived, so she arranged a friend of her for handing over the key and showing me around. All went perfect!
And the appartment is just what I was looking for. Nice, clean, and very nicely set-up. The kitchen is fully equiped and Ramona even left a little present for my arrival. Real hospitality! Thanks again!
name: Charming&cozy flat, unique location by the lake!

comments: We enjoyed every second spent in Mohna's flat. It was cozy, warm and it felt like home.
name: Charming&cozy flat, unique location by the lake!

comments: Mohna's apartment is the ideal place to stay in Lausanne. The view is incredible to wake up to, the mountains are at your doorstep. I would definitely return to stay at Mohna's place in the future.
name: Charming&cozy flat, unique location by the lake!

comments: Mohna ist eine sehr aufmerksame Gastgeberin. Sie hat alle Nachrichten sofort beantwortet und war bei jeder Anfrage sehr zuvorkommend. Die Wohnung ist studentisch aber wirklich gemütlich und unglaublich schön gelegen. Wohnzimmer mit traumhaftem Blick auf den Genfer See. Ich freue mich schon auf den nächsten Aufenthalt.
name: Charming&cozy flat, unique location by the lake!

comments: Super good location to the Metro, beautiful lake view, very clean and very quick response!
name: Charming&cozy flat, unique location by the lake!

comments: Appartement nickel propre et fonctionnel.
name: Modern studio close to Beaulieu

comments:
Pierre's place is a studio in a residencial area with strict rules and scheduling regarding the washing machine and dryer (something common in Switzerland). If you are thinking of staying long, speak to Pierre in advance about when you could use the laundry facilities.

Pierre is very accessible and responsive and overall the studio is nice, clean and 15 minutes away by bus from city centre. Good value for money. :)
name: Modern studio close to Beaulieu

comments: Bon rapport qualité prix
name: Modern studio close to Beaulieu

comments: LA PETITE MAISON est jolie et magnifiquement située au coeur des vignobles, avec une vue imprenable sur le lac Léman. La proximité de la charmante ville de Morges est un atout considérable. La maison est très bien pour 2 personnes mais ne convient pour 4. Le salon n'est pas confortable.
name: La Petite Maison

comments: We had a great time in the Castel. The view of the lake and mountain under snow is amazing. The communication is also very smooth. Ulla is very helpful. Montreux is a lovely town, the castel make it a great stay!
name: B & B Résidence Castel Les Chênes

comments: This just might be the best view in Montreux. Staying in this castle was so fun and Ulla and Hermann are the sweetest people. Great location with a view of Chateau de Chillon. Highly recommend!
name: B & B Résidence Castel Les Chênes

comments: Sarah has been a very helpful host with interesting stories about the region. She speaks both English and French fluently (Spanish too). The apartment is quite spacious and is located right next to the station which makes it very convenient to go places (the train to Geneve Cornavin is only 20 minutes and just 4 minutes to Nyon). Highly recommended for travellers who want to discover the townships on the Swiss side of lake Leman.
name: Cozy room 2mins from station

comments: Great room and location, loved it! sad to leave
name: 39 - Magnifique chambre indépendante

comments: This place is great. Excellent location close to everything you might need (including ski lifts). And lots of space and amenities to make your stay wonderful.
name: Cosy Chalet in city centre, 11 pax

comments: Great chalet for larger parties right by town and with easy access to slopes.
name: Cosy Chalet in city centre, 11 pax

comments:
Nous avons passé un super week-end dans le chalet aux Îles. Nous étions 6 adultes et 6 enfants. Le chalet est parfait pour un grand groupe et très bien situé. Proche du départ du télécabine mais également du village. Les enfants ce sont éclatés à jouer dans le jardin.
Netty est également très disponible pour répondre aux éventuelles questions.
name: Cosy Chalet in city centre, 11 pax

comments: Chalet idéalement situé et spacieux avec tout le confort nécessaire!
name: Cosy Chalet in city centre, 11 pax

comments: Nathalie was an awesome host! She came pick me up at the hospital and cooked very nice meals for dinner. The appartment is even better than on the pictures, very cozy and welcoming. Would recommend you to stay there!
name: Chambre avec balcon près du CHUV

comments: Claire-Lise è stata molto gentile e disponibile per far fronte a tutte le esigenze ed eventuali inconvenienti. Consigliata vivamente.
name: Chambres d'hôtes

comments:
Je recommande à 1000% le logement chez claire-lise. C'est une femme d'une extrême gentillesse qui a tout fait pour que mon séjour chez elle se passe à merveille :et c'est réussit !!! Arrangeante et pleines de bons conseils je ne regrette pas mon séjour chez elle . D'autant plus que la chambre est agrable, propre et fonctionnelle. 
À très bientôt et milles merci !
name: Chambres d'hôtes

comments:
Très beau week-end au milieu des montagnes jurassiennes suisses.
Proche des pistes de ski et de luges.
name: Chambres d'hôtes

comments: tout parfait pour qui veut se reposer au pied du Chasseron ! lieu très beau, très bon accueil de claire Lise,  et je vous recommande de gouter à sa délicieuse cuisine!  un régal !
name: Chambres d'hôtes

comments: We're allowed to spend a weekend at the strong man run 2018 in one of the beautiful apartments of amelie and francois. It's a bit out of the way with a beautiful view. The apartment was perfectly clean and equipped with everything you need for a weekend. We would definitely come again.
name: Duplex in the mountains - Les Trois Ours

comments: We spent a charming week in Émilie and François’s apartment. The space is small but perfectly arranged to comfortably fit a family of three. The location is high above the village of Gryon with some breathtaking views, especially at sunset, as noted in previous reviews. The surroundings are peaceful and quiet, and we truly felt in our own little cosy world once we were tucked away from the winter cold after a day of skiing. The bedroom in the mezzanine was as cosy as a little nest and our 2 (nearly 3) years old boy found it especially entertaining to climb the ladder (under our supervision!) at bedtime and close the hatch!  For skiing the location was good and you can walk to a T-bar lift or drive/take the bus to the telecabin in Barboleuse. Since we had our own car we ended up driving to Villars most days and taking the train or gondola up to the slopes, and then after a day of skiing we would spend some time in Villars (there’s a Migros in town to buy food and wine) before heading up to our cosy retreat in time for sunset. Overall a lovely stay!
name: Duplex in the mountains - Les Trois Ours

comments:
L'accueil d'Isabelle a été très chaleureux. J'ai apprécié la décoration de son appartement et la chambre est très spacieuse et confortable, avec une grande baie-vitrée donnant sur un balcon. De délicieux chocolat de bienvenue nous y attendaient.
Merci Isabelle et peut-être à une autre fois.
name: Double room in Lausanne

comments: I reserved this room for my boss and he was very happy with the apartment and the location. Isabelle wasn't there but she had no problem to give her apartment to my boss. Thank you for your trust! A pity that he couldn't meet you. :)
name: Double room in Lausanne

comments: Milieu merveilleux, hôtes géniaux, chat charmant. Un vrai plaisir!
name: Au coeur de Cully (Lavaux UNESCO)

comments:
la chambre et l'appartement correspondaient exactement à la description.Très agréable. Notre hôte très sympathique.
Au centre de Lausanne dans une rue piétonne. Idéal pour visiter à pied.
Nous avions une place de parking au pied de l'immeuble.
Adresse à recommander.
name: 170m2 duplex 2 bedroom 2 bath, center-free parking

comments: The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: 170m2 duplex 2 bedroom 2 bath, center-free parking

comments: It was a very nice and comfortable stay with Jennifer and her friendly family (and dog:)) The apartment is big, new and functional and Jennifer was very welcoming and helpful with our queries during the stay.
name: 170m2 duplex 2 bedroom 2 bath, center-free parking

comments: Good host, easy communication and flexible.
name: 170m2 duplex 2 bedroom 2 bath, center-free parking

comments: Lausanne is a nice city. Jennifer's house is big. One bedroom for us but there's no wifi yet.
name: 170m2 duplex 2 bedroom 2 bath, center-free parking

comments:
The house is located in the center of Lausanne downtown. Metro is very close.
Jennifer is very kind and do her best to solve all the inconveniences.
She moved recently to her new house, a little different from picture, but still big and comfortable.
We had a great stay.
name: 170m2 duplex 2 bedroom 2 bath, center-free parking

comments:
Hôte charmante et très arrangeante.  Appartement bien situé.
MAIS l'hôte a déménagé et n'a pas réactualisé les photos ni les infos. 
Pas d'ascenseur. Le parking est à 800 m et n'est pas du tout destiné à quelqu'un d'autre que la voiture de l'hôte. J'ai du payer et pour l'instant j'attends le remboursement des 35 Francs suisse pour une journée. Les codes wifi n'ont pas fonctionné : pas de wifi. 1 Lit pour deux tout petit.
name: 170m2 duplex 2 bedroom 2 bath, center-free parking

comments: Nous avons adoré cette chambre qui offre une vue à couper le souffle ! Nous avons profité d’un ciel étoilé. Magnifique ! Véronique , Pierre et leurs filles sont adorables et très accueillants ! Ils sont passionnés par l’endroit où ils vivent et réussissent à la  partager.
name: Fantastic view over the Alps

comments: Everything was perfect.
name: Swiss Chalet - Stunning view

comments: We had a wonderful stay at Lucinda's Chalet. The location is fantastic with stunning views and the chalet itself is lovely. Would highly recommend a stay here and hope to return in the future.
name: Swiss Chalet - Stunning view

comments: Très bel emplacement, calme reposant et chalet très bien équipé.
name: Swiss Chalet - Stunning view

comments: Grand chalet avec belle espace pour les enfants.
name: Swiss Chalet - Stunning view

comments: Le magnifique chalet de Lucinda est tout simplement parfait! Grand et décoré avec goût, on y retrouve tout ce dont on a besoin tant au niveau de l'équipement de cuisine que du mobilier et de l'aménagement qui nous comble à tout point de vue. La communication avec Lucinda est facile et agréable. Je vous recommande ce chalet pour son emplacement avec vue magnifique, son aménagement, ses commodités et pour le bien être qu'on y ressent dès l'entrée dans les lieux. Merci Lucinda! Au plaisir de vous visiter à nouveau!
name: Swiss Chalet - Stunning view

comments: Great place!! Great location!! Great stay!! Bet well organized!! Will definitely be back again!!!
name: Swiss Chalet - Stunning view

comments: The places location is pretty ok especially for students of UNIL or EPFL and the room is comfortable enough for studying sessions. I woukd recommend it :)
name: big room

comments: Lovely chalet! Great view, relaxed and pleasant atmosphere. Lots of cooking going on and everything smelled delicious! I definitely recommend.
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: Really great place, the room was clean and tidy and we received a really good welcome. We only stayed a night but I would definitely recommend Chalet Martin to anyone.
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: Très chouette endroit, très convivial et chaleureux. Chambre propre et parfaitement agencé. Nous n'étions là que pour une nuit, mais aurions volontiers prolongé notre séjour.
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments:
Le chalet est vraiment authentique. Si vous aimez l'ambiance "colo" et le contact avec des gens de toute horizons, je vous recommande vivement cette hostel ! 

Nous avions notre bébé avec et Martin nous a fourni tous ce qu'il faut (chaise haute, jeux, etc.), il a aussi 2 enfants et apprécie beaucoup les petits!
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments:
Séjour très agréable au Chalet Martin. Ambiance Cosy dans ce chalet de montagne, qui accueille aussi en dortoir des étudiants, saisonniers venus pour la saison et passionnés de montagne. La cuisine, le salon et la salle à manger sont autant de lieux d'échange. La chambre est très confortable, spacieuse joliment décorée avec un canapé en plus du lit, une jolie vue sur les montagne et un balcon. La salle de bain privé en face est très agréable, avec une très jolie mosaïque. 
Endroit idéal pour quelques jours de détente et repos à la montagne. Nous y retournerons!
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: As a couple we never stayed in hostel before, but everything was great! Place was clean , people respect each other’s, host very responsive! Definitely would recommend Merlin’s Place!
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: Freundliche Gastgeber, schnell vom Bahnhof aus zu erreichen, alles vorhanden was man braucht
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: Endroit chaleureux et convivial, bien équipé, recommandé pour des jeunes et des couples
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: Stayed in Private room. Nice atmosphere with lovely workers. Very cosy, log fire, nice lounge. Would go back.  Can walk or get tram to ski slopes. Thanks Merlin.
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: Très bon rapport qualité prix, ambiance très sympa et hôtes très à l'écoute. Je recommande vivement :-)
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: The chalet is meant for communal living and has a welcoming atmosphere. Some are tourists and others work nearby. All ages can be found. I was here in 2001 and it was wonderful to come back in 2020!
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: If you guys are looking for a quiet place to escape the hectic life of the city, a place to refresh and recharge your energy both physically and spiritually, a place with warm and friendly atmosphere not to mention the awesome view of the mountains, Chalet Martin is the place for you. It has been a wonderful experience for me there and I’m definitely doing it again.
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: Chalet typique, avec ambiance dynamique!
name: Chalet Martin Downstairs Double

comments: Jocelyne & Jean-Michel ont un sens inégalé de l’accueil. Leur maison est magnifique et le petit-déjeuner délicieux !
name: Chambre d'hôtes BnB "Le Haut des Vignes" no 2

comments: It is a wonderful room, extremely clean. We love it.
name: Chambre d'hôtes BnB "Le Haut des Vignes" no 2

comments:
Un accueil super et des hôtes exceptionnels 
Des moments privilégiés avec un petit déjeuner concocté avec amour et une vue splendide sur Lutry, le Leman est ses montagnes 
Une villa splendide et une propreté hors normes 
Sans hésitation nous y retournerons
name: Chambre d'hôtes BnB "Le Haut des Vignes" no 2

comments: L'appartement est très fonctionnel et très bien situé. La place de parc est vraiment pratique. Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour. De plus Eduardo est très sympathique, serviable et flexible. Au top !
name: Panorama sur le lac et les Alpes

comments: We had a great time at Eduardo's place. The view is spectacular.  The apartment is quite spacious and comfortable.  It was great for us to have laundry in the apartment.  We booked another week even before we left!
name: Panorama sur le lac et les Alpes

comments: Nice apartment with beatiful view!
name: Panorama sur le lac et les Alpes

comments: Wir haben uns in Barbaras Wohnung sehr wohl gefühlt. Wir empfanden sie grösser als aufgrund der Fotos erwartet und waren überrascht über die gute Ausstattung (sogar Fondue-Caquelon und Raclette-Ofen sind vorhanden!). Die Wohnung ist auch gut gelegen, denn in 10 Minuten zu Fuss findet man Einkaufsmöglichkeiten oder Restaurants. Wir kommen gerne wieder!
name: Magnifique studio dans chalet récent

comments: Very nice place! Thank you Laurence :)
name: Jolie maisonnette à Lausanne

comments:
A great apartment. We are a family of four, with boys 8&9 and we had plenty of room, and Willemijn’s was a great host with lots of useful local tips.
Pool was great, warm and deserted, and after a day on the slopes it was a real bonus if you have any energy left!
Very centrally located as well, a very short walk to all the other facilities you may want.
name: Charming apartment @ the Swiss Alps

comments: Wir haben uns in der Wohnung von Juan sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Beschreibungen stimmen mit der Realität überein - Juan ist ein sehr angenehmer Gastgeber.
name: Joli & Lumineux avec vue sur le Lac

comments: Apartment could not be more convenient to the lift. Only about 300m away. Cozy apartment near the top of the mountain, clean and great view off the back porch. Highly recommend.
name: Apartment near Villars-sur-Ollon/Alpes des Chaux

comments: Great location for people who come to ski!! Shuttle to the city stops going around 6 pm. But its a very great place right next to the ski lift!
name: Apartment near Villars-sur-Ollon/Alpes des Chaux

comments: Анжело - очень внимательный и гостеприимный хозяин! Квартира расположена в самом центре, но на очень тихой улице. Сама квартира очень чистая и уютная, в ней есть все необходимое. Абсолютно все соответствует фото и описанию. Для проживания двух людей было очень комфортно. Будем в Лозанне - только к Анжело!:)
name: Studio very clean and cosy (2 pax)

comments: We had a very comfortable stay in Angelo's apartment, it was cozy, well equipped and very clean. The location was incredible!! We were a 2 minute walk from Riponne, and super close to a range of shops and good coffee/brunch places (Le Pointu - check it out!) Angelo was kind, extremely patient and very flexible with all our questions/needs. Thanks again!
name: Studio very clean and cosy (2 pax)

comments: The apartment is located in a very good position, right next to the metro station and very close to the city center. It is a very simple apartment but it has all the facilities that are needed. Then Angelo is a very good host, he was really helpful and kind to us! Highly recommended
name: Studio very clean and cosy (2 pax)

comments: Angelo's apartment is right in the middle of Lausanne town. Bit of a trek uphill from the station, but if you don't like hills, don't visit Lausanne!!! It's really close to a metro station anyway! Perfectly located. Quiet. Spotless. Breakfast was left for us to arrive to, which was lovely and unexpected. Perfect. Definitely recommended.
name: Studio very clean and cosy (2 pax)

comments: L appartamento di Sarah e angelo è ubicato in posizione super centrale praticamente attaccato a place de la riponne. La casa è semplice ma dotata di tutti i comfort pulita, accogliente e funzionale. Sono entrambi degli host super disponibili. Unico suggerimento riguarda le luci purtroppo quella di corridoio e cucina non funzionano e anche quella della camera si accende e spegne ad intermittenza. Per fortuna c'erano delle funzionali lampade che ci hanno permesso di godere della casa. In generale bellissima esperienza. Raccomandato
name: Studio very clean and cosy (2 pax)

comments: Le studio est très jolis et très confortable. Le matelas est également très bon. Un endroit merveilleux avec une vue magnifique en pleine montagne. Je recommande vivement ce lieu. Je remercie les propriétaires qui ont été également très sympa pour nos brefs entrevues et je n'hésiterai pas à revenir ici la prochaine fois que je veux revenir dans cette belle région.
name: Studio meublé dans chalet

comments: Super séjour merci beaucoup ! Le studio est idéalement placé nous avons adoré ! Nous reviendrons !
name: Studio meublé dans chalet

comments: appartement exceptionnel .très moderne . juste a cote de la gare .(a profite le train pour les station ) je recommande.
name: NEW! 1BDR apartment close to NYON train station.

comments:
Logement agréable, plein sud et vue panoramique sur le lac.
Pour se rendre en ville, de préférence utiliser les transports en commun, sinon, il faut avoir une bonne condition physique. Lausanne mérite bien son titre de capitale olympique !
name: Sunny apartment in Lausanne

comments:
We had a wonderful stay! The apartment has lots of charm. The kitchen had all we needed to make meals every day. 

Our daughters loved the trampoline outside and the view of the lake was amazing. 

As several others have already mentioned it’s located very close to a train station that is very convenient for whoever doesn’t have a vehicle. Although we didn’t use it we did enjoy seeing the trains go by.  

Overall we were very happy with everything, most important Karin and her family are wonderful, helpful and very kind people! Would recommend for sure.
name: Vue sur le lac. Magnifique 90m2 calme et lumineux

comments: A wonderful place to stay. A great apartment with easy access to rail. Karin was the perfect host with initial thoughtful touches on arrival, great communication and a willingness to accommodate a couple of favours that we needed because of our unique stay during the Youth Olympics.  Greatly appreciated and we hope to return again.
name: Vue sur le lac. Magnifique 90m2 calme et lumineux

comments:
It was very comfortable stay. Karin is a wonderful host who replies promptly and kindly. She treated us with welcome drinks. And there are enough necessities here and there. we could feel she paid special attention to the guests.
I strongly recommend Karin's house those who visit Lausanne
name: Vue sur le lac. Magnifique 90m2 calme et lumineux

comments:
Top du top !!
N’hésitez surtout pas à réserver ce logement !!!!! Super bien placé entre la gare et le lac vous découvrirez un quartier calme et vivant à la fois. Le métro et les lignes de bus ne sont qu’à quelques pas de l’appartement ! Et en quelques minutes vous serez en plein centre ville ou sur les bords du lac !
Le logement en lui même est impeccable est agréablement décoré. Tout ce qu’il vous faut pour un petit séjour découverte dans la région.
Quand à Assia, euh que dire.....elle est super ! Accueillante, réactive, et très attentionnée!
Allez ! Réservez !!
name: Calme avec balcon entre gare et lac

comments: Our stay at Assia’s was very nice! She was a great host and very fast at responding to our emails. The apartment is very well located in between the train station and lake! The place is really nice: very clean and well equipped! Will definitely go back ! Thanks Assia!
name: Calme avec balcon entre gare et lac

comments:
Emilie nous a reçu de la meilleure des manières!
Spontanée, souriante et arrangeante, Emilie mérite d'être rencontrée!
Situé à un gros quart d'heure à pied du centre de Vevey, la maison est très bien placée pour aller et venir à sa guise à pied. Très simple d'accès en voiture également! Légèrement en hauteur, vous pourrez admirez les montagnes lors du petit déjeuner que l'hôte prépare gracieusement. 
La chambre s'auto suffit à elle même, grande et très propre, literie confortable. Idem pour la salle de bain, douche nickel et serviette de bain! Il y avait même des échantillons de gel douche pour les têtes en l'air que nous étions! 

Je conserve l'adresse dans mes favoris! Encore merci pour tout Emilie!

Sarah et Max
name: Jolie chambre à 5 mn du lac

comments: Ок place. I like dogs, so the Lab was fab ;)
name: Jolie chambre à 5 mn du lac

comments: Great host and very well equipped appartment
name: Nice apartment of 1.5 rooms

comments:
Un séjour très agréable.
Le chalet correspond tout à fait aux photos fournies, très bien situé dans un village charmant.
Vera et son mari ont été très aidants et disponibles tout en étant discrets.
Merci encore!
name: Lodge "Dolce Vita"

comments: Vera was an amazing Host, made us feel very welcome, the house was impeccable and so warm and cosy, Vera explained everything about the surroundings and shops which was very helpful, we will come again, or sure! thanks so much! laure
name: Lodge "Dolce Vita"

comments: Excellent séjours
name: Lodge "Dolce Vita"

comments: The Mazot was full of alpine character with a fantastic wood burner for nights in and the perfect location in terms of short walks to both the town centre and Roc d'Orsey lift to slopes.  We loved it and would definitely return / recommend.
name: Lodge "Petit Bonheur"

comments:
chambre incroyable 
design et deco relaxante
presque mieux qu'à l'hôtel 
merci pour tout!
name: Chambre "Pomme de Lune"

comments:
We really enjoyed our stay at Flocon de Sel. It's spacious, warm and beautifully decorated. The bed is very comfortable and the shower is fantastic.
As described, the room is north facing and the view is of the residential area and lush, leafy, green side of the mountain that rises behind Vera's complex. To the front of the complex the rooms face south across the road leading into Villars, to an amazing view of the valley and beautiful mountain range beyond.
Vera was helpful and friendly and drove into town to collect us. There are no facilities to prepare food or drink in the room but a breakfast basket is available if you book it in advance. Wifi issues reported by previous tenants have clearly been resolved - we had no problems.
We can recommend Cookie Cafe for excellent coffee, wifi and wholesome, freshly prepared food.
name: Chambre "Flocon de Sel"

comments:
Alles war tiptop, tolles Zimmer und eine super Lage! 
Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt und würden wieder kommen :)

Everything was great, nice room and a good place to stay!
name: Chambre "Flocon de Sel"

comments: Chalet/appartment superbe, très bien agencé et bien situé. Le spa est top et la situation bien centrée. Vue sur les alpes et couchés de soleil magnifiques. À faire en couple ou en famille. Nos enfants ont adoré et nous aussi.
name: Lodge "Péché Mignon"

comments: Loved this apartment. Even more charming in real life than the photos. All the charm of an old chalet but with all the modern day conveniences. Fantastic location and everything was just perfect. We'lol definitely be back!!!
name: Lovely duplex in Rougemont (Gstaad)

comments:
This is such a beautiful and cozy place. 
We felt very much at home.
Wonderful, quiet location.
Very clean.
Perfect communication, check-in and check-out.
Thank you, we had a lovely holiday
name: Lovely duplex in Rougemont (Gstaad)

comments:
Our guests, who stayed at Anthea and Marc's place were so delighted about the beautiful room and the wonderful hospitality they experienced. Everything was lovingly prepared. They were even considering to have breakfast with them rather with us ;-)! I think, this tells all. 
The preparatory communication was easy going and, as I live nearby, also the visit to see the room beforehand was already very welcoming.
Anthea and Marc, thanks for everything!
Elisabeth
name: Cosy room

comments: Bel appartement beau quartier
name: Little room near down town

comments: Très bonne expérience. Merci beaucoup pour la confiance et l'accueil.
name: Little room near down town

comments:
The apartment is fantastic with a beautiful garden.
Frederique is an excellent host, and she makes you feel like at home.
name: Little room near down town

comments: Alles sehr gut!
name: Little room near down town

comments: Es ist sehr gut gelegen und das kleine Zimmer ist o.k. einfach um zu übernachten.
name: Little room near down town

comments: Pour Lausanne, cet endroit offre un rapport qualité-prix imbattable. Il est très bien situé, l'accès en ville est très facile avec les transports en commun, le parking pour la voiture, particulièrement en we,  est idéal. Le quartier est superbe, calme, surplombant le lac, avec à proximité un petit parc.
name: Little room near down town

comments: J’ai passé 1 mois chez Frédérique et tout s’est très bien passé. C’est presque comme à la maison! Je recommande :)
name: Little room near down town

comments: Logement conforme aux descriptions, Cecile a été très sympathique et disponible pour toutes questions
name: Great House with 4 bedrooms, a big garden and pool

comments: very nice person
name: Great House with 4 bedrooms, a big garden and pool

comments:
Hôte très accueillante, sympathique et réactive. La maison est chaleureuse avec pleine de bonnes pensées. Un petit plus avec des animaux qui sont très calme et câlin.
Mes ami(e)s et moi avons beaucoup apprécié la cheminée au salon pendant notre séjour.
name: Great House with 4 bedrooms, a big garden and pool

comments: Comfortable stay in a lovely apartment with a beautiful view.
name: Apartment with stunning view

comments: Well equipped apartment with beautiful view. No access by car for unloading / loading luggage and very difficult access by car and on foot due to ice and snow.
name: Apartment with stunning view

comments: We spent a long weekend in Alpes des Chaux and were thrilled with this apartment. The location is perfect for anyone trying to get to the ski slopes - accessible in a few minutes walk by a button lift, not the main cable, reducing queuing time! The view from the apartment is fantastic and the apartment is well kitted out. Marc was great as a host, providing quick responses and all of the information we needed. Highly recommend
name: Apartment with stunning view

comments: Excellent week-end passé en famille chez Marc. Le chalet est accueillant et spacieux (nous étions 4 adultes avec deux enfants en bas âge). Petit bémol, l’accès par grosse neige au logement mais la vue depuis le balcon en vaut la chandelle!
name: Apartment with stunning view

comments:
Aucun soucis, on peut y aller les yeux fermer... enfin mieux les ouvrir pour arriver à bon port!

Appartement très agréable à 2 pas des pistes!
name: Apartment with stunning view

comments: This chalet was absolutely wonderful.  The location was perfect and beautiful.  We didn't get to meet Sebastian because we arrived later than we planned, but he was very accommodating to us. Overall the experience was very good and I would stay here again given the chance.
name: Beautiful Traditional Chalet

comments: We had a wonderful time at the chalet. The pictures don't do it justice, honestly - the house is spacious and charming, with a fully modern kitchen, while the view is spectacular. All the windows and balconies look out into Swiss mountain landscapes. Truly amazing stay. Additionally, Sebastian was very helpful and responsive, and gave us great recommendations when he stopped by. We highly, highly recommend this listing.
name: Beautiful Traditional Chalet

comments: I really love this place! My family went to this house to see the balloon festival of Château-d'Oex, it was just 10 minutes of driving. The house was located in a small village and there was nobody to disturb my rest. Outside of the house looks traditional and rather old, but the inside kitchen and bathrooms are recently renovated. Absolutely I want to stay again for the next balloon festival!
name: Beautiful Traditional Chalet

comments: Ein tolles Chalet mit grosser moderner Küche und renovierten Badezimmern. Wir verbrachten schöne Ferientage in Rossinière.
name: Beautiful Traditional Chalet

comments:
We really enjoyed our New Year celebration at Sebastian‘s place.
The chalet is very spacious and it is lovely decorated, so we felt directly like at home.
We met Sebastian during our Check out and he was really easy going, even as we unfortunately broke a glass of a painting. We definetly recommend Sebastian‘s place and would come back.
name: Beautiful Traditional Chalet

comments: This chalet, while a little dated, makes a fine spot to visit the area. Rossiniere is next door, Chateaux D'oex is a few minutes drive away with Gstadd just a littl efarther. Gruyeres is close enough to visit for lunch. Rougemont should not be missed. The home itself is equiped with the necessities for a family to feel at home while they are there. Sebastian is quick to respond with to any communication sent to him and remedy a problem if one occurs.
name: Beautiful Traditional Chalet

comments:
Ein sehr schönes, grosses und sauberes Chalet, mit renovierten Badezimmer und Küche!
Die Zeit dort war wunderbar, einzig folgendes ist vielleicht gut zu wissen:
- Ohne Auto etwas schwieriger zu erreichbar und die Gegend zu Erkunden (kein Trottoire auf der Hauptstrasse).
- Es gibt 4 Zimmer mit je 1 Doppelbett. In der Beschreibung gab es ein Zimmer mit 2 Einzelbetten.
- Im ersten Zimmer links knackst die Heizung sehr laut.
- Induktionsherd
name: Beautiful Traditional Chalet

comments: This is a fantastic place to stay in Lausanne and I can't recommend it highly enough!  It was perfectly situated for me as I was here for a long term stay while I begin work in Switzerland.  It's only a 15 minute walk from the train station but with plenty of bus connections as well and everything else you could need nearby.  Christophe was an amazing host and even left me some breakfast as I was arriving late on the first night!  He was extremely helpful when I was looking for flats to rent and even called to check everything was ok when I ventured out on a flat visit late one night!  In fact, it has been so convenient and such a great place that I have extended my stay by another month!  Christophe was also very amenable to this as well as plenty of other difficulties I had with my initial move to Switzerland.  You can use the washing machine, kitchen and have your own bathroom and if you stay here long enough it definitely starts to feel like home!
name: Charm & Design, Center of Lausanne

comments: 不知道是不是太幸运，送女儿来洛桑读书，第一次过来，也是第一次用airbnb预定房间，完全不知方向，结果订的房间正好就在学校下面，步行10分钟，房子很漂亮，欧式的建筑，离市中心步行15分左右，房东很热心，帅气又绅士，以后有机会会再来住，谢谢亲爱的Christophe！
name: Charm & Design, Center of Lausanne

comments: 不知道是不是太幸运,送女儿来洛桑读书,第一次过来,也是第一次用airbnb预定房间,完全不知方向,结果订的房间正好就在学校下面,步行10分钟,房子很漂亮,欧式的建筑,离市中心步行15分左右,房东很热心,帅气又绅士,以后有机会会再来住,谢谢亲爱的Christophe!
name: Charm & Design, Center of Lausanne

comments: Me and my finance had a lovely stay in Montreux, thanks to Lynn for the great information and fast response always, even though she was traveling the time we stayed, she still manage to always reply on time :)
name: Montreux Music BnB: friendly, with good breakfast!

comments:
Lynn is an amazing hostess. She is very kind and reactive. She gave us recommendations of places to visit in her city. She offered us  cards for free local public transportation . She has the best tips to really explore her city. And you will have the best conversation at night with her. The apartment is really clean and beautiful and the panoramic view from her living room is spectacular. Thanks for all, Lynn.
Mile & Danny.
name: Montreux Music BnB: friendly, with good breakfast!

comments: Had a wonderful 3 night stay at Lynn’s apartment in Montreux. The views from the kitchen and living room are just stunning. Lynn picked me up from the train station on my arrival and also dropped me at the station during my departure; this was surely very helpful for me, especially at the beginning when I wasn’t familiar with Montreux. Lynn also has sumptuous breakfasts and great suggestions on things to do in and around the area. I surely hope I have the opportunity to stay again at Lynn’s place in future. Overall Lynn’s hospitality and kindness made my 3 day stay at Montreux an experience to treasure.
name: Montreux Music BnB: friendly, with good breakfast!

comments:
Tout s'est très bien passé. Le studio était conforme à la description. Je n'ai pas vu Flavia mais sa maman.
Bien que le studio soit situé au rez-de-chaussée de la maison, je n'ai pas souvent vu les propriétaires et on a l'impression d'être totalement autonome.
name: Nice studio with a garden

comments: Trés bon séjour chez Flavia
name: Nice studio with a garden

Les consignes étaient claires et précises et la communication très agréable!

comments: Un appartement impeccable et très confortable, près de transport public. Maria a été toujours en contact. Merci!

comments: The place was fantastic, exactly what we needed for a few nights exploring Lausanne and the surrounding areas. The host had excellent communication and was very helpful.
