comments:
Un séjour super , Emilienne est une personne formidable . 
Le logement est impeccable , pratique et très bien situé . Je recommande .
name: chambre à louer  Chez l’habitant

comments:
Troisième séjours chez Emilienne , toujours aussi agréable et sympathique. 
Le logement est vraiment très bien situé . Merci pour ces bons moments . C est toujours un plaisir .
name: chambre à louer  Chez l’habitant

comments: Je remercie Emilienne pour les moments de partage, sa gentillesse et sa disponibilité. L'appartement est très propre, lumineux, super moderne et très bien sonorisé. La chambre est spacieuse avec un grand lit et une télé. Chez Emilienne je me suis senti comme chez moi et pour ceci je la remercie beaucoup. J'ai pu commencer mon nouveau travail dans des excellentes conditions.
name: chambre à louer  Chez l’habitant

comments: My staying at Lina and Mathieu's place was definitely one of my best Airbnb experiences! They have been super helpful and nice, they made me really feel at home. I totally suggest them! The place is central, nice and you have got everything you need! Thank you guys ;)
name: Small Room in Lausanne Center

comments: Such a lovely apartment, very cosy fire place! Good taste all over. I love when I sleep in a good bed and when I know how to start the shower. And: fantastic new kitchen - cooked many meals there. Spectacular view from the balcony. And last but not least: Donna is lovely host - she was so helpful for many little questions here and there.  We will be back!
name: Apartment in Swiss chalet

comments:
Loved it so close to everything and with the free shuttle every 20 minutes it makes it very close to all facilities in the center of Villars 
Great apartment very cosy
name: Apartment in Swiss chalet

comments: Donna’s flat is a great place to stay which I can only recommend.
name: Apartment in Swiss chalet

comments: The house is fantastic and the design is fancy, I love this hosue very much and the host (the person we met at first) are polite and friendly, I would like to visit again.
name: B&B ****  au pied du château Aigle, Switzerland

comments: The house was perfect for our group of 7. It was extremely well equipped, very clean, and had everything we needed to be very comfortable. The kitchen was well stocked with dishes and appliances. The view of the vineyard and chateau were lovely. The hosts were very accommodating and I highly recommend this Airbnb for anyone looking a great place convenient to attractions such as Gruyere Museum, Lavey baths, Vevey and the Charlie Chaplin Museum, Anzere and Zermat, Leysin, and many great hiking opportunities in the mountains.
name: B&B ****  au pied du château Aigle, Switzerland

comments: We've spent the last few days of 2017 in Aigle at this wonderful house. Together with our 4 friends we had a superb little holiday. The house was perfectly equipped: even Bluetooth-Speakers, towels, first-aid kit, a very nice kitchen, etc.... You will not miss a single thing! Just bring your food and drinks: that's it! Only one word: perfect.
name: B&B ****  au pied du château Aigle, Switzerland

comments: Capodanno 2018 passato in una splendida villa in mezzo ai vigneti con vista castello! La casa è semplicemente stupenda e fornita di qualunque cosa possa servire! Accogliente e molto pulita! Valerie è stata gentilissima e molto disponibile! Spero di ritornarci presto!!!
name: B&B ****  au pied du château Aigle, Switzerland

comments:
Une MaisonTrès Charmante:

Our family stayed for a month here and I really can’t think of anything that could be improved.

The house is situated in “the cloisters” a charming area with an old church, castle, tavern, vineyards and superb restaurant. 

It has magnificent views of the surrounding area dominated by the Chateau d’Aigle.

It’s 11 mins easy walk to the main train station but also 3 mins to 2 mountain train stations that take you  to Les Diablerets or Leysin for world class skiing or hiking.

The house is recently renovated and immaculately presented with everything you could want. It is on 3 levels and has 4 bathrooms which gives everyone their own space.

Communication with the hosts was excellent throughout - I really cannot fault our experience.
name: B&B ****  au pied du château Aigle, Switzerland

comments: This is the second time we have stayed at this gorgoeus house and we loved it! Great location, ideally suited for rail connections to Geneva, Montreux and trains up into the mountains.  The house and garden are in a lovely location and the property is spacious, very clean and well equipped.  A winner.
name: B&B ****  au pied du château Aigle, Switzerland

comments: Merci à Frederique pour l'accueil et la qualité du logement. Vraiment à recommander.
name: Nice room near down town

comments: Bonne Adresse
name: Nice room near down town

comments: I loved staying at Frederique's place. It was perfect in every way - clean, beautiful, peaceful - and Frederique is a wonderful, helpful host. I would return any day and highly recommend her place for a visit to Lausanne.
name: Nice room near down town

comments:
La très grande chambre dans ce bel appartement avec plein de cachet est certes superbe,ce qui fait par contre la différence sont la gentillesse et l’hospitalité absolument unique de Frédérique.
L’appartement se trouve à 10 mins à pieds de centre de Lausanne,une petite épicerie est à quelques pas,le bus juste devant la porte et par beau temps il faut bon de se poser dans le jardin.
name: Nice room near down town

comments: Myself and my boyfriend had a great and relaxing time at Pascal's beautiful home. The room was cozy and very clean. View is amazing- although we wish there was more sun the day we went! Him and his wife were very welcoming and kind enough to tour us around the area. Pascal also prepared very sumptuous dinner and lovely breakfast for us! Since the house is located in the vineyard we also had the chance to taste the wine the village produces. The semi detached room gave us the outmost privacy at the same time quick access to the house to get ready for our meals. We will definitely come back when we are in Geneva next.
name: Panorama unique sur le Lac Léman

comments: Il faut aller chez Pascal les yeux grands ouverts tant la maison est agréable . Merci pour la qualité du repas !
name: Panorama unique sur le Lac Léman

comments: Gute Adresse! Nur weiter zu empfehlen, vor allem im Sommer.
name: Panorama unique sur le Lac Léman

comments: This place i amazing!!!  Beautiful view of the lake and the mountains at practically all times. A paradise for people who like to walk or bike. I was there in winter but in spring and summer should be terrific. Pascal and family are very friendly and they make you feel at home all the time. A place to come back Jorge
name: Panorama unique sur le Lac Léman

comments:
Vous pouvez aller sans hésiter chez Pascal chez qui vous serez très bien accueilli.
La chambre était très propre.
Nous n'avons pas pu goûter à sa cuisine mais nous reviendrons avec plaisir.
name: Panorama unique sur le Lac Léman

comments: Beautiful apartment in a great location. Had a wonderful time.
name: Le refuge

comments: Très bel appartement, bien équipé. Il est idéalement situé entre Genève et Lausanne. Super séjour!
name: Le refuge

comments: The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Studio au CENTRE DE LAUSANNE

comments: Très satisfaite de ce rapide séjour dans un studio bien placé, propre et pratique ! Très bonne communication et réactivité également de la part de mon hôte :) Merci !
name: Studio au CENTRE DE LAUSANNE

comments: The appartment was great. It was spacious, calm and very comfortable with the car parking in front of the house. Jean-Daniel was very kind and reliable. The appartment itself is not the newest one, but this did not matter to us as it was very clean.
name: Confort à bon prix

comments: J'ai loué l'appartement de Jean-Daniel 2 semaines de suite et tout s'est bien passé. Jean-Daniel est disponible et facilement joignable. Il n'y a pas eu de soucis malgré mon arrivée tardive. "Confort à bon prix" résume bien l'appartement: l'immeuble est ancien, il faut faire la vaisselle à la main mais l'appartement est propre, il y a une  grande télévision avec écran plasma, le wifi marche bien et la literie est de très bonne qualité. Bref, l'appartement est parfait pour celui qui cherche quelque chose de simple à petit prix. Il y a une place de parking attitrée juste devant l'immeuble et l'appartement est à moins de 5 min de l'autoroute. Je recommande.
name: Confort à bon prix

comments: Odile and her family gave me a warm welcome when I came to Switzerland for the first time.  They also provide me a very comfortable room. They are also very kind. I was late for my school for one time and Odile's husband drove me to school . I really appreciate their help! I highly recommend people to choose their house!
name: Face to the lake and the mountains

comments: I highly recommend staying at Odile and Finn's! They are so welcoming and really helped me out in getting where I needed to go and finding what I needed to find in the area. The house is perfectly located: I was at EPFL in 25 minutes (door-to-door) on the bus and I could get there by bike in 30 minutes on a wooded trail right along the lake's edge! A mountain & lake view is a really lovely way to start and end the day! From Odile and Finn's you can walk uphill into vineyards, or downhill towards Morges' old town and the lake, and see the Alps and lake either way. On Saturdays there is a local market with fruits, veggies, pastries, etc. in Morges. Odile and Finn even invited me to join them for dinner!  It is a great place for a student, someone working, or someone new to the area. Enjoy!
name: Face to the lake and the mountains

comments:
Odile et Finn sont vraiment des personnes magnifiques et accueillantes.❤️ Le logement est exceptionnellement bien placé pour des étudiants à l’EPFL ou l’Unil. Le quartier est calme avec une vue exceptionnelle du lac Léman et les montagnes suisses, et la chambre est idéal avec tout dont on a besoin. Il ne faut rien d’autre pour se sentir chez soi.
Honnêtement, je n’ai que des choses positives à dire. Allez loger chez eux!
name: Face to the lake and the mountains

comments: Jasmina handled the managing of the booking very well. She answered my queries promptly and very accurately.  The house description was on-point as well.  I would definitely stay here again!
name: 114 Beautiful apartment

comments: Super Lage, schöne Wohnung!
name: 114 Beautiful apartment

comments: Accueil parfait. Chambre tres bien, exactement conme decrite. Le petit dejeuner est tres bon aussi. Hotel de charme ou je reviendrais avec grand plaisir.

comments: A cosy and beautiful room in a boutique hotel. I enjoyed the hospitality and the restaurant.

comments: Le personnel de la Maison d'Igor se donne de la peine pour répondre aux demandes de la clientèle. Lieu paisible, moins de 5 minutes à pieds pour rejoindre le quai du lac, 10 minutes pour la gare.
name: Chambre dans une maison de maître

comments:
Un endroit magnifique avec un personnel au petit soin !

Although I did not use the kitchen, they were open about me using it and also reserved place in the fridge. I did not see them much due to my schedule; was a comfortable stay.

comments: Marc Etienne nous attendu (étions dans les embouteillages) malgré notre arrivée tardive, et nous a accueilli comme des princes !
name: Guestroom for 2, amazing views and facilities

comments:
Marc-Etienne est un hôte très sympathique et attentionné. L'infrastructure est exceptionnelle puisque son appartement est situé dans un ancien hôtel  qui possède piscine avec vue sur les montagnes, sauna et salon commun. 
Nous le recommandons vivement.
name: Guestroom for 2, amazing views and facilities

comments: Super sympathisch und freundlich. Perfekter Gastgeber.
name: Guestroom for 2, amazing views and facilities

comments: Great location near Gstaad at non-Gstaad prices
name: Guestroom for 2, amazing views and facilities

comments: Marc-Etienne was great showing around the village, giving tips for hikes and and chatting about locals.
name: Guestroom for 2, amazing views and facilities

comments:
Malheureusement nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de nous rencontrer car elle habite relativement loin et j'ai insisté pour ne pas la déranger. Elle était déjà venu quelques jours plutôt pour préparer notre venue et elle m'a tout expliqué par téléphone.
Annette est une hôte formidable; attentive et disponible elle a su nous mettre immédiatement à l'aise, elle s'est montrée très chaleureuse et compréhensive.
Et le chalet... pour avoir grandi en montagne et être artisan je peux vous garantir que c'est un bijou. Le RDC est resté complètement authentique et vous accueillera pour une fondue ou raclette traditionnelle. Les étages supérieurs vous offriront toutes les commodités modernes, tout en restant dans l'esprit du chalet de montagne, mais surtout les fenêtres s'ouvrent sur une vue imprenable du lac Léman.
En résumé merci Annette pour ce séjour nous ne l'oublierons pas...
name: Charming home near Montreux

comments: Alles perfekt!
name: Charming home near Montreux

comments: Sehr schönes Chalet, eine sehr nette Gastgeberin! Danke Annette!
name: Charming home near Montreux

comments: Nice breakfast, good, spacious room, great ancient ambiance!! Good company.
name: One Bed-Room in the Old-Town of Lausanne

comments:
L'appartement se trouve en plain centre ville historique, en face de la cathédrale et à côté des spots avec une vue sur la ville e le lac.

L'immeuble a l'air historique et renouvelé. 

L'appartement est très joli et a tous les conforts .  Je le recommande très chaleureusement  ;)
name: One Bed-Room in the Old-Town of Lausanne

comments:
Our choice couldn't be better. The house is incredible, unbeatable location, and Hans is such a great host. He made our stay very easy. 
Would come back again.
name: Apartment on Terrace

comments:
We had a lovely stay at Vevey.
The view is breathtaking and the apartment is functional (but there is no oven in the kitchen of this specific apartment).
Hans is a good host who communicated everything we needed to know in advance and was very responsive to our questions. He also found a solution for us to use an oven.
I recommend this place !!
name: Apartment on Terrace

comments: Magnifique terrasse pour cet appartement central et confortable. Bien chauffé (car il fait froid!!!) et super machine à café! Merci pour les indications de Hans Jürg qui étaient très précises. Cela donne envie de rester plus longtemps qu'un we! À revoir pour apprécier l'été!!!
name: Apartment on Terrace

comments:
nous avons passé un très bon week end dans cet appartement.
Très propre, très agréable et très belle vue sur le lac. Très reposant à cette époque (janvier).
Nous n'avons pas eu le plaisir de rencontrer Hans mais il a été très réactif et attentionné lors de nos échanges par sms et mails.
name: Apartment on Terrace

comments:
Eine sehr schöne Unterkunft. Das große Bad im unteren Bereich ist sehr schön eingerichtet mit sehr großer Dusche & Badewanne. Die gemeinsam genutzte Terrasse ist ein Traum mit wunderschönem Ausblick.
Der Gastgeber ist super nett und hilfsbereit. Ausstattung ist gut, ist soweit alles dort was man braucht. 
Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder kommen wenn es sich ergibt. Aber das nächste Mal im Sommer, sodass wir auch die Terrasse und den See besser nutzen können. :)
name: Apartment on Terrace

comments: Sehr schönes Airbnb mit perfekter Lage am See und mitten im Zentrum. Es war sehr sauber und wir wurden super von Hans-Jürg informiert. Empfehlenswert.
name: Apartment on Terrace

comments: The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Chambre centre ville de Nyon Daphné

comments: Accueil chaleureux, calme, propreté impeccable. Je recommande vivement!
name: Chambre centre ville de Nyon Daphné

comments: It was perfect! We stayed for new year with family and friends, including two little children. The comunication with Mieke was good and fast. She was very kind and comprehensive with our needs (e.g. Babybed, late check-out). We didn't meet her in person, but she was always available via e-mail or phone. We met Patricia, who live in the village, to check-in/out. She is a very nice person and was very helpfull. The appartment is great, big, well equipped and clean. It was very cozy with a chimeney. The beds were very confortable. Amazing view from 2 balconies. Central location and at the same time very quiet. Free indoor parking. Totally recomendable for a family or group of friends.
name: Spacious and sunny getaway

comments: Todo ha sido perfecto! Un lugar con mucho encanto y ideal para disfrutar de las montañas suizas.
name: Spacious and sunny getaway

comments: J'ai très bien dormi, lit très confortable. Le chalet est super propre, très bon petit déjeuner et hôtes très serviables. Je recommande vivement!
name: Chalet in Pays d'Enhaut - B

comments: Montreux is amazing & this apartment has a wonderful view & location!
name: Modern Montreux 2 Bedroom Lake Geneva Apartment

comments: sehr schöne und Größe Unterkunft (super Bett) in der Küche alles vorhanden was man benötigt komme gerne wider.
name: Superbe appart proche de LAUSANNE

comments: Wir haben die grosszügige Wohnung mit der wunderbaren Aussicht auf den Genfersee genossen. Die Abwicklung am An und- Abreisetag gestaltete sich angenehm und unkompliziert.
name: Large flat on lakefront

comments: Georges place is super! The flat is really spacious, clean, and looks exactly like the pictures. This is so far the best apartment I have ever stayed via airbnb! He welcomed us personally and the communication with him was easy. He took care of us by providing snacks and some food. We had a lovely stay at his place. Thank you so much for hosting us, Georges!
name: Large flat on lakefront

comments: very nice chalet. not far from the cable car. tastful decor and lots of space. our family had a greAt. stay. we will definitely consider to come back. thanks a lot.
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments:
Dés notre arrivée, impression favorable tant pour l'emplacement au centre du hameau que pour la proximité des commerces qui ont pratiqué la remise commerciale annoncée par le propriétaire.
L'équipement culinaire est suffisant, les chambres et salles de bain bien équipées. Regret pour l'absence de sèche-cheveux.
Feu de cheminée, grande table conviviale, sous-sol avec sauna qui fonctionne parfaitement.
Tout ceci a contribué à rendre notre séjour d'une semaine fort agréable avec en prime une neige abondante qui a permis à notre petite fille de 14mois de goûter les premières joies de la glisse.
L'ambiance calme de Villars nous incitera sans doute à revenir.
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments: We had a good time in Villars--and La Rosière certainly is a nice place to stay.
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments: Fantastic time at the lovely Chalet Rosiere.
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments: Magnifique chalet super bien placé, à recommander !
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments:
Nous sommes très satisfaits de notre week-end au chalet La Rosière.  Le chalet est confortable et bien situé. La propriétaire est très aimable.
Nous recommandons vivement ce chalet.
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments: Prachtig ingericht huis, goed geoutilleerd, echter kleiner dan verwacht en matig geschikt voor meer dan 12 personen. Telecabine ligt niet op loopafstand, wel prima busverbinding voor de deur met op de terugweg rit door hele dorp
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments:
Wir hatten eine tolle Woche im Chalet La Rosière.
Wir waren 12 Personen und es war eher eng, vor allem im Ess und Wohnbereich.
Dennoch kann ich es empfehlen: Sehr bequeme Betten, toller Garten und Balkone, schönes Wohnzimmer (das Sofa müsste aber mal ersetzt werden), langer Esstisch.
Generell hat das Haus viel Charme und wurde toll renoviert.

Gewisse Punkte irritieren aber in einem Haus dieser Preisklasse:

- Kleinliches Verhalten bei der Ausstattung: Pro Toilette nur eine Rolle Papier, nur 1 Tab für den Geschirrspühler, 1 Abfallsack
-Audioanlage im Wohnzimmer hat kein Bluetooth und funktionierte erst, nachdem wir ans Kabelnetz angeschlossen haben. 
-Küchenausstattung generell zu wenig zahlreich, ungepflegt, billigste Ware.
-zu viele Fernseher in den Schlafräumen, die nur Platz wegnehmen, der eh nicht reichlich vorhanden ist.

Diese Punkte sind eigentlich einfach zu beheben und würden den Aufenthalt massiv verbessern, ausserdem steht es einem Haus dieser Klasse besser an.
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments: Chalet agréable et cosy
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments: it is wonderful place for vacation. You could find almost everything you need there.
name: Chalet 14 people Villars-sur-Ollon

comments: Annabel et sa partenaire se sont montrées très disponibles durant tout le séjour, même en période de congés officiels (fêtes de noël et de nouvel an) et parfaitement professionnels.
name: Magnificent 4 bed flat by the lake

comments: perfect place,awesome host.trust you will be in good hands :>
name: Bel appartement jardin ville

comments: Ospitalità ineccepibile, come ogni volta che ho usufruito dell'ospitalità di Nicola
name: nice Studio in Vevey city center

comments: Magnifique chalet loué pour un séjour hivernal, très bon emplacement, vue agréable sur le lac, accueil et attentions parfaites de l’hôte.  Très bon séjour, à refaire l’été pour profiter encore plus des beaux paysages et de ce chalet cocooning. Ravie de cette location que je recommande.
name: Appartement in lakeside chalet

comments:
Grande maison décorée avec goût et très propre. Le rez de chaussée est particulièrement bien agencé avec une cuisine très équipée ouverte sur la salle à manger et le salon.
La maison est située à 5 minutes à pied du lac Léman, idéal pour les coureurs !
Même si la maison est proche de l'autoroute, on n'entend pas le bruit des voitures. Lausanne est à 15 min environ en voiture.

A recommander pour les groupes d'amis ou famille !
name: Cosy house close to Lausanne

comments: A friendly and warm host. Although I was out most of the time, always felt welcomed when I came back to the flat in the evening. Great location if you are there for the UNI.
name: Belle chambre lumineuse.

comments: Away from it all! Appartment is located in the main house! Ariane and David are very helpful
name: Moulin Pacot

comments: The apartment was just as presented as on the pictures. We had a great time and would come back any time.
name: Moulin Pacot

comments: We had a marvelous stay in Leonie Chalet directly on the ski slope, thanks a lot! I can only recommend this place... Leonie was very helpful and easy to communicate with!
name: Chalet 1800m  met auto bereikbaar vol orchideeën.

comments: Brilliant hospitality. Homely little studio. Hans was very kind and helpful also!
name: Charming & cosy Attic studio by the lake

comments: Hans Rudolf's studio is the best place in Nyon for a short stay.
name: Charming & cosy Attic studio by the lake

comments: The place is exactly what you can see in the description, that means lovely. The location, the flat, the views from the apartment,... and on top on that, Hans is a really great host. I was landing really late, almost midnight, and still, he comes with the keys, providing explanations about the city, about how to use everything, and everything with a fast communication. Excelent.
name: Charming & cosy Attic studio by the lake

comments:
This bijou accommodation is well designed for maximum comfort . An ideal base for exploring the lake Geneva area and within easy reach of Geneva and airport.
Well equipped with all items you will need . In a very quiet position yet within easy reach of Nyon centre and castle.
My wife and I had a relaxing stay and recommend the accommodation.
name: Charming & cosy Attic studio by the lake

comments: Je recommande vivement cet hébergement!
name: Charming & cosy Attic studio by the lake

comments: Really nice and cozy appartement close to the lake
name: Charming & cosy Attic studio by the lake

comments: We had a fantastic stay in Martinas lovely apartment. Very clean and with everything we needed for our stay. Most importantly, it has an amazing view! Montreux is a lovely little town with nice walks and there are plenty of those around if you like hills. Trains are easy to catch nearby to places further away although they aren't cheap! All in all, a fantastic stay in a comfortable home in an exceptionally beautiful place. Thanks
name: 3 Zimmer-Wohnung mit super Aussicht

comments:
Tout etait impeccable 
Merci
name: 3 Zimmer-Wohnung mit super Aussicht

comments: appartement simple, belle vue et bonnes commodités (train, magasins)
name: 3 Zimmer-Wohnung mit super Aussicht

comments: Fantastic place! The view is dream-like and the ambience is tranquil. The train station is 2 mins away by foot and there is a restaurant and bakery close-by. Moreover, Martina is a very helpful host and cleared any doubts I might have had. Lastly, given the location and the size of the apartment, I can safely vouch for the value for money!

comments: Martina’s place has the most glorious view of the lake, everything is super convenient with a supermarket right downstairs and Chernex train station just a short walk. From here it’s a short trip to Montruex or around a 25 minute walk to Montruex to get on a train to Lausanne. It sleeps 4 comfortably and we had 5 so one slept on the fold out couch in the lounge. We absolutely loved our stay! Thanks so much Martina!
name: 3 Zimmer-Wohnung mit super Aussicht

comments:
L'accoglienza è stata buona.
L'attrezzatura nel bagno era molto esigua per 2 persone.
Non ho apprezzato il fatto di non poter usare la cucina, perchè non attrezzata.

comments:
Great apartment - cozy as promised! The balcony is great to enjoy a cup of coffee - you can even see a tiny bit of lake Geneva. There's also a bakery (confiserie) just across the street. I would pick this apartment again.
Martha was a great host - everything just went smoothly. I can definitely recommend Martha as a host.

comments: Martha's appartement is a small jewel 10minutes from Lausanne city center walking. It's exactly what you wish an airbnb to be; super cosy. A cocoon, we will hopefully visit again!
name: Cozy apartment w/ terrace in center

comments: Perfectl place that will recommend to my friends. Everything as it is displayed on pictures and more.
name: Cozy apartment w/ terrace in center

comments: 非常的专业整洁,卫生条件极好,有你需要的一切,离火车站也很近,作为我们瑞士之行的第一个家,真的就像自己的家一样温馨｡下次来洛桑还会来这里的｡

comments: very good place to stay. good value for money. great location

comments: Peter was a great host. Peter is a very helpful host , I had an accident and delayed the arrival time , but he was very kind. The house is a few minutes drive from the city of Lausanne in a lonely and quiet zone. The house is perfect as you can see in picture. There is a free wifi and free park, that's great but no television. We had a great time!

comments: Merci Peter pour l'accueil et le logement ! Je recommande chaudement ces hôtes, et cet appartement. 20 minutes du centre et de la gare, en voiture, par la route de Berne. Parfait !

comments:
Péter est un excellent hote. Il nous a attendus jusqu'à 23h et a deneige l'acces alors qu'il y avait une grosse tempête de neige.
Logement en sous sol mais avec de la lumiere naturelle dans le salon, qui correspond exactement aux photos.
Je recommande vivement ce logement

comments: Très bonne adresse !
name: 2 room apartment near Lausanne

comments:
Excellent rapport service rendu / prix !
Je recommande d'ailleurs je suis revenu une autre fois entre temps :)
name: 2 room apartment near Lausanne

comments: Peter‘s House is located in a residence quarter ca. 15-20 Min. drive from City Centre of Lausanne. It‘s clean and quiet. The room without view didn’t bother us much. We visited a hospital in Lausanne and were happy to stay a few days in a house such as his with private parking nearby and a kitchen with basic equipment to prepare simple meals. Maybe one should pay a bit attention to the slippery floor in the shower cabinet.
name: 2 room apartment near Lausanne

comments: Super studio
name: 2 room apartment near Lausanne

comments: We had a lovely room in this beautiful chateau with fantastic views. Will and David were wonderful hosts who made sure we had everything we needed. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back!
name: Bed & Breakfast with breathtaking Alp views

comments: Beautiful Home up on the hill! Was everything we were hoping for. My girlfriend and I really liked waking up to a Snowy Mountain View. Thanks again Will and David 😊
name: Bed & Breakfast with breathtaking Alp views

comments: Beautiful Home up on the hill! Was everything we were hoping for. My girlfriend and I really liked waking up to a Snowy Mountain View. Thanks again Will and David
name: Bed & Breakfast with breathtaking Alp views

comments: Great place if you are thinking of renting a car, parking is convenient in the driveway. Close to the highway if you are planning day trips around Switzerland. The ceiling is sloped  like an A frame so be aware if walking around in the night. Great host with the primary language being French but (Hidden by Airbnb) translate did the trick for English.
name: La Maison Véronique

comments: Zentral in Epalinges gelegenen, nette Gastgeberin, sehr sauber und sehr nett eingerichtetes Zimmer mit eigenem  Bad.
name: La Maison Véronique

comments: Es war ein wunderschönes Haus mit all seinen Details hinsichtlich Sauberkeit, Ordnung, Herzlichkeit und Verfügbarkeit von allem, was zu Hause neben dem schönen Ort und einem herrlichen Blick auf die Berge und die Stadt und die gute Behandlung des Gastgebers und seiner Reaktion vorkommt
name: Au balcon d'Annie

comments: Annie ist eine sehr aufmerksame Gastgeberin. Wir haben den Abend am Chemie Feuer sehr genossen.
name: Au balcon d'Annie

comments:
Annie, 

Merci pour tout! 
We loved our stay. 
The Balcon was great, with good commodities, and a great view. 
Very cosy and warm. The fireplace made the atmosphere magical! 

We cannot think in any better place to spend the New Year’s Eve. 
It was such a great experience and Annie was so helpful with us, as well as her husband, her friend Françoise and her daughter. 

We arrived by train and we were a bit lost and with lots of suitcases. Françoise quickly came to us with her car to help us! 
Françoise also gave us a ride until the nearest supermarket in that day. 

Annie was also very generous to us because it filled us the fridge for breakfast and more! :) 

We had the chance to have typical Swiss dinner for a fair price in the New Year’s Eve - Fondue and Raclette! 

Annie and her husband gave us lots of advices and suggestions on what to do in the area. Thanks to Annie we went to Roche de Naye, and it was a great journey, full of snow! 

In the end, we still had the right to a ride for the train station. 

Thanks for everything, we can’t wait to come back.
name: Au balcon d'Annie

comments:
Annie and her Husband were amazing people. They are so helpful and friendly, after only staying at her place two nights we felt like we were leaving good friends.  They were able to pick us up and drop us off to the train station, which was a nice surprise.  They have a full fridge of foods for you to have.  They also had wine and beer available (for a small fee). This was nice as we didn't have time to stop to pick any up.
We ordered the Fondu which was very good.
The beds are comfortable and everything clean.  I love the two balconies. 
Lots of games and toys, fresh fruit, chocolates, just like being at home.  Very cozy to arrive and the fireplace was going with free wood to use.  Heaters throughout the house to keep you comfortable. She thinks of everything!
name: Au balcon d'Annie

comments: Terrasse avec vue incroyable et super host
name: Petit Appartement centre ville

comments: Wunderbarer Empfang, ein schönes kleines Bijou an einem ruhigen  Platz im hübschen Aigle. Wir fühlten uns sehr wohl ,vorallem wegen dem schönen Cheminee.
name: Votre maison au pied du Château

comments: Le séjour chez Janine était super – Janine était très gentille et hospitalière et la maison est jolie, avec le village et les montagnes très proches. Merci beaucoup, Janine!
name: Votre maison au pied du Château

comments: Emplacement et maison exceptionnels. La maison en elle même est spacieuse, de très grande qualité, et est de toute beauté. Janine est très sympathique et disponible, accueil très chaleureux. Ce fut une super expérience !
name: Votre maison au pied du Château

comments: Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans la maison de Janine. Nous avons été très bien accueillis, Janine a été très arrangeante. Nous recommandons ce séjour

comments: The listing was as described in the pictures. Very cozy and peaceful. It is walking distance to the center of the town (shops and restaurants). Very practical; 25min away from ski resorts and small hiking trails close to the house. Very pretty during winter!
name: Votre maison au pied du Château

comments:
Je recommande vivement ce Duplex, bien situé dans la vielle ville, à proximité du château et d'une superbe vue, surtout avec une vue magnifique sur la vallée enneigée.
Merci Janine !
name: Votre maison au pied du Château

comments:
Un super accueil de Janine. La maison est très agréable à vivre, elle appelle au cocooning ... Bien située (notamment pas loin des pistes), emplacement de parking à proximité très pratique.
Nous recommandons !
name: Votre maison au pied du Château

comments: David was an excellent host, he was extremely helpful and friendly. The location is prime and near all the necessary; bus station, grocery store, the post and the metro station are all walking distance. I enjoyed my stay very much and would definitely consider David and his apartment as a really convenient stay for new comers and transitional residents. He makes the best Colombian coffee and is a very cheerful host! The apartment was clean and he made sure you have clean bed sheets and towels. Washing machine and dryer are on the basement floor, however David made sure to keep notifying me to reserve my spot as it is shared among all the residents of the building. The daily Schedule is not big and very easy.
name: Chailly Room

comments: Netter Gastgeber, antwortet schnell, sehr gute Verkehrsanbindung, gerne wieder
name: Chailly Room

comments: Nice place, nice roommates, nice physical location, nice host, everything is nice, thx a lot. Jérôme
name: Chambre lumineuse et cocooning

comments: Un grand merci pour ces trois jours dans le chalet hanoum ! Nicolas et sa femme sont des hôtes très accueillants. Le chalet est chaleureux , on a tout ce qu'il faut pour s'y sentir comme chez soi.
name: Cosy Chalet with a magnificent view

comments: Nicolas always replied to our mails right away and was very helpful. The chalet had everything you needed. We could even make a Chinese fondue. The living room was very confortable and we enjoyed the fire in the chimney. The bakery nearby is very nice for breakfast in the morning.
name: Cosy Chalet with a magnificent view

comments:
super chalet avec une vue inoubliable en se réveillant le matin !
Nicolas répond immédiatement aux messages, ce qui facilite l'organisation !
A conseiller si vous recherchez de l'authenticité !
name: Cosy Chalet with a magnificent view

comments: Nicolas est un hôte exceptionnel ! Toujours dispo et d'excellents conseils ! Le chalet est magnifique, avec une vue et un ensoleillement superbes. Très bien équipé également, et riche en bons livres ! Bref, nous recommandons vivement !
name: Cosy Chalet with a magnificent view

comments: A wonderful chalet, perfect quiet location, near the town and ski-lift. Very warm welcome, real homely feel and very well kitted out. A perfect place for both winter and summer holidays. Nicolas the host was incredible fast with communication and very easygoing. I have been renting many places in this area over the last 30 years, this one certainly makes the top of the list.
name: Cosy Chalet with a magnificent view

comments: Great location with a lovely view! The kitchen is decked out with everything and anything you might need, including pots, pans, and fondue sets. There is a Nespresso machine and a Bialetti. There is one comfy couch (and one less comfy set of chairs) to enjoy movies, Netflix, etc. on bad weather days. Otherwise, just walk about 10min. uphill to the gondola and you're immediately connected with 3 ski resorts (of which we still didn't experience everything after 3 days on the slopes!) The key-box makes for an easy check-in (although Nicolas put the wrong key in there for us, he was back in an hour with the correct one + prosecco!) There are also several phone chargers conveniently located by the door. Our family loved our holiday getaway in this cosy lil mountain chalet! Thanks, Nicolas.
name: Cosy Chalet with a magnificent view

comments: Warm & genuine reception at the train station. The very charming apartment is ideally situated to amenities & the ski transport... The apartment is perfectly equipped with all kitchen necessities. The Surround sound, the cost sitting room, the exceptional balcony & views.. Make this a home away from home with all your comforts. Grateful for this experience, that complemented my ski holiday beautifully. Highly recommended.. Definitely will return. Gracious hosts. Merci!
name: Petites fugues en Plein-Ciel

comments: Un peu loin de la gare et de la télécabine mais très bon logement familial et agréable et surtout très bien équipé
name: Charmant studio au calme

comments: The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

comments: Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet und man hat einen wundervollen Blick auf den See. Wir verbachten eine schöne Nacht und können es nur empfehlen. Eva ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit.
name: Wohnen mit Blick auf den Murtensee

comments: Appartement bien équipé, idéalement situé pour le ski, et avec superbe vue.

comments: L'appartamento è bello, il letto è comodo e l'ambiente accogliente. La connessione Wi-Fi è molto buona. Potrebbe essere un vero gioiello, ma ci vuole un po' più cura. Un superhost dovrebbe lasciare tutto in ordine e accertarsi che gli ospiti non trovino sorprese, come ad esempio numerosi vasi di piante in camera da letto o avanzi in frigo. Peccato che manchino alcuni servizi come lavatrice, lavastoviglie o microonde, dopotutto non si tratta di un alloggio economico. Da migliorare ma comunque non male!

comments: Lovely and comfortable house. Anja is a great host and friendly. I have extended my stay.

comments: Nick ‘s flat is very well equipped ! You will find all what you need ! The flat is big , there are 2 nice rooms as well as 2 bedrooms. Fireplace on the ground floor is very cozy and tv room upstairs is cool .  Local team supporting Nick during our stay was very helpful and reactive ! There is no doubt  we will stay again in Nick’ a flat !

comments: Cosy duplex next to small river with nice view. Easy to find. Kind staff. Close to all necessary facilities, comfortable parking and calm atmosphere. Good for two couples or couple with 1-2 kids.
name: Luxurious apartment with 5* Spa

comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Home sweet home

comments: Amazing host and really friendly person. Thanks Stephen!
name: Quiet, modern and well connected

comments: Stephen è stato molto gentile e disponibile. Ci siamo accordati per la chiave e mi ha lasciato tenere la stanza fino al pomeriggio. Il quartiere è molto pratico e comodo, attaccato alla fermata della metro e alla coop e alla farmacia, insomma ideale! La descrizione e le foto rispecchiano perfettamente la casa e la camera.
name: Quiet, modern and well connected

comments: Ho soggiornato da Chris per 4 giorni. La stanza e' confortevole e non manca mai l'acqua , ne il the e caffè . Gli asciugamani puliti e prodotti per il corpo. Accoglienza buona. Un 15/20 minuti a piedi per il centro
name: Cosy bedroom (shops and beach at 5 min by car)

comments: Un accueil d’une qualité exceptionnelle, une hôte exceptionnelle dirais-je ! L’appartement est impeccable, la chambre douillette, les chats accueillants, et rencontrer Christel a été comme revoir une amie. Nous recommandons vivement cette halte bienveillante et généreuse en Pays de Vaud!
name: Cosy bedroom (shops and beach at 5 min by car)

comments: Chris was a great host. She drove to the train station to pick me up and waited patiently for me when I took the wrong turn exiting the train platform. He apartment was immaculate and there were nice touches such as a coffee machine with pods, chocolate, water and  different jacks to recharge my phone in my room. Extra towels, soap, shampoo/conditioner and other toiletries were also available in the bathroom. The bed was very comfortable and I slept very well since there was absolutely no noise. When I had to get up early the next morning to catch a flight from Geneva, Chris generously offered to drive me back to the train station. Overall, I had a great stay and wished I could stay longer. If I'm ever in the area again, I would definitely book this apartment again. Highly recommended. Thanks Chris!
name: Cosy bedroom (shops and beach at 5 min by car)

comments:
Die Wohnung ist genau wie auf den Bildern - sehr gross / geräumig. Die Kommunikation was hervorragend und wir konnten unseren Aufenthalt geniessen.
Leider kann man das Sofa nicht "ausziehen" und so ist es sehr schmal und nicht für mehrere Nächte zu empfehlen.

comments:
It was a nice stay in a nice apartment. We especially enjoyed the nice view from the balconies, and a nice living room.
The house is a bit old, with no elevator. The floor in the corridor and a kitchen was a bit cold, so our kid could not play there barefoot, but it was not a big problem.
name: 121 Nice apartment Lausanne

comments: Schönen Unterkunft alles nötige vorhanden.

comments: Grosszügige Stadtwohnung

comments: Everything was perfect, we had a fantastic stay. Rita was a great host and the breakfast was awesome! We're looking forward to come back next year ;)

comments: Everything was perfect, we had a fantastic stay. Rita was a great host and the breakfast was awesome! We're looking forward to come back next year ;)

comments: Our days at la Griotte were very pleasant. We felt like at home at all times. We liked the location a lot, convenient to go skiing and not far from the city center. A highly recommendable choice!

comments: Rita propose un logement de qualité, très propre, avec de bons lits et un excellent petit-déjeuner. En plus c'est une personne sympa et ouverte avec laquelle on a plaisir à parler.
name: La Griotte, Mountain Chalet -Room 3

comments: Rita ist eine sehr aufgeschlossene und hilfsbereite Person. Der Aufenthalt war dadurch sehr angenehm.

comments:

On se sent bien dans le Guesthouse de Rita !

comments: Rita’s chateau is a little gem, it’s homely and cheerful and has everything you need to make the most of a trip to Villars.
name: La Griotte, Mountain Chalet -Room 3

comments: Rita was a great host and very helpful. The breakfast was awesome! See you next year ;)
name: La Griotte, Mountain Chalet -Room 4

comments: Très bon séjour dans l'appartement, propreté irréprochable et calme parfait. Au besoin je n'hésiterai pas à louer encore une fois. Seul point gênant, la chambre est plus froide que le reste de l'appartement. Salutations

comments: Natacha was charming and her flat was exactly as described in the site. We had a very good time and we highly recommend Natacha's place.

comments: Very beautiful and spacious apartment, well equiped kichen and wonderful sunny view to the lake and mountins from 7th floor. Denner (shop) and bus stop were just couple of steps far. Helpful and kind host (delevered me from railway station, while I arrieved late at night).
name: Luxe, calme et volupté avec vue lac

comments: Mon séjour dans ce logement c’est bien passé , logement agréable et reposant
name: Luxe, calme et volupté avec vue lac

comments: I visit Lausanne monthly and this apartment has been the best where I have stayed so far. The views are totally amazing, the apartment is very well equipped, there are supermarkets nearby, the connection by bus is quite good and the lake is really near. Additionally, interacting with Natacha was really smooth and she was always very helpful and flexible in order to make our stay comfortable. A place that I would recommend without any doubt.
name: Luxe, calme et volupté avec vue lac

comments: Great stay and excellent host
name: Luxe, calme et volupté avec vue lac

comments: Marc was an awesome host. He was very friendly and responded super fast.  The location was great and the view to the alps was really breathtaking. Everything worked very well. This was my first booking using airbnb but definitely not the last one and for sure not the last time we stayed at Marc's place. Cheers Martin

comments: Séjour ressourçant dans un logement joliment  décoré. L'accueil était impeccable et attentionné.  L'appartement est parfaitement équipé avec un bel espace. Nous avons apprécié la belle vue sur les montagnes et le charmant village à la population très accueillante. Pas de neige mais de magnifiques balades dans cette superbe région!

comments: We had a very nice time  (7 days) in Silvio s apartment. Everything was clean and worked properly. The apt. was like we had imagined though the pictures. We were with 2 adults and 2 little children and  we had enough space to feel comfortable.  The apt has a lot of natural light and great vieuws! Silvio was ready always to answer our questions and to help us, we felt very welcomed!  Gryon is a very quiet beautiful town and skiing with te children was a wonderful experience!

comments: Nous avons passé une semaine très agréable dans le studio de Silvio. Logement cosy tout à fait conforme à la description. L'accueil de Silvio est chaleureux et très sympathique. Ajouter la beauté du village et des alentours: une très bonne adresse !
name: Beau studio - centre village

comments: Passer le week end de nouvel an en montagne! Vraiment un endroit charmant, correspondant tout à fait à l'annonce! Un accueil super, un appartement propre et très bien équipé! La navette à côté de l'appart. toutes les heures ou presque pour aller au ski est vraiment appréciable! Merci Silvio pour tout et bonne année! :)
name: Beau studio - centre village

comments:
Le studio de Silvio est parfait.
La situation est idéale au cœur du vieux Gryon avec des petits commerces de qualité à quelques enjambées.
La vue est sublime , soleil toute la matinée , les sommets en face de vous.
La literie est de qualité , les équipements aussi.
Rien ne manque pour cuisiner.
La salle de jeu en bas est sympa avec sa table de Ping Pong
La télécabine pour les pistes est à moins de cinq minutes en voiture,sinon il y a un train, oui oui un train qui passe par là et qui vous conduit sur les pistes ou une navette gratuite 
Pour résumer , vous êtes dans un nid douillet , à l écart des foules avec tout ce qu il faut aux alentours
Rapport qualité prix imbattable 
Silvio est dispo pour répondre à vos questions .
Le studio est dans un ancien hôtel ce qui ajoute au charme.
Les communs sont nickels et très soignés .
name: Beau studio - centre village

comments: Un appartement très agréable et propre dans une résidence parfaitement tenue,  dans le charmant village de Gryon, à proximité des commerces (le marché gryonnais, le boucher, la laiterie...), de la navette qui mène aux télécabines, de la gare pour aller jusqu'à Villars. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour et la communication avec Silvio a été aisée. Une très bonne adresse !
name: Beau studio - centre village

comments:
Lovely place, conveniently located in the quiet old centre of Gryon. Although small it has everything you need. Nice sunny balcony. 
Mind that the matrass is a bit hard.
name: Beau studio - centre village

comments: Un accueil chaleureux, des hôtes bienveillants à notre écoute, bouilloire et thés à notre disposition, espace simple et calme dans les hauteurs de la vallée de Joux, petit déjeuner copieux avec des fruits frais : je reviendrais avec plaisir, surtout en été pour randonner !

comments: Nous avons passé un très bon week-end de ski de fond dans le coin, et nous avons bien apprécié l'accueil chaleureux d'Arthur et Lucille. Ils nous ont donné des conseils pour le bus, les pistes de ski de fond, un restaurant, ... c'était agréable de discuter avec toute la famille pendant le petit déjeuner ! Merci !! Nous retournerons avec plaisir !
name: Chalet à la Vallée de Joux

comments: Another great stay.
name: Living/Bedroom sofabed centertown

comments:
We had a wonderful week at the chalet. It's cosy, fully furnished, clean and calm. 
We really enjoyed the fact you can almost do everything by walking. 
Slops are at 50 meters away too.
If you're a family with little children there isn't better place at Les Diablerets!
name: Traditional Swiss Bijou Chalet aux Diablerets

comments:
J’ai loué le chalet d’Alan pendant une semaine, milieu Janvier, avec une de mes filles et son ami. C’est un espace très chaleureux, confortable et propre. Le chalet est très bien situé. En quelques minutes à pieds, on est dans le centre du village, ou au télésiège des Mazots, avec rentrée directe au chalet, sans déchausser. Le bus pour Isenau et Glacier 3.000 est proche, deux à trois minutes à pieds. La piste de ski fond est juste devant le chalet. Malgré toute cette proximité, l’emplacement reste assez privé.  C’est vraiment un endroit idéal à tous les niveaux. Alan est un hôte très accessible. Quand je reviendrai aux Diablerets, ce sera certainement mon chalet de choix, mais je crains de devoir « faire la queue »  lorsque  ce petit chalet aura été découvert. 

I stayed one week with my daughter and a friend in Alan’s chalet in mid January. It is a wonderful, warm, cozy, well appointed and clean space. Ideally situated, only a short walk away from the center of the village, less than a five minute walk to the chair lift of Les Mazots, three minutes to the bus that goes to Isenau lift and the Glacier 3000 gondola. When skiing the Mazots/Meilleret side you can ski right down to the chalet. The cross country trail is just in front of the chalet. Despite being close to everything there is still comfortable isolation. Alan is a gracious and communicative host and his chalet will be first on my list next time I am in Les Diablerets.
name: Traditional Swiss Bijou Chalet aux Diablerets

comments:
Le chalet d Alan est exceptionnel, à tel point que nous souhaiterions presque garder secret cette petite merveille.

Le chalet en lui même n est pas juste un petit chalet... C est LE CHALET ! Très typique, parfaitement situé au calme (mais tout est accessible à pied), joliment décoré où tout est bien pensé. Nous n avons manqué de rien. 

Dès notre arrivée nous nous sommes sentis chez nous. Il y avait de belles décorations dans tout le chalet pour les fêtes de fin d année.

Pour les enfants, il y a une grande place de jeux en face du chalet et beaucoup de verdure tout autour.

Un grand merci à Alan de nous avoir permis de séjourner dans son superbe chalet, nous reviendrons sans hésitation.
name: Traditional Swiss Bijou Chalet aux Diablerets

comments: This was my second stay in the chalet. The second time was just as good as the first. It is a cozy, comfortable and very well located chalet which I plan to book again.
name: Traditional Swiss Bijou Chalet aux Diablerets

Would definitely recommend.

comments:
Julian’s flat very much met our expectations.   Location was very central, within minutes walk  to the train station.  The road was somewhat busy with car traffic and the area did attract a fair amount of noise from late night revelers, but that should be expected since it was around new years.   It was a nice flat in a charming building 

The flat itself was clean, everything was functional.    The flat clearly had a masculine tough,  there were a fair amount of trinkets and table top items, so we put those all in the corner during our visit.    

Julian’s communication was great, his English was superb and he greeted us warmly.  He even went out of his way to obtain items like a cafetiere and hair dryer.   He also had the kitchen stocked and was kind enough to allow us access to coffee and other basics.   He could not have been more helpful. 

We had a lovely stay and I would easily recommend this flat
name: Montreux Spacious Apartment

comments: Thanks for having us, the place was clean and Julian the host was very helpful. The heating system and hot water was great. Train station and amenities are all a walk away. Can be a little moody around early hour of the night when people go out of the bar a few doors up. For there rest thumbs up!!!
name: Montreux Spacious Apartment

comments: Philipp's chalet at Rougemont is great! Modern, charming, well located, sunny and well equipped. Facing the Videmanette, very close to a ski bus stop and a short walk to nice restaurants. Friends of mine were installed in other chalets but this one was, by far, the best option. Check in/out very smooth and convenient parking spot underground.

comments: Anne's Home is very comfortable and has anything you'd need for some days of holiday. It's midway between the old centre of the city and the lake and you can easly walk or go anywhere. comments:
Francine a été une hôte très accueillante! Magnifique petit déjeuner avec des produits locaux et délicieux.
On se sent chez elle comme à la maison et les enfants ont eu énormément de plaisir à discuter avec Francine qui nous a beaucoup parlé du Village et de ses traditions.
Le seul hic est peut être le prix passablement élevé pour une chambre sans salle de bain. 

Un grand merci à Francine et son sourire contagieux!;-)  m
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments:
Notre passage à la Daille c'est avant tout une belle rencontre avec Francine, notre hôte aux multiples talents. Francine aura été aux petits soins dès notre arrivée pour faire de notre séjour un sucés. et c'est réussi : toute la famille est conquise!
Accueil et logement très chaleureux. Nous aurons grand plaisir à revenir pour découvrir un peu plus la région, hiver comme été!
A recommander!
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments:
The location is amazing as it is close to everything. The rooms were really clean and cosy! We enjoyed the breakfast that was prepared by Francine every morning.

Even though the bathroom was a shared bathroom, it wasn't too inconvenient. Francine was very kind to arrange her husband to drop us off at the train station when we requested for it (a fee of 5 CHF per person) as our luggages were quite heavy and it was snowing. We are very glad to have Francine as our host. Thank you!
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments: I wholeheartedly recommend this as one of the best BnBs I've ever stayed in. Francine is the kindest, most outgoing host who knows the region inside out and can offer endless tips. The BnB itself is extremely cosy and comfortable. The breakfast is outstanding. Best of all, it's only a few minutes from the ski lifts!
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments:
Très bonne adresse, emplacement idéal proche du centre du village et des remontées mécanniques. on peut tout faire à pied.
L'acceuil de Francine est très chaleureux et convivial. On est comme à la (Website hidden by Airbnb) chalet !
Encore merci pour ce super petit séjour et la découverte du ''surf'' :)
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments: We had an amazing time at Francine's! The town is picture perfect and everyone is so friendly. Francine and Pierre are kind, generous, amazing hosts! The bed was the most comfortable I've ever slept in! The breakfast in the morning is so incredibly delicious, especially the homemade preserves! Even though our activities on the mountain were canceled due to weather conditions, we had a lovely time relaxing and wandering the town. Everyone should book a stay at La Daille, you will not be disappointed!
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments: La Daille est un très charmant chalet. Francine est très accueillante et serviable. Une expérience des plus authentiques! :D
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments: Super accueil, petit déjeuner magnifique et très complet. Chalet suisse typique très joliment décoré. Juste une salle de bain/WC non séparé pour 6 personnes, ça peut être un peu juste.
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments: Accueil très sympathique, grande disponibilité pour nous renseigner. Le site est idéalement situé au coeur du village près des remontées mécaniques, des restaurants et des commerces. Le cadre est unique, dans une ancienne ferme. Le confort est bon compte tenu des contraintes liées à la conservation d'un patrimoine qui ont font un lieu au cachet magnifique.
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments: Cosy and essential, old Swiss chalet style, clean, friendly, yummy home made jams
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments: Acceuil très chaleureux dans la maison familiale de Francine qui est très bien située à proximité du centre et au calme.
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments: Francine accommodated us last minute and was very flexible with our late check in. The place is beautiful and perfectly located and really does go beyond expectations. Betsy the cat was a really big plus and the breakfasts were always delicious !
name: LA DAILLE - Chambre d'hôtes, B&B, LES DIABLERETS

comments: Perfectly situated B&B in a rustic farm house with charming hosts. For me it was a delightful short stay.

comments: Great flat in convenient location. Very quiet and comfortable. Host was awesome.

comments: I hit the jackpot with this reservation . Beautiful house in a beautiful location and true to the spirit of bnb. Each morning we had a wholesome breakfast including a selection of homebaked sourdough breads, organic fruits, yogurt, honey and jams. Most memorable was the feeling of being at home with the kind and hospitable family of Iva and her three sons, all talented and inspired. Add to that an assortment of classes of yoga, Tai-Chi and other activities including Ayurvedic massage...what more could one ask for ?
name: Single Room & Breakfast, St-Cergue

comments: Merci beaucoup pour cette belle expérience. J'ai vraiment passé une belle fin d'année et j'ai profité de marcher dans la neige. Magnifique vue depuis la Dôle!
name: Single Room & Breakfast, St-Cergue

comments: I stayed in Helina Apartment 1 week , really i felt am home , she was kind and helpful , Thank you very much Helina :)
name: Big room at stade olympique.

comments: I spent a very comfortable time here: the house is close to the city center and in a quite neighborhood. Moreover, Elia has been kind and precise!
name: Nice appartment in the center

comments: We had a great time celebrating New Year's Eve at Christian's place. Lack of snow notwithstanding, for which Christian can't be blamed, we had fun visiting Neuchatel, trekking along the nearby trails and enjoying the hot baths in Yverdon. Christian's home is spacious, fully equipped and has a stunning view of the Neuchatel lake. Would absolutely come back again.
name: Enjoy & Relax in this beautyful pla

comments:
Nous avons passe un sejour tres agreable dans cet  appartement dans un quartier de verdure , pres de Vevey et assez proche du lac Leman  .
Anne Marie tres accueillante et tres soucieuse de notre bien etre jusque dans les moindres details , s est montree disponible et tres reactive par sms .Son mari est egalement tres gentil tout comme leur petit garçon .Appartement bien chauffe ,bcp de rangements ,baie vitree agreable donnant sur le petit jardin .Nous recommandons ce logement pour y passer 1 ou 2 semaines de vacances en Suisse !
name: LittleNest, your private home at Riviera Montreux

comments: A really lovely home in a very beautiful part of the world. Ann-Marie was a wonderful and welcoming host who was very friendly and made our stay very pleasant. The place is only a short drive from central Montreux and is also handy to Lausanne. Would recommend Anne-Marie and her place to anyone!
name: LittleNest, your private home at Riviera Montreux

comments:
Anne-Marie,
thank you very much for your very friendly welcome and your good help for discovering the sourroundings. 
The appartment was very nice and functional. We could use the washing machine with incorporated dryer and a well equipped kitchen. 
It was calm and relaxing, no traffic or other noise.
We felt very welcomed and cared for -  were very pleased with our stay. Thank you!
name: LittleNest, your private home at Riviera Montreux

comments: Anne-Marie and Henry were wonderful hospitable hosts. Nothing was too much trouble and that a lot of advice and ideas on what to do and how to get around the area. Though it is quite a small apartment we highly, recommended it.
name: LittleNest, your private home at Riviera Montreux

comments:
Anne Marie was extremelly helpful. The apt is great - we were 2 families of 2 and fit perfectly. On pretty days the view is awsome and so is the neighborhood.
THANK YOU
name: LittleNest, your private home at Riviera Montreux

comments: bel endroit,  bel environnement;  hôtes charmant et disponibles,  de quoi occuper les enfants,  et documentation sur la région.
name: LittleNest, your private home at Riviera Montreux

comments: Enjoyed our stay at your place. Very convenient location for our purpose in a quiet neighbourhood.  Comfortable space with all basic amenities provided. Sparkling clean house. Nice big living area and a spacious bedroom.
name: LittleNest, your private home at Riviera Montreux

comments: Très bon séjour au Sentier, le studio est agréable et nous avons été bien accueillies par Michel. Le site alentour est magnifique et propice aux randonnées.
name: studio

comments: J'ai passé un agréable séjour à la Vallée de Joux dans le studio de Michel. Le lieu est propre et sympathique, parfait pour se ressourcer et pratiquer de belles randonnées. Il y a même le centre sportif juste à côté pour s'offrir un moment de détente avec : massage, hammam, sauna et jacuzzi :-)

comments: Studio spacieux, idéalement situé pour les amoureux de la nature

Francesco et son coloc Luc ont été très sympathiques ! Rbnb ++ !

comments: L'appartement etait identique aux photos, Francesco n'était pas présent lors de notre voyage mais il a toujours été present par message pour tout.Nous sommes ravis d'avoir choisis cet appartement et nous le recommandons vivement.... Proche du centre a pied et belle vue sur le lac vraiment super

comments: L'accueil a été absolument adorable. Tout était parfait pour les adultes, les enfants et le chat! Nous avons adoré passer ces vacances et espérons revenir avec grand plaisir. L'usage de la maison est rendu très simple par Rose et on se sent à l'aise immédiatement.

comments: Chalet très comfortable, récent mais cosy, bien équipé et bien placé. Jolie vue. L'accueil est irréprochable. Tout était bien organisé et Rose est toujours disponible.

comments: Chaleureux chalet proche des centres d’interêt ! La propriétaire a été très réactive dans la communication et tout s’est parfaitement passé durant notre séjour. On recommande ce bien et nous y retournerons volontiers ! Merci

Chalet très bien pour une famille. Photos conformes à l’annonce.

comments: Très bel appartement neuf, l'intérieur est magnifiquement aménagé. Accueil très chaleureux!
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments: The flat was great.  Sophia has fantastic taste in furnishings.  We enjoyed our time for a great getaway weekend.
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments: Messages après la réservation, avant notre arrivée, et au départ pour s'assurer que tout allait bien pour nous.  Merci Sophia !!!
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments: Idéalement placé, à quelques pas (à plat) seulement du train qui mène aux pistes de ski. Une jolie vue sur les Dent du Midi. Une rénovation accomplie avec beaucoup de goût, entre charme montagnard discret et cocon cosy. Bonne literie, salles d'eau très jolies avec tous les équipements nécessaire, y compris une machine à laver le linge. Propreté irréprochable. Adresse à retenir et à partager !
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments: This is a beautiful apartment that is fully-equipped! Sophia has added thoughtful little touches like bedroom slippers. The beds and linens were pure luxury! The kitchen was perfect as well. A perfect spot in Villars!
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments: Great apartment, decorated with taste, very well situated (2 min walk to the Roche Grise train station, 5 min from the sledding area and from town center) and well equipped. Sophia was a very responsive, helpful and flexible host. Definitely a place we recommend and where we will come back.
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments: En plus d'une localisation idéale pour rejoindre les pistes, la réactivité/flexibilité de Sophia ainsi que le charme de l'appartement nous ont permis de passer un excellent weekend. A recommander.
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments: Stylish, spacious and stunning apartment with amazing views.  Beds unbelievably comfortable and exceptionally clean.
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments: Beautifully decorated, modern and lovely apartment a short walk to the Roche Grise train stop in Villars (which brings you up to the ski slopes).   Nice view of the mountains, well situated for an enjoyable visit to Villars.
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments:
Sophia’s apartment is in a great location for skiing. It’s just a couple of minutes walk from the little train station that leads to Bretaye and all the ski areas. Trains in the morning go every 15 minutes so pretty convenient. The apartment itself is beautifully decorated in a woody chalet style with lovely soft sheets and towels and fluffy duvets. Both bathrooms (one walk-in shower, one shower over bath) were modern and clean with plenty of hot water. The living space and kitchen had everything we needed (including UK tv channels!!) for self catering and a little balcony with a view of the station. There’s a ski/boot room in the basement to store kit overnight. 
The train stops at about 6 in the evening so if you want to go out and eat/skate/bowl you need to walk down/up the fairly steep path to the main town. It’s not far but better to be prepared and have grippy boots with you.
All in all a super place to stay to access the Villars/Diablerets ski area and very tastefully presented.
Thank you
name: Elegant ski & hiking flat for 6, Villars s/Ollon

comments: J'ai passé un excellent séjour chez Hilda qui est une hôte très disponible. Le logement était très propre et calme, situé à seulement 2 minutes à pied de l'arrêt de bus

comments: Séjour très agréable rien à dire  merci

comments: Great stay, the place is central with a direct metro to EPFL. She is nice and very flexible.
name: chambre bleue

comments: J'ai pu profiter du calme et de la place à disposition- Très bon accueil, sympathique et disponible pour tout renseignements. L'appartement est joliment décoré et fonctionnel, comme à la maison! :-)
name: Appart. cosy au coeur de Crissier

comments: Accueil très chaleureux de Aurélie et Matthieu: en plus des petits chocolats qui nous attendaient à l'arrivée, l'appartement est vraiment très agréable, très au calme et en même temps tout près de Lausanne, avec ce grand jardin (dommage, ce n'était pas le moment des barbecues!), belle terrasse, une chambre spacieuse, bref, un appartement idéal si vous cherchez un logement avec un excellent rapport qualité/prix.

Calme, confortable, spacieux et propreté irréprochable.
Discrétion et adaptabilité de Matthieu aux horaires d'arrivée et de départ
logement très bien situé pour une visite de Lausanne ou pour le travail.
