comments:
Catherine est une hôtesse absolument charmante qui m'a accueillie avec chaleur.
L'appartement est rénové et très propre. Il a une vue magnifique et est baigné de soleil. Il est idéalement situé : il se situe à qql mètres du parking, des télécabines et tout proche du magasin Migros et du cinéma.
Il est également possible de dormir sur le canapé-lit et de se faire réveiller par le soleil qui se lève.
L'appartement est petit mais confortable et tout le nécessaire est présent pour vivre et cuisiner.
Je recommande vraiment.
name: Appartement au départ du télécabine

comments: Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour. Catherine est très chaleureuse et arrangeante. L'appartement est fonctionnel, bien équipé et très bien situé. Nous recommandons vivement.
name: Appartement au départ du télécabine

comments: Departamento impecable, muy bien ubicado.
name: Appartement au départ du télécabine

comments:
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Fabienne. Il est spacieux, lumineux et confortable. Il correspond aux photos et est même plus beau en vrai. 
L'immeuble est neuf et sécurisé,  le quartier tranquille et proche des commerces. La vue du salon sur les montagnes est très reposante et se marie bien avec la décoration "zen".
La cuisine est bien équipée et fonctionnelle et joli bouquet de roses nous attendait. Nous avons passé un bon weekend à trois dans cette belle région.
name: Val vert au bord du Lac Léman

comments:
The apartment located in very quiet place and in pretty new building. 
Inside by evening can be pretty cold, but with a time we took it in a habit.
name: Val vert au bord du Lac Léman

comments: I want to thank Madame Fabienne for her kindness and always help were coming when we need it. Definitely the best place to stay in Switzerland. Apartment is in a new building, so clean, beautiful and sunny. In 20min from Geneva and 25min from Lausanne. The best location if you going to travel much.
name: Val vert au bord du Lac Léman

comments: Super view and quiet place.
name: Val vert au bord du Lac Léman

comments: This is a lovely, almost brand-new apartment in the small and charming village of Vich.  The apartment is situated near a creek and close to the village centre, great places for walking, 2 supermarkets and the motorway to Geneva/Lausanne. There's even a cross-fit and a yoga center for those who are interested in Fitness. We had everything that we needed for our (rather long) stay, including a washer & dryer, well-equiped kitchen, fast internet, lots of TV channels, hair dryer, etc. We really enjoyed our stay, especially the convenience of the location and the beauty of the countryside near the apartment. Fabienne is a very friendly host.
name: Val vert au bord du Lac Léman

comments: Super trip, great place to stay ! I highly recommend ! 5 STARS  !
name: Beautiful room, independant acces.

comments: Nicolas is a very friendly host and gave us great local advices. His flat is very clean, a great place to stay and to explore the beautiful surrounding. Absolutely recommendable  ;-)
name: Room with a view, perfect location

comments: Nicolas is the best host I ever experienced on Airbnb. He is always willing to help. The appartement is clean and cozy.
name: Room with a view, perfect location

comments: Maggie's house have a good location which the bus station is directly in front of the building. Me and my boyfriend were a bit disappointed with the room on the first day since the room was dusty and I had to vacuum and mop the floor and tables by myself on the next day. We are very sensitive to the dust but luckily everything is fine. Brand new experience compared with my previous stay from Airbnb. Although Maggie is a friendly host and I am happy to stay with her during the time.
name: cosy appartment with lake view

comments: Ich kann mich den Bewertungen anschliessen. Schönes Chalet, dass ruhig gelegen ist und eine wundervolle Aussicht auf die Alpen bietet. Wir waren über Silvester dort und hatten sehr viel Schnee. Zum Skifahren ist das Chalet sehr gut gelegen, der Skilift und auch ein Kinderhang sind in Gehdistanz. Gut zu wissen: Bei so viel Schnee wie wir hatten, besteht dort ein Schneeketten-Obligatorium für Autos. Aber mit Schneeketten ist die Fahrt kein Problem. Der gedeckte Parkplatz oben an der Strasse ist im Winter super. Ohne Einschränkung weiter zu empfehlen.
name: Chalet Julia, Villars sur Ollon/Alpe des Chaux

comments:
The chalet is just great! Very well located (4min walks from ski lift) and with an incredible view, it has way enough space to make your stay comfortable.

We really enjoyed our stay and will probably come back!
name: Chalet Julia, Villars sur Ollon/Alpe des Chaux

comments:
Wir, -6- Personen im Alter von 47-52j., haben eine wunderbare Woche über Sylvester 19/20 im Chalet Julia verbracht mit viel Sonne und reichlich Schnee. Perfekt!!!
Der kleine Weg (ca.100m) zum Haus ist ziemlich steil und im Winter nur mit Allrad und ggf Schneeketten befahrbar. Dort befinden sich bis zu zwei Abstellplätze direkt am Haus. Etwas oberhalb an der Straße kann ein überdachter Parkplatz (Nr.706) benutzt werden.
Aussenbereich:
Traumhafter und überwältigender Ausblick auf die Berge vom Balkon oder der darunter befindlichen Terasse. Das Grundstück bietet zudem reichlich Platz für verschiedene Aktivitäten.
Innenbereich:
Insgesamt -4- Schlafzimmer, wobei nach meinem Geschmack eines davon etwas zu klein für Erwachsene ist. Davon -3- Schlafzimmer mit direktem Zugang zu der Terasse und eines befindet sich unter dem Dach. Die zwei Badezimmer und die Gästetoilette waren sauber und zum Teil wohl frisch renoviert. Das Wohnzimmer und Esszimmer mit tollem Blick auf die Berge, sowie die angrenzende offene Küche bieten ansprechenden Platz. Die Küche ist sehr gut ausgestattet mit Geschirr, Besteck und Töpfe/Pfannen etc. Hervorzuheben ist der Backautomat, da sich ein Bäcker nicht in fussläufiger befindet.
Aktivitäten:
In ca. 400 und 700m befindet sich der Skilift und eine Rodelbahn (mit Lift), alles fussläufig erreichbar und man könnte sogar bis zum Haus zurück auf Skiern fahren.
Vor dem Lift, bzw. auf der Straße dorthin, wird die schmale Straße durch sogenannte Park-Guides geregelt, da leider viele Urlauber durch sinnfreies Parken den Verkehr fast komplett lahmlegen. Da das Chalet fast direkt am Lift (daneben Ski-Shop und Pizzeria) liegt blieb uns das Verkehrs-Chaos erspart. 
Fazit:
Wir alle haben den Aufenthalt dort sehr genossen und würden das Chalet vorbehaltlos weiter empfehlen. Dank auch an Airbnb und dem Kontakt Bernadette. Rückfragen wurden schnell beantwortet und alle Reiseunterlagen, einschließlich der Wegbeschreibung, waren rechtzeitig da. Toller Urlaub in einer wunderschönen Gegend mit sehr schönem Chalet.
name: Chalet Julia, Villars sur Ollon/Alpe des Chaux

comments:
We spent a wonderful time in Andrea's chalet! The view is paritucularly beautiful! The chalet is cosy and clean. We especially enjoyed long evenings next to the fireplace. Andrea was also very friendly and helpful. The chalet is located above the village which gives easy access to hiking.
We would definitely stay here again!
name: Warm and Charming Swiss Chalet

comments: Super Host ! I had a great time at Mark & Juliette’s place
name: 'Le 54', ravissant studio

comments:
I stayed three nights in this stylish, cosy and comfortable studio. Perroy is a beautiful small village. None the less, you will have a small shop and a bakery with its tea room just opposite, and a restaurant round the corner. Couldn’t get more comfortable than that.
There is a church on the opposite side of the road, and the bells ring half hour, but to my surprise it was not disturbing in any way.
Mark and Juliette were very friendly and took their time to answer questions.
The small home is well equipped and has everything one needs.
I highly recommend this place and hope to be back myself!
name: 'Le 54', ravissant studio

comments: Lorenzo is a great, very responsive and reliable host. The apartment is very cosy, clean, modern, well equipped, comfortable, calm and nicely located. The stay was perfectly organized by Lorenzo and everything at it's best. Very warm recommendation for your next stay in Rougemont. Will always come back. PERFECT!
name: Beautiful renovated apartment in Rougemont

comments: I would like to thank Sofia for being a wonderful host. Despite being ill, she welcomed me after midnight to make sure I was settled and comfortable. The apartment is in the best location in Lausanne, very cosy and easy to find. Sofia went out of her way to help me with any queries and directions . 10/10 X
name: In the heart of the old town

comments:
Sofia is very friendly and open to share her place with a 'stranger'. She was home when I arrived, made tea and even offered to make food. We had very nice chats about her work and life in general.

The apartment is well decorated with all kinds of stylish touches. The room is quiet, which I always find important. The bed is good.

Summarizing, it was a great stay!
name: In the heart of the old town

comments: Appartement très bien situé. Sofia est super sympa. Je la recommande vivement :-)
name: In the heart of the old town

comments:
Sofia est une hôte chaleureuse et très prévenante. Elle m'a mis tout de suite à l'aise. 
Elle a mis sa cuisine à disposition pour que je puisse prendre petit-déjeuner et dîner.
La chambre est spacieuse et claire. J'appréhendais un peu le matelas fut on mais au final c'était confortable et pas trop ferme. Petit bémol : il manque des rangements pour entreposer ses affaires. 
Je recommande !
name: In the heart of the old town

comments:
Appartement confortable et conforme aux photos. 
Je le recommande
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments: es war sauber, geräumig.
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments: Excellent housing with good conditions and views, very clean and neat and thoughtful. I recommend, including for families. There are some restrictions on noise and ejection of garbage, which are due to local regulations.
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments: Todo perfecto! El apartamento es tal cual en las fotos
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments: The place is wonderful. I would recommend to anyone who is looking for a place to stay in Lausanne.
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments: Nice flat. Is clean and has everything you need. Everything worked out fine.
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments: Great Location
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments:
To begin with, the instructions for check-ins/check-outs and house rules were very clear and easy to understand. 

The place is clean and spacious. Beds are very soft although quite squeaky when moving about. There is a functional kitchen with the necessary utensils to cook with. 

The view from the apartment is amazing as you get 3 different views from the living room, kitchen and rooms. During clear skies, you get to see a part of Lake Geneva past the other apartments from the living room. You also get to see the mountains towards the left from there as well. 

The neighbourhood was quiet and peaceful. No TV is good too, so family bonding is encouraged. It was a pleasant stay overall and we would gladly come back here again.
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments: Logement conforme à la desceiption
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments:
A lovely 2 bedroom flat with some views of the lake and mountains. Garage space is small so need good skills and not be driving a big car. Small shop at bottom of road for late groceries on a Sunday, but other shops two roads down towards the lake. About a 15 min walk from the train station and slightly less to Mally Metro station. The hill is first part of the walk to the metro and last part of the walk to the train station. Or bus 6 can go one stop to get you up the hill for the Metro. Washing machine only takes exact coins and has instruction books behind them. Good luck finding the laundry - we had to explore a little to find it.  Front door can be locked after 10pm, so will need key and not just use code to enter. 
Note that international adaptors need to be raised up To get over the Swiss safety feature of the extension leads that Mina supplies. These help you get your mobile phone closer to you at night if needing an alarm clock as we did. 
A lovely quiet flat to enjoy your time in Lausanne.
name: 122 Beautiful apartment in Lausanne

comments:
France is an excellent hostess with a wonderful house.  Our family of five spent five lovely days there, and her care, excellent communication and attention to detail made our visit a great success.  The house is wonderfully located with easy access to Geneva and the general area, and is very well equipped. It really has everything to make your stay comfortable and feel like you are at home.  When we were thinking of staying in a hotel, residential hotel or her place, we looked at all the factors and saw that staying at her house made the most sense.  And we were not disappointed!  We highly recommend her residence for anyone staying in the Geneva area and will be more than happy to return to her house in the future!

David

comments:
When I left for Switzerland my flight was cancelled and I was rerouted to a later flight with additional stops. So my arrival time was changed from a morning arrival to afternoon. Having 6 hours time difference I couldn't easily relay that info to Aless but when I landed and reached out to tell Aless of my late arrival... he was pleasant and accommodating with a no problem attitude. I appreciated it. The apartment is exactly as pictured and what was an even better surprise was how spotless and clean it was. It also had a very fresh scent that seemed to last the whole time as well. Aless made a space available to hang garments as well as drawers to use. He was available for any questions I had and always responded to any texts I sent.  I was there for 10 days and felt very comfortable and at ease during my stay. 
If your considering this location, please don't hesitate as its a great location with plenty of shops and lots to see withing walking distance. I would easily return and would like to stay there again should the situation arise. Thanks Aless for all your hospitality!... Paul
name: Appartement 1 pièce au centre ville

comments:

We hadn't any problem and I would definitely suggest staying at this place.

poco spazio per mettere i propri effetti personali, ma nel complesso una buona alternativa all'hotel.

comments: As a host Eric was amazing!!  He was onsite to greet me and show me everything that was necessary to live in his beautiful apartment.  He was so gracious you could not have asked more from a 5 star hotel! The apartment is well kept and spotless!!  Eric is very neat,orderly and organized.  He was very helpful about the area and extremely accessible.  He could be reached at anytime and no request was ever overlooked.  The view from his apartment as well as the balcony are truly amazing.  The building is quiet,safe and well kept.  He left me a bottle of wine and sweets for my first night there.  I have been here for a month and will be sorry to have to leave.  You could not go wrong staying in this lovely apartment. If you feel as I did that you need a cleaning person, Eric has a wonderful lady named Christine who is just amazing. I wish I could take her with me.  For a person traveling alone in Switzerland, I could not have asked for a better situation.

comments: Fantastic! House is extremely well equipped and prepared for its guests

comments:
Let me start by saying we travel a lot and we were very impressed! Perfect in every way. 

We opened the front door and went “wow”look at this!Immaculate in presentation and a great first impression. There are two double bedrooms, The first is a good size with two windows and  wardrobe. The lounge which is in the middle of the house has cosy seating area with multi language tv, with internet access and YouTube etc. A small bay provides a dining area with table and seating for up to 6. We found additional chairs in the store area along with hover, toilet roll, tools etc. 
The second bedroom is another good double with wardrobe and shelving, with double doors leading to a child’s room with full size bunk beds. Perfectly fine for older teenagers- our daughter was 15.
The kitchen is really well fitted with dishwasher and induction hob and with every thing you could need from a fondue set to microwave. To the rear of the kitchen is a utility area with large fridge/freezer and lots of bits such as spices, cooking oil etc. The family bathroom proves for a smaller bath with shower over and lots of very hot water and a separate toilet. There is also a shared laundry available and off road parking directly in front of the building. You have lovely views towards the mountains which you can enjoy from the bedrooms and dining area. Everything is of good quality, nice bedding and furnishings and it’s lovely and warm. All towels, bedding are included. 

The location is close to the main village and you can walk down a gentle slope in around 5 minutes. Our preferred shop was the coop as it had more choice than others. There are varied eateries in the village along with cinema in the classic hotel and ice skating and tobogganing at the bottom of the village. 


If you are going to ski then it’s a 2 minute drive to the main gondola but about 800 meters walk, so a bit of a trudge. You can park at the lifts for 5 francs a day- get there early as it can get busy a peak times. The “all area”ski pass also include Les Diablerets and the glacier3000 and they are close to each other’s about a 25 minute drive. A 6 day pass cost 310 francs. Not cheap! But over the last couple of years some new faster and bigger lifts have been added. The combined ski area is around 200 kilometres. Leysin offers around 60 kilometres. There are a number of ski hire shops with one directly opposite the main ski lift. 

Journey time from Geneva airport by car is about 1.5 hours and you can get a train to Aigle and then into Leysin where the closest station is only 100 yards away. 

This is a high quality accommodation with a very helpful host. 10/10 from us and we look forward to returning again.
name: Villa Maria, Apartment 1

comments: Très bien équipé et très propre. Place de parking appréciable. On se sent à l’aise dans cet appartement !

comments: 房东夫妇都很和蔼，艺术家庭，妻子绘画，丈夫贝斯手，来过北京，上海开巡回演，欧洲人对物质的追求意识比较淡泊，家里装饰很简单，只有些生活必须品.这样反而觉得整洁温馨，在这边临时定了一晚，因为第二天要下午离开，房东又要出门，退房交钥匙时间就有点冲突，房东夫人不确定下午2点前一定能赶回来，好心的房东把钥匙留给我，她出门去了，让我下午出门钥匙给她放门口信箱，谢谢房东夫人的信任，很暖心的人，值得再次入住！

The room is spacious and comfortable, the information of wifi and contact detail were writing on the paper leaving in the room. Both Roxana and André are very nice, I met Roxana at first night, she made me feel as free as at home. Moreover, since my flight was late at night, André allowed me to stay longer. If next time, definitely staying at their place again! P.s Dear Roxana, I like your artworks so much, and your singing too:p

comments: Cet appartement est merveilleux!  Surtout, nous voudrions bien rester encore chez Céline quand nous allons à Lausanne.  D’abord, l’appartement est exactement comme les photos indiquent:  il était spacieux, décoré joliment et tout était parfaitement propre.  Il était parfait pour nos enfants parce qu’il y avait beaucoup de jouets avec lesquels nos enfants ont bien profité!  Ensuite, Céline est une hôtesse trés attentive. Elle nous a expliqué complètement toutes les choses et elle était accessible tout le temps.  Enfin, elle était généreuse et gentille.  Elle nous a aussi donné quelques petites choses pour nous accueillir chaleureusement.  Pour conclure, nous pouvons le recommander à vous sans hesitation!  Merci, Céline!!

comments: Celine and her family welcomed us very warmly. They have two lovely kids, and the atmosphere is family friendly. We found the general experience positive, my tips for visitors: check if the family has any other visitors with them over your stay as it might get a bit busy, and bring extra pillows. Other than that, I would definitely recommend Celine`s place to future guests.

comments:
Die Wohnung hat sehr gute Lage mit schönem Aussucht auf die Berge. Im Winter ist es sehr bequem sofort von zuhause Ski fahren. Auch für die kleinen Kinder ist die Lage perfekt - die Übungspiste mit langem überdachtem Förderbahn ist in weniger Minuten erreichbar. Migros ist auch nicht weit, sowie Schwimmbad und einige Restaurants. 
Die Wohnung ist gross genug, passt gut für die Familie aus 3-5 Leuten. Der Esstisch ist etwas zu klein, reicht nur für 4 Personen.  
Unkomplizierter Check-in/ out. Parkplatz ist vorhanden, aber ist ziemlich eng, nicht für grosse Familienautos. 
Jay ist sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich. Vielen Dank.
name: Colina 403: Ski In/Ski Out Hike In/Hike Out Easy

comments: This a great place to stay in Leysin. The location is excellent, especially if you ski or snowboard because it's very close to the lifts and ski rental shop. We were able to walk to the train station,  grocery store, restaurants and pool. The view from the apartment is spectacular looking out into the valley. We loved drinking our morning coffee and looking out at the view. The kitchen has everything and bathroom is big. I would love to see Leysin in the summer with everything in bloom!  Leysin is a lovely small town and the locals were very friendly and welcoming.
name: Colina 403: Ski In/Ski Out Hike In/Hike Out Easy

comments: Thank you Caroline and Cecile! We had an amazing weekend. Your Chalet is beautiful, clean, and very cozy. "Just like home" :)
name: Chalet in Pays d'Enhaut - D - Chambre à louer

comments:
What a beautiful chalet! We had such a wonderful time and this was exactly what we had in mind for our new year gathering with friends and family (we were 9 + a small baby). 
A remote setting and an opportunity to 'switch off' from modern living for a few days, cinematic views and plenty of opportunity to warm ourselves by the stove after a day of hiking/skiing. Nicolas was completely welcoming, hospitable and replied instantly to our messages when we had questions, meeting us at the chalet when we arrived to show us around and to tell us how everything worked. Everything was there ready for us when we arrived; the chalet was very clean and tidy and Nicolas made sure that a sleeping place for the baby was provided. 
The inside is very comfortable, decorated with love and style. We certainly have had a good week of exercise (without a car) and it has been enough to burn off all the fondue that has been consumed (not to mention the chocolate). The area that the chalet is in is jaw droppingly beautiful, we continuously had to pinch ourselves upon waking up in the morning. In an excellent spot location wise- a 25-30 minute downhill walk to the local train station- Vers L'Eglise, 3 minutes by car and if you like to walk; a 50 minute hike to Les Diablerets or a 7 ish minute drive. Unfortunately, we didn't get to spot any wild mountain goats but we were lucky enough to spot some rabbits running around. The locals in the area were very welcoming and didn't hesitate to help us find our way around the village. A perfect spot for a Swiss getaway/skiing trip (I imagine in the spring and summer it is also wonderful). We would certainly come back and highly recommend the chalet for your next trip!
name: CHALET WITH A CINEMATOGRAPHIC VIEW

We had a very pleasant stay in Villars le Grand. Jean-Luc is a very nice and helpful host. The apartment is in a very quiet area. There are nice outdoor and playing facilities for children. The rooms are basic and comfortable.  The apartment is a little inconvenient constructed to our taste. Because dining table and sitting room are part of the bedrooms instead that they could have been centrally positioned for everybody to access. The kitchen is too small, whilst the bathroom is oversized and the toilet is not seperate.
Also there is no shop, restaurant or anything else than a busstop in the village.

comments: I booked this apartment for my husband and my 17 year old son for a boys-get-away for a week and they absolutely loved it. Tom was always quick and efficient in responding to queries, he popped in to meet them while they were there, gave precise directions on how to get to the apartment and the apartment was spotlessly clean on arrival, with beautiful views of Villar.  The apartment is very conveniently located close to the ski lift, within walking distance also to the main part of town, so one does not need a vehicle at all while there. The amenities in the apartment were more than sufficient and access to a separate space for snow gear, a sauna and heated pool was a huge bonus.  We would definitely recommend this apartment to others and will stay here again when next in Villar.
name: Charming Apartment, Dream Location

comments:
Nous avons passe les fetes de Noel et Nouvel an dans le chalet de Pascal et Jacqueline.
Tout y etait parfait. Chalet tres confortable, amenage avec beaucoup de gout et de charme.
Cuisine bien fournie,  salle a manger avec vue imprenable sur les Dents du Midi, salon cosy, salles de bains modernes, litterie excellente. Il ne manquait rien!
Pendant la journee on peut profiter du soleil sur le balcon en admirant la vue unique et le soir se retrouver dans le salon autour du feu. 
En plus les pistes de ski, ski de fond et raquettes sont a quelques minutes. Superbes randonnees a faire.
Bref, a vivement recommander! Vous ne le regretterez pas.
Un grand merci a Pascal et Jacqueline pour votre chaleureux acceuil.
Graziella et Barbara + familles
name: Vaudoise Alpes spacious Chalet

comments: Eine Unterkunft mit viel Charme und Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet! Die Schlüsselübergabe hat super geklappt.

comments: Parfait, cosy, de qualité, super bien équipée, super confortable, bien localisé avec une superbe vue sur le lac et la Riviera. Barbara et son mari sont des hôtes parfaits, présent, réactifs mais très discrets, quoi demander de plus?
name: Parfait pour visiter Vevey/Montreux

comments:
Barbara is a fantastic host, very welcoming and friendly. The place is located away from the city, with an amazing view just outside. 

The apartment was very clean and there was lots of room to move around for four people. I would highly recommend this to anyone visiting the area.
name: Parfait pour visiter Vevey/Montreux

comments: Barbara's place was great. Very spacious and clean. The kitchen was well equipped. It is a short walk to the Funicular to town. Public transit pass was included with the stay. Barbara also kindly picked us up and dropped us off at the Vevey train station.  Overall great stay!
name: Parfait pour visiter Vevey/Montreux

comments: Très bonne adresse, accueil très chaleureux, appartement propre et cosy nous recommandons fortement! Situé sur les hauteurs, jolie vue sur le lac et à proximité de Genève et Lausanne en voiture. Literie très confortable ! N'hésitez plus!
name: Parfait pour visiter Vevey/Montreux

comments: The place is very nice, very clean and has everything you need to have a perfect stay.  Barbara is a awsome host, she has recommend place to have dinner around. Perfect location to visit many Switzerland cities.
name: Parfait pour visiter Vevey/Montreux

comments: Un accueil chaleureux et aux petits soins. L'appartement en très bon état et très propre, nous sommes très content d'avoir fait ce choix. Malgré la distance, l'appartement reste très pratique pour visiter Montreux et Vevey. Une très bonne expérience!
name: Parfait pour visiter Vevey/Montreux

comments: Casa excelente para 6 pessoas, com toda infra estrutura necessária e uma vista maravilhosa. A anfitriã é muito atenciosa e a casa muito limpa e organizada. Recomendo!
name: Parfait pour visiter Vevey/Montreux

comments: 房间位于半山腰,风景很美,房间里面很干净,厨房非常不错,设施很全,做饭饿的体验和家里没有区别,洗漱设施很好｡房东人很好,为我们准备了面包,牛奶等不少食物,强烈向大家推荐｡
name: Parfait pour visiter Vevey/Montreux

comments: Cynthia et son époux sont des hôtes très accueillants, gentils et très intéressants que je recommande. La chambre est spacieuse, très propre et a sa propre douche. Accès à la cuisine.
name: Room to rent in apartment

comments: Cynthia is a good host and communicated well throughout. Her home was pleasant and our room was warm despite it being quite cold outside. We would have preferred a firmer bed, though. The location is fine if you are coming from Nyon train station as there is a direct bus to the end of the road, but buses and taxis aren't cheap so you may need to walk instead to save much compared to staying in Nyon.
name: Room to rent in apartment

comments: Chambre calme et agréable. Accueil sympa. A 5 min du centre de Prangins, facile d'accès par transports publics.
name: Room to rent in apartment

comments: Vous y trouverez une famille très chaleureuse, une chambre calme et tout prêt du beau village de prangins. J’y ai vécu un beau séjour et je je ne peux que les recommander. J’y retourne d’ailleurs:-)
name: Room to rent in apartment

comments: 房东人很好,房子条件也很好
name: Single room in triplex

comments: All super
name: Studio meublé avec place de parc

comments: Très bien situé près gare et près métro.   Jolie petite vue sur lac
name: 1, 5 pièce meublée

comments:
Atef n'était pas présent mais il nous l'avait annoncé et nous avons pu accéder à l'appartement grâce à ses directives.
Il a pris contact avec nous par téléphone au début de notre séjour et après notre départ pour s'assurer que tout s'est bien passé.
Appartement fidèle à la description et aux photos, bien situé, transports en commun proches.
Environnement calme.
Nous recommandons cet hôte et le recontacterons pour un séjour à Lausanne dans le futur.
Cathy & Philippe, Saint-Louis, France.
name: Appartement calme avec parking prive ( garage)

comments: Logement bien équipé et très calme et surtout un garage pour la voiture indispensable à LAUSANNE et station de bus à moins de 200m donc Lausanne centre à 10mn environ très bon accueil rien à dire de négatif  PRIX correct pour une ville comme Lausanne
name: Appartement calme avec parking prive ( garage)

comments: Magnifique vue! Et le chalet est également bien situé ! Merci beaucoup! Je recommande ce chalet!
name: Boutique Alpine getaway & your mountain home

comments: The perfect Airbnb experience! Marjorie was super friendly and quick to respond; the apartment is really well located, a nice walk from the ski lift and so peaceful and quiet; and everything was extremely clean and comfortable. We loved waking up to that view! Thanks so much Marjorie for a lovely stay!
name: Boutique Alpine getaway & your mountain home

comments: Lieux extrêmement bien situé au calme à deux minutes des sentiers de raquettes et marche. La vue est exceptionnelle levé de soleil en face sur la tour d’Aï. Je recommande vivement ce lieu!
name: Boutique Alpine getaway & your mountain home

comments: The cutest little apartment with the most amazing view!
name: Boutique Alpine getaway & your mountain home

comments:
L'appartement de Marjorie est très chaleureux et très bien décoré. Il convient parfaitement pour passer une semaine en couple ou quelques jours avec deux enfants.

Nous avons eu beaucoup de plaisir à séjourner dans son appartement et le recommandons vivement aux prochains voyageurs qui souhaiteraient séjourner quelques jours à Leysin.
name: Boutique Alpine getaway & your mountain home

comments: Localisation et accès top! La vue est magnifique. L'appartement est bien équipé. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour passer un bon séjour.
name: Boutique Alpine getaway & your mountain home

comments: Excellente location. Cozy, très bien équipé, très propre, vue superbe. L’arrivée autonome est très pratique. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.
name: Boutique Alpine getaway & your mountain home

comments: Everything was perfect. We thought we were staying at our house. Clean house, cozy and warm, close to transport and the lake. provided everything. very recommended
name: Lovely two bedroom apartment locate

comments: Séjour parfait à Lutry! Appartement superbe, très bien équipé et décoré avec goût. Très belle vue sur le port, situation calme tout en étant au centre de ce village magnifique. Christian et sa famille sont très accueillants et attentionnés, un séjour à refaire absolument en été pour profiter de l'agréable terrasse.
name: Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva
Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva

comments: Nice cosy place - Christian is a great host ! Very caring and a good ambassador of the region products and places! Thank you very much.
name: Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva

comments:
L'appartement est superbe. J'ai beaucoup aimé les grands tableaux modernes, les couleurs et les coussins tout partout :)
Tout y est, de la cuisine équipée et largement approvisionnée, à la salle de bain avec sa collection de produits de bien-être et de soins.
Ce qui m'a le plus touché sont toutes les petites intentions de bienvenue comme un petit vin du pays, une carte postale pour écrire à ses proches ou encore une carte de transport pour profiter grandement de cette belle région.
Merci Christian et à bientôt!
name: Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva

comments: Logement très cosy, belle vue sur le lac Léman. Tout est fait pour un accueil agréable avec des attentions très sympathique de la part du propriétaire. Allez-y...
name: Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva

comments: Ein perfektes Wochenende! Perfect Weekend!
name: Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva

comments:
Christian's house in Lutry is so precious that I even don't want to make this comment to let others know so that I can keep it as a secret! 
 Clean, spacious, and well equipped room decorated with charming pictures. The terrace is facing the scenic view of Geneva river.
 Also, the location is good. Lutry is not a busy city but a peaceful town near bybigger cities and tourist spots. There are nice bakeries, resturants and markets.
 Christian is really welcoming! He made me and my mom feel comfortable as if we were in the second hometown. Wonderful memories here.
name: Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva

comments: A wonderful location, with a lovely view. A beautiful place to stay.
name: Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva

comments: Amazing location, spotless, great hospitality.
name: Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva

comments: Le logement est très agréable, très bien équipé et la vue est superbe. Christian fait tout son possible pour que tout soit parfait et...tout a été parfait. Merci encore. Nous en garderons un très bon souvenir
name: Studio + terrace overlooking the Lake of Geneva

comments: The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Belle chambre dans appartement de charme, Centre

comments: Très grande flexibilité et chien très accueillant!
name: Belle chambre dans appartement de charme, Centre

comments:
Grande chambre dans un appartement spacieux en plein centre de Lausanne,dans le quartier que j’affectionne beaucoup.
Je suis une habituée chez Nathalie et j’ai toujours autant de plaisir de revenir chez elle.Ce que j’apprécie particulièrement est l’équilibre entre partage/discussion et le temps pour soi.
name: Belle chambre dans appartement de charme, Centre

comments:
Very nice house, with a beautiful view of the lake.
The room is confortable and big. The bathroom and the toilet are shared with the other visitors, but they have all you need.
name: Belle chambre dans appartement de charme, Centre

comments: Nous avons passé 4 jours très agréables à Gryon. Prés des télécabines mais aussi dans un vieux village pittoresque. Elena et Jérôme sont très accueillants ils nous ont communiqués plein de bon tuyaux.
name: "La Grotte" in the heart of Gryon!

comments: Second time with Marine and second great experience! 100% recommended!
name: Duplex avec vue lac et montagnes

comments: L'organisation avec Marine est très simple, on s'approprie rapidement l'espace. La chambre est grande et pratique, pour quelques nuits c'est idéal !
name: Duplex avec vue lac et montagnes

comments: Bien situé, très pratique, dans une jolie résidence. Comme décrit, le studio est petit mais convient bien pour un couple qui vient passer quelques nuits à Villars.
name: Studio Bristol

comments: We had a lovely time in Christian's apartment. We spent a long weekend skiing and the studio could not have been more perfect. Great location, brilliant to be able to cook our own meals, and there is even a ski room in the building where we could store our skis. It was clean and comfortable, with lovely views and very close to the centre of the town. We would definitely recommend this to a friend. Thanks Christian!
name: Studio Bristol

comments: Très joli apartement, bien situé. Grand merci à Christian pour les instructions:) Je recommende!
name: Studio Bristol

comments: Super studio, très bien placé. Propre, jolie vue.
name: Studio Bristol

comments: Très bon séjour à Villars! Studio très bien situé, très chalereux. Nous reviendrons sans hésitation.
name: Studio Bristol

comments: Studio très confortable et très bien situé
name: Studio Bristol

comments: Petit appartement très propre et bien situé, conforme à l’annonce. Bien équipé, charmant. Cependant problème de bruit, on entend beaucoup trop la route et le train qui passe juste en dessous. Et les deux petits lits de 90cm ne sont pas idéals pour un couple mais matelas confortable.
name: Studio Bristol

comments: Anne-Catherine's place is just perfect. It has everything you need and the most stunning views over the lake to the alps. It is perfectly positioned for someone working temporarily in Gland as I was (20 minutes on prefect bike tracks through vineyards and farms). Anne-Catherine is also the perfect host. We were so happy there we never wanted to leave.
name: Appartement de vacances

comments: Great stay! Everything according to the expectations. David is a concerned host and does everything he cans to make us feel welcome in his home!
name: Top Floor Studio in Nyon

comments: Roxanne is a very good host. The apartment is very hommie in the most picturesque area of Nyon and close by the lake. I would definately recommend to anyone visiting Nyon to stay at this apartment.
name: Centrally located apartment in Nyon by Lake Geneva

comments:
Roxanne's apartment is a true gem. Great location, clean, super-well equipped, it has it all. Roxanne has been within an arm's reach the whole time, making sure we had everything we needed. 

I would definitely come back whenever I get a chance!
name: Centrally located apartment in Nyon by Lake Geneva

comments: Central and calme. Neat, equipped. Very nice
name: Centrally located apartment in Nyon by Lake Geneva

comments: C'est la troisième fois que je viens chez Roxanne. J'apprécie toujours autant sa disponibilité et réactivité. L'endroit est calme et idéalement situé (surtout l'été pour profiter du lac). L'appartement est tout est équipé et idéal pour les séjours prolongés. Je ne peux que chaudement recommander Roxanne et son appartement à Nyon. J'y reviendrais avec plaisir prochainement!
name: Centrally located apartment in Nyon by Lake Geneva

comments: This apartment is really well located, it’s clean and cozy. Roxanne is very professional and easy to communicate with. I very much recommend this place.
name: Centrally located apartment in Nyon by Lake Geneva

comments: Tres bon séjour ! Je recommande
name: 32m2indep.entry;frigo;Nestlé:10min,free bus/train*

comments: It was the second time I stayed and it was great, very nice host and great service. Very good care taking of the guests. Many thanks
name: 32m2indep.entry;frigo;Nestlé:10min,free bus/train*

comments: Super adresse avec un accueil magnifique!!!je recommande vivement.
name: 32m2indep.entry;frigo;Nestlé:10min,free bus/train*

comments:
Hôte hors de l’ordinaire, j’ai été super bien accueilli par Karina et son mari qui étaient réellement aux petits soins avec moi :)
Je recommande vivement d’autant que la situation et l’espace sont très appréciables !
name: 32m2indep.entry;frigo;Nestlé:10min,free bus/train*

comments: The view is pretty nice, the sunset are amazing from here and also is close to supermarkets, pharmacies etc. Also there is a bus stop that is really close and the train station is just like 4 min waking is amazing!
name: 32m2indep.entry;frigo;Nestlé:10min,free bus/train*

comments: I had a fantastic stay at Maite's apartment. The location is central: 15 minutes by train from Geneva and 25 minutes to Lausanne. Nyon is a really nice town and a short walk and  public transportation is 2 minutes from the apartment. The apartment is clean, safe and quite. Maite is a gracious host and always happy to answer your questions and ensure you feel at home. She is one of the kindest and most genuine souls I have encountered. The breakfast is healthy and fresh and the wifi connection is strong. In the past I stayed at Maite's apartment for over 2 months and would wholeheartedly recommend this room to anyone. You would be hard pressed to find a place with such incredible value in the area. I look forward to returning to her apartment upon my next visit to the region! Thanks Maite!
name: Single room close to downtown and very quite

comments:
Maite a été très accueillante, elle est très attentionné et donne énormément des nions conseils sur le canton et des choses de la vie en général.
Elle fait tout pour que l'on se sente comme á la maison. 
L'appartement est confortable et bien décorée, la propreté irréprochable, elle est située à 10min á pied du centre de Nyon , l'appartement de Maite a tout pour plaire pour un cour ou long séjour.
name: Single room close to downtown and very quite

comments: It is always a pleasure to stay at Maite’s place. It’s a very good place and Maite is an excellent host!
name: Single room close to downtown and very quite

comments:
I work in Nyon and often need to stay over night. 
This was a very good place. Nice room, good facilities and excellent breakfast in the morning :)
Can very highly recommend
name: Single room close to downtown and very quite

comments: Super séjour, super accueil.
name: Single room close to downtown and very quite

comments:
Je recommande fortement , acceuil chaleureux, propreté et confort , communication et réactivité 
Merci Maïté
name: Single room close to downtown and very quite

comments: Une semaine parfaite passée chez Maite qui est une personne très intéressante et avec beaucoup d'attention. Son appartement est très propre,  il y a aussi tout le nécessaire pour passer un bon séjour. Recommande grandement!
name: Single room close to downtown and very quite

comments: nice place, quite neighbourhood, beautiful views, and Adriana is a very nice lady, her dog is very cute, Jasmina always reply the massage very quick.
name: 151 Room in Pully

comments: I lived here for about 40 days until I found my long term apartment. It's a very nice and private room, we could use the kitchen and dining room all day long. When sitting in dinning room, outside the window is the beautiful lake Geneva. When there is no fog you can see the little French town Evian. 12 mins down hill walk to the Train station, 10 mins walk to the bus station. 20 mins to Lausanne. The view of this town are very pretty you will gonna love it.
name: 151* Nice room in Pully

comments: Beautiful spacious apartment in a good location.
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Appartement tout equipé, au calme... parfait!
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Charmant appartement, proche transports et facilement accessible. Convivial, très bien tenu et très propre. Accueil très chaleureux. A recommander sans hésiter lors d'un séjour à Lausanne :)
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Syoum's place is at a walking distance (~15 min) from the old town of Lausanne. There are also a number of public transport options (bus, tram, train) nearby. Nice apartment overall!
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Super !
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Appartemment agréable, bien équipé et tranquille. Le canapé-lit n'est pas confortable pour un adulte mais a très bien convenu à notre fils. Dommage qu'il n'y ait pas possibilité de stationner à proximité, mais l'hôte nous avait conseillé les parkings les plus proches (compter tout de même 10-15min à pied). Globalement très bon séjour, merci!
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Bien que le canapé ne soit pas un plan pour y dormir, cet appartement est très joliment décoré et très fonctionnel. Il est relativement facile de se garer en zone bleue pour la nuit. Je recommande.
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: L'appartement est environ 20 minutes à pied de la gare, ou moins avec un bus. L'appartement est spacieux et bien équipé (grande télé, cuisine, wifi rapide). Pas de problèmes pendant notre séjour.
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Very nice apartment, well maintained, convenient location
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Logement fonctionnel, spacieux et bien situé. Syoum est très réactive et a su se rendre disponible à la moindre interrogation.
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Agréable séjour dans cet appartement fidèle aux descriptions et photos chez une hôte disponible à toute heure.
name: Charmant appart au centre ville

comments: Appartement très agréable, la vue avec le petit balcon est fantastique ! Très propre et bien équipé (tv, système son Bluetooth & chromecast, cuisine compacte mais complète), et un grand lit confortable. Cadre très calme sauf lorsque les quelques rares trains qui passent derrière l'immeuble peuvent surprendre, mais cela ne nous a pas réveillé. Communication impeccable même si on n'a pas rencontré Julien, qui laisse à dispo des infos sur les alentours dans l'appartement et un guide Lonely Planet. Que demander de plus ? Merci !
name: Bel appartement avec vue imprenable sur le lac !

comments: Le séjour chez Julien à été parfait pour nos exigences. La maison est petite mais complète de tout ce qui nous fallait. Propre et très bien amenagée, facile à rejoindre et dans un quartier tranquille mais bien connecté au centre ville et au lac. Nous sommes arrivés tard le soir mais ça ne nous a posé aucun problème. Julien à été très cooperatif aussi pour le parking en nous laissant son disque horaire. Très conseillé !!
name: Bel appartement avec vue imprenable sur le lac !

comments:
It was a very nice stay at Fra&Enri's place. They even provided me a nice dinner :-) Thank you very
much.
name: Very Nice and Cozy Room

comments: They were very nice and helpful, good communicators and everything was as expected. Thanks a lot.
name: Very Nice and Cozy Room

comments: Un deuxième séjour très agréable à st Cergues.
name: Apartment with terrace-GVA in 35min

comments: Maria was very nice and helpful during my entire stay there. The place is very cozy, and functional. The surroundings of the city are astonishing. I highly recommend it!
name: Apartment with terrace-GVA in 35min

comments: The apartment is in a good location. Just a minute walk from public transportation and a few stops away from Montreux. The apartment itself is excellent! The kitchen was fully stocked and had every possible amenity needed so you can feel right at home. Beat and her husband were very nice even if we we're a little late to check in. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in the area.
name: WalkingDistanceToMontreuxCosyFlat70mFromTheLake

comments: Lovely clean apartment - close to the lake and about a 15/20 minute walk into Montreux.
name: WalkingDistanceToMontreuxCosyFlat70mFromTheLake

comments: Great location. Great stay.
name: 2BR Cozy, calm, central and spacious

comments: Sehr nette, unkomplizierte Gastgeber. Sehr saubere Unterkunft mit super Frühstück. Parkplatz direkt vor dem Haus.
name: BnB Le Relais du Château

comments: Maison tres propre, calme et très agréable. Hôtes charmants et discrets ! À recommander ! Nous reviendrons.
name: BnB Le Relais du Château

comments: Jolie maison au calme et proche du centre ville. Accueil très chaleureux.
name: BnB Le Relais du Château

comments: Un endroit sympa et tranquille
name: BnB Le Relais du Château

comments:
Excellent stay at a very accommodating and friendly home.
Private spaces and always on the end of the phone if any questions.
Very close to train station to take you anywhere & a 5-10min walk to all the restaurants.
100% recommend this place.
name: BnB Le Relais du Château

comments: I stayed at Giuseppina's gorgeous flat with my sister and another friend over New Years, and we could not have been happier with our experience.  The place is impeccably clean, the beds comfortable and cozy, and the views are just as breathtaking as the photos.  Great location, easily walkable to all parts of Montreux, as well as the train station.  Giuseppina's thoughtful touches of a bottle of wine and some kitchen basics were icing on the cake.  If I am ever back in Montreux, I would definitely look to stay here again!
Very good location,great view.

Nice appartment, great view! The location is amazing, everything is very close and easily accessible. The appartment rooms are all new, very clean with a TV and a decent Wi-Fi connection. We were pleasantly surprised to find lots of snacks and every day life utilities (toilet paper, clean towels and even shampoo). It was very convenient and nice to have since we came for a short time. The hostess is lovely when showing us around! Great place to stay for a family! Boris
位置挺不错的，房间超大！很适合家庭来居住。位置在蒙特勒比较中心的位置，出行也比较方便。设施很齐全。房东很热情，狗狗很可爱~
位置挺不错的,房间超大!很适合家庭来居住｡位置在蒙特勒比较中心的位置,出行也比较方便｡设施很齐全｡房东很热情,狗狗很可爱~
位置挺不错的,房间超大!很适合家庭来居住。位置在蒙特勒比较中心的位置,出行也比较方便。设施很齐全。房东很热情,狗狗很可爱~
Michael is amazing and very kind. His accommodation is clean, comfortable and lovely. I really enjoy my stays and recommend his places!
name: Cottage Annex, Saint-Cergue, CH

comments:
Christophe’s Chalet is in a perfect place in Gruyeres Park. It is on the mountain and the view is amazing! 
From his house you can go walking in the woods and enjoy the panorama.

His house is a very typical mountain house: all made of wood, a lot of carpets, a big fireplace.
If you are looking for a fancy place, this is not for you, but if you are looking for a typical experience than you are in the perfect place. 
The house is rustic and raw, some part of the house is not finished yet, and to go to the bathroom you have go down in a manhole. 
The room is very warm and the bed is comfortable.

But the best part of this house is his owner: Cristophe cooked for us a fantastic fondue, and talking with him can be funny and deep in the same time. 
I would have spent more time taking with him!
name: The Enchanted Star. Traditional room.

comments: Petite chambre confortable située dans un magnifique chalet rustique. Hôte très accueillant et conciliant. La région est superbe et convient parfaitement à un séjour au calme au grand air.
name: The Enchanted Star. South room.

comments: Endroit parfait pour se reposer
name: The Enchanted Star. Room for longer stays.

comments: J'ai passé un agréable séjour de 5 nuits chez Christophe, qui est un hôte très accueillant, sympathique, disponible et chaleureux.Le paysage et la nature environnants sont idylliques et propice à la balade et à la contemplation. L'Etoile enchantée est un lieu calme et accueillant. Je recommande un séjour chez Christophe! Merci pout tout!
name: The Enchanted Star. Room for longer stays.

comments:
Thank you, again. It was a special time for me up in your „hut“, better beautiful, simple home, and I hope it will not be the last time. Thanks for all the questions that were answered, mostly in a teasing funny way (what I needed) but I enjoyed all the shared conversations, thoughts, music and food! 
I was able to go snowboarding a few days in the nearby ski area, do my thing but still knowing good company around. Also much love to Isabelle! What a sweetheart. We, Jenny and me are deeply thankful. Also we had the most conscious and magical start into the new year, beneath the stars in an enchanted home. Namaste, until next time, rainbow time!
name: The Enchanted Star. Room for longer stays.

comments: très bon lit, dans une chambre tranquille, facilement  atteignable par les transports publics.
name: 027 Room in Lausanne city Center

comments: Dragon who lives in this flat is an awesome guy with full of energy. Our conversations with Dragon was full of fun because we did not know the F of French. Still, he helped us to the max and we had a delightful time in Laussane. I would highly recommend this property and I am sure you are going to like it. All the best.
name: 027 Room in Lausanne city Center

comments: Lovely place!
name: Appartement 2p dans le Vieux-Bourg

comments:
We enjoyed Robertos Apartment very much. The flat is cozy, great location and with an amazing view ! 
Also, Roberto has a very cool book collection;)
name: Bright loft with 3 balconies and view on the lake

comments: The guests have been extremely kind. Location is great and the room is very conforta
name: IDEAL POUR DECOUVRIR LA SUISSE

comments: A lovely couple, interesting and personable to talk to and so very welcoming. They even made me dinner! So sweet. These two remind me of the original spirit of AirBnB, when it was about meeting locals and making connections in new places. Also their place is about 3 meters from the train station and very convenient. Highly recommended!
name: IDEAL POUR DECOUVRIR LA SUISSE

comments: You will find the apartment clean and tidy , The hosts are first class and made me feel very welcome. Location is perfect next to train station
name: IDEAL POUR DECOUVRIR LA SUISSE

comments: Merci à Florence pour son accueil chaleureux et souriant. Cette appartement est bien situé au centre du village mais aussi proche des remontées mechanique pour faire du ski. Il est très bien équipé et parfais pour une famille de 4 personnes.
name: Logement au Diablerets

comments:
Super appartement au centre du village. 
Cuisine ultra-équipée, fondue, raclette, chinoise, etc...

Très agréable pour notre famille de 4 + 1 copain.
name: Logement au Diablerets

comments:
We had a great stay at Florence's place. This beautiful apartment is in an awesome location, very close to the ski lifts and ski schools. The apartment came with everything you needed.
I would recommend this flat to any of my friends visiting Diablerets!
name: Logement au Diablerets

comments: Très bel appartement, tout confort et très bien situé. Une excellente adresse.
name: Logement au Diablerets

comments: The apartment was just what we needed and in a great location for access to everything and with stunning views. Thanks for a great stay!
name: Logement au Diablerets

comments: If you are carrying with large luggages, you better take the train to the apartment or taxi instead of walking.
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments:
Sympathique accueil 
Mise a dispo de la cuisine pour mon dîner du soir 
J'y retournerai
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments:
Francine is a nice and decent host 
She pick and drop us to the station and helped us to find the tourist spots nearby 
I strongly recommend to visit at her house
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: 가족같은 분위기
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: Très bon accueil chez Francine, chambre et emplacement très calme.
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: Francine真的很好，我们到的时候Francine开车来火车站接了我们。附近的公交车站可以坐车到达市中心，从公交车站到房子需要爬一些坡。房子干净，整洁，温馨。有两只猫，都很温顺。提供早餐，当然也可以自己做些东西吃，非常棒。房间里暖气充足，不用担心晚上会冷。
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: Francine真的很好,我们到的时候Francine开车来火车站接了我们｡附近的公交车站可以坐车到达市中心,从公交车站到房子需要爬一些坡｡房子干净,整洁,温馨｡有两只猫,都很温顺｡提供早餐,当然也可以自己做些东西吃,非常棒｡房间里暖气充足,不用担心晚上会冷｡
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: Francine was kind enough to pick us up and send us off to the train station. She was very accommodating and helpful throughout our stay. Location of the house is just nice about 10 mins ride by bus to the city centre.
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: Francine is an amazing host. She went to pick us up in the Montreux Gare in her car, which is 10 minutes by car from her house. The house is very confortable and friendly, and we get coffee, tea and some food by the morning. We loved the experience.
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: Very helpful and adorable cat.
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: Lovely lady , who was very helpful and kind. Great kitchen area to prepare food. Beautiful views and location is ideal to feel the real suburbs of Montreaux, but near even to get to by public transport or foot.
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: A room was quite bigger than expected, Francine was kind and friendly, made me a breakfast, gave me a change so i can take a bus, the place has incredible views, and the room was very clean, everything as expected and even better! Thank you so much!
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: Francine真的很好,我们到的时候Francine开车来火车站接了我们。附近的公交车站可以坐车到达市中心,从公交车站到房子需要爬一些坡。房子干净,整洁,温馨。有两只猫,都很温顺。提供早餐,当然也可以自己做些东西吃,非常棒。房间里暖气充足,不用担心晚上会冷。
name: Chambre près de Montreux

comments: Sehr Gastfreundlich
name: ELIZABETH TAYLOR Suite

comments: Agréable Accueil!! Chambre cosy, bel endroit avec vue superbe sur le lac et les montagnes. Impeccable. Je recommande vivement
name: Cosy place with spectacular view

comments:
This Chalet is the perfect place for Family or Group of People who are looking for a great place to come together, go skiing or just want relax in the mountains.
The 360-Fire-Place in the big living room with three Sofas and an extraordinary view into the mountains, gives a relaxed and romantic atmosphere and it is just perfect for coming together and have a great time.
The Spa-room (with whirlpool and sauna) it's an awesome place to relax and recovering after skiing or hiking.
The kitchen is large and very well equipped and all the bedrooms are very nice, clean and comfortable.
The E-Mail communication with the owner was very friendly and uncomplicated. He is very interested to provide a great service and is responding very quickly.
We’ve been a group of 8 adults and one seven year old child. Everybody just loved the place and enjoyed the time very much.
I really can recommend this Chalet and will return as soon as possible.
name: Luxury Swiss Chalet 50m from Piste

comments: The chalet "Les Hirondelles" is a perfect location to rest and enjoy your vacation days. The view from the living room and balcony to the Alps is just amazing. And we especially enjoyed the fireplace in midst of the living room - it creates a pleasant atmosphere! In the bathroom and kitchen you find everything needed for a pleasant stay. And if you want to ski, the chalet's location just beside the slope is ideal - the slope is just a few steps away. The communication with the owner and chalet manager was very quick, uncomplicated and very friendly. Thank you very much for everything!
name: Luxury Swiss Chalet 50m from Piste

comments: Wonderful chalet, especially for large groups. We were 5 couples over New Years, and even though it was a weak season for snow, we enjoyed cooking meals together, and enjoying the gorgeous views.
name: Luxury Swiss Chalet 50m from Piste

comments: perfect place
name: JAMES DEAN Superior room

comments:
Nous avons passé 5 jours fabuleux dans cette sublime demeure ! A notre arrivée les propriétaires n’étaient pas là mais Natalie une amie de la famille nous a merveilleusement accueillis et nous a mis de suite dans le bain tant elle est chaleureuse et lumineuse. Gregory le fiston de la maison a aussi fait son maximum pour nous rendre le séjour agréable et a été des plus sympathiques. La maison est incroyable par son volume et sa déco mais ce qui retient mon attention ce sont les vibrations chaleureuses et positives qu’on ressent en y entrant. Un havre de paix et de sérénité. La salle de méditation est géniale, j’y ai passé un moment divin ! La maison est très bien équipée, la cuisine avec tout ce qu’il faut pour se sentir chez soi. Nous étions dans la chambre James Dean donc n’avions pas de salle de bain à partager c’était agréable. Il y avait d’autres personnes dans la maison mais celle ci est tellement grande et sur plusieurs étages qu’on ne ressent pas et ne subit pas la vie des autres habitants. Petites surprises à 4 pattes, Pai et Belle, deux petites chattes adorables et sociables, comme elles sont belles ! Elles nous ont aussi très bien accueilli ! Niveau commodité la ville de Lausanne est juste à côté, on est ici au calme avec une vue incroyable sur le coucher de soleil le soir.
Bref, c’était un séjour très lumineux et chaleureux pour finir et commencer l’année. J’espère de tout cœur revenir vous saluer. Ludivine
name: JAMES DEAN Superior room

comments: Il s'agit d'un très belle appartement dans un endroit calme et relaxant. Difficile d'accès en transport public mais à quelques minutes de Lausanne en voiture. Le rapport qualité prix est très intéressant. Les hôtes sont très sympa et prêt à rendre service. Bref, que du positif.
name: EMOTION duplex apartment

comments:
Die Einrichtung ist grandios. Die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir durften sogar eine Yoga Lektion mit Coco geniessen. 
Für eine Gruppe, eine tolle Erfahrung.
name: EMOTION duplex apartment

comments: Très joli duplex, belle terrasse, belle déco...on se sent de suite bien chez Benny. Seul petit bémol la salle de Bain partagée mais on s'y fait vite. Nous avons tous apprécié notre séjour!!à refaire!
name: EMOTION duplex apartment

comments: Excellent accueil et bon séjour !
name: Big villa in Sainte-croix

comments: Appartement spacieux, fonctionnel et bien situé, avec terrasses et jardin. Sans luxe.
name: Big villa in Sainte-croix

comments: Joli appartement, très bien placé, dans une rue calme, mais aussi proche de toutes commodités. Un séjour bien plus que sympathique!
name: Bel appartement lumineux au coeur de Lausanne

comments: Evelyne's chalet is a dream, very close to Les Diablerets village and the Ski slopes, but with a nice feeling of remoteness..The view is amazing and the chalet itself it's cozy and spacious. Shame the firework was out of order as it would have added charme to the whole experience, but we enjoyed everything very much.
name: Chalet La Croisée

comments: The apartment at the top of Daniela and Francisco's house is a lovely place to stay if you've got an event at the Bogis-Bossey castle or if you just want to find a little out of the way escape. This is the third time we've stayed there in as many months and it feels like a little homecoming every time. Aside from being very friendly hosts, they're flexible and quick to respond when making arrangements, they understand the value of a good restaurant recommendation, and as return guests, I can definitely say they know a thing or two about thoughtful gestures!
name: Top floor loft apartment with a view

comments: This is a great apartment. It's well equipped and super clean. The hosts are very kind and welcoming. They have also provided me with some food and drinks in the fridge. They provided me with fresh towels and sheets every couple of days. the location is great and free parking is provided. Divonne is only 5 mins by car and Geneva is 15 mins. I highly recommend this apartment!
name: Top floor loft apartment with a view

comments: Tout est impeccable , très bon accueil et la chambre est agréable et bien équipée
name: Belle chambre proche centre, sdb privée, parking

comments: This was my third stay with Claire. It feels like a home away from home. The facilities and position are ideal for me and Claire and Farouz are wonderful hosts- warm and helpful but not intrusive. I’ll definitely be back.
name: Belle chambre proche centre, sdb privée, parking

comments: The hostel is located right on the central square, close to everything. The bed is super comfortable and the linen is really good. The showers and bathrooms are clean but a bit old and few taps need maintenance. Note that the bathrooms and showers are shared by males and females which can be uncomfortable. The majority of guests are men living on a regular basis there, so if you are female you might feel awkward though all of them are quite friendly. There are not many sockets in the bedrooms (not by every bed). Overall, the cheapest and quite good option to stay on the Swiss Riviera.
name: Vevey House

comments: Very kind & helpful hosts, very quick communication and indications for smooth check in. Central location for Vevey.
name: Vevey House

comments:
Stéphanie et Philippe sont très accueillants et disponibles. L'appartement est beau et très agréable et avec une très belle vue.
Excellent séjour pour ma part.
name: Magnifique appartement avec vue sur le lac Léman

comments: Logement très agréable, spacieux et lumineux, bénéficiant d'un point de vue direct sans vis a vis sur les montagnes avoisinantes.  Pascale est disponible et réactive, tout en se faisant discrète. Une mention particulière aux petites attentions misent à disposition à votre arrivée et l'accès libre au sauna.
name: Paccalisweet - Hosts'apatment will pool and sauna

comments:
Amazing stay. We were only there for one night, but it was a wonderful departure from a hotel. My husband and I had our 15 mo son with us and Pascale had many amenities available for our baby’s needs. The linens were very nice, tub was nice and deep. Kitchen was well stocked and the oven worked well. Complementary sparking wine was a nice surprise.

Pascale greeted us when we arrived, showed us around and said goodbye before we departed. Lovely experience.

I wish we could have enjoyed the view, sadly it was rainy and overcast.
name: Paccalisweet - Hosts'apatment will pool and sauna

comments: Our stay in giambattista's apartment was perfect. The view was just breathtaking and we fell in love with the swing chair on the balcony.
name: Image du profil Lovely Flat with Lake view

comments: Giambattista's studio was perfect for my work-stay in Chernex for an extended 3 weeks.  Although the weather was... well, winter Chernex wet, cold weather, the apartment was cozy warn always. Having a parking space was very important as was the convenience of MOB ... close enough to enjoy a scenic ride to Gstaad for lunch and stroll and back before dark! Staying so long necessitates a well-equipped kitchen and I used it often.  I know the merchants in Chernex so it felt like I was living in well-known community.  Thanks Giambattista and I anticipate booking Chernex again!
name: Image du profil Lovely Flat with Lake view

comments:
Lieu calme et reposant avec une belle vue sur le Léman. Bel aménagement de l'appartement avec tout le confort nécessaire pour ce sentir comme à la maison.
Decoration epurée et de goût.
name: 2 pièces vue lac sur Lutry/Lausanne. Terrasse

comments: We were here for passing silvester and had some great days here. The communication with Francois worked perfect! And the apartment is very modern and cozy.
name: Ravissant appartement vue lac Lutry/Lausanne

comments: 特别好的景色,位置也很好很安静｡推荐
name: Ravissant appartement vue lac Lutry/Lausanne

comments: Amazing view and the host was so easy to deal with.  Wonderful apartment.

comments: A big apartment with very good view. You could find almost everything you need.
name: Ravissant appartement vue lac Lutry/Lausanne

comments:
Très bien, Laurence est disponible et accueillante. 
Très bonne expérience
name: 19- Chambre indépendante au vert pleine de charme

comments: We loved the spaciousness and contemporary style of this centrally located appartment.  The kitchen is very well equipped and dining room sat 10 people comfortably. Even though it is in the middle of the city it is very quiet. We were warmly welcome by the caretaker. Just wished we had gotten her contact information ahead of time.
