comments: We had a lovely stay in Diane`s apartment. Diane was very friendly and helpful when we arrived and arranged everything perfectly for our stay. The location of the apartment is in some walking distance from the city centre. We would definitely stay here again if we come back to Lausanne one day.
name: Lovely & Peaceful Studio

comments: Unser Aufenthalt in Jongny (La Perrette) war sehr schön. Von der Ankunft über die Unterkunft bis zur Lage war unser Aufenthalt bezaubernd. Unsere Gastgeber waren außerordentlich freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen.
name: "La Perrette" near Montreux-Lausanne

comments:
Merci beaucoup à Marinette et à Jean-Claude pour leur accueil. Le logement est exactement comme sur les photos, d’une propreté parfaite, joliment décoré et très bien équipé, rien ne manque : grille-pain, four multifonctions, jolie vaisselle le poêlon à fondue et même le sèche cheveux dans la salle de bain.
L’accueil chaleureux des hôtes avec une petite corbeille de fruits, de chocolat, une bouteille de vin et de bons conseils pour visiter la région.
C’était parfait !
Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir.
name: "La Perrette" near Montreux-Lausanne

comments: très belle adresse, pleine de charme, avec vue unique sur le lac...
name: "La Perrette" near Montreux-Lausanne

comments: Wonderful place for my directors to stay, stunning views everything perfect
name: "La Perrette" near Montreux-Lausanne

comments: This has been one of the best Airbnb we have ever booked. So special and beautiful! We were so lucky to see it in the snow, and fully green the next day. The view is one of a kind, the space is so thoughtfully decorated. Jean-Claude and Marinette were amazing hosts.
name: "La Perrette" near Montreux-Lausanne

comments:
Séjour parfait pour ma petite famille: des hôtes présents, à l'écoute, polis et chaleureux, avec une véritable envie de nous faire découvrir leur beau pays. 
Un chalet formidable, très propre, totalement équipé, avec une vue à tomber par terre. 
Je recommande les yeux fermés !
name: "La Perrette" near Montreux-Lausanne

comments:
It has been my wisest decision to book this big and stylist apartment overlooking Lac Leman. In fact these  3 weeks' ski trip in Switzerland is our very first non self driving trip in Europe ( we have done heaps of self drive in both Western and Eastern  Europe before but since most of our traveling this time involves up and down the most snow capped Mountains, so we have decided to take the public transportation instead for the sake of safety) . Switzerland's public transportation from train to local buses is excellent and its punctuality is up to minute and second. So don't be put off when you see from (Hidden by Airbnb) map that this Airbnb seems to be located in a suburb a bit off from all the familiar names  BUT  in fact it is not but just 20 mins or so bus ride to the Vevey train station or simply changes bus line easily to various  places of interest. 

You would have unblocked view to the Lac Leman and the surround is tranquil and quiet. Inside the apartment you could feel the host has put thoughtful and artistic  touches to the interior design. While for the outside, you could hang around and enjoy a sunbath in the summer time. 

All in all it is a hidden gem if one put scenery, tranquility, serenity as the keys of your stay and you won't regret you have chosen this top graded apartment.
name: "La Perrette" near Montreux-Lausanne

comments: Nice studio near to Lausanne and Lavaux which the hospitality is great with all equipments you need to enjoy your stay, while having space for cooking.
name: Studio La Rigole / Green & Calm near Lausanne

comments: Beatufully equipped studio and warm wellcome from Marcio and Mariana. Spotty clean, even providing you the bathrobe. Cannot think of a better place!

comments: Un emplacement au calme dans un charmant studio confortable et impeccable. Une bouteille de vin pour la bienvenue et une proximité avec les propriétaires si un problème arrive ! Nous reviendrons si nous repassons par là.
name: Studio La Rigole / Green & Calm near Lausanne

comments:
Jai passé 5 jours chez Marcio,
Le logement est parfaitement propre. Le lit est confortable et c’est un endroit très calme.
La localisation est bonne il y a un arrêt de bus à côté. Sinon à pied il y a le métro Croisette à 10 min.
Je reviendrais. 
Merci
name: Studio La Rigole / Green & Calm near Lausanne

comments: Super accueil et logement impeccable idéalement situé. Nous recommandons vivement.
name: Studio La Rigole / Green & Calm near Lausanne

comments: We spent six days at Laurent’s place over New Year’s Eve. Laurent is a very kind and welcoming host, who suggested various nice activities around Villar-sur-Ollon. The flat was cozy, clean and spacious. It really looks like it is shown on the pictures. The flat is perfectly situated for skiing or hiking and the view from the balcony is extraordinary. The neighbours are very friendly, too. The centre of the village is a 10 minutes drive away and provides shops, cafés and restaurants. We highly recommend the flat to everybody who wants to spend a pleasant time in the Vaud Alps.

comments: Logement idéal pour famille avec 2-3 enfants, très bien situé et fidèle aux photos. Entrée dans les lieux faciles et contact aisé avec le propriétaire. A recommander!

Taha, his wife and the 3 kids are lovely. I lived with them for 2 weeks and it was great. Thanks!!

comments: Really friendly family :) Everything went well.
name: Appartement lumineux avec un grand balcon

comments:
Nous rentrons d’un séjour d’une semaine dans l’appartement LA TANIÈRE. 
Tout est absolument remarquable. Chalet décoré avec beaucoup de goût, équipement en cuisine est parfait, excellente literie, 3 chambres avec chacune une salle de bains privative. Endroit calme et reposant. Proche du centre de Villars-sur-Ollon. 2 places de parking à disposition devant le chalet. 
De plus, Line est à l’écoute, présente, disponible. Une vraie perle. 
Nous recommandons sans aucune hésitation ce chalet! D’ailleurs nous y retournons...
name: Appartement " La Tanière "

comments:
Situation idéal, chalet magnifique, Line est une hôte exceptionnelle.
Nous avons passé de super vacances en famille. Merci beaucoup encore une fois! 
A la prochaine! 
Olga, Ilya, Stepan et Grigoriy
name: Appartement " La Tanière "

comments: Mirko is a very smart guy, good communication and flexible. The apartment is very comfortable for business trips, near to the public transpors and in the city center.
name: In the city center, quiet and bright apartment

comments: Appartement très joli à seulement 2 min à pied de la cathédrale. Bien meublé et confortable avec tout le nécessaire. Merci Magic.
name: In the city center, quiet and bright apartment

comments: Clean apartment. Great location
name: In the city center, quiet and bright apartment

comments: Good place at the heat of Lausanne
name: In the city center, quiet and bright apartment

comments:
Excellent séjour dans ce studio parfaitement aménagé!
Le lieu est propice à la détente, la vue est magnifique, et l'on dispose de tout le confort nécessaire.
À une dixaine de minutes de Montreux en transports, le trajet se fait très facilement, Uber étant également disponible dans la région.
Merci encore Laurent pour ce magnifique séjour!
name: Beautiful studio in an old renovated barn.
Beautiful studio in an old renovated barn.

comments: Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable dans le studio de Laurent. Entièrement refait à neuf dans une bâtisse restaurée avec soin, le studio est moderne et confortable, parfait pour un couple. Il est situé dans un village charmant avec des voisins chaleureux. Nous avons également apprécié sa localisation, proche (en voiture) du lac Léman et des principaux sites touristiques. Nous recommandons ce logement, et y retournerons avec plaisir.
name: Beautiful studio in an old renovated barn.

comments: Situé dans un village à 10 min du lac, cet appartement aménagé avec le plus grand soin ne concède rien à la facilité; décoration, aménagement, équipements, tout est de grande qualité. Laurent est l'hôte idéal, réactif, attentionné et discret. Une adresse à partager pour une belle expérience au coeur de la Riviera Suisse.
name: Beautiful studio in an old renovated barn.

comments: As a single visitor the studio apartment was clean and comfortable with all the facilities for my stay. A quiet location with parking made available, Laurent was always available for any questions and to offer help.
name: Beautiful studio in an old renovated barn.

comments: Very nice studio in a beautiful village. Great views of the lake with a short walk. Approximately 10 mins walk from the train station. Very  good host.
name: Beautiful studio in an old renovated barn.

comments: The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

comments:
Yolene est adorable et le petit déjeuner délicieux. 
Nous avons passé un agréable moment en sa compagnie
name: Chardonne, amazing view of lake and mountains

comments: Yolene was a very welcoming host. She has a beautiful apartment with a spectacular view on lake Geneva. I would highly recommend it!
name: Chardonne, amazing view of lake and mountains

comments: Yolene again was a good host and made my stay easy. The location is quite and close to the transport to Vevey. The view is beautiful and the room is nice.
name: Chardonne, amazing view of lake and mountains

comments:
Nous avons été très bien accueillis chez Yolene, qui est une personne pleine de vie et très intéressante.
La chambre est agréable et propre. Le cadre est magnifique. (Paysage incroyable avec un supplément neige). Nous retournons avec plaisir voir Yolene lorsque nous retournons là-bas.
name: Chardonne, amazing view of lake and mountains

comments: Nous avons passé un séjour certes court mais très agréable à Chardonne chez une hôtesse très généreuse et très intéressante ! La vue est effectivement magnifique !
name: Chardonne, amazing view of lake and mountains

comments: Great stayed; clean, warm and comfortable!! Plus the family was lovely :)
name: Chardonne, amazing view of lake and mountains

comments: Had an amazing stay, wish we were staying longer though! Highly recommend Ruth's place!
name: Montreux:Stunning 2 Bedroom Apartment, Lake Geneva

comments: Immaculate, beautiful, modern, comfortable apartment, with stunning views of Lake Geneva in the heart of Montreux. Great location for seeing all the sites along the lake (Chateau Chillon, etc.), plus Gruyères, and other attractions. Ruth gave us great tips on restaurants, shops and other amenities. Highly recommend this lovely place.
name: Montreux:Stunning 2 Bedroom Apartment, Lake Geneva

comments: What an amazingly beautiful apartment with a unique view of the mountains between a historic church and Montreux Palace hotel. Very comfortable and spacious with room for six excellent facilities, excellent beds a fabulous lounge and incredibly good location two minutes from the lake and five minutes easy walk from the train station. Ruth is an excellent communicator and shared detailed information on local sights, restaurants, and other handy advice. We all loved our stay and would certainly return to this apartment. Highly recommended!!
name: Montreux:Stunning 2 Bedroom Apartment, Lake Geneva

comments: Ruth’s place is very big, super clean and in a good location: 2 toilets was also a bonus and beds were comfy. Would stay there again. About a 10 minute walk to most things and Montreux is stunning. Just be careful when using the card for the washing machines or it will take your allowance.
name: Montreux:Stunning 2 Bedroom Apartment, Lake Geneva

comments: Stunning bright airy space. Beautifully clean and tidy, quiet and warm. Amazing views across the lake.
name: Montreux:Stunning 2 Bedroom Apartment, Lake Geneva

comments: Ruth’s place is a sparkling clean apartment with all the amenities you need for a stay. Perfectly located close to the center of Montreux behind the Fairmont Montreux Palace! There is a train line directly behind the apartment but you rarely hear the trains.
name: Montreux:Stunning 2 Bedroom Apartment, Lake Geneva

comments: Apartamento limpo e bem ubicado, recomendo !
name: Apartment 200m from the train station

comments: We enjoyed staying at Ali's place. The location is great, just 5 minutes from the train station, and the apartment is very spacious. It was perfect for our family of 4. We hope to stay there again for our next trip in Lausanne
name: Apartment 200m from the train station

comments: Great apartment and communication from host. Easy checkin and very central location. Thank you!
name: Apartment 200m from the train station

comments: Old house but good location near the train station. Everything went smoothly.
name: Apartment 200m from the train station

comments:
Appartement bien situé. Tout s'est parfaitement passé.

Ali a été réactif.

Note: un peu serré pour 5 adultes
name: Apartment 200m from the train station

comments: L’appartement correct et conforme à l’annonce.
name: Apartment 200m from the train station

comments: Ali's place was perfect for our needs- it really is a stone's throw from the train station, which is easy to walk to/from even if you have a rolling suitcase. It's also close to the shops/restaurants of the city center to which you can walk. Check-in was easy thanks to the keypad and the directions were super clear thanks for Ali's prompt communication. Would easily recommend for anyone looking to travel for business or leisure.
name: Apartment 200m from the train station

comments:
During my stay I didn't had much contact with Nasr but He made sure everything was in order.
The room is exactly as it shown on the pictures and is located near downtown and the train station.
I totally recommend this place.
name: Private specious room, City center

comments: Great place, quiet, clean and central!
name: Private specious room, City center

comments: A few (safe) steps away from the train station, conveniently located midway from the Old Town and the Harbour. Microwave available to compensate for the lack of access to the kitchen (the AirBnB room is separate from the main part of the apartment in which the host's family resides, sharing its bathroom only). I would've said the accommodation exemplifies how AirBnB precludes the need for hotels as the space was spotless and the towels soft...until I flipped open the covers to find sheets not so clean. Given the great contrast between the quality of the rest of the lodging, I think it was but an aberration and the host promptly and satisfactorily resolved the issue despite being really late in the night. As such, I would still highly recommend this listing and would've stayed longer if I could.
name: Private specious room, City center

comments: Very nice!
name: Private specious room, City center

comments: Very close to the city center.
name: Private specious room, City center

comments:
We got there late, but he was very available, which was a big relief for us, stressing with timetables and scheduling.
Many little gadgets and confortable accomodations, the bathroom is pretty nice. 
Close to main station, which is absolutely fantastic!
The price was very affordable and if it stays more or less the same, I'd undoubtedly book here again.
Thanks Nasr, hoped to talk to you more but our trip was short and busy 😣
name: Private specious room, City center

comments: Ein nettes und zentral gelegenes Zimmer, welches sich sehr gut für einen kurzen Aufenthalt in Lausanne eignet.
name: Private specious room, City center

comments: The apartment is located in a quiet area close to Lausanne-Flon, where there are lots of restaurants or cafés to have breakfast or dinner. The host is polite and nice. The room is well furnished and clean. There is a microwave in the room.
name: Private specious room, City center

comments:

The price was very affordable and if it stays more or less the same, I'd undoubtedly book here again.

comments: I was staying for 10nights it was very nice, very recommended!

comments: Really nice apartment&really comfort staying here!

comments: Marina et son mari Allan sont adorables. Ils nous ont très bien accueilli. Ils ont été très serviables et nous ont proposé plein d activités dans la région. Le petit déjeuner était délicieux avec des produits de très bonne qualité. Merci encore. Leur chien est très sympathique !
name: Château-d'Oex, Quiet & cosy room #1 in Chalet

comments: Philippe est un excellent hôte accommodant, j'ai passé un excellent séjour chez lui. On a parlé cinéma c'était très intéressant, je recommande vivement Philippe
name: Single room in a nice bright apartment.

comments: Excellent en tout: acceuil, contact et compagnie. Très propre et bien organisé. Et beaucoup de petites attentions! Calme, central. Peut-on souhaiter mieux?
name: Single room in a nice bright apartment.

comments:
Philippe est un super hôte. Il a été très disponible pour moi. Il est venu me chercher à l'arrêt de bus quand je suis arrivé. Il a pris du temps pour m'expliquer tous les détails pour la maison et pour circuler en ville. 
Son appartement est très propre et très bien situé. Pas très loin du centre et de la gare qui sont accessibles en transport ou même à pied. Le quartier est très sympa et calme.
name: Single room in a nice bright apartment.

comments: Accueil parfait, Très bon Emplacement, et une magnifique vu à ne pas rater surtout au petit dej!!!
name: Single room in a nice bright apartment.

comments: Philippe is a great host!  Super polite, respectful and helpful in all matters. The appartment is located right in city center 5-10 walking  min from the metro station Riponne. I had a amazing stay and would recommend this  room to everybody!
name: Single room in a nice bright apartment.

comments: Merci pour cette hébergement au top pendant ces 3 jours :)
name: Single room in a nice bright apartment.

comments: Philippe est un hôte attentif, gentil et accueillant. Son appartement est très bien situé... Une adresse à retenir à Lausanne.
name: Single room in a nice bright apartment.
Single room in a nice bright apartment.

comments:
In a quite place, close to La Barboleusaz, this appartment on the first floor of a modern Chalet offers an Outstanding view on the dent du midi.
Rooms have big windows extending the impression of free space
name: Chalet contemporain,  avec sauna privatif

comments: This is a beautiful flat with amazing mountain views and  Lidia is a truly fabulous host.
name: Chalet contemporain,  avec sauna privatif

comments: Nous avons passé un excellent séjour. Le chalet est très bien agencé avec des chambres et une salle de bain assez spacieuse. La cuisine moderne convient parfaitement. Chalet idéal pour des familles ou pour passer un moment convivial entre amis avec des enfants. Propriétaire très sympathique, serviable et accueillant
name: Charmant Chalet 8 places : Le petit Cazard à Gryon

comments: Lionel’s home is magical. Our family of five (2 adults, 1 teen and 2 kids) enjoyed a superb and comfortable month in his home. It had everything we needed for a relaxing break. The unobstructed view is spectacular and the chalet is located in a quiet area on the edge of a small village. We wholeheartedly recommend.
name: Charmant Chalet 8 places : Le petit Cazard à Gryon

comments:
Logement tout confort, avec tout ce dont on a besoin, comme à la maison! Avec en prime un accueil très chaleureux de la part des propriétaires!
Le coin est magnifique! Tout y est pour passer des vacances dépaysantes!
A refaire sans hésiter!!!
name: Chalet spacieux et chaleureux

comments: Awesome chalet!  Short drive to skiing and very family friendly!  Has everything you need and more!
name: Chalet spacieux et chaleureux

comments:
Que du tout bon. Lina est une super hôte. Appartement très sympa et propre.
Merci pour tout
name: Small Apartment on the heights of Lausanne

comments: très recommendable, propre, calme..
name: Small Apartment on the heights of Lausanne

comments: Pour une retraite spirituelle, pour des retrouvailles en famille ou pour un moment en amoureux, cette maison est l'endroit qu'il vous faut. Nous avons été charmé par la magie et l'authenticité du lieu. Parfaitement équipé, nous avons trouvé un agréable confort tout en étant dans une forme de rusticité. Ce lieu appelle à la paix intérieure, à la méditation, aux repas en communauté, aux ballades dans la nature et au silence absolu. Magnifique. Nous étions toute une Famille de 1 an à 66 ans et tout le monde y a trouvé son bonheur. Nous souhaitons y retourner dès que possible.
name: Spectacular views  Traditional Chalet, Rougemont

comments: A great location and apartment. Close to the gate and village.
name: 4-Zimmer-Ferienwohnung Balmoral in Villars

comments:
Nice appartement on a great location, very close to telecabine (2 min walk), And very close to the village center. The accomodation itself was fine and big enough but could be a bit cleaner (there was some dog hair on the sofa's). Watch out with the stairs outside, they can be very slippery on cold icy days.

Overall a good accomodation for 3 nights. I would book it again.
name: Route des Layeux

comments: Very clean, great location and Maxime responds very quickly. Can definitely recommend the place!
name: Studio meublé Valentin

comments: The apartment is nice, tidy and quite. The  bed is really comfortable and there is public transport really close.
name: Studio meublé Valentin

comments: Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour dans l’appartement de Nathalie. L’accueil a été très chaleureux. L’appartement est top : propre, idéalement situé, chaleureux, décoré avec goût et très bien équipé. On y trouve tout ce dont on a besoin. Nous le recommandons les yeux fermés et avons déjà d’ailleurs réservé pour un prochain séjour.
name: Appartement très calme au centre de Villars

comments: Nathalies’ apartment is very centrally located and very well appointed. We enjoyed our stay immensely. Being able to use the clothes washing machine was a very welcome benefit for overseas travellers. Nathalie and her family were very helpful and a pleasure to stay with.
name: Appartement très calme au centre de Villars

comments: Friendly, clean, fast communication, perfect!
name: Cosy Apartment 2 BDR, Garden, Lake View

comments: 房东很贴心,给了我们很多的建议,房子比想象中还好,设施齐全,非常干净
name: Cosy Apartment 2 BDR, Garden, Lake View

comments: Very nice host. He was always available to answer or questions during the whole stay. We spend a lovely Christmas holidays at his apartment.
name: Roc d' Orsay C6/Ski Home Direct

comments:
Très bel appartement spacieux avec vue magnifique au dernier étage d'un petit immeuble!!! 2 belles terrasses.
Il suffit de gravir un petit bout de colline pour se retrouver sur les pistes.
Nous avons passé un séjour très calme. 
L'hôte, attentif,  est disponible avant et pendant le séjour!
Merci à lui
name: Appartement duplex au pied des pistes !

comments: Eloi’s place was very beautiful! He was a wonderful host, responded quickly to our questions. The apartment was clean and has a great view!
name: Appartement duplex au pied des pistes !

comments: Ingrid was very friendly and her bnb was great. The entire building is very clean, warm, and tidy. The surrounding mountainous area is beautiful and it is a short distance away from St Maurice station. I highly recommend this villa.
name: Cosy Single Room in Traditional Swiss Villa

comments: We really enjoyed our stay.  It is a lovely clean, spacious apartment.  Well situated for skiers or people wanting to hike in the mountains.  The view is amazing.
name: Apartment with balcony and lake view -GVA in 35min

comments: Un bel appartement bien équipé, confortable, au calme, en bord de lac. De belles balades en perspective ! Et tout près de Vevey, Montreux, Lausanne… Une grande amabilité du voisinage. Un havre de paix tout proche du foisonnant Musée Chaplin, et du mythique festival de musique de Montreux. Un régal.
name: Spacious Glion apartment

comments:
Very nice, very clean and in an excellent location… A+
The apartment is fully equipped, warm and quiet.
name: Grand appartement proche des remontées mécaniques

comments: The Apartment of Alain is beautiful. It is what one expect when booking it for a stay in the mountains. It gives this cozy Chalet-feeling even though you're staying in an apartment. The location is really center and a short walking distance from the main station. I can really only recommend this place if you want to stay in Villars.
name: Grand appartement proche des remontées mécaniques

comments: Really good mansion, superbe landscape, incredible living room to chill and good food
name: Le Grain de Ble

comments:
Accueil sympathique et attentionné.
Bon rapport qualité-prix

Very clean, organized and perfectly equipped. Chiara solve all our concerns in order to offer us the best experience. Fully recommended!Thank you very much Chiara! :)
name: Modern house, perfect for families

comments: I would reccomend this house. Tidy, clean and luxury was all around
name: Modern house, perfect for families

comments: Gostamos do apartamento, boa localização. Wi-Fi bom, boas condições para quem  quer cozinhar.

comments: The apartment is very cute and very central!  Noemie is quick to respond to any needs.  I would definitely stay again.

comments: It’s a wonderful apartment. I would definitely stay in again.
name: Lovely 2 room apartment in the city centre

comments: Très joli petit appartement. Très bien situé. Il était marqué que c'est deux lits simple (twin bed), mais malheureusement ils se séparaient au moindre contacte, car ils glissent sur le sol. Sinon top le séjour!
name: Lovely 2 room apartment in the city centre

comments: Très bel appartement, spacieux, propre, bien agencé et décoré avec soin. Son emplacement central mais légèrement décalé permet de profiter du centre ville sans en avoir les inconvénients. Des équipements tout à fait convenable, et une honte toujours attentive. A recommander
name: Lovely 2 room apartment in the city centre

comments: Very practical and central apartment, close to city center and city buses.
name: Lovely 2 room apartment in the city centre

comments: The apartment was very spacious and comfortable, super clean and tidy and was exactly as described The area is very quiet, close to the metro and trolleybus stop, I liked this place. I would gladly come back to this apartment when visiting Lausanne again. I'm recommended this place to stay in Lausanne. Thank you Vera!
name: Appartement deux pièces au cœur de Lausanne

comments:
Barbara und Vera waren beide sehr sympathische und liebenswürdige Gastgeberinnen! Ich habe mich von Anfang an sehr willkommen und wohl gefühlt und hab mich in den 2 Wochen sehr heimelig gefühlt. Die Küche ist super ausgestattet, das Bett unglaublich bequem und die Wohnung liegt wirklich sehr zentral.
Ich würde ganz sicher wieder bei Barbara anfragen, wenn ich nochmals nach Lausanne reisen würde! :)
MERCI BEAUCOUP!
name: Appartement deux pièces au cœur de Lausanne

comments:
J'ai passé un excellent moment à Lausanne chez Barbara. L'appartement est idéalement placé (à pied environ10 minutes du cœur de la villes au Flon), il offre un excellent confort et est très bien équipé.
Les échanges téléphoniques avec Barbara ont  été excellents. 
Je recommande cet hébergement.
name: Appartement deux pièces au cœur de Lausanne

comments: Very pleasant stay in a clean and confortable flat in a well renovated building with a beautiful swimming pool, sauna, hammam and jacuzzi. Everything was clean and working ! Thank you for the kind welcome at la Soldannelle ☺
name: Luxury Alpine Apartment in 5 star building

comments: Thank you for all. Kathryn was great and the place is really cool. In an old hotel, so you have some big commons spaces and the best is the spa/swimming pool/ sauna/Hallam area. Everything is really well maintained and of great standing. The train station is about 5/8 minutes walk
name: Luxury Alpine Apartment in 5 star building

comments:
Empfähleswärt! 
Chlei äng für meh aus 7 Persone
name: Cozy Chalet Rougemont-Gstaad

comments: My friends and I had a very nice stay in this chalet. Two of the bedrooms have bunk beds while the third is a master bedroom with en suite. A free bus conveniently runs from the street outside every 15 minutes down to the ski lifts. Would definitely recommend!
name: Cozy Chalet Rougemont-Gstaad

comments: This comfortable and well-equipped apartment is close to the ski lift system at La Vidamanette.  We  can also recommend Rougemont ski school for lessons.  We had a great family holiday in this charming village.  Access and communication were good.
name: Cozy Chalet Rougemont-Gstaad

comments:
Nice appartment. Well situed with a magnificient view. It was a great stay. Christos was tuned in and reactive. 

I recommand it.
name: Apartment @Lausanne, lake view, great location!

comments:

comments: Lovely flat, Christos made himself available if we needed anything. Would recommend to future guests.

Nice trendy and neat appartment.
Marvellous and inspiring view.
Best location within walking distance to the main station and downtown.

comments: Logement conforme à la description. Arrêt du ski bus en face de l'hôtel. Seul bémol sur l'isolation phonique mais les clients étaient calmes.

comments: We had excellent stay in this nice hotel!
name: Le Chamois aux Diablerets

comments: Comfortable and clean, we enjoyed our stay. Slightly limited breakfast would be the only possible negative aspect but this wasn't really a bit deal it's just that my partner is gluten and diary free so there wasn't much available for her to eat in the morning
name: Le Chamois aux Diablerets

comments: Très beau logement dans un hotel, propre, reactivité du locataire ,localisation parfaite pour l aprés ski, nous etions déjà venus l'année passée et nous reviendrons
name: Le Chamois aux Diablerets

comments: Great place to stay in Les Diablerets
name: Le Chamois aux Diablerets

comments: This is a room in a hotel, not a private residence. There are therefore hotel amenities -- a bar and restaurant, and ski equipment room. So it's very good for a ski vacation in Diablerets, if you are looking for a hotel room.
name: Le Chamois aux Diablerets 301

comments: Hotel room not an apartment,  no self catering.  Although coffee machine in room. Very clean, comfy beds, towels changed daily. Restaurant available in evening but limited meals and serving times. Breakfast ok.
name: Le Chamois aux Diablerets 301

comments:
Liz and Mark are lovely people and very helpful. The chalet is cozy and amazing .. it has a huge window in the living room that receives alot of sun. Well equipped and well situated. 
I highly recommend it.
name: Swiss chalet style apartment sleeps 6, near Gryon

comments: Joli coin tranquille, très propre et confortable.
name: Swiss chalet style apartment sleeps 6, near Gryon

comments: Liz was very helpful. Instructions are crystal clear. The house is awesome.

comments: Wir hatten eine super Zeit. Alles war tip top. Wir und natürlich unsere Kinder fanden die Snowslides super. Sehr zu empfehlen. Danke für alles.

comments:
Appartement très rustique dans son genre. La cheminée rejette beaucoup de fumé, ce qui veut dire qu’en rentrant chez vous, vous devez passez tout en machine! 
C’est un appartement de 5 personnes et pas de 6! 
La literie (matelas) sont à changer! 
La pente qui donne accès à l’entrée de l’appartement est toujours gelée. 
J’ai demandé des draps de lits pour ne pas avoir besoin de faire les lits et notre hôte nous les avez posé tout simplement sur les lits. 180Frs. Un peu cher son service !! J’ai du prendre environ 1 heure pour les faire. 
Sur l’équipement il y aurait dû avoir un sèche cheveux et il n’y avait pas.
name: Swiss chalet style apartment sleeps 6, near Gryon

comments: Nice location. Really good apartment
name: Neuf proche gare & place de parc

comments:
I had an enjoyable stay in Carmen's place! The flat is at walking distance from  EPFL and UNIL thought it is well connected with the city centre through buses and metro.
I liked the flat, the residential area where it is located and its decorations. Carmen is a very nice host: she always replied me promptly and she was very flexible for the check in. I had a nice time with Carmen, Quentin and Nathan and I will be back to their place soon!
name: Chambre spacieuse et design près de l'EPFL

comments: We had an excellent time staying at Carmen's place. I was at a conference at UniL, so it's location was just right. It's a quiet area, and the flat is new and spacious. We were welcomed by Carmen and her housemates. Check in was easy. They provided access to all amenities and shared tea and coffee. They were very hospitable. Their place is so unique as well, with cool lighting and different decorations. It felt very comfortable to stay there. I don't expect to visit Lausanne much in future, but if I ever do, I'd definitely try to stay with them again.
name: Chambre spacieuse et design près de l'EPFL

comments: It’s a very clean place and Phil is really kind.

comments: Very nice host, perfect communication, nice place in good location. 100% recommendation.

comments: Great stay, Phil was very welcoming and helpful. Comfortable, clean and spacious room. Would definetely recommend it!

comments: Bon accueil de Leonard et de sa femme Mélanie. le couple ont deux ravissantes petites filles. Le quartier résidentiel est calme. l'appartement donne sur l'arrière de la résidence avec vue étendue sur des champs. Celui-ci est spacieux et lumineux. La chambre bien aménagée  et la SDB sont propres. La cusine est mise à la  disposition des voyageurs. Nous avons eu de bons échanges.  A recommander.

comments: The appartment is very comfortable and attractive with splendid views. Watch out for the linen and cleaning charge before you book, it is there in the description. Bedding is not well provided, only four duvets and four pillows, even though it can accomodate 5, so ask for more before you go or bring your own if possible. The staff at Interhome are very friendly but limited in what help they could offer. Bring your own toilet roll as only one partial one was left for us on arrival. No cooking basics such as oil or herbs, salt or pepper are left between lets, so again bring some with you. Nothing for you in the fridge to even make a cup of coffee or tea, let alone a bottle of wine.
name: Le Miclivier B7

comments: lovely apartment, amazing views! swimming pool and sauna were an added bonus!
name: Le Bristol B36

comments: Très bon accueill.
name: Les Girolles

comments:
L'appartement est tel qu on le voit sur les photos.
Il est cosy et fonctionnel.
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.
name: Verseau 17

comments: Le logement est d'un bon rapport qualité-prix, très calme et confortable (le lit en particulier)! La cuisine pourrait être un peu mieux entretenue. Pour le reste, la communication avec Nicole a été excellente et agréable.
name: Magnifique appartement contemporain de 2 pièces

comments:
This place doesn’t deserve 5 stars, it deserves 500!  Julian hooked us up with a babysitter, places to eat, food delivery, what to see, where to go, etc....that was pretty over the top and we thought that was it.  Then Yasmine and Vlado stepped up and made it even more above and beyond.  They had us over and told us the whole story about the property.  The view of the lake from the garden is one of the best settings I have ever been in.  It’s quiet, serene and the Lake water has a calmness that is astounding.  We played frisbee with the kids, played catch, sat on the ledge and looked at the lake, watched the sunset over the mountains.  Amazing place.  This isn’t renting an AirBNB, this is making life long friends while you feel like you have known them for years.

We were there for New Years Eve and I am confident we saw 25 firework shows from the garden.  Off the charts.  Can’t recommend it enough.  Happy New Year everyone.
name: The Villa at the Sangata Mansion

comments: Really enjoyed our short stay in Blonay, the room was very nice and the view of the mountains from the balcony was amazing.
name: Studio flat in welcoming family home

comments: La hôtesse était très gentille. Nous sommes accueillis dès la descente de la voiture. Le studio est propre et cozy. Pour aller au centre ville de Vevey et Montreux, c’est 15 mins maximum en voiture. La vue vers la montagne était magnifique. Plein de livres, BD sont à la disposition dans une petite bibliothèque. Le petit-déjeuner était parfait. Je recommande fortement ce studio.
name: Studio flat in welcoming family home

comments:
- Présence d'un lave-vaisselle. Très agréable :)
- Logement quelque peu froid en hiver, malgré le chauffage.
- Restaurant au rez-de-chaussé, bien pratiqeu pour ne pas cuisiner tous les soirs.

The apartment was large and comfortable with a beautiful view. Great shower and comfortable couch as well! Would stay again. 

Christian était un hôte merveilleux qui a communiqué très rapidement et a rendu notre expérience aller aussi bien que possible. Il a fait mon petit ami et je me sens comme chez moi et même nous a laissé des chocolats! L'appartement était grand et confortable avec une belle vue. Grande douche et canapé confortable aussi! J'y retournerais volontiers

comments:

comments: My wife, four-year-old daughter and I stayed at Mar's place for a week and had a great experience. The unit is very private and quiet. Mar's place is a five-minute walk to the metro, and is close to both Geneva and Divonne by car. Great neighborhood. Mar did a great job helping us get settled and was very responsive to any questions. Highly recommended.

Le salon est ma partie favorite de la maison parce qu’il est grand et parfait pour un groupe d’environ 10 personnes. Je vous recommande cette maison plus que n’importe laquelle de La région. comments: This house is a little outside the city of Lausanne, but so worth the distance. The view of the Geneva lake, the mountains and the vineyard are amazing! Etoy has a wonderful charm to it. We thoroughly enjoyed the hotel/restaurant, Auberge Communale. You can walk there from the home. Anja and her family are very kind and accommodating. Hope to stay here again in the future!

comments: Anja’s house was amazingly beautiful! Location was stunning with lake a 30 min walk away. Very spacious house, many beds, and with a great atmosphere and view of the alps! Anja was great at replying so quickly and at keeping the place very clean before getting there. She made it very easy to communicate everything to her.

comments: Très propre et calme, auberge idéalement situé par rapport à mes besoins. Petit déjeuner simple mais bon

comments: Fantastic Hostel. Super clean and great hospitality. I would highly recommend it.
name: Nyon Hostel

comments:
Superbe auberge de jeunesse, la meilleure que j’ai pu faire ! On se croirait à l’hôtel. Les bâtiments sont neufs, les chambres sont spacieuses. Chacun lit dispose d’un casier que l’on ouvre avec son badge. Le casier comporte des prises avant de laisser charger son téléphone en toute sécurité. Chaque lit dispose de deux prises et d’un lumière. Les douches sont très propres et spacieuses avec un compartiment pour pouvoir poser ses affaires sans qu’elles soient mouillés. Il en est de même pour la cuisine, très spacieuse, très bien agencée, elle ne manque de rien ! Enfin le petit déjeuner est un joli plus, il est gratuit et se compose de toast, pain frais, yaourt, céréales, beurre, confiture, jus et boissons chaudes. 
L’auberge est très calme, et très bien isolée ! Ce qui permet de dormir en toute tranquillité ! Je ne peux que vous la recommander !!
name: Nyon Hostel

comments: Très propre, agréable a y passer quelques jours, staff sympa.
name: Nyon Hostel

comments: Un Grand Merci a Vous Pour ce Magnifique séjour nous avons été très bien accueilli l’apparteme Est Nickel rien a dire et l’hôtes tres a l’écoute je recommande vraiment.

comments: L'appartamento è sicuramente molto caldo, personale ed originale. Si sente che è vissuto e si respira un'aria accogliente.  La posizione è ottima. Stefanie è molto accogliente e premurosa.
name: In the heart of Lausanne, a place to be.

comments: Stéphanie was a very friendly, attentive host who met me at the train station, showed me around Lausanne and provided the occasional meal for me. She was always checking to make sure I had everything I needed. This flat is probably better for those vacationing than on a work trip, because the only work space is out in the common area. The bed was very comfortable!
name: In the heart of Lausanne, a place to be.

comments: Bon séjour chez Stéphanie qui a un très bel appart avec une vue magnifique et peu commune. La déco est chaleureuse, autant que l'hôtesse ! Tout s'est bien passé et Stéphanie s'est montrée très flexible sur les horaires. Attention aux allergiques, il y a un chat dans l'appart !
name: In the heart of Lausanne, a place to be.

comments:
La posizione dell’abitazione è ottima, molto centrale e vicinissima ai mezzi di trasporto (raggiungibile dalla stazione dei treni in sole 3 fermate di metro, 5 minuti). L'appartamento è sicuramente molto caldo, personale ed originale. 
Stephanie è molto accogliente e premurosa. Questa sistemazione è probabilmente più adatta a chi si trova a Losanna in vacanza e non per lavoro, in quanto l’unico spazio adatto al lavoro ed allo studio si trova nell’area comune.  Al momento della prenotazione in realtà le condizioni dichiarate erano diverse (dal sito si evinceva l’affitto dell’intero appartamento e  non solo della camera in un appartamento condiviso), tuttavia quando ha dovuto, per motivi contingenti, modificare la disponibilità dell’intero alloggio, Stephanie è stata disposta a prolungare la durata del soggiorno, quando, per motivi di trasporto, ho dovuto rimandare la partenza di un giorno.  Inoltre, ha accettato la permanenza di una persona in più (mio marito) per 2 notti.
name: In the heart of Lausanne, a place to be.

comments:
S'il y à une adresse à connaître à Lausanne... c'est Chez Stéphanie!
Situation idéal, calme et tranquillité sont ici les règles. 
Situation idéale pour découvrir Lausanne et profiter de la ville.
N'hésitez pas, allez y!
Mériterait des étoiles au fameux guide rouge... !!!
A bientôt, Stéphanie!
name: In the heart of Lausanne, a place to be.

comments: Stéphanie is a very nice host :) our stay was really pleasant
name: In the heart of Lausanne, a place to be.

comments: C’était génial :)
name: In the heart of Lausanne, a place to be.

comments:
Our stay was fantastic. They took incredible good care of us. The apartment is very clean, spacious and relaxing. Natural daylight is great. 
The location of the house in the middle of the vineyard is lovely. 
We would have loved staying longer and will definitely stay there again if we come back in the region. 
Thanks!
name: Antagnes near Ollon and near Villars

comments: Hilary and David were extraordinary friendly. We really enjoyed staying at their House, there was a comfortable atmosphere the whole time. The neighbourhood with its direct view on the Mountains is astonishing. They gave us worthy tips for really beautiful spots, where you also can go for skiing, hiking and sleding. And on top you have a lovely bonus with their private Jacuzzi. We are absolutely recommending their place! :))
name: Antagnes near Ollon and near Villars

comments: Appartement charmant et très cosy. On se sent comme à la maison. Très bien situé, proche du centre du village, des commerces et de la gare. On sort de la maison, on peut directement partir en randonnée, et sans voiture c est un immense atout. Nous avons apprécié le calme , la tranquillité et la propreté. Merci France de partager votre  petit coin de paradis où on a qu une  envie celle d y revenir.
name: Bright and Cozy apartment in Center of Town

comments: Appartement chaleureux et très confortable, idéalement situé, proche des petits commerces. Très bon point de départ pour visiter la région. Nous y avons passé quelques jours ensoleillés plus qu’agréables. Merci pour tout!
name: Bright and Cozy apartment in Center of Town

comments: The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

comments: The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

comments: Das Appartement war sehr sauber, die Einrichtung stilvoll, alles was notwendig ist, war da. Vivek ist ein sehr freundlicher, aufmerksamer Gastgeber, nimmt sich viel Zeit, alles genau zu erklären. Ich kann ihn zu 100% weiterempfehlen. Danke Vivek
name: Alpine Zen !

comments:
Très joli chalet, confortable et extrêmement bien équipé! Notre weekend en famille a été super agréable, nous le recommandons pour tous ceux qui veulent partager un bon moment tranquille à la montagne et profiter de commodités modernes. L'accueil a été très chaleureux et on s'est senti comme à la maison. 
Nos meilleurs vœux et sincères salutations à la famille du chalet Heidi.
Céline & Damien
name: Heidi Chalet - Ideal for Large Groups & Families

comments: Heidi Chalet est un hébergement exceptionnel pour groupe et familles, dans une vraie construction ancienne typique de la région. Très bien située au calme et près de jolis villages, l'équipement est luxueux, exceptionnel : il y a tout, et plus que nécessaire. On se sent comme à la maison, l'ambiance est très chaleureuse. Excellent accueil et communication parfaite. Mon conseil : séjourner plusieurs jours. Tous mes accompagnants ont envie d'y retourner !
name: Heidi Chalet - Ideal for Large Groups & Families

comments: Communication très facile, hôte attentionné et réactif dans un cadre juste magnifique. Le chalet est équipé avec tout ce dont on a besoin. Idéal pour recevoir la famille et les amis en groupe. Merci pour tout.
name: Heidi Chalet - Ideal for Large Groups & Families

comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: Pied à terre pour professionnels & touristes

comments: Très beau séjour au chalet les pavots. Très spacieux. Idéalement placé (a 2min du centre en voiture) et très calme. Propreté impeccable. Lits très confortables. Ambiance vieux chalet que nous avons beaucoup appréciée!
name: Chalet authentique et chaleureux

comments: Endroit à recommander.

comments: Chambre plus bain dédié situés à l‘intérieur de la maison, le tout propre et très correct pour le prix. Communication rapide et facile avec Isabel par téléphone. Nous avons passé seulement une nuit chez elle et ne l‘avons malheureusement pas rencontrée.
name: Chambre supplémentaire

comments: Soggiorno piacevole, località bucolica ma non immediata da raggiungere. Con la pioggia ed il buio non evidente trovare la stanza. Stanza pulita, letto comodo.
name: Chambre supplémentaire

comments: The room, despite being rather small, is very comfortable, clean and elegantly furnished. the bed is comfortable and the heating is efficient. The bathroom is large and complete with everything and also quite elegant. From the window of the bathroom the view is fantastic. The is also a nice space outside with table and chairs: the location is in the countryside just outside Vevey with a fantastic view on the lake and the monitorando behind it. The space outside is probably agreeable in summer though useless for us in January of course. Only disappointing thing was the non possibility to use the kitchen, despite being indicated in the description on Airbnb website. On the other hand, Isabelle has been very kind, providing a tray with breakfast items (biscuits, jam, tea, coffee etc. and also a thermos with hot milk). Surely we would like to stay again here.
name: Chambre supplémentaire

comments:
Très calme et propre 
Parking privatif, grande terrasse avec vue sur le lac !
Au milieu des champs et des forêts
name: Chambre supplémentaire

comments:
Sufficient place to stay for 2 weeks.  Very good location and the shared washer and dryer were great.  The common area smells strongly of cigarettes and I was awoken every night by loud pounding noises from upstairs that seemed to last for hours.  

The host was responsive and the check-in process was easy.

comments: Great

comments: Very convenient location (close to the SBB train station, metro and lots of buses), quiet neighbors, big room and a great host. Staying at Gabriele's place was very pleasant and relaxed — almost like at home. Even though we didn't see him much, he was always available to answer any of our questions or help us with anything!

comments: J'ai passé un agréable moment, mon accueil a été remarquable ! Je vous remercie encore de vous être si bien occupé de moi. Au plaisir de vous revoir :-)

comments: Jonathan est accueillant et avenant, son studio très propre. À vérifier si la situation et l’équipement conviennent et suffisent.
name: Cosy flat in city centre - Lausanne / EPFL

comments: Jonathan is a great host, very friendly and knowledgeable about the area including shopping places and transport, and always responded very quickly to messages. The flat is ideally located for travel to both the center of Lausanne (about 20min by metro) and getting to the EPFL (about 6min by metro), and is clean, tidy, and cosy. I would definitely stay here again!
name: Cosy flat in city centre - Lausanne / EPFL

comments: Jonathan is a wonderful host. Quick response, really cared about sharing with me and making sure that I was comfortable. The apartment is modern, small and very neat and clean. Very quiet, quite close to the EPFL and Unil. About 15 minute train to Lausanne, 20 minute by bus/tram. Queen size bed, SOFT pillows = happy guest!
name: Cosy flat in city centre - Lausanne / EPFL

comments: Petit studio à deux pas de la gare. Très propre, rien à redire.

comments:

In der Wohnung wurde an wirklich alles gedacht. Uns hat nichts gefehlt und wir waren vollkommen zufrieden und würden hier wieder buchen.

comments: parfait !
name: Studio Valentin , centre ville

comments: I really enjoyed staying in this sparkling clean and stylish studio. It was nice to have the refrigerator and kitchen area to cook small meals. The place was small but comfortable and located in a quiet neighborhood with free parking and also convenient 10 minute walking access to center of town (on a hilly road) and on the city bus route if you don't have a car.  I would definitely recommend and stay there again on future trips.
name: Studio Valentin , centre ville

comments: Accueil chaleureux de la part de ce couple. Je recommande a tout voyageur venant sur Avenches de réserver à cette adresse . J’ai passé un moment unique de détente et de tranquillité.merci à Martine et Oliver

Cristina :)

comments: Excellent location, close to supermarkets, train station, bus stops, pharmacies and health centers. Also near the EPFL university and UNIL. The house and the room are large and very comfortable. Fatima is a good person, I really like being in her house.

comments: Appartamento molto bello e confortevole, tale quale le foto. Posso  consigliarlo!

comments: 깔끔한 시설과 아침에 창문으로 보이는 경치는 모든걸 감수 할 수 있습니다. 단 3명 이상이라면 조금 불편한 간이 침대를 이용해야 됩니다. 3명이서 이용 했을 때,  더블 사이즈 침대+ 간이 침대를 이용했는데 잠자리에 민감하다면 고려를 해야 합니다. 더불어 주위에 마트나 식당이 적기 때문에 이 것 또한 생각하고 예약 바랍니다. 마지막으로 여성분이 예약을 할 예정이고 짐이 무겁다면 4층 높이의 계단을 올라가야 된다는 걸 고려하길 바랍니다. 다시 한번 말하지만 접근만 가능하다면 최고의 숙소 중 하나인 것 같아요 ;)
name: New Design Flat 70m2, view mountain/lake, 6 person

comments:
Eine wunderbar gemütliche Wohnung. Super eingerichtet. Freundliche Nachbarn. Parkplatz vor dem Haus. Perfekt war auch die Möglichkeit, Skischuhe und nasse Kleider im separaten Raum trocknen zu können. 
Céline und Robin sind super Gastgeber - freundlich, kurze Antwortzeiten und sehr aufmerksam.

comments: Merci beaucoup pour ce super séjour, tout s'est extrêment bien passé! Et merci pour votre aide et votre flexibilite! Chalet tres chaleureux dans un tres bel endroit.

comments: Meine Familie und ich hatten eine wunderschöne Zeit in La Boutique! Die Wohnung ist top ausgestattet, sehr gemütlich und warm, so dass es nach langen Tagen im Schnee jeweils eine Freude war, wieder „nach Hause“ zu kommen. Die Nachbarn sind sehr nett und hilfsbereit und Rossinière ist ein schmucker Ort mit vielen interessanten Ecken. Wir kommen gerne wieder einmal!

comments:
Fresia’s place is super convenient, right in the centre of pretty Vevey’s old town, and in front of a delicious boulangerie! Inside, it is clean and very comfy. We appreciated the warmth, the big TV, the coffee machine and the possibility to cook light meals with all the necessary equipment. Fresia welcomed us on time and gave us all the info we needed. 
Highly recommended!
name: Charmant studio

comments: Bon séjour dans l'appartement de Fresia ! Belle décoration et immense télévision qui est facile à utiliser ! La connection internet est parfaite, et tout est bien fonctionnel dans le logement. La propriétaire est bien réactive aux messages, ce qui est très pratique ! Le seul soucis que l'on a rencontré c'est pour se garer, les parkings sont chers et compliqué à comprendre par rapport aux horaires etc. Mais sinon nous avons beaucoup aimé notre petit week-end ! Nous recommandons fortement, merci encore !
name: Charmant studio

comments: Very nice studio apartment in the centre of Vevey old town. My favourite place to stay when in Vevey.
name: Charmant studio

comments: L'appartement est très bien situé, dans la vieille ville de Vevey et à deux pas du lac. La propreté est irréprochable et l'atmosphère très accueillante! Fresia a été très disponible et elle a répondu avec gentillesse à toutes nos questions. On recommande sans hésiter son logement!
name: Charmant studio

comments: emplacement très bien
name: Charmant studio

comments: Logement confortable très bien placé dans le centre de Vevey par contre un peu bruyant. La cuisine et la vaisselle n'étaient pas très propre.
name: Charmant studio

comments: Très propre, très bonne communication. Un très bon appartement très bien situé
name: Charmant studio

comments: 整个旅程中最满意的一次住宿体验啦!房间离vevey火车站和莱蒙湖都很近,五分钟左右都可以到达｡房间虽不太大,但是麻雀虽小,五脏俱全｡厨具齐全,我们自己煮了面,喝了咖啡｡入睡前可躺在床上欣赏大屏幕电视节目,非常棒的感受!强烈推荐来vevey小镇旅游度假的朋友们来入住｡我们下次有机会再来还是会住到这里的｡
name: Charmant studio

comments:
Position parfaite, dans la vieille ville, proche de la gare et du lac.
Une bonne solution pour un petit séjour

comments: Studio très confortable et très bien équipé. Merci à Fresia pour sa réactivité malgré ma réservation tardive ainsi que pour la remise des clés de manière anticipée.

comments: Valérie ist sehr freundlich und hat uns praktische Tipps zum Langlauf und Skifahren gegeben. Die Unterkunft ist sehr sauber und gemütlich! Kann ich nur weiterempfehlen, Les Moses bietet für Wintersport optimale Bedingungen.

comments: Très beau petit studio avec magnifique vue de la vallée. Juste mal insonorisé, heureusement que les voisins ne faisaient pas trop la fête.

comments: Nous avons passé deux nuits sur place. Valérie était disponible et de bon conseil pour les activités aux alentours. Appartement fonctionnel et parfaitement propre, super balcon orienté vers le massif des aiguilles du midi, vers le soleil couchant. Très (trop) bien chauffé en plein hiver. Lit un peu mou à déconseiller aux lombaires fragiles. Super cuisine, bien équipée. Rapport qualité-prix très intéressant. On recommande volontiers cet hébergement.
name: Appartement 3 sapins n°11

comments: Logement conforme à la description. Très propre. Bien équipé. Balcon pour pouvoir profiter du soleil. Endroit très calme. A 5 mn à pied de la station Les Mosses. Très bon accueil et gentillesse de Valérie. De belles randonnées à réaliser dans le coin et bien sûr le ski pour ceux qui aiment.
name: Appartement 3 sapins n°11

comments: Gerda est une superbe hôte, aux petits soins et très agréable !
name: Room for short periods

comments: As one night was a good experience ! I recommande !

comments: Petit studio très propre et bien équipé, je recommande!

comments: The host canceled this reservation 44 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

comments:
Удобные апартаменты, оснащённые всем необходимым. До подъёмника 20 мин пешком, ходит регулярный бесплатный автобус. Рядом продуктовый магазин, кафе, пиццерия.
Хозяин очень гостеприимный. Нам все очень понравилось, спасибо и до встречи :)
name: Villars Chalet with a view.

comments:
Très bel appartement spacieux,bien aménagé et équipé. 
Idéal pour une famille.
name: Villars Chalet with a view.

comments: Maison pittoresque, agréable et sympathique. Un accueil chaleureux, bref un excellent séjour.
name: Maison villageoise, jardin, calme, 20' de Lausanne

comments:
We had a wonderful stay at this chalet. It was tastefully decorated. The owner Julien is a very helpful and kind person.
He waited for us at the train to bring our luggage to the chalet by snowmobile. We had a minor problem with the WiFi, which he fixed for us within a day. The communication went really pleasant.
The chalet has everything you need, it even has a bread baking machine, which is very handy because there are no shops in the neighbourhood. It is rather isolated, on the far end of a small group of chalets in the mountain, called Bretaye. This is appealing to us, but good to know is the fact that you bring your own groceries. Julien helps by providing a good part of the regular household needings!
In return for the isolation you get a stunning view on the mountains and real quiet at night.
We had a super holiday in Bretaye. Thanks Julien!
name: Unique chalet on the top of the ski slopes

comments: I had a pleasant stay at Myriame's place. She was a very friendly host and her Chalet is very charming, clean and comfy.
name: Chambre cosy dans un chalet

comments: A beautiful and lovely maintained house in a quite area - the room is big and you have everything you need for a night abroad. I liked it very much.
name: Chambre cosy dans un chalet

comments: I enjoyed the stay at Mariame's place. There is a lovely friendly male siamese cat in her place. It is quite close to the bus stops (3-5 min). The room is located in the spacious basement with a bathroom and a shower booth. She offers tea bags and coffee for free. There is also a mini-refrigerator for a small amount of food in the room, which can be noisy at night but useful to keep fresh food.
name: Chambre cosy dans un chalet

comments:
Le sous-sol de cette belle maison est aménagé en une chambre indépendante avec toilettes et douche privés. C'est très propre, bien équipé, même le thé et café dans la chambre. Tres pro.
Tres calme. Myriame est sympathique et arrangeante. Je recommande vivement.
name: Chambre cosy dans un chalet

comments: Très bon accueil de la part des hotes, la chambre est agréable et située dans un chalet tres beau. Je recommande !
name: Chambre cosy dans un chalet

comments: J’ai été tres bien accueillie, ma chambre était parfaite, lit superconfortable.
name: Chambre cosy dans un chalet

comments: 5* for Myriame. Stayed already at hers and it's always such a nice experience. Can recommend this to everyone. Enjoy! :-)
name: Chambre cosy dans un chalet

comments: Great and straight forward Airbnb experience, as all of them should be!
name: Chambre cosy dans un chalet

comments: Logement conforme à la description, confortable et bien situé. Pas de mauvaises surprises. Daniel est un hôte très sympathique et réactif à toutes demandes. Place de parc intérieure avec accès direct à l'ascenseur, vue magnifique. Juste un peu bruyant dû à la situation mais une fois les fenêtres fermées on n'entend plus rien. Nous avons passé 3 semaines très agréables et nous recommandons vivement ce logement.
name: Near CHUV, BIOPOLE, AQUATIS, Lake view @ Lausanne.

comments: En veldig modern og praktisk leilighet i et nytt bygg. Praktisk og funksjonelt. Ligger 200 meter fra metrostasjonen som går direkte til jernbanestasjonen i Lausanne. Litt langt fra sentrum, men med metroen tar det bare noen få minutter til Le Flon eller til O´uchy. Jeg likte meg meget godt her.
name: Near CHUV, BIOPOLE, AQUATIS, Lake view @ Lausanne.

comments: Super appartement, super hôte!! Je le conseille vivement.
name: Near CHUV, BIOPOLE, AQUATIS, Lake view @ Lausanne.

comments: Communication was super easy. Simpel Self- Check-in and out. The appartment itself is super modern, clean and spacious. We really enjoyed our stay. Nothing to complain. Would come back any time for Lausanne.

comments:

comments: I have never used Airbnb  housing services  before and Maxine  and Sandra's  place set the standard  for me to continue  to use that type of services. Place  is sparkling clean, modernized,very quite and in close proximity to train stations  and (Website hidden by Airbnb) stay  was a very pleasant one and I would recommend  this place to anyone  looking for a clean and comfortable  home away from home.Will definitely  stay again on my next trip to  Lausanne.Thanks for hosting me.

comments:
Very nice studio, very clean and well furnished.
WiFi worked very well, warmers also.
The location is perfect, supermarket, pharmacy, gym, bakery just 5 minutes from there by feet. And the downtown it's just 10 minutes by feet from there.
Maxime was very friendly and whit fast answers for everything.
The building is also clean and well protected by one concierge and camera at the main door, that's really good.
Laundry it's also avaliable.
For sure, 100% recommended.
name: Joli studio meublé proche centre ville

comments: Really good place for a longer stay. Concierge is really friendly and the cleaning service is always sparkling clean. Would recommend it for sure !
name: Joli studio meublé proche centre ville

comments: Annie est une hôtesse d'exception et sa maison est un havre de paix. Je ne peux que recommander ce logement.
name: bienvenue chez Annie

comments: Calme absolu, une pépinière sous les yeux et les cimes au loin.. Top !

comments: Maxime and Sandra were great hosts. Recommend their apartments. Thanks a lot!

comments:
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement de Sophie. L'appartement de Sophie est très propre, agréable, lumineux et spacieux. La présence d'un parking dans la résidence est très appréciable. Situé à Prilly, il est un peu à l'écart du centre de Lausanne mais cela reste rapidement accessible en voiture ou en transports.
Sophie est très réactive, attention cependant à quelques fautes de frappe dans les mails qui peuvent porter à confusion (le mot "boite à lettre" ayant été remplacé par "pot de lait": du coup on a recherché la clé dans un pot de lait pendant une bonne dizaine de minutes... sans succès)
Bon à savoir: le lit de la chambre adulte est un matelas futon qui est extrêmement dur et ne convient pas à tous les dos.
name: 3 rooms flat terras&garden&jacuzzi 10'center bus

comments: Schöne Zimmer mit Bad, WC und Seeblick. Alles ist sauber und schön hergerichtet. Antionette ist eine super Gastgeberin. Das Frühstück ist reichhaltig und beinhaltet alles, was das Herz begehrt. Gerne mal wieder!

comments:
Kate's place is lovely, very cozy and has a great location. The view from the appartment is amazing. 
We loved the fireplace! 
Kate is a great host, always there to help and reply any questions you might have. Totally recommended.
name: 79m2 Apartment with Amazing Mountain Views

comments: Wonderful time, enjoyed the view, loved the layout of the apartment, plenty of towels and other amenity in the kitchen. The owner made the entire process easy. We would most definitely return to the apartment in a future ski holiday. Thank you very much  Kate
name: 79m2 Apartment with Amazing Mountain Views

comments: Kate's place is absolutely as advertised and as others have reviewed - it's a wonderful spacious apartment with all that you would wish for a wonderful stay in the mountains.  Fabulously equipped, fantastic views, nice decor and train stop just a short walk away - so getting into Villars and onward to the ski slopes is easy.  Kate provided us with lots of useful local tips to make the most of our short stay, check-in was super simple and Kate was really quick to respond with the few questions we had.  Parking is as stated by Kate i.e. quite tight but perfectly fine for our Audi A3 - and we much appreciated being able to park under cover and close by.  Would love to go back again and would definitely recommend Kate's place to others.
name: 79m2 Apartment with Amazing Mountain Views

comments: Nice place, great view.
name: 79m2 Apartment with Amazing Mountain Views

comments: Je recommande vivement ce logement. Attention quand même difficile d accès si beaucoup de bagage ou personne à mobilité réduite.
name: 79m2 Apartment with Amazing Mountain Views

comments: Lovely apartment with amazing views
name: 79m2 Apartment with Amazing Mountain Views

comments: Calme, environnement en pleine nature avec possibilités de balades sans reprendre la voiture, proximité d'une gare de la Travys mais sans le bruit du chemin de fer, vue sur le lac,  restaurant à proximité, chambre spacieuse et confortable.

comments: Belle chambre avec une vue extraordinaire sur le Lac de Joux. Bien situé dans une belle region, à quelques minutes à peine d'un arrêt de train et proche des pistes de ski de fond ainsi que d'un très bon restaurant. L'endroit ideal pour découvrir cette jolie region qu'elle la vallée de Joux. Antoinette est une hôte très accueillante qui fournit en plus des conseils très utiles sur les choses à découvrir durant le séjour ainsi qu'une carte donnant droit à des reductions sur certaines choses (trains gratuits, location de materiel de ski à moitié prix, etc.).
name: 1 chambre (violette) au bord du lac de Joux

comments: Très bien accueillie chez Antoinette, chambre lumineuse avec vue sur le lac, situation calme en pleine nature, literie très confortable. Monique, Genève

comments: Great!

comments: There is no way you could book a better location in Lausanne for this price. Everything was very modern and clean. 5min walk to Lausanne Gare. Groceries and everything you could need are very close (especially since it's close to the station and the COOP Pronto there is 24/7).
name: City Pad Near Station *Great Value* Med/Long Term

comments:
Emplacement calme, très proche du centre et du lac. Appartement très propre et relativement grand (Nous étions 8, pas idéal mais aucun problème). Caroline a été très réactive pour les communications et tout était parfait. 

Seul point négatif : Les fenêtres des toilettes-WC-cuisine sont très proche et vous pourrez donc admirer votre ami se frotter furieusement les aisselles alors que vous êtes tranquillement en train de faire la vaisselle.
name: TOP Montreux centre,  2-8 p., view lake and castle

comments:
One thing I did not know before getting to the flat was that it’s on a hillside, that I think it is better suited for a traveler who is staying for a few days instead of someone who has a lot of luggage and wants to only stay a night.

Overall the apartment was clean and comfortable to stay. Olivier and Caroline were kind hosts and quick in responding to any of our questions. Thanks for having us!
name: TOP Montreux centre,  2-8 p., view lake and castle

comments: The view from the flat's balcony was gorgeous when the sun was shining! Overall the apartment was clean, easy to find, close to the center of Montreux, and comfortably fit 8 guests. The flat was updated, comfortable, and safe.
name: TOP Montreux centre,  2-8 p., view lake and castle

comments: Super appartement, très convenable pour 4 personnes. Peut-être un peu trop limité vis-à-vis de la quantité d'ustensiles de cuisine.  Les canapés-lits étaient super confortable ! Très bien situé, à proximité d'un arrêt de bus et du centre.

comments: Nous avons passé un très bon weekend sur Montreux entre copines. L'appartement était très propre, bien équipé, et spacieux. L'emplacement est idéal car nous avons pu nous garer facilement et nous étions à 5-10 minutes à pied du centre! Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse :)

comments:
Appartement très bien placé, propre, vue sur le lac et proximité des commerces. Places de parking à proximité avec disques de stationnement mis à dispo par l'hôte.
Très bon rapport qualité/prix, je recommande !
name: TOP Montreux centre,  2-8 p., view lake and castle

comments: The apartment was amazing! Olivier responded quickly to my texts. Recommended and I will definitely get back again with my family next time!!!!
name: TOP Montreux centre,  2-8 p., view lake and castle

comments: The apartment was very clean and comfortable. The location was quiet but not too far from town. We found Switzerland too expensive, but that can hardly be held against our hosts, who were attentive and easy to work with. Would recommend.

comments:

Montreux is beautiful little town and we enjoyed our brief stay here.  The location of the apartment is only a little walk from the train station and down the road from Château de Chillon, a must-see.
name: TOP Montreux centre,  2-8 p., view lake and castle

comments: It is a really nice apartment with a beautiful view. A bit far from the downtown to-go walking but there is public transportation nearby.

comments:
Espaço simpático e acolhedor, com uma óptima vista sobre o lago. Para vir a pé, sobe-se um pouco, mas por outro lado, está pertíssimo da cidade velha. O castelo de Chillon fica a 3km, mas o caminho a pé, junto ao lago, é mesmo muito bonito. Para quem gosta de caminhadas, fica perto do parque Gorges du Chauderon.
O contacto com os anfitriões foi óptimo. Muito acessíveis e rápidos a responder. Aconselhamos!
name: TOP Montreux centre,  2-8 p., view lake and castle

comments: Dans une belle maison au calme, sur les hauteurs de Morges, en plein milieu des vignes, et avec une vue imprenable sur le lac Leman et les belles montagnes des Alpes, Norbert vous accueille à bras ouverts. Grande chambre, salle de bains toute équipée, et même sauna, tout est là pour passer un moment de détente exceptionnel.

comments: Super place in a convenient location (walking distance of the train station and Nyon centre). Clean, tidy and lots of space and nice view of the mountain in the distance. I stayed at a bleak wintery time of the year - in the summer I can imagine its great to stay and have windows open to the world. I would like very much to come back to Nyon and would stay here again if it was possible. Thank you Karen and Philip for your hospitality.
name: Perfect Location in Central Nyon

comments: A ver spacious and nice place very near to the site's and facilities of Nyon. Very good service from Karen and Philip

comments: Pour les personnes recherchant le calme dans une cadre pittoresque et « loin » des « bruits » du village. Pour descendre au village de Château d’Oex et remonter au chalet, prévoir de bonnes chaussures, agréables à porter et permettant de marcher (à proscrire : talon aiguille pour les dames)
name: Room in a Swiss chalet in the Alps.

comments: Beautiful residence, the pictures don’t do justice. The room and bathroom are huge, the residence is very clean and the decor is simply wow! Communication was very thorough and prompt. Fabrice is an amazing host and so nice. The cats are really cute as well. The only complaint I would have is the check-in time at 19:00 which is a little late but it was also my fault I did not read the check-in time until after booking and assumed it will be around 15:00 as usual. I wish I could have stayed longer! Thank you for everything.

comments:
L'accueil de Gisela est très chaleureux. Elle s'adapte fort bien à la situation, et est très attentionnée.

comments: Très beau loft avec vue imprenable sur le Lac et montagnes. équipements et pièces multiples modernes. très High Tech notamment pour lumière et son. bel accueil de Ramon. quartier calme et très agréable. a 5 minutes de Lausanne et 30 de Genève. on reviendra.

comments: We spent 2 nights at Ramon's appartement during a business trip to EPFL. The apartment looks wonderful, is very close to the Uni and is equipped with every convenience that you could imagine (Luxurious bathroomS, bluetooth speakers in every room etc.). It was very clean when we checked in with Ramon, who was very flexible and kind. We definitely enjoyed our stay at his home and recommend his place to the fullest!
name: Panoramic Lake View Luxury Equiped

comments: Ramon is a great host with a lovely listing. Ramon had orange juice, milk and coffee available for us and made us feel at home. There is an elevator in the building so easy to bring luggage. Only 15 minutes to Lausanne. Highly recommend.
name: Panoramic Lake View Luxury Equiped

comments: Séjour parfait dans ce petit chalet! Tres bien situé par rapport a Villars. La vue du balcon est juste magnifique (pour prendre le café chaque matin ). J’ai lu dans des commentaires précédents que la cuisine était assez basique mais finalement pas du tout, tout y est ! Même le caquelon a fondue et l’équipement à raclette. Tout est là pour cuisiner des bons repas. Je vous le conseille!
name: L'Eau Vive

comments: Emplacement parfait pour une famille
name: Le Brévent 4

comments: Heel fijn huis, goede communicatie. Wel overdreven hoge kosten voor opkuis en linnen.
name: Albatros 4

comments: The location was fantastic, clean and the flat is well equipped. We also received great service from Melinda - Interhome Villars and we would definitely recommend it.
name: Le Savoie

comments:
Le logement en question est lié à une agence qui est très réactive aussi bien pour la remise des clefs que pour leur disponibilité.
L'appartement a une bonne surface, très belle vue et se trouve à proximité des pistes (possibilité d'y accéder en ski). Place de parc dans un parking fermé et local à ski.
Inconvénient dans l'appartement, le manque d'un vestiaire pour suspendre les affaires surtout en rentrant du ski. On arrive directement dans la zone séjour. Et un des 2 matelas est très inconfortable (trop mou). Sinon le reste est bien.
On a passé un agréable séjour.
name: Schuss 23

comments: Coole Wohnung nur 5min von der Skipiste. Gute Kommunikation mit Vermietern. Wohnung war sehr sauber und aufgeräumt
name: Le Faucon 7

comments:
Superbe logement avec une vue à vous couper le souffle ! Idéal avec des enfants (jouets +++, baignoire, lit bébé, chaises hautes...)
Cependant les alentours en poussette (double, pour nous) sont difficiles (relief +++)
Aucune nuisance sonore.
Les propriétaires (que nous n avons pas rencontrés) sont d une très grande gentillesse
Nous conseillons vivement ce logement.
name: Vue splendide - Lavaux, Alpes et Léman !

comments: Un appartement propre et fonctionnel ! Des salles des bains recemment rénovées et une jolie vue depuis la terrasse ! Parfait pour des vacances en famille !

comments: good location, 15-20 min. on foot to the strict city centre and to the railway station, 10 min. walk from the metro; new, small but well equipped apartment for 2-3 people; good wifi and kitchen; unproblematic self check in and check out
name: Modern 1 Bedroom + Balcony + Roof Terrace #1

comments: This apartment is very good for one or two persons. It is very close to the train station and shops. Perfect trip
name: Studio en plein cœur de Montreux

comments: Celia was absolutely fantastic! She was extremely helpful and available for questions/help if we needed anything.  The apartment was as pictured and the location was extremely central within Montreux.  Would definitely recommend!
name: Studio en plein cœur de Montreux

comments:
Gloria's apartment is everything the listing says - and more. Not only is the location super central (you can walk to the train station or easily take a bus that is just minutes away from the station) and extremely safe and peaceful. There is also an elevator so fret not if you have heavy luggages or just dread taking the stairs. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at her apartment and actually felt a wisp of sadness when I checked out that afternoon. 

What really stood out for me was Gloria. She is the host with the most, the person with a big heart and the lady with a welcoming smile. I was somewhat exhausted but staying at her apartment really made feel like I was home. She is very helpful, super obliging and is always encouraging like a sister. Super positive and upbeat about life! I had the good fortune to have a chat with her and she also shared a lot about life of locals in Switzerland with me. Such amazing insights. Thanks so much to Gloria for a most memorable time (and for everything else e.g. the breakfast), and I hope you get the opportunity to stay with and meet this amazing Superhost in Lausanne.
name: Chambre propre et jolie au CENTRE de Lausanne

comments: Très bonne adresse. Gloria est très accueillante. Emplacement idéal. Propreté impeccable.
name: Chambre propre et jolie au CENTRE de Lausanne

comments: Gloria is very friendly, she is a perfect host. She prepared coffee for me every morning. The apartment is in a very good position, in the centre, but it is very quiet. It is very clean. The room is very nice.
name: Chambre propre et jolie au CENTRE de Lausanne

comments: Trés très sympa, tout était parfait comme déjà lá première fois. A recommander absolument!
name: Chambre propre et jolie au CENTRE de Lausanne

comments: Very convenient studio close to the center of Lausanne. Excellent communication with the host. Recommended!

comments: Jonathons place is in a great location. The room was spacious and quiet. Great host and great stay!

comments: Jonathan's place was very comfortable, neat, and tidy. He's very friendly and gave us local tips during my stay in Switzerland. Very recommended!!

comments: Accueil sympa, disponibilité, tout est là pour un séjour tranquille et sans soucis!

Déçus par le séjour : retard des hôtes (puis nous avons du faire nos lits nous mêmes) , équipements bébé nos fournis malgré notre demande.

comments: Francine and her whole family are lovely. Communication was on point and the stay was pleasant, the room is really nice, cozy and private, and the location is great. Highly recommend.

comments: You will find an nice and tidy room and Francine will welcome you warmly. We spent one night, but it felt like holiday. If you are keen to explore beautiful Lausanne it is just the right place to stay.

comments: Perfect base to explore Lausanne. Sparkling clean, very cosy and as described. Francine and her family were delightful  hosts !

Domizia et son mari sont très chaleureux et attentionnés; Ce fut une très belle rencontre . Nous reviendrons !

comments: Wir haben fantastische Tage in dem Haus verbracht. Olivier kann mit der Deutschsprache gut verteidigen! Er ist sehr nett und kommunikativ, sehr gute Aufmerksamkeit. Das Haus ist wunderschön, die Räume sind sehr gut verteilt und die Umgebung des Hauses ist sehr schön, viel Privatsphäre und Ruhe. Das Haus hat alles was Sie brauchen und einen Feuerlöscher. Wir hoffen, dass wir wiederkommen können. Vielen Dank Olivier!
name: Clos-du-Nant, charmant chalet à louer (Gryon)

comments: Séjour magnifique dans le chalet d'Olivier. Il a toujours été très réactif et ses explications ont rendu l'arrivée, ainsi que le départ, très agréable et facile. Le chalet est un véritable havre de paix, et la petit rivière qui coule a coté a contribué à l'ambiance Zen qui règne alentours. On sent le chalet habité, et du coup on peut profiter du sel, poivre et de beaucoup de vaisselle. Merci aussi pour le café et les bûches pour faire un feu dès notre arrivée dans le chalet.  Le chemin pour y arriver, qui a première vu peut sembler escarpé, se dompte en fait très aisément. Je ne peux que recommander!
name: Clos-du-Nant, charmant chalet à louer (Gryon)
