comments: The location is superb! Very nice apartment to chill and have holiday with family and friends. Will definitely come back and recommend to friends!
name: Au bord du lac de Montreux N3

comments:
Merci pour ton accueil chaleureux Patrizia !! :)

 Merci également pour ta flexibilité sur les horaires d'arrivées et de départ. Ce n'est pas toujours facile quand on voyage, quand on ne connait pas bien la région de tout anticiper et de donner une heure exacte.. 

Encore une fois ton logement était très agréable à y séjourner. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié les petites intentions comme la pomme, le kiwi, le vin chaud, et les aromates pour cuisiner. Du coup on s'est vraiment senti chez nous, comme à la maison. En plus c'est décoré avec goût!
De plus, l'appartement est vraiment très propre. Le lit est bien plus confortable que le mien. Bref, c'est un appartement très confortable, idéal également pour les personnes un peu âgé, comme mes parents, qui ont passé l'âge de dormir dans un clic clac. Pareil on est très bien installé sur le canapé pour bouquiner. 

Et merci pour tout les renseignements que tu as pu nous transmettre sur les "infos pratique" tel que la coop, les brochures de l'office du tourisme.. 

Je pense que tu auras beaucoup de futurs voyageurs ... ;)

A bientôt, 

Rachel
name: Studio cosy au cœur de la Vallée de Joux

comments: The studio is very comfortable, clean with a very well equipped kitchen. Close to public transportation,  food shops, sport and wellness center.  The host family is very friendly, helpful and easy to communicate with. Patrizia even picked me up and drop me off at the station. A cozy place just to relax, explore the unspoilt nature which offers many activities. Patrizia was also very flexible with the check in and check out time.  Highly recommended.
name: Studio cosy au cœur de la Vallée de Joux

comments:
Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable ma compagne et moi ! L'appartement est très propre et bien agencé. Patrizia est de très bon conseil et nous nous sommes tout de suite sentis comme chez nous !
A recommander !
name: Studio cosy au cœur de la Vallée de Joux

comments: Le studio de Patrizia est parfaitement situé, près du centre sportif et de toutes les commodités. Il est bien aménagé et agréablement décoré. Patrizia est une hôte chaleureuse et attentive. Le lac de Joux est à proximité et offre de superbes balades comme la forêt et les monts alentour.
name: Studio cosy au cœur de la Vallée de Joux

comments: Absolument PARFAIT à tous points de vue : gentillesse, réactivité, propreté, échanges inter-personnels super sympas, logement effectivement 'cosy' et optimisé pour le confort des occupants. Une SUPER expérience, pleine de pep's, conviviale et détendue ! N'hésitez pas : FONCEZ chez Patrizia !!!
name: Studio cosy au cœur de la Vallée de Joux

comments: Great place, perfect location and lovely host. Both my boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay at Steffis. Zoek is super friendly too!!
name: Big room in the city center but quiet.

comments: Clean and quiet house
name: Big room in the city center but quiet.

comments: Enchanted star.. well I had a good time here, nice peacefull place almost at the end of the valley Scierne Picat, not the most easy to reach during winter and snowstorms but yeah, its the mountains right !? I had a nice stay here, small bedroom but could use kitchen, livingroom and bathroom at any time, very nice if you're ok with no luxery and comforts of older swiss house ! And of course very interesting talks with the owner Christophe ! cheers man, see you soon ! ciao Bert
name: The Enchanted Star. Backpacker's room.

comments: Fantastic!
name: The Enchanted Star. Backpacker's room.

comments: Un accueil bienveillant dans une maison simple et agréable. Juste authentique.
name: The Enchanted Star. Backpacker's room.

comments:
Staying in the Enchanted Star has been a great pleasure. Christophe was so kind to pick me up from the railway station and back after my 4 nights. He is a great host and  we had good talks. It was a really fun time!

The location is absolutely stunning, right inbetween the mountains. I was able to use his snowshoes on my second hike to explore the area, absolutely amazing!
My stay was during silvester and there was not a single firework, only the stars - stunning!

The information provided here on AirBnB is correct so read it. If you come in winter, be sure to bring enough warm clothes (!) as the accomodation is very simple and sometimes pretty cold - it's an old house. I slept in two different rooms (I knew this before I got there) and I was able to heat up every room (there are small heaters in every room) so it was nice and comfy, even though it was freezing cold outside.

The loft is awesome to do yoga, meditation and even thai yoga as there are mattresses and cushions.

I'll probably come again. Thank you! :-)
name: The Enchanted Star. Backpacker's room.

comments: A great location (close to the gare), wonderful views and the sauna and bains nordique were devine!  We had a problem with the plumbing and Arnaud got it fixed the same day - great response!! Comfy beds everything you need for families skiing. There is a quick access ski/boot drying room at the bottom.  Thanks!
name: Charmant chalet familial avec vue exceptionnelle

comments:
Modern apartment in amazingly central location close to the lake.
3 good sized bedrooms all with bathrooms.

comments: Un très bon accueil un site sympathique et une hôte très gentille

je recommande !!!

name: Le charme de la campagne à 2 pas de lausanne

comments: Laurence est extrêmement accueillante et attentive au bien être de ses convives. Elle est souriante, disponible et d’agreable compagnie! Le logement est parfaitement situé pour accéder aux domaines skiables. Nous recommandons fortement.
name: Maison d'hôtes - La Diligence - Lits 2+1

comments: Nous avons séjourné  une nuit pour aller faire du ski. Ambiance  chaleureuse.  Laurence est très agréable  et réactive. La chambre était propre les sanitaires également. La literie  bonne. On a passé une bonne nuit.
name: Maison d'hôtes - La Diligence - Lits 2+1

comments: Site chargé d'histoire, mais confort impeccable et hôtesse charmante. Grande flexibilité pour l'arrivée et le départ, dans la mesure du possible. Super! à recommander
name: Maison d'hôtes - La Diligence - Lits 2+1

comments:
Logement très intéressant au niveau qualité/prix. 
Propre, proche des pistes de ski (4min en voiture), proche de très bons restaurants et chambre spacieuse avec accès à Netflix.
Laurence est très gentille et nous a bien conseillé. 
2 seuls petits reproches : matelas un peu trop mou et l'aspirateur qui nous a réveillé un matin à 8h. 
Ce qui nous a pas empêché de passer un très bon séjour ! 
Merci pour cet accueil.
name: Maison d'hôtes - La Diligence - Lits 2+1

comments: A cosy place to stay. The house breathes history. Laurence is a warm-hearted person. You feel immediatly welcome. There was enough flexibility so we could arrive late in the evening. We loved the fact that the ski-area was nearby. We definitely would go back!
name: Maison d'hôtes - La Diligence - Lits 2+1

comments: Nice and clean apartment. Very close to the center

comments:
Appartamento piccolino ma confortevole, noi eravamo in quattro amici, siamo stati un po' stretti ma soddisfa tutte le necessità principali.
La posizione è ottima, facile arrivarci in automobile e dista solo 5 minuti a piedi dal centro della città.
Esperienza positiva. Uniche pecche sono la poca luminosità dell'appartamento e che il riscaldamento non basta per riscaldarlo: rimane sempre freddo.
Comunque consiglio a chi vuole passare qualche giorno a Losanna, ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo.

comments: Sven et Sophie sont aux petits soins, ils nous ont très bien expliqué comment accéder au restaurant où nous avions rdv et bien sûr au logement. Celui ci est bien situé et fonctionnel on s’y sent vite bien. Nous avons testé les conseils de Sven et Sophie en allant boire une bière artisanale au petit bar du coin et c’etait très sympathique.

comments: Great location, just a few minutes walk from the main train station and public transportation with many restaurants, shops.

comments: Super appartement , bien placé , hôte très précis et agréable !
name: TON CHEZ MOI - Studio 26m2, centre ville & gare

comments: Jennifer’s house is absolutely amazing and her hospitality is second to none.  Her son is also a joy to be around and enjoyed hanging out with us “guests.” Great communication pre/during/post stay.  Easy to find & free parking right out front.  The house is very special...unique architecture, beautiful wood & stonework, and a nice wine cave in the basement.  Jennifer welcomed us with coffee & tea, made us fondue with bread, pickles, and local wine, and made dinner reservations for us in town.  The rooms were very comfortable and a nice breakfast was served in the morning.  We were in the area to visit Glacier 3000 which is about a 50 minute scenic drive from the house (and far cheaper than any lodging you’ll find closer to the Glacier). We cannot recommend this place to stay highly enough!
name: Cosy Escape 2 rooms with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments: A very beautiful house, a very nice and friendly host and an adorable child, a cozy breakfast every morning, what else we could ask for more. We enjoyed the stay very much, thanks again Jen.
name: Cosy Escape 2 rooms with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments:
Breathtaking location, priceless experience, it is all so perfect that it's impossible to miss a stop here on your trip to the lake.
And the dinner in the wine cave it is simply perfect! 
Jennifer it is a great host , feeling like part of the family. A loveble experience folks
name: Cosy Escape 1 room with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments: Une belle adresse et un charmant accueil ! Beaucoup d’espace attenant à la chambre.
name: Cosy Escape 1 room with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments:
The space is great, the two top floors of a wonderfully-refurbished old house.  The location is also great, in the centre of the village and walking distance to station and restaurants, even if few were opened at the time (we found out that the whole region (Website hidden by Airbnb) stop in early January).
Jennifer is an excellent host: the place is extremely well equipped, the bed very comfortable and the wood-burning stove kept us nicely warm. She is also very responsive and easy to communicate with.
Very much recommended!
name: Cosy Escape 1 room with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments: Lovely home, with modern facilities! Super comfortable!
name: Cosy Escape 1 room with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments:
Jen's place is exceptional! She is a wonderful host who gave us lots of recommendations for the local area and even booked us a wine tasting.
The view from the end of the street is absolutely stunning and you can take a stroll through the vineyards and see the mountains. You can even see some of the mountain from upstairs at Jen's House.
The guest space is very large and comfortable. Staying in a 1600s house was pretty cool and Jen makes it like your home away from home. Would 100% recommend staying here. Jen is the best host we've ever had!
name: Cosy Escape 1 room with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments: It was great stay at Jen's home. Nice place, great view outside, convinient  location. Definitely worth it
name: Cosy Escape 1 room with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments:
호스트가 정말 친절했습니다. 정말 편하게 쉬다 갈수 있었고 필요한 모든것을 최대한 제공해줬습니다. 3층에 대부분이 갖춰져있었고 프라이버시도 매우 존중해줘서 좋았습니다. 일요일에는 주위 마트가 모두 닫지만 정말 맛있는 제과점에 빵과 물을 파니 참고하시기 바랍니다.
Great hosting, Warm welcome, Thank you Jennifer
name: Cosy Escape 1 room with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments: Jennifer is a very good host, as well as a linguistic ^^,cozy and stalished room, abandoned and delicious breakfast, efficient and clear communication, everything made up a quite nice stay here. Highly recommended.
name: Cosy Escape 1 room with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments: Superbe partie pour les hôtes et vue exceptionnelle, hôtes très sympathiques. Attention pour les enfants en bas âge, beaucoup d'escaliers.
name: Cosy Escape 1 room with breakfast Wine Maker home

comments:
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. L’appartement est très comfortable, propre et complète tous les besoins.
L’emplacement est aussi un plus, proche du centre ville.

Nous avons eu un accueil excellent par Maurine qui nous a donné toutes les informations nécessaires. 

C’est un endroit que nous allons garder en tête pour un futur séjour :)
name: Appartement au Calme à Lausanne

comments: Excellent emplacement. Pratique, efficace, sans souci!
name: Large central apartment near the train station.

comments: Alan's place was in such a perfect location. It was literally right outside the train station which was perfect for getting to and from the Geneva airport with amazing ease and in Lausanne it was the perfect distance between the old and new parts of town and you could walk to any main attraction within 15 minutes. There was also a small view of the lake and the balcony was perfect for people watching. All in all Alan's place was a diamond.
name: Large central apartment near the train station.

comments: everything was perfectly organised, clean nice! happy to come back soon!
name: Swiss Riviera Belmont 1

comments: Tanor est un hôte très accueillant, il fait tout pour que vous vous sentiez à l'aise, il est très réactif, on a eu un petit souci de wifi qui s'est réglé dans le 1/4 d'heure alors qu'il était en voyage aux USA.  L'appartement est confortable et pour ceux qui dispose d'une voiture il est facile de se garer dans son quartier.
name: Appartement calme idéalement située

comments:
Super appartement bien placé et bien équipé. Les cartes de transport sont un vrai plus!!!
Je recommande !!!
name: Lake view 180° Résidence Talleyrand

comments: Excellent emplacement et très spacieux.
name: Chalet l'Eglantine

comments:
Une maison au top !! Vue époustouflante, intérieur tout équipé, à proximité des pistes de ski de fond ! Propriétaires très disponibles et chaleureux !
Je recommande +++ cette maison de Florence et Cédric !
name: Zen Chalet fully equipped - Panoramic view

comments: Jennifer est une hôtesse parfaite, très sympathique et très accueillante. La chambre est très grande et agréable. L'appartement est très bien situé près de la gare. Deux points à signaler qui pour moi n'ont pas eu d'importance : pas d'ascenseur (si vous avez des bagages lourds à monter, mais ce n'est qu'au deuxième étage) et la rue est assez passante donc on entend la circulation la nuit. Mais je recommande sans réserve !
name: Chambre avec cachet à 1min de la gare

comments: Sophie’s place was great! It was clean renovated and cozy! You have to walk up hill a bit to get to it, but there is a bus available sometimes. Good place for relaxation and admiring the views.
name: Charmant appartement à Riex

comments: La casa è veramente bella, calda e accogliente, pulizia davvero ottima. Aïssatou è stata gentilissima, ci ha dato informazioni precise e utilissime per l'uso della casa e per gli spostamenti. Il centro è raggiungibile in una ventina di min a piedi ma c'è anche una fermata dei pullman molto vicino. Parcheggiare però è un problema perchè non è possibile lasciare l'auto gratuitamente e i parcheggi a pagamento non sono vicinissimi. Consigliata!
name: Cosy apartment near the city center of Lausanne

comments: Had a wonderful stay, I can recommend it to everyone!
name: Chambre avec grande terrasse

comments: Un sejour en famille pour les fêtes de fin d'année qui s'est tres bien passé, Angel est tres acceuillante, gentille et à l'ecoute, super emplacement au bord du lac,très belle vue, acces facile a pieds pour se balader au bord du lac ou même pour faire des courses, batiment sécurisés et on entends pas de bruits.A refaire absolument.
name: DUPLEX VUE SUR LE LAC, CENTRE VILLE

comments: A lovely apartment on the third floor, light, clean, cozy, and classy, and with great views of the surrounding mountains. Everything was accurately described and provided amenities were outstanding. Marine was a very friendly and hospitable host and had excellent recommendations for the local area. A real bonus is the proximity of the apartment to the train (10 second walk?) which allows you access to the resort at Villars and the towns above and below Les Posses.
name: Un séjour plein de charme aux Posses!

comments: Great find with fantastic views over the mountains. Full of character, which does bring its own challenges in providing a great space for guests but the Marine has succeeded. Very well equipped with nice touches.  Be aware the driveway is not for the faint-hearted, if arriving by car might want to leave it down by the road.
name: Un séjour plein de charme aux Posses!

comments:
Super tolle Unterkunft und eine liebenswerte Gastgeberin. 
Die Lage ist perfekt und in nur wenigen Minuten ereicht man ein wunderschönes Städtchen mit allem was man braucht
name: Un séjour plein de charme aux Posses!

comments: Bel appartement dans un chalet plein de charme idéalement situé pour skier à 5 minutes en voiture des télécabines . Couple adorable aux petits soins pour ses hôtes !!!
name: Un séjour plein de charme aux Posses!

comments: We enjoyed our stay very much. Marine was very helpful with aiding us in locating her home. By chance we were  even able to catch a ride to nearest town when we missed our train the first day.
name: Un séjour plein de charme aux Posses!

comments:
excellent accueil, nous a orienté sur des lieux et des adresses local au top.
logement à proximité de de la gare des Posses ce qui permet un accès direct en train jusqu'à Villars sur Ollon et donc sur le domaine skiable
name: Un séjour plein de charme aux Posses!

comments:
A 5 stars location: the flat is very close to the metro stop Riponne, which is in front of the Cathedral. In 15 Min walking you can arrive at the train station. The landscape from the window is amazing!

Stefano is the kind of host that you'd like to have: discreet, kind, likeable and welcoming. 
I would absolutely recommend it!
name: Fabulous Attic Suite Near Lausanne Gare

comments: Juste superbe
name: Fabulous Attic Suite Near Lausanne Gare

comments: We had a great stay in Lausanne thanks to this central and cozy nice flat with very helpful hosts.
name: Fabulous Attic Suite Near Lausanne Gare

comments: Einfaches Chalet in einer traumhaften, einsamen Umgebung. Das Haus liegt etwa 2-3 Km entfernt vom nächsten Dorf; man erlebt dort die Natur hautnah...
name: Chalet Mirabelle

comments: Tolles Gebiet zum wandern, direkt zu Fuß vor der Tür, sehr sehr liebe Gastgeber, aufmerksam und sehr nett. Ein süßer Platz für eine Auszeit. Vielen vielen Dank für alles!!! Toller Kamin, sehr sehr bequeme Betten, alles was man braucht.
name: Chalet Mirabelle

comments: It is the second time that we booked the appartment of Suzanne and Urs. The place is spotless clean, with an outstanding view.  There are children/adults games made available and the Wi-Fi has a good reception. All basic kitchen amenities are provided and the host are very responsive. We will definately go back.
name: Chalet Mirabelle

comments: We loved the place. It was isolated and gave us a lot of privacy. At the same time we were five minutes away from La Lécherette village and les mosses where you can find plenty of activities for everyone. The house had everything we needed. We loved the fireplace and enjoyed making our own breakfast in the morning. Urs welcomed us and Suzanne was already ready to give us tips and reply to any questions or requests we may have. We will definitely come back for longer than a weekend and maybe in summer as well. The area has a lot to offer!
name: Chalet Mirabelle

comments:
Susanne et Urs sont très gentils et attentionnés, merci encore à eux pour la bonne adresse de la ferme de la Sciaz et son Etivaz remarquable... la vue depuis les chambres est magique. Ce petit chalet est un havre de paix qui incite à la reconnexion avec la nature. Les équipements de cuisine sont simple mais très complets (pas de lave vaisselle ni de lave linge mais on s'en passe très bien).
Le poêle à bois apporte énormément à l'ambiance.
Beaucoup de documentation pour les ballades et des hôtes très disponibles et réactifs.
Un séjour authentique et très ressourçant, nous recommandons...
name: Chalet Mirabelle

comments: Central place, very smooth logistics, quite cramped.
name: Single Bed - Footsteps Away from Train Station

comments: Cosy apartment, very well equipped and maintained, with convenient access to both city center and lake's shore. Julie has ensured that our check-in was as smooth as possible and her hospitality is outstanding. Absolutely recommended host.
name: Bel appartement avec vue,5min de la gare et du lac

comments: Great place with a peaceful country setting.
name: BLUE LARGE TENT (R) à Commugny, Switzerland. + BED

comments: Suissement chaleureux !!!
name: Chez Nelly

comments:
Appartement très bien aménagé et propre.
Bonne situation.
Très bon accueil !
name: Chez Nelly

comments: Nous avons été ravi de notre séjour. L’appartement est bien aménagé et cosy. La chambre offre une belle vue sur les montagnes. Les hôtes sont chaleureux et attentionnés. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir !
name: Chez Nelly

comments: Très bon accueil de la part de Mélanie et son mari. Excelent spot pour assister à la Fete des lumières de Morat, avec en prime un jacuzzi qui a beaucoup plus aux enfants malgré la météo bien humide.
name: Studio "La belle vie"

comments: The place is really well located, 4 min to and from the Crochy station (from there you can go anywhere in Lausanne). Also, the apartment is pretty clean, and Mayank is a nice guy! I highly suggest this place.
name: Apartment close to EPFL/UNIL/ and Lausanne

comments:
Appartamento che si presenta come una piccola casetta, quasi indipendente e con una magnifica vista. Sulla carta sembrerebbe trovarsi un può fuori dal centro di villars, centro che però può essere raggiunto in 8 minuti a piedi o tramite i mezzi di trasporto, che si trovano nelle immediate vicinanze. L'appartamento dunque beneficia anche di un buon posizionamento per gli ospiti di Alain. 

L'alloggio rispecchia perfettamente la descrizione dell'host, come per altro anche le fotografie. Confortevole, ben ammobiliato, Charmant e rifornito. Caratteristiche che permettono a pieno il godimento delle proprie vacanze. 

Inoltre abbiamo anche avuto l'opportunità di conoscere Alain personalmente. Una persona molto simpatica, disponibile per qualsiasi evenienza o problema e in nessun modo invadente. 

Per quanto riguarda villars Sur Ollon, la zona e gli impianti sciistici ci siamo trovati molto, nonostante un paio di giorni di maltempo. La zona offre attività alternative allo sci, come le terme, un acquaparc, ciaspole ecc.

Se avete la possibilità di rimanere più a lungo vi consiglio di spostarvi un po' con la macchina e provare altri impianti sciistici, come ad esempio Leysin (35min) o Diablerets (40-50min).

Dunque concludendo vi consiglio una vacanza rilassante a Villars, alloggiando nell'appartamento di Alain. Sono sicuro che ne rimarrete soddisfatti!
name: Arcobaleno

comments: Exactly as shown in the images, great location in Villars.
name: Arcobaleno

comments: A lovely little chalet in a great location. Superb views and easy transport to Villars. A 20 minute walk or fee ski bus in winter or 2 minute train just up the road. Alain provided a great local guide and information about the chalet. We will recommend this to our friends and family in the future.
name: Arcobaleno

comments:
un séjour très beau avec une vue magnifique sur les montagnes en face ! 
Et Alan est très réactive de notre arrivé à départ. 
salle de bain très propre et cuisine bien équipé.
name: Arcobaleno

comments: Lovely little chalet, very clean warm and comfortable. Not too far from the station in Villars so it was an ideal base for ski trips
name: Arcobaleno

comments: todo fue excelente! super recomendable
name: Arcobaleno

comments: We had a great rest in the chalet at Alain. The view from the balcony is amazing.  The chalet is warm and comfortable.  There is everything you need.  Not far from the center.  Alain answers all the questions.
name: Arcobaleno

comments:
Un endroit superbe avec un appartement propre et avec une vue imprenable! 
Alain était super avec ces instructions et réponses aux questions! 
Conseil ce BnB fortement!
name: Arcobaleno

comments: Alain est très à l'écoute, sympathique et réactif !  Le chalet est très bien équipé, beau et propre ! La situation est parfaite même pour se rendre aux télécabine de Villars sans véhicule. Il suffit de prendre le bus qui est situé à 2minutes du chalet. Nous recommandons fortement ce chalet !
name: Arcobaleno

comments: Tolles kleines Chalet für 2 Personen, gute Lage, schöner Ausblick, zweckmäßig eingerichtet. Wir haben es genossen.
name: Arcobaleno

comments: Nous avons passé un excellent séjour au chalet de Corinne. Le logement est décoré avec goût, très cosy, à proximité des grandes villes voisines. Corinne a été bien veillante avec nous, d’une gentillesse remarquable, aux petits soins. Nous recommandons Corinne sans hésiter.

comments: Corinne's chalet is a charming and comfortable place in Vevey countryside area. The whole scenario is wonderful, especially the view of Lake Geneva. Corinne's hospitality is outstanding. We enjoy very much being hers guests.

comments: Un logement au calme, neuf et plein de charme, parfait pour visiter cette région magnifique.

comments:
Accueil exceptionnel 
Lieu calme reposant cocoon
Je reviendrais ça va devenir mon lieu quand je devrais passer la nuit a Lausanne
name: A 15 minutes de Lausanne et du Lavaux....

comments: Wir haben uns vom ersten Moment an absolut wohl gefühlt in dieser fantastischen Unterkunft - es ist sogar noch schöner und stylisher als es auf den Bildern aussieht. Der Kontakt zu Franziska und Bernard war auch ausgezeichnet, beide haben sich äußerst bemüht damit wir uns gut zurechtfinden. Deshalb: alles top, wir werden definitiv wiederkommen!
name: A 15 minutes de Lausanne et du Lavaux....

comments: We had a wonderful stay. The place is perfect for some time out. Beautiful atmosphere with the fireplace and the wooden interior. We can only recommend!
name: A 15 minutes de Lausanne et du Lavaux....

comments: Wir haben uns super wohl gefühlt und können die Unterkunft sehr weiterempfehlen!
name: A 15 minutes de Lausanne et du Lavaux....

comments: Rien à redire... chalet idyllique en pleine nature, design sobre, beau et fonctionnel, feu de cheminée, vue sur les Alpes, sans compter une propreté irréprochable. Je n’ai pas rencontré les propriétaires mais la communication fut fluide, claire et courtoise . Je ne peux que recommander ce magnifique chalet! J’avais besoin de repos et il fut au rendez-vous.
name: A 15 minutes de Lausanne et du Lavaux....

comments:
Une jolie petite maison adjacente à celle de Bernard & Franziska. La pièce principale est spacieuse, chaleureuse et bien décorée. Les alentours et la vue sur les montagnes sont très agréables.
La communication avec Bernard fut facile. Je recommande cet endroit

comments: The chalet is wonderfully located with great views and a stylish interior - the communication was so easy and we had a wonderful time in front of the fire place!
name: A 15 minutes de Lausanne et du Lavaux....

comments: 全五星好评｡房子的位置是在洛桑的一个田野间,如果不自驾想要到达会比较困难｡但正是因为这样,风景才更美｡图文实景完全一致的好屋子,一楼是厨房洗浴一应俱全,二楼是卧室客厅｡房东太太人超级好,虽然我们到达房子已经晚上8点多,但是主人还在等我们｡这栋小房子虽然是房东家,但是房东住在隔壁一栋,是完全分开不会有干扰的｡她帮我们拿行李,仔细的介绍火炉的用法,我真的爱死那个火炉了,超级暖,很有家的温暖感｡房间真的很美,就是住了一天太可惜了,要是行程不赶能多住几天就更好了!谢谢房东太太的招待!
name: A 15 minutes de Lausanne et du Lavaux....

comments: Un havre de paix parfait pour les amoureux de la nature ou les amoureux tout court
name: A 15 minutes de Lausanne et du Lavaux....

comments: the room had everything that is needed, even a guitar ;) and it's super central to everything to Lausanne
name: 1.6 km from Lausanne station, lake view, near park

comments: Roman's appartment is very spacious and its location on the lakeside is magnificent. It is also very convenient as only a few steps from shops and a bus stop. The inside parking space is also great and very convenient if you have a car.  We traveled as a family of four and highly recommend Roman's flat.
name: Appt Central 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath & 1 separate toilet

comments:
Oh wow. This place is AMAZING!! The view is outstanding. We had to keep reminding ourselves that it was real - a huge and expansive view of Lake Geneva and the stunning snow capped mountains on the other side of the lake. The apartment building is right on the water’s edge. Fantastic!!

The apartment is huge with three very large double bedrooms (with comfortable beds, beautiful linen and massive amounts of cupboard space), and three bathrooms (with powerful water pressure). One of the bedrooms has an ensuite and the other two bedrooms and second bathroom are off a corridor. The start of that corridor has a door so people staying in those rooms and using that bathroom can have extra privacy by closing the door at the start of the corridor. The third bathroom adjoins a common area. 

The living area has three large sofas, a tv (with some English speaking channels, which my children were grateful for), and a large dining table. The kitchen is sufficiently equipped with cooking utensils. Wifi is also available. 

We had not been to Switzerland before and didn’t know too much about the area so we were very pleasantly surprised at how fantastic La Tour-de-Peilz is. It’s a stunningly beautiful stroll to Vevey (or just one minute on the train). It’s about three train stops to Montreux. There are two large supermarkets just within a couple of minutes’ walk from the apartment, along with a gym, indoor swimming pool (I assume the gym and pool are open to visitors, but didn’t check), hairdressers, bar, and probably plenty more close by that I didn’t get a chance to discover. 

On the walk to Vevey you pass a couple of museums, a number of children’s play areas, some great coffee shops, and the boat jetty to travel to other locations on the lake. And the view for the whole walk is incredible! We took the boat to Chillon Castle and it was a scenic, beautiful trip. 

Viktor was very helpful. We’d definitely book this place again!
name: Appt Central 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath & 1 separate toilet

comments:
Chez Pépinette devrait vraiment s'appeler comme à la maison. En effet l'appartement est bien équipé (serviettes de toilettes, cuisine fournie pour faire de bon petits plats, gel douche...). Le logement est propre, bien décoré et pleins de petites attentions.

Pépinette est une hôte formidable toujours à l'écoute et disponible.  Pour moi le séjour a été parfait. 

Je recommande ce logement et n'hésiterai pas à revenir.
name: Chez Pépinette

comments:
Au top. Super logement dans un petit coin reculé au calme avec une vue magnifique sur le lac et le mont blanc.
Logement extrêmement agréable avec vraiment tout ce qu'il faut. Merci Pépinette ^^
name: Chez Pépinette

comments:
Fantastique!
Op de begane grond van het prachtige chalet van Pépinette is het appartement gelegen. Er is een fijne tuin met (in de verte) mooi uitzicht op het meer. 
Alles is aanwezig in de gezellig ingerichte ruimte. Er is een ruime keuken en badkamer met heerlijke douche en dubbele wastafel en een knusse woon- en slaapkamer. De gastvrijheid is top, de ruimte zeer schoon. Ideaal gelegen tussen Nyon en Saint-Cergue. Wij zullen Chez Pépinette zeker een volgende keer boeken!
name: Chez Pépinette

comments: Nicola e Deborah con i lori bellissimi figli sono una bella famiglia, accogliente e disponibile
name: Charming room, Lake view, Ideal location

comments: Tres bel appartement fidèle aux photos! L'espace de vie est meme bien plus grand en vrai que sur les photos! Tres agréable d'y séjourner, avec de belles pièces, belle luminosité et belle vue! La terrasse est super et nous aurions aimé en profiter plus. Fabrice est tres disponible et répond rapidement
name: Luxury apartment with lake view (3 bedrooms)

comments: gastfreundlich, sauber und nette menschen, gern wieder
name: Charmant appartement privatif au calme.

comments: Great.
name: morges, chambre neuve dans le centre

comments: Wie bereits von anderen Gästen erwähnt - es ist sehr sauber.
name: morges, chambre neuve dans le centre

comments:
The location of the apartment is excellent! Centre of town, easy to walk to from the metro, and above a delicious Vietnamese restaurant. The beds and bedding are very comfortable, and the furniture itself is in good condition. Samuel has cleverly invested in beds and couches that can convert from twin to queen size, so you can arrange the space to your liking. The rooms are large and have good sized closets as well.   While the apartment can sleep up to 12 people, the kitchen and bathroom are small and the kitchen table can only seat 4 people, so 12 guests would be cosy. 

As a host Samuel was honest and upfront about the two biggest challenges with the apartment - 1) it is a very old building with two flights of stairs leading up to the apartment & there is no elevator; 2) while there one laundry machine that is shared by the building, there is no dryer. This means you either have to hang the laundry in the apartment to dry or take it to the laundromat. I would also add that even though the apartment is a smoke-free zone, many people in the building seem to smoke from their balconies, so if you are sensitive to smoke, this could be bothersome.
name: Grand 3 pièces au cœur de Lausanne

comments: Bon logement dans l'ensemble du fait de sa situation, dame accueillante. Manque de vaisselle, nous étions moins nombreux que la capacité de l'appartement et malgré tout il n'y avait pas assez de couverts/verres. Pas non plus de choses de base comme sel/poivre/huile... Pas de table à manger, seulement une petite pour 4.
name: Grand 3 pièces au cœur de Lausanne

comments: Nous avons été surpris par le logement, mais dans le bon sens ! La vue de la terrasse sur le lac Léman et les montagnes est magnifique, la chambre et les équipements sont superbes. Le lieu est calme mais un petit peu loin des restaurants (il faut prendre la voiture). Machine à café nespresso, bouilloire, microonde à disposition si besoin. C’était top ! Nous y retournerons sans hésiter !
name: Studio privé dans villa, La Tour de Peilz

comments: Le logement de Béatrice est excelent, rien à dire.
name: Studio privé dans villa, La Tour de Peilz

comments: Lovely stay, amazing views from up top. Easy check in and out.
name: Studio privé dans villa, La Tour de Peilz

comments: Nous avons passé un agréable séjour en Suisse, le studio de Béatrice est très accueillant, propre, parfaitement équipé et adapté pour deux personnes ! La vue est magnifique et l’emplacement stratégique pour visiter plusieurs coins de la région.
name: Studio privé dans villa, La Tour de Peilz

comments: Nice studio with wonderful lake and mountain view from the rooftop
name: Studio privé dans villa, La Tour de Peilz

comments:
밤에 옥상에서 보는 뷰가 정말 좋음.
203번 버스가 계속 다녀서 산 중턱에 위치한 것 치고 교통도 편리함.
방에 보드게임, 뭐 기타등등 많은게 있어서 참 좋았음. 굳이 단점 고르자면 밤에 약간 추웠음.

comments: Great place to stay with a pleasant host. Beatrice was nice & have a great understanding to our needs. A little tricky to find the home entrance. But, don’t worry you’ll find it the second time. Also, worth mentioning is the panoramic windows in the room. I loved waking up to the heavenly views of the mountains.

comments: Great studio clean and spacious, Beatrice has added some great touch of care that can be found as you live in this beautiful  space. Highly recommended if you looking of a break from your busy life style....

comments: Bel endroit, osez le petit déjeuner sur le toit face au lac et aux montagnes

comments: Je recommande vivement cet hôte.  La chambre est indépendante et permet d'entrer et sortir sans problème. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut (Wifi, télé, cafetière, bouilloire...). Logement très bien situé entre le lac et la gare et le centre ville. Il est très intéressant de discuter avec Robert et son fils.

comments: As I expected - great value for money.
name: Independent room close to lake of Geneva

comments: Super calmo e aconchegante
name: Independent room close to lake of Geneva

comments: Nadine's apartment was amazing. It was really clean and much bigger than we had expected from the pictures. We traveled with an infant and Nadine provided us with a baby bed, which made our nights so much easier. Nadine was always there when we needed something. The apartment is in a quiet area and close to everything you need. Couldn't have found a better place to stay!! Thank you!!

comments: Très bon séjour dans ce chalet qui offre une vue magnifique. Le Jacuzzi est très appréciable après une journée de ski. Nos hôtes sont très sympathiques et très réactifs. Je recommande vivement pour un week-end hors du temps ;-)

comments: Camille's place is one of these very charming Lausanne apartments with a glimpse on the Lake from the windows. Besides, her place is perfectly situated between the train station and the lake (both in walking distance). Check it out!
name: Grande chambre au centre de Lausanne

comments: Camille is a wonderful host, very responsive and open. The room is beautiful, the bed comfortable and the location of the apartment very convenient. I highly recommend staying here.
name: Grande chambre au centre de Lausanne

comments: Camille and her family are great. Same as the place: very spacious, stylish and centrally located. We arrived late in the evening- tired, wet and hungry. Bit as soon as we entered Camille’s house we felt as being totally at home, it’s precious. Merci!
name: Grande chambre au centre de Lausanne

comments: Raum wirkt ziemlich lieblos (keine Deckenlampe, nur eine Nachttischlampe, sodass man nicht mal abends vernünftig ein Buch lesen kann), Küche ziemlich chaotisch für meinen Geschmack, keine bequeme Sitzmöglichkeit dort; Wohnung roch komisch - insgesamt eher nicht zu empfehlen, ich glaub die Bewertungen sind zu einem guten Teil selbst verfasst.
name: Grande chambre au centre de Lausanne

comments: Joli appartement confortable proche du centre et très sympa :)
name: Beautiful room in the city center

comments:
Appartement très mignon, bien placé, très proche de Lausanne et de toutes commodités.  L’accueil fut très agréable,  Et l’hote est contactable en toute situation avec une très bonne réactivité ! 
 De plus, le routeur wi-fi mis à disposition  est un vrai plus, ainsi que le lit King size. Bon séjour!
name: Préverenges studio with the vineyard view

comments: Dirk的家在Montreux火車站後門出去步行約約8分鐘的小坡上，路口有個噴泉石雕裝飾。火車站後門是由最後個月台向左走，有條路出去，再走出路口向右轉直走到分岔路口，左上石子路約100米就是。Dirk給了我們很好的歡迎和空間，他擁有很好的廚房設備和很舒適的大廳，很有特色的裝修。房屋位置相當不錯， 出路口沿石子路一直下山，十分鐘就到日內瓦湖邊，湖邊商場有很好的超市。沿著湖邊散步是很舒適的，下山拖行李從後門條路去火車站8分鐘。推薦。Dirk give us super warm welcome,the house is nearby the Montreux Sbb,highly recommend .
name: Old Montreux

comments:
Great host and great apartment!
The apartment is very well located, walking distance to downtown, 5 minutes walk to the metro station. The apartment was clean and comfortable. 
The communication was very easy. Pascal was always very helpful and reachable, and responded within few minutes. Most often he was even willing to anticipate our needs. 
On arrival we found public transport cards printed for each one of us.
Highly recommended!
name: 10min gare LausanneTransp.gratuit Card2019/Parking

comments: Pascal’s flat right by the city was delightful. We were able to walk or hop on the close-by metro stop to navigate all over the city. Be prepared to get your steps in climbing to the third floor- more calories burned to eat more chocolate!!

comments:
Ce logement permet d'accueillir dans d'excellentes conditions un couple avec un enfant. Dans notre cas, nous étions 4 adultes et 1 enfant et notre séjour est resté très agréable. En effet,  même si  l'une des deux chambres est relativement petite, elle permet quand même de loger 2 personnes. Quant au canapé-lit dans le séjour, il est très confortable.
L'appartement est situé près d'une route importante, mais il reste silencieux. Il offre une belle vue et est à proximité de la gare et des commerces. Un excellent rapport qualité-prix!

comments: We had a great time. Kiran rents out half of a sizeable house that is decorated with love and dedication. There are two bedrooms and a living area with a sofa bed which allowed our three couples to sleep with adequate privacy. There's a beautiful fireplace as a centerpiece of the living room and firewood is provided (the firewood seems self-produced so if you would like machine-dried and chopped firewood, you might want to bring your own).  There's a plethora of pots, pans and other cooking utensils and we managed to cook several New Year's feast dishes at once without any problems. The house is spotlessly clean and shows no signs of wear or tear. The location is easily accessed and the nature around is beautiful. Unfortunately, a warehouse has been built some distance away, spoiling a perfect view, but the grounds only have neighbours on one side, offering perfect peace and tranquility.  Communication with Kiran was pleasant and quick, and despite Kiran traveling at the time of our arrival, we managed to check ourselves in using a key lockbox with a code. I would recommend this house to everyone looking for a place to gather with friends and explore the stunning Swiss countryside.
name: Beautiful country home, 15 mins from Lausanne.

comments: Du charme et de l’authenticité à l’état pur !
name: Le Mazot

comments:
Chambre luxueuse, spacieuse, chaleureuse, décorée avec soin, chauffé par un magnifique poêle d'époque très efficace. Petite table pour manger à 2 ou 3 maximum. Terrasse agréable avec une belle vue. 
Attention le plafond est bas. L'accès à la cuisine et la SDB se fait par une échelle de meunier. La salle de bain partagée est modeste mais fonctionnel. 
Jean-Louis s'est plié en 4 pour nous servir pendant notre séjour ! Son petit-déjeuner est divin. Si vous le souhaitez il partagera les dîners avec vous. Sa fondue et son "bircher" sont excellents!
name: Le Mazot

comments:
Un accueil très chaleureux accompagné d’un verre de vin local. Jean-Luis est une personne très aimable, au service des visiteurs, très respectueux et plein de bon conseils à donner. Un échange très intéressant et franc avec lui. 
Je conseille le mazot pour passer un week-end romantique dans un cadre féérique et une vue sur toute la vallée. À refaire!

Daniele
name: Le Mazot

comments: Two words for this apartment: HOST and LOCALIZATION, both just AMAZING! The person responsible for the entire building was super kind and helpful as well as the host itself (always on top of any question), and awake to walk two minutes to get in the train station or just cross the station to go anywhere in Lausanne or even to go to the lake is priceless. Would recommend for sure despite a minor problem with the fact that the first day when I first open the door I felt an odor to smoke which I don't appreciate - not really a problem since after opening the window its gone and the apartment is really warm even with the window open at night.
name: A 2 minutes de la gare et du métro

comments:
Nice view, helpful hosts, but...

My husband and I spent here 5 days during the NYE break in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Let's start with the good things first: the view from the house is nice, great location in the Vaud Alps, and the hosts were helpful in suggesting local walks and restaurants. BUT...
* Not a chalet: This property is advertised as a 2-bedroom chalet. A chalet is defined as "a small cabin or house used by holidaymakers." Alas, this definition does not apply here. It is a 1-bedroom basement apartment in the house you see in the photos. It opens to a lower level garden on one side. A family lives upstairs full time. I don't mind renting an in-laws suite, but that's not what we expected.
* Location: Getting there is a pain. Don't use your GPS or (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. The host's instructions are only marginally helpful. 
* Weird privacy: You don't get a key to your apartment, so it stays unlocked all the time. Yet the apartment upstairs is locked, and so is the staircase between the basement and the upstairs--but the key is from the host's side only. Further, the hosts are allowed to enter the basement apartment as often as they like as the only washer and dryer in the house is in your apartment. There are also no curtains in the entire house, so forget sleeping in or being intimate. 
* The house is full of hosts' clothes and belongings, with no designated space for airbnb guests. 
* Dark: The lighting is meant to be stylish, I am guessing, but it's simply a rather dark space. Forget reading in bed.
* Cleanliness: The sofa is appallingly old. Horribly saggy and dusty. The space was dusty overall, with cobwebs on all lamps.
name: Chalet dans la forêt

comments: J'étais très déçu de sa prestation,  avec des indications qui étaient fausses et erronées

comments:
Beautiful and modern apartment. Check-in was very easy and fast. The apartment is a couple of stops away (around 10 minutes away) from the Place de la Riponne with the bus, but if you have got a car you shouldn't worry about the apartment's location at all. We spent 4 nights studying for our finals and there is not a better place to unwind and enjoy the calm of Lausanne than le Mont-sur-Lausanne. Amenities are a plus. The apartment is equipped with a curved, smart TV plus furnished kitchen, coffee machine...

Thank you very much Asnake for the hospitality! We will be recommending this hidden gem for sure ☺️
name:
Addres
Rionzi 37
1052 m’ont sur Lausanne

comments:
Vera s'est montrée disponible et accueillante à notre égard.
La chambre correspond à la description.

Nous recommandons cette adresse 😄

comments:
Vera s'est montrée disponible et accueillante à notre égard.
La chambre correspond à la description.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour comme à la maison. 
Nous recommandons cette adresse
name: Cozy room in cool apartment in Lausanne downtown

comments: Stella was a great host and made me feel very welcome. We had some great chats over a cup of tea when I arrived and helped me make some dinner as I was way too knackered to go back out after I arrived! Comfortable bed and warm house. She was also very accommodating despite the fact that the booking was super last minute.
name: Cozy room in cool apartment in Lausanne downtown

comments: Great Host and amazing chalet. Perfectly equipped and clean. Loved our stay !!
name: A louer chalet familial

comments: Typical wooden chalet in the Swiss Alps. Very clean and very well managed. All you need for cooking meals at home, we even made a winter BBQ. A bottle of local wine and a homemade jam was a very nice wellcome gesture from the owners. The dining room has plenty of sitting, including children's chair. The dining room is separated from the couch area with a huge fireplace. It was a delight to use it. The chalet has a big satelite TV and a music station. Big typical terrace was amazing for the breakfast with a view on the Alps. All bedrooms are spatious and very comfortable. We enjoyed a lot renting this property and recommend it to future guests! :)
name: A louer chalet familial

comments: Chalet très beau et très propre, correspond parfaitement à l'annonce (c'est même plus beau que sur les photos). Florence et son mari sont très gentils et des hôtes parfaits! On a passé un super week-end dans le chalet!
name: A louer chalet familial

comments: We were blown away by the chalet when we arrived, its position, its view, its terraces and gardens. The accommodation is perfect and the extra bed, cot and children’s toys were so useful. We found the whole experience of booking easy, pleasant and great value for money. We are already planning on going again with our family for skiing. Leysin is a great, family friendly location.
name: A louer chalet familial

comments:
Wir waren im Januar 3 Tage in Florences Chalet zu Besuch mit 11 Personen und verbrachten dort wunderbare Tage. Die Lage ist sehr schön – da das Chalet auf einer Seite freistehend ist, sieht man über (im Winter) schneebedeckte Hügel auf imposante Bergketten. Das Dorf ist zu Fuss gut erreichbar – der Spaziergang dauert etwa 20 bis 25 Minuten, je nach Lauftempo.

Im Chalet hat es alles, was das Herz begehrt – die Küche ist super eingerichtet und das ganze Haus hyperfunktional und durchdacht ausgestattet, ohne unnötigen Nippes, aber mit viel Stil. Die Zimmer sind grosszügig und lichtdurchflutet, die Bäder modern und ebenfalls mit genügend Platz. Die beiden Sitzplätze laden zum Sonne tanken ein und sind gemütlich und gepflegt. Ein rundum tolles Chalet mit einer sehr sympathischen Gastgeberin! Wir kehren bestimmt ins schöne Leysin zurück und werden die Gastfreundschaft von Florence gerne wieder geniessen.
name: A louer chalet familial

comments: Sauberes und schönes Chalet
name: A louer chalet familial

comments: Exactement tout ce dont vous aurez besoin pour un séjour en montagne! Une superbe option où petits et grands trouveront leur bonheur. Le rapport qualité-prix y est excellent. Bravo et merci!
name: A louer chalet familial

comments: Gino’s was centrally located, about a 5 min walk from the train station and town centre. The apartment was clean and tidy with a large outdoor area. Gino was very communicative and even allowed us to stay past the check out time. We couldn’t fault our stay, however it would have been nice if we were supplied with coffee pods and milk.
name: Beautiful Vevey

comments: Très bon accueil, je recommande
name: Fullness

comments: Mon premier airbnb, ça mettre le bar haut pour les suivants! Très bon accueil, tout confort que je peux souhaiter, prix très raisonable.
name: Fullness

comments: A beautifully renovated old country house combined with antique furniture and great hospitality.
name: Fullness

comments: el alojamiento de alex ,,, es muy confortable ,,,tranquilo y esta muy bien equipado ,,y cerquita del centro ,,,lo recomiendo  si vais a visitar Vevey que es una ciudad pequeña pero preciosa,,,

comments: Great place! Perfect location near the lake.
name: 2 Rooms Appartment 10 min walk from the Lake

comments: Appartement très agréable, idéalement placé, avec une vue donnant sur tout Lausanne ! Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, merci pour tout !

comments:
Très joli appartement situé hypercentre avec une vue à 180° sur les superbes montagnes et lac Léman !
Il manque juste d'un placard pour les vêtements et .. de casseroles pour la cuisine !
name: 2 pièces au centre de Lausanne avec vue et balcon

comments:
Vevey is a beautiful scenic town, the apartment is perfectly situated to explore and take in the views. 

We stayed over New Year and throughly enjoyed watching the fireworks on the lake and enjoying the festivities around town.

Hans was a fantastic host, welcoming, quick to respond and also provided us with an informative list of restaurants and activities in the area.

I would recommend this property to anyone- 5 star stay.

Thank you.
name: Duplex on the Lake

comments: Fantastic terrasse, with views of the mountains majestically surrounding the lake. An excellent place to spend time at home and visit the area.
name: Duplex on the Lake

comments:
HJ has provided a detailed information on how to check in and very responsive during our stay at his house.

All the things are provided include kitchenware, oil and condiments etc. 

Total there are 3 rooms, one room is a suite that has 1 king size bed, 1 queen size bed and a day bed (can accommodate at least 4 pax in the suite) and a huge toilet with tub, shower and toilet area. But during winter the suite can be quite cold. 2 more rooms are on the 2nd floor, 1 is a king size bed and the other is a single size bed and a toilet is also on the 2nd floor.

The most amazing part is the terrace with a non blocking view of the lake and we also manage to catch 20 mins of fireworks during new year day at the terrace.
name: Duplex on the Lake

comments: I have lived in Vevey previously and visit frequently for work. This is place is unique as it has the best location in the old town right in front of the lake. Very charming place and HJ is an excellent host!
name: Duplex on the Lake

comments: Great flat, amazing terrace with a direct view on the lake. Couldn’t be better located ! Hans-Jürg is very nice and made himself available to welcome us, which we appreciated. Perfect for 5-6 people - we didn’t want to leave !
name: Duplex on the Lake

comments: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this beautiful location and would have been content to spend all day soaking up the view from the kitchen and dining area. The location is amazing - with the lake and old town on the door step. There are numerous bakeries for breakfast treats and a good Coop in easy walking distance. There are also lots of restaurants, however, we preferred to cook and enjoy the view! The property is in the pedestrianised part of town and has no parking, but luggage and people can be dropped off at the door and there is parking at a reasonable price a few minutes walk away. If ever in the area again, we would certainly stay again.
name: Duplex on the Lake

comments:
Dimitra est une hôte d'une communication très facile, Cordiale, de bon accueil et attentionnée au confort des voyageurs.
L'appartement est bien placé, propre et conforme au descriptif. Idéal pour un séjour à Lausanne !
Nous recommandons vivement Dimitra et Merci !

comments: Logement spacieux et très bien situé
name: Appartement à 5mn de la gare, Vue sur le lac!

comments:

comments: Le Duplex se situe à proximité à pied des pistes et des télécabines. Le duplex est très bien agencé avec 4 vraies chambres et suffisamment de salles d'eau / SDB pour un séjour entre amis ou en famille. Un salon, salle a manger et cuisine très cosy et agréables avec un feu de cheminée. Nous garderons un excellent souvenir de ce séjour. Michèle, notre hôte, a fait preuve d'une grande réactivité et de beaucoup d'attention pour nous permettre de passer un excellent moment. Un grand merci encore.
name: Magnifique duplex à Villars sur Ollon

comments: The actual accomodation looks even more stunning than on the pictures! Michèle was the nicest host we could have asked for. She didn‘t hesitate to rush to our help when having troubles with the oven. The location is some kind of gated community (therefore slightly remote), but still a 5min car ride away from the village. We very much enjoyed our stay here and are recommending it warmly.
name: Magnifique duplex à Villars sur Ollon

comments: Thanks a lot, much better than the pictures and very well located ! See you next year.
name: Magnifique duplex à Villars sur Ollon

comments: Super accueil de la part de Sofy, très arrangeante. Appartement bien localisé, très propre.

comments:
Sofy's place was a great choice for staying in Lausanne. It was walking distance (1-2Km) from most places you would like to visit. There were stores right outside her place if you want to grab a quick bite to eat or go grocery shopping.
Sofy was also extremely accommodating with a very flexible checking and checkout schedule and made sure we had everything we needed for our stay. The whole process was very simple and straight forward. I would highly recommend her place to anyone visiting Lausanne.
name: Studio au cœur de tout

comments: The flat is located not far from the city center (15 mins by foot / 10 mins by bus), two groceries and a bus stop are just around the corner. The apartment is quite small, but very lovely and clean. The host Sofy was really friendly. Recommend this place.

comments: 意外预定到了这家，既是民宿也是餐厅也是酒吧，不知道哪个是主人，每一位都很热情好客。而且运气很好遇到有人跟我们换房间，给了我们一个带独立卫生间的房间，店员很感激我们的“合作态度”，送了我们甜品，很地道。餐厅的食物很新鲜，味道很赞；房间很舒适很有特色很干净，视野很开阔；交通是另一大特色，乘坐登山小火车从蒙特勒始发，终点站就是，沿途景色迷人，可以俯瞰蒙特勒老城街景，很不错的体验，下车500米就到。下次来还会选择这里。
name: Chambre 1-2 personne, vue sur le lac Léman/Alpes

comments: Le logement de Martine est très propre, fonctionnel, silencieux, bien situé (à côté d'un resto succulent!...en autre...Proche de la Baie de Montreux...) . RIEN A DIRE..Que du bonheur...Martine est une personne généreuse, souriante, (Website hidden by Airbnb) RECOMMANDE!
name: Grand studio proche du lac

comments: Tout est parfait pour y séjourner quelques jours. L'appartement est dans un état irréprochable avec beaucoup de petites attentions et un accueil très chaleureux de Martine. Il est, de plus, très bien placé par rapport à la gare notamment.
name: Grand studio proche du lac

comments: Très belle vue et bon emplacement. Mais au prix que coûte la nuit nous nous attendions à un peu plus d’effort sur les services. Dans la cuisine sel poivre pas plus, il y a un four mais pas de papier cuisson ni de plat allant au four, très peu d’ustensiles donc cuisine pratiquement inutilisable. Les deux stores de la chambre étaient cassés ce qui nous a au final empêché de profiter pleinement de la vue. Et aucun store ni rideau dans le salon qui sert aussi de chambre donc assez dérangeant. Les deux seuls fois où j’ai posé une question aux hôtes j’ai dû relancer deux fois pour avoir une réponse.
name: Appt Central 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath - Lake View

comments: Great place, with fantastic 270 degree view of the lake. Fantastic location in the center, next to the casino of Montreux. Only annoying thing is the noise from the casino guests and music during the weekend, but that's the price you pay for being in the middle of the action I guess ;-)
name: Appt Central 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath - Lake View

comments: Nice place with a great view and quiet neighbors. Not as posh as the pictures but that was okay. Kitchen has only the very basic items for preparing meals. Several grocery shops are nearby. Appreciated that coffee was provided. Nice that someone welcomes you to show you around. So many places now only have a lockbox. The location is very central and an easy walk to the train stetion.
name: Appt Central 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath - Lake View

comments: Sweet couple and amazing room with all you need
name: Cosy room

comments: I really enjoyed my stay, even if it was only for one night. I was impressed by the hospitality and I found everything I needed during my stay and more. I recommend this place and I would happily go back.
name: Cosy room

comments: The apartment is really nice and clean with everything you need and it is near to city center. Ewa is a friendly host, really recommended!
name:
Cozy Rooftop Apartment
Lausanne City Center.

comments: It was wonderful, good place, good location and Ewa is helpful.
name:
Cozy Rooftop Apartment
Lausanne City Center.

comments: Ewa is a delightful host. Her flat is very comfortable and is centrally located. I had everything I needed for a perfect weekend in Lausanne.
name:
Cozy Rooftop Apartment
Lausanne City Center.

comments:
Ewa was a great hostess. She answered questions in a short time. She responded to our needs and made our stay in Lausanne very pleasant.

The apartment is very central. Bars, restaurants and public transport are within walking distance. It is nevertheless quiet. Everything you need is available and the apartment is very comfortable.
name:
Cozy Rooftop Apartment
Lausanne City Center.

comments: Amazing location, great host!  Had a wonderful time and will be sure to rent again in the future!
name: Appartement de 3.5 pièces avec vue panoramique

comments:
If you’re hesitating to book this place, dont, cause it’s the most amazing Airbnb that I’ve stay at. Alla was very hospitable in welcoming us to her apartment and gave us recommendations on where to eat, which btw, was amazing! Views was amazing and the apartment came equipped with everything we needed! However, I do recommend this apartment only for those who drive cause it’s a bit out of the way. But hey, you win some you lose some right? 

P.s. (Hidden by Airbnb) maps redirected us to a long route with a very narrow bridge to cross. Suggest coming from montreux town (by the water) than through the forest if you’re driving a big car!
name: Le paradis sur la riviera

comments: Montreux is one of the most picturesque places on Earth, and in these apartments you will have the first row with a view of it.
name: Le paradis sur la riviera

comments: The home was super stylish and very well equipped! The views were absolutely stunning! Anthony and Alla were amazing hosts!
name: Le paradis sur la riviera

comments: Proche de Montreux, un endroit très reposant.
name: Le paradis sur la riviera

comments: Superbe appart, je recommande :)
name: Le paradis sur la riviera

comments: Beautiful home with excellent view
name: Le paradis sur la riviera

comments: Fantástico lugar para deleitarse tanto de las vistas exteriores como de las interiores por su bonita decoración, es un lugar para enamorarse...
name: Le paradis sur la riviera

comments: Everything was perfect, from the view and the location to the amenities and Alla and Anthony’s hospitality. They were extremely helpful and showed us everything we might need/use while checking in. They filled the fridge with breakfast food like cheese, eggs, milk, juice etc. The kitchen was FULLY equipped - anything you can think of - which enabled us to cook our own dinner and chill on the sofa with the big screen TV. The place is sparkling clean, too. Although we had foggy weather during our stay, you could see the snowy mountains from the big terrace on the top floor. We will definitely be back at this amazing house!
name: Le paradis sur la riviera

comments: This house offers all you wish for and the host is super friendly. I can only recommend it!
name: Beach house, garden, fireplace, kayaks, steam bath

comments: Our stay at Victoria's place was perfect. She gave us a very warm welcome and a helpful introduction to everything. She was totally flexible with the check-in and check-out time. The house is super clean, really cosy and a perfect location either to relax and enjoy the area or to have a workshop with your business partner while overlooking the beautiful lake. We highly recommend the beach house for a stay and wish Victoria and her husband all the best.
name: Beach house, garden, fireplace, kayaks, steam bath

comments: Wunderschöner Blick! Sehr gemütliches Haus!
name: Beach house, garden, fireplace, kayaks, steam bath

comments: Victoria’s place is perfect for families, business travelers, or anyone wanting to visit the beautiful city. The location is within driving distance to Prilly, Zurich, and Evian France. The home is beautifully decorated and has all the essentials! There is plenty of space in this home for a group of people. The view outside the back doors is breathtaking. There are a lot of stairs so if you aren’t able to use stairs you can utilize the elevator outside the home. We would certainly stay here again! It would be nice to stay in a warmer season. Thanks for your hospitality and quick responses, Victoria!
name: Beach house, garden, fireplace, kayaks, steam bath

comments:
Excellent apartment for up to 5-6 persons with large balcony with great view into the Rhone valley and central location in Villars. 

The apartment has three bedrooms, two with two separate beds and one with queen bed. There are two bathrooms (one with shower/tub and one shower) and separate guest toilet. The bedrooms have plenty of wardrobes for storage. The interior is a bit old style with lots of brown but in good condition.

The same for the kitchen, which has everything you need (oven, dishwasher, boiler, etc).

The area around the apartment is very nice and quiet, in the old part of Villars amongst typical Swiss-style chalets. You can walk up the hill to the main street of Villars in 5-10 mins. 

In all I can highly recommend staying in this apartmemt for a great Swiss mountain experience.
name: Magical Villars Mountain Apartment

comments: Perfect location if you wish to stay in Villars! Great value for money...
name: Magical Villars Mountain Apartment

comments: Very nice house. I recommend definitely!
name: Magical Villars Mountain Apartment

comments: We staid in the appartment with our family for a week and we enjoyed it very much. The appartment was great, clean, with alot of ammenities, spacious Swiss style interiour with a beautifull fire place, and a huge balcony with beautifull views on the mountains. The location was also perfect, just a couple of min walking to the centre/train station or down the road to the thermal centre.  Also quick responses to any questions we had. We hope to visit again in the future!
name: Magical Villars Mountain Apartment

comments: 客厅很宽松,房间光线足方正,楼层位置很好,有足够大的阳台,暖气很好,厨房设备中洗碗机稍旧,非常好的房子,订房一星期后再订十天｡

comments: A fantastic place to stay. The views are outstanding. The communication was very quick. The actual place was clean, very well equipped, modern and comfy.

comments: My girlfriend and I stayed here for a few days , and absolutely loved it. If you thought the pictures were nice, wait till you get there. The apartment is beautifully decorated and has all the amenities you would need. The location is super close to downtown Montreux, and very easy access by car from wherever you are traveling. 5/5, will stay here again.
name: Lake View - 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath

comments: Christine est une hôte très accueillante, disponible et chaleureuse. L’appartement est grand, confortable, très bien chauffé et très très bien équipé, la vue du lac en première ligne est magique! La petite station de train est à 30s à pieds, très pratique pour se rendre rapidement à Lausanne / Genève / vevey etc. Nous avons passé un séjour de 7 jours vraiment génial et dépaysant chez Christine sans jamais manquer de rien. Je recommande sans hésiter!

comments:
Spacious home in a wonderful location for exploring the city of Montreux. This is a retreat! Great place

comments: Yury was an excellent communicator with very prompt responses. The views from his home are spectacular. The pictures don’t give the beautiful views justice. The house was spacious for our group during the Youth Olympics in Lausanne. You can walk to the train station in less than 10 minutes. It is hilly. We would recommend comfy shoes. We did rent a car and were grateful for the parking spots. We were 35 minutes from skiing. Yury made great recommendations for ski slopes.

comments: L'appartement est super bien équipé, très confortable, au calme avec une splendide vue. comments: Nous avons passés quelques jours dans le chalet de Carol. La décoration y est chaleureuse et la cheminée égaye les soirées. La petite cuisine est bien équipée et Carol a toujours été disponible pour répondre à nos questions. Je recommande cette adresse à toutes les personnes qui cherchent un chalet typique. Il était également agréable de pouvoir faire des courses sans avoir à prendre de voiture grâce au magasin et à la boucherie qui se trouvent à 2 minutes à pied du chalet.

comments: Very cosy chalet with nice privat sauna in a pretty old village near the skiarea. Perfekt for skiholidays!

comments: Jessica's place is located very conveniently in Gland town centre, close to amenities, 10 minutes walk from station, and only 5-10 minutes walk to the IUCN centre where most offices are located. She is very communicative and responsive. The room is sparkling clean, with warm blanket, fresh flower every few days, and two friendly cats. The room is spacious and bright with nice corner to work and another corner to relax watching cable TV. Jessica is also a great cook, I got a taste of her super delicious creme caramel. I can highly recommend!
name: Cosy, bright and spacious room in Gland

comments:

Max est aussi très disponible. 
Je recommande l'appartement de Max, qu'elles que soient les raisons de votre venue à Lausanne. 
Laurent

comments: Un appartement bien placé, avec accès simple et facile, sobre et fonctionnel.

comments: Der Gastgeber hat direkt nach der Buchung alle Angaben geschickt, worauf man keine Fragen mehr hatte, was perfekt ist! Alle Vorbereitungen sehr durchdacht. Die Wohnung ist etwas hellhörig, was uns jedoch nicht gestört hat, da wir viel unterwegs waren. Die Wohnung ist sehr zentral und bietet einen kurzen Fussweg zu den Öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln. Wir könnten uns auf jeden Fall vorstellen wieder zu kommen!
name: 029 Beautiful apartment Lausanne private parking

comments: Très bon appartement. Bien situé et équipé.
name: 029 Beautiful apartment Lausanne private parking

comments:
Unsere Zeit mit 2 Nächten in Lausanne war sehr schnell vorbei. Wir haben aber vieles in Lausanne gesehen. Mit unserem Auto ( ca. 15 Minuten ) zum war für uns kein Problem. Die Wohnung war sehr gut. Wir waren mit unseren Kinder (2) sehr zufrieden. Die Betten waren ausreichend bequem. 
Kostenloser Parkplatz - sehr geholfen. 
Ohne Aufzug nach oben zu gehen - kein Problem, ein paar Kilogramm runter nach dem Silvester auch als Pflicht gewesen. 
Ankommen mit dem Auto war sehr einfach, als wir eine Video-Instruktion vom Gastgeber bekommen. 
Alles gut gewesen. 
Danke.
name: 029 Beautiful apartment Lausanne private parking

comments: Parfaitement situé et rapport qualité prix exceptionnel. Fortement recommandé
name: 029 Beautiful apartment Lausanne private parking

comments:
Un appartement spacieux très agréable à 2 pas du métro. 
Place idéale pour visiter Lausanne. 
A savoir 4ème étage sans ascenseur, pour famille en forme
name: 029 Beautiful apartment Lausanne private parking

Emplacement parfait, vue sublime, le chalet a été hautement apprécié par notre groupe de 12 amis. Spacieux, avec une cuisine complètement équipée, on y a passé 4 jours magnifiques, convivial et un nouvel an au top!
Merci Nicholas pour tout, c'était top!
name: Spacious Chalet for families or business trips

comments: Super séjour à 11 dans le chalet de Nicholas ! Un jour de Sky a Leysin tout près et l’autre sur le glacier (moins de 30 minutes de voiture)
name: Spacious Chalet for families or business trips

comments: Très beau chalet, spacieux et bien placé. Accueille chaleureuse et sympathique. Nous avons passé un beau séjour et n’hésiterons pas à revenir.
name: Spacious Chalet for families or business trips

comments:
Wir waren eine Gruppe von 9 Personen und hatten ein paar schöne Tage über Silvester in Leysin. Es hat alles wunderbar geklappt. Die  Kommunikation mit Nicholas verlief reibungslos und von seiner Mutter wurden wir herzlichst begrüßt. Der Ausblick vom Chalet auf die Berge war ein absoluter Traum, dieses zauberhafte Plätzchen ist einfach zum verlieben. ;)
Die Zimmer waren sehr sauber und das Haus hat alles was man braucht. Insbesondere die Küche ist sehr gut ausgestattet.
Alles in allem auf jeden Fall eine Reise wert. Wir können die Unterkunft definitiv weiterempfehlen. Nochmal vielen Dank an die Gastgeber!
name: Spacious Chalet for families or business trips

comments: Great place with good facilities and great view - ideal for family’s and suitable for children.
name: Spacious Chalet for families or business trips

comments: The Chalet is really special for families. The atmosphere is very cozy and accommodate everyone properly. The house is well equipped and suits very well for kids. The view is stunning and you can enjoy Leysin a lot because is well located. The communication with Nicholas was good and he answered every doubt we had in a good time. I recommend the place and hope will return in the future.
name: Spacious Chalet for families or business trips

comments: Der Aufenthalt im Chalet war ein einziger Traum. Top-Lage und super gepflegt - wir haben uns hier richtig wohlgefühlt. Nur paar Minuten zu Fuß erreicht man den Lift für die Skiabfahrt. Abends kann man sich am offenen Kamin aufwärmen und eine entspannte Zeit mit Freunden und Familie verbringen. Können es wärmstens weiterempfehlen!
name: Spacious Chalet for families or business trips

comments: The place is large, modern kitchen, a bit far from the town but easily accessible by car

Le lieu est parfait pour se détendre à deux ou en famille et nous y reviendrons avec plaisir. Le petit plus: la fromagerie à côté avec son distributeur 24/24 permettant un séjour très Suisse et gourmand!

comments: La pasamos super bien en lo de Merce! La habitación es super cómoda. La vista hacia el lago y las montañas es realmente bellísima. La comunicación con Merce fue excelente desde el principio. Ella es muy agradable y simpática. Conversamos muchísimo y compartimos la cena. La recomiendo 100%.  El lugar es ideal para moverse en auto a ciudades cercanas. Es un pueblo pequeño pero tiene todo cerca (supermercado, panadería, estación de tren). Merce es Genial! Muy amable y atenta.

name: Perfect location! close to gare & next to Flon

comments:
Charming flat very close to the city centre, but extremely quiet. A beautiful place to stay with high ceilings, huge windows, a really comfortable bedroom and a cosy little kitchen with anything you might need.
Apart from a small issue we had with the hot water (the building has a shared hot water system, so sometimes there is no hot water in the evenings, but after exchanging a couple of messages with Leticia she explained it to us, so we managed to plan accordingly), everything else was perfect.
It is in an old building, but very well maintained and very stylishly furnished with simple, yet elegant and very comfortable furniture. The plants and flowers in all windows were another nice touch (I really like flowers), so everything just adds to making this flat feel like home. 
There isn't much to do in the immediate area, but there is a supermarket just down the road, and a metro station just around the corner. The reality is that the flat is so close to both Flon and the central station, that you don't actually need to take the metro. If you feel like exploring the city on foot, you really can do it with this as a base. Being close to Flon also means that you don't need to worry about catching the last metro or the pajama bus to get back home after a Friday or Saturday night out (and the neighbourhood feels very safe, so there is no need to worry about walking back in the middle of the night). 
Leticia was also very responsive to our messages, so even though we didn't meet, it felt that she was always there for whatever we might needed. 
A very good experience overall. Definitely recommend it.
name: Perfect location! close to gare & next to Flon

comments: Good!
name: Ski, Jazz and Zen !

comments:
It's a great place, easy to go by foot to the center where all the shops and the border of the lake are located. The apartment is modern, super clean, very well equipped with a kitchen with full amenities. Everything you'd need for a short or longer stay!

Appart from the occasional train that passes at the back of the building, the place is quiet and we slept well. Oh, and you might want to open the window at night because it's suuuuuper hot even with the heating turned off. However overheated spaces in the winter are a common thing in Switzerland - one of those cultural things I guess :-)

There are two little niggles that we've experienced. First one is if you have a car. The advert says it's possible to rent a parking space in the garage. However that was not the case as it was already rented out when we arrived. Please note it's just a possibility that has to be checked and confirmed, not a certainty. There's plenty to park all around, but it's all blue (free) zones up to max. 3h, or paid parking between max 1h. and max 3h (only during the day between 7AM to 7PM, the night is free everywhere with no time limit). So it's a bit of a hassle as you have to move your car and park elsewhere when the time expires. Fines are a hefty 40 CHF. Otherwise there's an underground car park 5 min on foot, but it's 35 CHF a day.

The second thing is that it's not possible to park close to the entrance of the building, so if you have lots of (heavy) luggage, be advised. You can however temporarily park your car down the courtyard by going round back of the building, just for unloading quickly, but there are a few stairs involved in getting to the building.

If you're only on foot, it's a problem you won't have and your experience will be great! :-)

Also, for those who wonder, the bed is 140x200cm.

Highly recommended.
name: Ski, Jazz and Zen !

comments: L'appartement de Raymond est juste sublime, tout comme la vue sur le lac Léman qui est incroyable (22ème étage sur 23). Quel plaisir de se réveiller les matins dans de telles conditions. Les photographies présentes sur le site sont tout à fait conformes à la réalité. Tous les commerces sont accessibles à pied, dont un grand centre commercial à deux pas. L'équipement global de l'appartement est très correct, la déco est design. Raymond est extrêmement réactif et prévenant. Bref, je recommande cet endroit sans hésiter qui possède un rapport qualité prix excellent.
name: Superbe appartement meublé de 4 pièces

comments: Lovely spot for a nice weekend getaway.
name: Appartement de vacances à la montagne

comments: We stayed here for 3 weeks over the Christmas and New Year season. It was clean, spacious and nicely decorated to make it feel like a home away from home. Everything was well equipped and we did not need anything - it as all there! We prepared all our meals and the Coop supermarket was conveniently located. We walked a lot and thoroughly enjoyed the beautiful scenery and fresh air, but if you are not keen on walking and lots of exercise then it is probably best to have a car. Cath and Allen are great hosts that respected our privacy, but were available all the time. We would certainly want to return to this beautiful place and strongly recommend this for anyone that want to experience the beauty of Switzerland and an adventure-filled holiday.
name: Appartement de vacances à la montagne

comments: Catherine nous a accueilli chaleureusement malgré notre arrivée tardive. L'appartement est joli, spacieux pour 4 personnes, cosy et agréable. Il donne envie d'y rester pour se reposer et profiter de la région. Il est bien équipé et se situe tout prêt des Diablerets.

comments:
Fantastic flat, this is very accommodating for 2-3 people. There is plenty of parking space too.

We initially found the place a little chilly and a few startling sounds from the boiler, but it all adds to the rustic charm! The duvet were warm and made sleep comfortable.

We didn’t get to use the kitchen apart from making coffee.

And I should mention that the plugs provided (they look a little odd btw, at first I had no idea what they were, but very elegant) are all Swiss/French compatible. So do bring your adapter if needed.

I look forward to returning to the region!

comments: Armand was the perfect host. Even though he couldn’t be there to meet us in person he gave us clear and detailed instructions regarding our stay in his flat. The place was a clean, tidy and comfortable space to live in and close by to central Lausanne. The transport links were excellent and Armand provided us with lots of helpful recommendations for places to eat, drink and socialise. Only 10 minutes walk from the cathedral, we spent New Year with lively crowds witnessing the annual “embrasement” and enjoyed every minute of our stay. Merci Beaucoup! From Marco and Jay

comments: Magnifique & grande maison avec charme, on s’y sent bien au coin du feu. Jolie vue sur Yverdon-les-Bains. Les chambres sont spacieuses, l’ideal pour un séjour entre amis ou en famille. Elle est isolée et de ce fait très calme.
