comments: Charmantes älteres Haus in einer einmaligen, sehr ruhigen Lage mit toller Aussicht. Wir waren eine Gruppe von 8 Erwachsenen und hatten Platz zu genüge. Man findet in der Unterkunft alles, was man für einen angenehmen Aufenthalt benötigt. Das Haus ist sehr zu empfehlen!

comments: This is a cozy and well equipped apartment, with a great view of the valley below. There are only a few houses around, so the neighborhood is very quiet. The Villars train station is reachable by foot in about 10 minutes, but I wouldn't recommend it while carrying ski equipment. Car access is easy, and the covered garage is compact, but we managed to park a van there.
name: Barrold's Alpine Retreat, Villars-sur-Ollon

comments:
Die Wohnung könnte nicht besser gelegen sein. Der Bahnhof Villars befindet sich direkt nebenan und wenn die Schneeverhältnisse stimmen kann man mit den Ski bis fast vors Haus fahren.

Die Küche ist mittelmässig eingerichtet, mit etwas Improvisation klappt das aber alles gut.

Die Kommunikation war top, Check-In und -Out findet im ca 1.5km entfernten Chesière statt und dauerte sehr kurz.
name: Apartment Zenith in Villars

comments: Great little apartment in an excellent location close to ski lift, shops and centre of town. Nicely decorated although could do with a few more items, such as hairdryers, better coffee machine, and extension wires or adapters for plugs. Would definitely come back

comments: Senad’s stunning home, just 10 minutes from Lausanne, was so very comfortable for our family trip with 8 people including Grandpa and teenage kids. Senad was very responsive in his communications and all of our needs were met- including an excellent recommendation for dinner.  Highly recommended!

comments: Max is a great host who is always there if you need him.

comments: My family of 6 stayed here for 8 nights mid January. Weather was mid 40s and sunny. Max was a great host! He answered me as quick as he could about questions from the time I was searching the site until after we left. Location is 15 minutes from downtown Lausanne and an hour from Geneva or Montreaux. There is a 5-10 minute walk to a bus stop at the end of the road that you can try and figure out the public transportation to and from if needed but you will need a car or taxi to get you to the house from an airport. The view is beautiful from the patio and the house is mostly windows so you get beautiful views from everywhere. The patio has a huge sliding glass door wall which is amazing. The window shades in each room are amazing and so cool. There’s a little remote that you can lift or lower them to block out the light if you want to sleep in or leave open if you want to wake up with the sun. Does come with a kitchen, small fridge, coffee maker, pots/pans, and dishes. Beds are good sized, may be a little hard depending on what you’re used to. Everything was clean when we checked in. There is a garage if you want to park your car/rental and walk right into the house. The showers are spacious, the upstairs one you can even crack the window in it while you shower for some fresh mountain air and ventilation. 10/10 would rent it again!
name: 030 Incredible House, 10 minutes from Lausanne.

comments:
We (party of 5) can only strongly recommend this house !
It is ideally situated for several trips within 45mins driving around to the most beautiful spots in Switzerland.
The house itself is very well equipped, hyper-clean, and ideal for stays in both winter (the open fire in the living room - wood is provided) and summer (big terrace in the sun).
The host, Anne-Laure, is most friendly, and very responsive in case of issues (but we did not have any...). She was so friendly to arrange for a breakfast the next morning, when we arrived the day before.
We 'll come back for sure !

comments: Karoline provided a very quick response, with excellent communication. The flat is located about 10 by bus or 15 minutes walking from the Renens train station - convenient for UNIL / EPFL. The flat is small, however nicely decorated and very clean. The bed is king size and comfortable, with fluffy pillows. Karoline is very nice, however we only met briefly - but she was available via phone and her roommate offered support. One small note is that at the time of my stay, there was no lock on either the bathroom or bedroom door. Excellent value for the price - and I have stayed in several AirBnB's in the Renen area.
name: BELLE CHAMBRE PRIVÉE/ NICE PRIVATE ROOM

comments:

comments: We booked this apartment for 10 days in Lausanne. As we liked the web presentation of this apart, and as the communication with our host was ok, we were looking forward to our stay. The apartment however didn't meet our expectations at all. Trash left in the kitchen, personal stuff everywhere, one very sparingly furnished bedroom with a tiny bed for a couple ( NO Queen bed ) , just a rack to hang up our clothes, some drawers, the bedroom shown on the website was locked, used towels in the bathroom, with personal stuff all around. We found  CHF 10 on the kitchen table in order to buy new trash bags. We preferred not to stay in this apart, as we didn't feel comfortable at all. We previously had a  very good experience with airbnb,  but this time we felt very disappointed.
name: 70m2 Private Apartment: Queen bed + 1.5 bath

comments:
Stephane is a really nice guy. The house is clean. The room is big. There is a TV, a desk, a chair, water cattle, a capsule coffee machine and a bed for two. I lived there in winter and feel the heater is warm. The view outside the window is great. You can see the mountains and the lake. The flat is on the eighth floor and there are two lifts in the building.

The location is good. The supermarket and bus station and metro are all within walking distance.

Two things should be aware of. Firstly, there is a cat. She might want your attention and rub your legs. If you are allergic to cat hair, be careful.

Secondly, there is No microwave in his house.
name: Chambre dans  appartement 5 min EPFL en  metro

comments: Todo perfecto, el departamento impecable, la ubicación inmejorable.

comments:
Appartement agréable, avec une vue magnifique à deux pas du centre ville. 
Séjourner à 4 dans l'appartement nécessite une bonne entente, vu le peu de place qui reste une fois les lits en position "nuit".

comments: The host canceled this reservation 336 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

comments:
Hazeline's cottage in Saint-Prex is charmingly quaint and very, very cozy. It is located within the "city walls", as it were, and amid beautiful surroundings. Hazeline's description of the cottage on Airbnb is very accurate, and Hazeline herself proved to be a wonderful host: personable, welcoming, helpful,  and very generous.

My daughter and I enjoyed our stay immensely, and we hope to be able to return for a new visit someday soon.
name: The Cottage in Saint-Prex

comments: Gracious host in a beautiful area of Switzerland.  Will be back!
name: The Cottage in Saint-Prex

comments: Appartement très sympa et bien situé. Hazeline est très accueillante et arrangente, je recommande vivement !
name: The Cottage in Saint-Prex

comments: Bel appartement, un peu excentré mais proche des transports.
name: Ideal Family

comments: Nice chalet, nice place, nice welcome. We stayed 4 nights and enjoyed our time there. Sure we will meet it again, hoping there will be more snow to enjoy skiing!
name: Contemporary Swiss chalet for all seasons

comments:
This central appartment in Villars is great. We stayed with our kids  
Very conveniently situated, only 5 minutes from train station where you can rent lockers to store your skis and boards.
The Migros market is next door, the ski school is on the ground floor.
Beds are comfortable and there is a lot of space. 
We were very well welcomed and communication was fluent. I recommend.
name: Daphne 11B, Swiss Alps, Villars sur Ollon, Vaud

comments:
Very well located.
We enjoyed to stay in this clean and spacious home.
Appreciated especially the welcome.
name: Daphne 11B, Swiss Alps, Villars sur Ollon, Vaud

comments:
The apparent is very large with a nice leaving room. Large than it looks at the photos. We found everything needed, the kitchen is well equipped.
Hosting was great!
name: Daphne 11B, Swiss Alps, Villars sur Ollon, Vaud

comments: Super logement, très pratique et bien situé au centre du village.
name: Daphne 11B, Swiss Alps, Villars sur Ollon, Vaud

comments: Excellent !! Notre séjour chez Jean Da était vraiment parfait !! Le studio est vraiment bien placé si vous êtes véhiculé, à proximité du lac de Neuchatel et pas si loin du Lac Léman, des villes de Bern, Gruyère et Lausanne. Vous trouverez une superbe laiterie juste à côtés pour profiter d un fromage suisse de qualité pour des soirées fondue typique (appareil fourni dans le studio) !! Vraiment un bel endroit à la campagne avec une vue exceptionnelle sur le lac de Neuchatel et les Alpes ;) Hôtes très sympathiques et chaleureux :)
name: Vacances détendues en campagne et  au bord du lac

comments: Jean-Da est très gentil, sont logement est un parfait pied à terre dans la région. La cuisine est également bien équipé ! MERCI
name: Vacances détendues en campagne et  au bord du lac

comments:
Accueil parfait même sans rencontrer notre hôte (système de clé accessible très pratique).
Tout était en ordre et nous avons apprécié fruits, thé et café à disposition.
Très confortable !
name: Vacances détendues en campagne et  au bord du lac

comments: Pour notre 2e arrêt dans ce studio sur la route des vacances, nous avons été très satisfaits de la prestation de ce studio. Situé non loin de l’autoroute, parfait pour une halte de courte durée. L’entrée dans l’appartement est très simple, très propre, bien équipé et très calme. Une adresse à recommander.
name: Vacances détendues en campagne et  au bord du lac

comments: Logement très chaleureux, spacieux et très confortable. Max est un hôte super chaleureux et très arrangent je recommande fortement !
name: 050 Wonderful views, 10 min. from Lausanne&Parking

comments:
El apartamento es como se describe. Está ubicado aprox a unos 10 minutos del centro de Laussane. Es super tranquilo. Dispone de todas las prestaciones. Hay que puntualizar que el piso hacía un olor a cerrado/humedad cuando entramos aunque estaba limpio.
Sólo hay que decir que el sofá debe cambiarse ya que está muy usado.
Max está disponible siempre, nos ha ayudado desde que llegamos.
Sin duda volveremos a este apartamento, está genial para descansar. Lo recomiendo.
name: 050 Wonderful views, 10 min. from Lausanne&Parking

comments: Hébergement très pratique et calme. En revanche les équipements ne sont pas tout à fait exacts, il n'y a pas de sèche-linge ni de lave-linge, et le "Fauteuil-lit" est en fait un matelas posé par terre.
name: 050 Wonderful views, 10 min. from Lausanne&Parking

comments: Accueil chaleureux, emplacement très proche du lac et très agréable
name: Wohnung in Haus am Neuenburgersee.

comments: je recommande  la chambre de Gisela
name: Lovely  double-room in a cosy villa

comments: Un accueil chaleureux et un logement impeccable.
name: House, billard and swimming pool

comments: Marc's apartment is stunning! It is super clean and very well-decorated, and provides as such a great experience for anyone who chooses the place to stay for either a short or a long time-period. In walking distance to EPFL/UNIL. The neighbourhood is extremely calm and quiet, with no noise at all. Marc's hospitality was perfect; he responded immediately to my messages and provided everything I would need to have a very comfortable stay. All things considered, I would highly recommend the place to anyone seeking to spend time around Lausanne!
name: "Bienvenue chez Vous à St-Sulpice" (EPFL UNIL)

comments: Marc's place is great and he is a great host! Spotlessly clean, very stylish, convenient, in a beautiful location. I really appreciated the personal welcome and complimentary drinks. What a pity I couldn't stay longer!I would definitely go back any time and highly recommend Marc's place.
name: "Bienvenue chez Vous à St-Sulpice" (EPFL UNIL)

comments: Wonderful location with very easy walking to the train, waterfront, and old town.
name: Loft with rooftop, stunning view of the lake!

comments: This apartment was one of my best AirBNB experiences! The place was super clean, well located and, not only comfortable, but also warm and inviting. I didn't get a chance to enjoy the roof deck because I was working and it was winter but the view from there is spectacular. Stéphanie was a super host with quick replies to my questions. I would definitely stay there again!
name: Loft with rooftop, stunning view of the lake!

comments: nice place, excellent location
name: Loft with rooftop, stunning view of the lake!

comments: We had a wonderful experience at Stéphanie’s place. The view was absolutely spectacular, I couldn’t imagine a more perfect place to take in the breathtaking scenery of Montreaux. We were lucky to be there on New Year’s Eve and watched the fireworks from the rooftop balcony - simply amazing! The space itself was very clean and comfortable. While we were only there for three days, I could imagine it being a perfect place for a longer visit. The location was excellent, close walking to everything, a few steps from the train station, and a short drive off the highway although you would never know it. Two thumbs up - I would highly recommend!
name: Loft with rooftop, stunning view of the lake!

comments: Immaculately clean, everything sparkling new,  excellent natural light and view, and great location.  I loved this little place!
name: Loft with rooftop, stunning view of the lake!

comments: Superbe emplacement et magnifique terrase sur le toit!
name: Loft with rooftop, stunning view of the lake!

comments: Stephanie’s apartment is comfortable and in a convenient location to Coop (the local supermarket) nice shops, restaurants, and the train station. The most special part of the apartment is definitely the private roof deck with a view of the Alps! It’s a great place to enjoy a glass of wine and enjoy the sunset.
name: Loft with rooftop, stunning view of the lake!

comments:
C'est une adresse à retenir!
Accueil chaleureux et bienveillant dans un cadre superbe proche de Vevey.
Une décoration esprit chalet contemporain, très propre, un lieu idéal pour passer une nuit au calme.
Un grand merci à Antonio pour tout!
name: Guest Room between Lake Geneva and Gruyères

comments: Super, merci Antonio! tous parfait
name: Guest Room between Lake Geneva and Gruyères

comments: Appartement très bien situé et très propre. Antonio est réactif et arrangeant.

comments:
La maison de Jean-Marie est tout simplement magnifique, dans un cadre magique. Décorée avec goût et soin, on se sent vraiment dans un havre de paix avec une vue exceptionnelle. Jean-Marie est très sympathique et a pris le temps de nous présenter la maison et ses très beaux chats qui ont partagé les lieux avec nous lors de notre séjour. 
Nous reviendrons si l'occasion se présente !
name: Charming house with terrace, garden and lake view

comments: From the minute I stepped in, I didn't want to leave. Perfect location in Vevey, stylish taste with beautiful furniture, cute back balcony, and lots of natural light. The apartment has great energy and I loved the personal touches like flowers, plants, candles. The main bedroom is a dream to sleep in,  the bathroom is modern and thoughtful, and the kitchen has everything you need. Loved this place, thank you Jean-Marie!
name: Charming house with terrace, garden and lake view

comments: Karen est une femme charmante et très étonnante, qui mérite d'être connue. Merci à elle pour son accueil adorable, et son apéritif exceptionnel à bien des égards. Tout de bon pour la suite, Karen.
name: Ma maison de poupée

comments: Mon séjour chez Karen était parfait, Karen est une personne très accueillante avec beaucoup d'humanité et vivant dans un cadre magnifique. Sa maison est très fonctionnelle et bien décorée! MERCI!
name: Ma maison de poupée

comments: Accueil chaleureux, Karen aime échanger, discuter, partager du temps avec ses hôtes. Le logement est bien situé. Superbe vue sur les montagnes enneigées.
name: Ma maison de poupée

comments: Séjourner chez Karen c'est l'esprit AIRBNB de départ càd être chez quelqu'un, échanger, bavarder et ne pas avoir l'anonymat d'un hôtel. C'est vraiment une maison de poupée et on s'y sent bien.
name: Ma maison de poupée

comments: Super sympa belle découverte et chouette rencontre avec Karine
name: Ma maison de poupée

comments: Viviane's place is quiet and tidy. There were lovely notes which made me feel very welcome. I can really tell Viviane cares about her guests. The house is easy to find, it's an 8minutes walk from the train station. The room was very clean as well as the bathroom. There was a kettle in the hallway and some tea. Overall I am very satisfied with my stay and would highly recommend.

comments: Ludovica's places was great!! The appartment is nice, well equipped, and very comfortable for 6 adults. Ludovica was a great host, she was quick in communicating and very very helpful and nice! We loved staying there and I can't wait to come back next winter!

comments:
I had an excellent stay with Diego & Gemma. They are friendly hosts with a beautiful and comfortable home. Everything was well organized and communication was fast and efficient. Their place is in a great location for people visiting EPFL or UNIL, since it's within walking distance but also easy to get by metro when it's raining.

Thanks Diego & Gemma!

comments: Nice and clean!

comments: Magnifique séjour chez kadio. Hôte très sympa, attentionné et sérieux. 5/5
name: MAGNIFIQUE CHAMBRE À SÉJOURNER.

comments:
The whole apartment and room looks exactly as it is in the photos: everything is very good, and the room is big and very well furnished, with the fridge and coffe machine as advertised; everything perfectly clean.

Kadio was very nice during my stay, and went out if his way to make me feel welcome, or if I needed anything. 

From the apartment, it is very easy to reach the city center by bus.

It was a positive experience, and I definitely recommend the apartment if you're looking for a place to stay in Lausanne, very good quality for price.
name: MAGNIFIQUE CHAMBRE À SÉJOURNER.

comments: Je tiens à remercier Kadio pour les conditions remarquables de la visite, la description détaillée et l'aide dans l'organisation de la vie en Suisse. Il est pratique de se rendre au centre-ville. Je conseillerai cet hôte à tous ceux qui souhaitent visiter Lausanne.
name: MAGNIFIQUE CHAMBRE À SÉJOURNER.

comments:
Appartement idéalement situé en plein centre ville tout peut se faire à pied.
Cependant si vous ne venez pas le week-end vous ne pourrez pas bénéficier du parking gratuit derriere l’immeuble et devrez vous garer ailleurs (renseignez à l’office du stationnement qui est à cote du logement car il y a des risques d’amende, j’en ai  personnellement pris une).
Le logement est très propre et l’hôte  réactive.
Je recommande 
Merci !

comments: Great apartment, wonderful view. A bit hard access uphill with luggage, but the view compensates for it.

comments: Lugar con mucho encanto, buena calefacción , preciosas vistas del lago Leman, necesario tener coche.
name: Château du Châtelard - Montreux Castle

comments:
I still cannot believe how lucky we were to stay in such a comfortable and gorgeous apartment in an exquisitely beautiful location. Breathtaking views across the lake. Short walk past the vineyards to the little Châtelard Station - leas than 10 minute trip to the main Montreux station. 
The apartment had everything we needed       and beautifully decorated. Highly recommend this gem.
name: Château du Châtelard - Montreux Castle

comments: The apartment is truly in a small castle, though the castle itself is located on the edge of a hillside neighboorhood. Nonetheless, the view is quite amazing and the apartment is quite fun. As others have mentioned, the second bed is noisy and squeaks loudly whenever the occupant moves - not an issue for motionless sleepers but may prove problematic for those who toss and turn. Be aware that the apartment is a moderate walk from the parking area. Not a problem for those traveling with a rolly or small bag, but could prove problematic if you travel with big suitcases. Recommended for those looking for something a little different.
name: Château du Châtelard - Montreux Castle

comments:

comments:
Merci Yveline pour cet acceuil, votre appartement est idéal pour passer un séjour au calme à la découverte de la région. 
De très belles randonnées à faire avec points de vue imprenable sur la chaîne des Alpes !
Bonne continuation, peut-être à une prochaine fois si nous revenons dans la région.
name: Appart. 45 m2 Domaine du Bochet à 10min d'Yverdon

comments: Si vous aimez le calme, la nature, un petit bijou d'appartement et une hôtesse joyeuse et attentionnée vous allez adorer.
name: Appart. 45 m2 Domaine du Bochet à 10min d'Yverdon

comments: Séjour au top dans ce charmant, superbement équipé et paisible logement. Je recommande vivement cet endroit ! (3ème séjour chez Yveline qui est une hôte adorable)
name: Appart. 45 m2 Domaine du Bochet à 10min d'Yverdon

comments: It was a very cozy and beautiful stay chez le Domaine d' Yveline and her family. We've passed our Christmas holidays there and it was great. It's perfect for everyone loving the calm and beauty of nature. The appartment is located 30 minutes by foot to the train station of baulmes embedded of fields and hilly landscape with a great mountain view.  It's possible and a sporty start in the day if you're walking. We really loved the appartment, which is well suited for 2. There is everything you need, even fondue - very important in Switzerland! Yveline is a very nice host and you can see how much love is in the details.
name: Appart. 45 m2 Domaine du Bochet à 10min d'Yverdon

comments: Super logement, bien décoré et très propre. L'hôtesse était très à l'écoute de mes demandes et a répondu avec efficacité et rapidité à les questions. Merci !

comments:
super chambre, cosy et confortable. 
accueil chaleureux de Frédérique qui est très sympa

comments: Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans le logement de Frédérique, sa fille Solenn à été adorable. Le logement était impeccable, près des transports en commun, très pratique pour visiter la ville. Nous recommandons ce logement!
name: Lausanne, chambre de charme dans maison atypique

comments:
Très bon séjour chez Koti. Le logement est propre et agréable. Tous les produits de première nécessité nous attendaient aussi bien dans la salle de bain que dans la cuisine.
L'appartement est très bien placé, près du lac et du metro.
Je recommande cet hébergement
name: Large 1 Bed Flat in Ouchy

comments: Studio bien situé proche du lac et du metro
name: Large 1 Bed Flat in Ouchy

comments: Enrique's place is very nice and well equipped. The studio is comfortable and spotless, we found some biscuits and chocolates in the fridge. Enrique is a very nice and welcoming person, easy to contact and who answers very quickly to all messages. You'll spend a lovely time there.
name: Studio meublé de luxe, accès privé

comments: Enrique and his wife went above and beyond with their hospitality. They picked us up from the bus stop to take us to the accommodation, and took us back to the train station early in the morning. Although the apartment is on the outskirts of town, the public transport is excellent and very easy to use (Enrique and his wife were so helpful making sure we knew what buses to use - even came with us to show us the first time!). The apartment had everything we needed, was very comfortable and clean. We can highly recommend staying here.
name: Studio meublé de luxe, accès privé

comments: Très bon séjour chez Enrique et sa femme, accueil remarquable et disponibilité. De plus le logement est très bien équipé et d'une propreté remarquable ! Je conseille vivement.
name: Studio meublé de luxe, accès privé

comments: Great host and housing experience. 100% would come back!

comments:
Max est un hôte réactif et nous avons apprécié notre séjour dans son appartement.
Je ne qualifierai pas de "magnifique appartement" , pas de hauteur de plafond, pas si propre  ( cela dépend  de ceux qui vous ont précédés m' a dit Max), mais confortable,  où vous trouverez le nécessaire pour passer un bon séjour à Lausanne.
Un peu excentré, on a aimé l'emplacement de parking. La literie super confortable, les nouveaux ustensiles de cuisine ;)
J'y retournerai avec plaisir, je vous le recommande donc.
name: 029-2 Beautiful apartment Lausanne

comments: Top
name: 029-2 Beautiful apartment Lausanne

comments: Appartement super bien situé, en plein centre-ville de Lausanne vraiment au top ! Je m'attendais pas à ça, j'ai passer un agréable séjour et Dylan est super arrangeant et au top ! Merci beaucoup pour sa disponibilité je le recommande fois 100000

comments: Super séjour dans l’appartement de Dylan. Proche du centre ville et des transports. Je recommandes. Merci encore à Dylan pour la flexibilité ;)

comments:
L’appartement de Miguel est idéalement situé, près de la cathédrale de Lausanne, une vue magnifique ! Miguel est réactif et attentionné. L’emplacement est parfait pour visiter la ville. Des places de parking sont à proximité ! 
Un séjour vraiment agréable et parfait
name: Belle appartement en plein coeur de Lausanne

comments: This apartment was absolutely horrid. Upon arrival, the bathroom drawers had a lot of hair and in the top drawer of the vanity, an earwax coated Q-tip front and center (clearly visible if any cleaning had been done prior to our arrival). The toilet had a settled poop at the bottom. There were expired eggs in the fridge along with opened bottles of water. Under the bed, expect to find a lot of dust and more hair. Dust/lint balls the size of cotton balls. There were two blankets. One was small and the other had dried semen on it. The semen blanket was folded under the pillows. One of the curtains also had something dried on it. Do not count on the decorative lamp, aquarium, or cabinet under coffee maker as they are not in the apartment. The entire building smelled of trash and cigarette smoke. Double check with the host that he gives you the correct information as we were told to go to the wrong apartment and set on a misguided hunt for the keys. The host does not greet you. Zero stars.
name: Belle appartement en plein coeur de Lausanne

comments: Très bon emplacement dans Lausanne
name: Belle appartement en plein coeur de Lausanne

comments: The location of the flat is excellent. It is right nearby the old town and public transportation. The apartment offers everything one needs for a short stay in the city. However, cigarette smoke from one of the other flats in the same building regularly enters the flat. This was extremely bothersome, as I frequently encountered breathing difficulties and my clothes also began to reek of cigarette smoke.
name: Belle appartement en plein coeur de Lausanne

comments: Location. Location. Location. A perfect landing spot for our visit. Clean, accessible, comfortable. No frills. Great value.
name: Belle appartement en plein coeur de Lausanne

comments: Super studio très bien situé, je le recommande!
name: Belle appartement en plein coeur de Lausanne

comments: Bien, seul petit hic, on entend tous les bruits de la rue (les jeunes qui hurlent toute la nuit) pas de double vitrage. Pas facile pour s'endormir. En espérant que ça n'est pas tous les jours comme cela.
name: Belle appartement en plein coeur de Lausanne

comments: Emplacement idéal ! Appartement conforme à l’annonce ! Beau quartier. Toutes les commodités dans l’appartement.

comments: Die Übernachtung auf einer Burg ist schon was besonderes. Die Lage so nah an Montreux ist optimal für Ausflüge in die Umgebung. Die Einrichtung war toll, die Betten bequem, das WiFi war schnell. Die Wohnung war ruhig obwohl die Autobahn in der Nähe ist. Der Empfang war gut und ohne Probleme. Die Küche hätte etwas besser mit Geschirr ausgerüstet sein können aber es war soweit alles da was man so zum einfachen kochen brauchte.
name: Appt 2 Bedroom - Château du Châtelard

comments: We spent 10 days in this apartment. It was clean and neat.  the bathroom had a beautiful claw foot tub, all new.  The beds were comfortable.  The kitchen has a good quality stove, microwave and fridge however no dishwasher.  Dishes, pots and pan are bare essential for basic cooking.  I suggested that the host get some more items so may be these will be there for the next visitor.   The view is really beautiful from the 2nd bedroom but the other rooms overlook the inner courtyard.  One can imagine the working of the castle.
name: Appt 2 Bedroom - Château du Châtelard

comments: Tout était parfait

comments: Emmanuel’s place is fantastic and he is very good at responding quickly with any queries we had. Always very polite and happy to help. Our family had a wonderful time. Many thanks.

comments: Yvette is an amazing host. The Mazot is a dream come true. We spent some relaxing time, there’s great places to go for a hike too!

I can only recommend to prepare fireplace equipment for dummies since we could not manage properly to start a fire :) I highly recommend to stay at Ann Sofie ' s place.

comments: Patrick's house is wonderfully located in St Sulpice, a small residential quartier of Lausanne close to the lake. There is a parking spot in the the courtyard, a precious plus in Lausanne. The view from the house is suggestive and relaxing, providing a good "end of the day" sensation when you are back after work! The apartment is small portion of Patrick's house , with private access from the house garden, that has also  swimming pool, and a nice canopy just in front of the door. The place is cute, very clean, and it has all what is needed for a medium length stay (I stayed there one week, I could have stayed more). Patrick is a great host, present but discrete, truly respectful and very kind. A great stay!
name: Grandes-Vignes

comments: Patrick’s place is s great location and Patrick is absolutely a nice host!

Grzegorz propose également des massages (type Esalen) d'une grande qualité. 
Je recommande vivement cette chambre d'hôte où nous reviendrons très certainement ! :)

The best Airbnb experience so far! 
His beautiful place is located in the centre of Lausanne, just perfect for visiting the town and around, and is still very quiet to allow a good sleep while being surrounded by modern pieces of art. Just awesome. Thanks a million
name: Bonne ambiance dans le centre de la ville

comments: Antonio est très sympathique et ouvert, c’est un excellent endroit pour s’arrêter pendant un ou plusieurs soirs
name: Bonne ambiance dans le centre de la ville

comments: Julien is perfect host! Though we have not met in person, the communication was super smooth and we found the flat just as it is shown on the photos! Small, but very cozy and tidy. There’s everything one needs for a comfort stay. Renens VD train station is within 10 mins walk from the flat. The  neighbourhood is quiet and there’re several groceries, such as Migros and Denner, in 10-15 mins walking distance. At Julien’s place you will immediately feel yourself at home. I give my highest possible recommendation! Thank you, Julien!
name: Super studio à 2min de la gare de renens

comments: Everything was beyond our expectations, the view, the place, the hospitality - we had such an amazing relaxing time at Claudia! She is the most nicest and warm-hearted host you’ll ever meet!
name: Chambre spacieuse dans un beau chalet

comments: Une vue à couper le souffle, un logement idéal pour passer du bon temps . Nous avons passé 2 nuits chez Claudia et c’était tout simplement parfait :) un accueil et des services au top (petit déjeuner,  cheminée...) je recommende chaudement cet endroit
name: Chambre spacieuse dans un beau chalet

comments: Wonderful Chalet with stunning views and great public transport links. Claudia was an amazing host and went out of her way to help us.
name: Chambre spacieuse dans un beau chalet

comments: One of the best places I ever stay in Airbnb . Lovely lady and house was super stylish and accurate. View in the morning breathtaking. The place is higher in the mountains and it’s better if you have a car. From now on this is my place to visit once a year .
name: Chambre spacieuse dans un beau chalet

comments: nice trip 很好的一次体验
name: Large loft in Vevey centre

comments: Friendly and helpful, excellent stay
name: Large loft in Vevey centre

comments: Très bien situé, appartement spacieux, non loin du lac et du centre!
name: Charmant appartement, vers musée olympique/ ouchy

comments:
Très bon séjour, tout était bien sauf peut être la réactivité de Catia qui ne répond pas très rapidement aux messages
Mais ce n'est pas un frein car la procédure d'arrivée et de départ et complètement autonome
Seul petit détail dans la cuisine nous n'avons pas trouvé de passoire (peut être mal cherché)
 C'est dommage qu'il y a eu un problème de serviette qui a soit disant disparu et qu'on veut me facturer, sans ceci j'aurais mis les 5 étoiles
name: Charmant appartement, vers musée olympique/ ouchy

comments: Chouette appartement, grand, équipé, cosy.
name: Charmant appartement, vers musée olympique/ ouchy

comments: Sehr schönes Apartment. Komme gerne wieder

comments:
Appartamento molto carino a 5 minuti a piedi dalla Clinica di Montchoisi e dal Museo Olimpico in cui abbiamo soggiornato comodamente in tre. 
C’è anche un giardino esterno molto piacevole che purtroppo non abbiamo potuto sfruttare a causa del periodo (gennaio). Catia è molto gentile e disponibile. Consigliato!

comments:
Le logement était super, comme annoncé sur l’annonce et vu sur les photos.
Le contact avec Fanny était très agréable et ce fut très simple de s’organiser pour notre arrivée ainsi que notre départ.
Nous n’avons manqué de rien et passé un agréable moment! Merci

comments: Grandísimas personas y muy acogedor el apartamento no le falta nada

comments: a parler doucement et à être discret l hôte n aime pas être dérangé l hôte veut de l argent mais pour le reste il reste de gros efforts à faire si on paie un prix excessif pour que par la suite on nous disent de faire moins de bruit quand on discute je ne vois pas l intérêt vu que nous sommes en vacances
name: Studio indépendant sur les hauts de Lutry

comments: Très bien !
name: Studio indépendant sur les hauts de Lutry

comments: Nous avons passé un très beau séjour dans la maison. Elle est conforme à sa description, spacieuse et accueillante. Nous avons profité du calme et de la merveilleuse vue sur le Léman et les Alpes! Un spectacle incroyable!
name: Contemporary villa in a splendid area

comments: Appartement très fonctionnel et à proximité de la ville. Dans l’ensemble très satisfaisant.
name: WHITE PEARL.. 280m TO THE CATHÉDRALE..

comments: Belle appartement et Hôtes Très a l’écoute je recommande
name: WHITE PEARL.. 280m TO THE CATHÉDRALE..

comments:
Facile à trouver, parking facile. 
Un quartier vraiment très joli. 
Nous conseillons de monter au signal et au lac pour le petit déjeuner.
name: WHITE PEARL.. 280m TO THE CATHÉDRALE..

comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
name: WHITE PEARL.. 280m TO THE CATHÉDRALE..

comments: C’était très agréable et le logement est bien équipé !
name: WHITE PEARL.. 280m TO THE CATHÉDRALE..

comments: Location is very near migros and coop supermarket which is excellent, and in front of the house is bus stop, although since we have rental car its not so important for us. Bed is a bit too soft, and the wooden floor have creaking sound when you walk so difficult for light sleeper to sleep. We didnt use the terrace as it was winter. Overall is sufficient for 5 of us as we end up cooking dinner at home as restaurant or overall eating out in switzerland are quite expensive.
name: 070 Apart. 1 min from Lausanne & Parking & Terrace

comments: Aucun problème au cours de ce séjour. La communication avec les hôtes est et la procédure d'arrivée sont précises et bien rodées ce qui les rend très efficaces. Le logement est spacieux, bien chauffé, propre et fonctionnel. La décoration est chaleureuse et l'on s'y sent bien. L'emplacement est idéal. Une place de parking permet de se garer, un supermarché est à deux pas et le bus passe dans la rue.  Nous recommandons ce logement !
name: 070 Apart. 1 min from Lausanne & Parking & Terrace

comments: We had a really good time.  Appartment big enough for 2-4 adults for a short stay.  If you stay longer 2-3 persons is best.  Max was really nice in his messages and responded very quickly.  If we should go again we would book it again.
name: 070 Apart. 1 min from Lausanne & Parking & Terrace

comments: We had a great stay at this accommodation! The main reason for our stay were the youth olympic games in Lausanne, the place is close to the ice rink as well as the city center, we were able to walk everywhere even though there is also a bus stop right in front of the building. The check in was easy and convenient and I would definitely stay here again.
name: 070 Apart. 1 min from Lausanne & Parking & Terrace

comments: Buona la posizione
name: 070 Apart. 1 min from Lausanne & Parking & Terrace

comments:
Conforme à la description, appartement bien situé.
Encore merci pour ce séjour
name: Sonniges Appartement im Herzen Lausannes

comments: Stylish sunny apartment in the heart of Lausanne. This location makes it possible to do without a car entirely as everything is in walking distance, bus and metro are very close. Would rent again for sure
name: Sonniges Appartement im Herzen Lausannes

comments: Muy buena ubicación. Es un departamento con estilo pero necesita algunos toques de mantenimento.
name: Sonniges Appartement im Herzen Lausannes

comments: Thomas e molto gentile preciso e alla mano, l’appartamento che dire era fantastico ha tutti i confort and e in centro di Lausanne proprio a due passi da tutto quindi non abbiamo mai preso mezzo biblici, sicuramente consigliato
name: Sonniges Appartement im Herzen Lausannes

comments: Séjour d'une semaine correcte chez Adrian. Cependant la description de la chambre n'est pas tout à fait explicite. Les communs (une douche, un salon, une cuisine) sont partagés avec plusieurs locataires telle une auberge de jeunesse. La propreté dépend donc de l'ensemble de ces locataires. L'ambiance est bonne sinon.
name: Studio Commugny, Switzerland.

comments: Simple et efficace, je recommande!
name: Stunning View - 2 Bedroom Apartment. Chardonne

comments: Appartement très propre avec tous ce qu'il faut pour agréable séjour à Lausanne. Merci  beaucoup pour l'hospitalité. Facile d'acces avec parking privé
name: Proche EPFL/UNIL/STCC, Parking gratuit

comments:
Wir haben uns bei Carolin sehr wohl gefühlt, die Wohnung ist sehr liebevoll eingerichtet und es gibt alles was man für den täglichen Bedarf braucht. Vor allem die Küche ist sehr gut ausgestattet und es gibt sehr viele Spiele und Bücher. Toll! :-)

Wir werden auf jeden Fall gern wiederkommen und haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt.
name: Comfortable Mountain Getaway

comments: Wir haben eine knappe Woche in der netten und praktisch ausgestatteten Wohnung verbracht. Leider hat das Wetter nicht mitgespielt, ansonsten wäre die Lage perfekt, um einen Skiurlaub mit Kindern zu geniessen. Der nächste Skilift ist 200 m vom Haus entfernt.
name: Comfortable Mountain Getaway

comments: Lovely apartment in a quiet village. Everything was very well prepared by Caroline. Perfect for families - our children appreciated the games, toys and DVDs with Disney cartoons. We loved the view and the equipment - there is everything you might need, including fondue set and hooks on the radiators for drying skiing gloves etc. Great stay despite lack of snow - apparently it started really snowing the day we left :-).
name: Comfortable Mountain Getaway

comments: Très bon logement
name: Comfortable Mountain Getaway

comments: Notre séjour chez Anouk a été particulièrement agréable. Notre arrivée a été facilitée par un guide clair et complet et la maison était tout à fait adaptée pour les jeunes enfants (chaise, jeux, jardin). Dans un cadre moderne au milieu de la nature, nous avons passé des vacances très reposantes. Merci!
name: Contemporary house with fireplace

comments: The place is very conveniently located to Ecole Hoteliere de Lausanne which was great as I was in town to visit my friend who attends school there. The place itself is very neat, modern and nice, perfect for one or two guests. The only downside I would say was the bad reception as the apartment is located underneath the house- much of the time it would say no service or I would only have one bar and would not be able to receive or make calls. Other than that I came across a few spiders and there were many webs around the apartment but it was no trouble at all.
name: Private apartment in a luxury villa

comments: Great option in Lausanne. Very well located, quiet and clean. Totally matches the advertisement.
name: Cozy apartment in the city center

comments: Appartement spacieux et au calme bien équipé. Nous n'avons pas pu profiter du balcon (Il faisait trop froid) mais cela doit être très agréable à la belle saison car on y aperçoit le lac. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Chantal mais avons pu échanger avec elle sans problème.
name: Montreux Riviera Condo -$100/night!

comments: The chalet was an excellent place in Diablerets. Proximity to town was within walking distance. Great views of the valley. Very comfortable, much better than expected. Easy to use appliances and very relaxing home away from home. Renato was an excellent contact. Helped us above and beyond when we had car problems with the rental car. He was easily reachable and very responsive. I highly recommendthe chalet.
name: Somptueux demi-chalet aux Diablerets proche centre

comments: C'était parfait! Nous sommes restés que 2 jours, mais c'était juste parfait. L'emplacement est carrément au Lac. Je peux que le conseiller aux autres!
name: Bel appt familial centre-ville et lac (avec chat)

comments: Lovely place!! Perfect for a big group. We are 10 adults and one child. We enjoyed the chalet so much. The region is very nice too!

comments:
Super Unterkunft, tolle Lage 
Paola ist super freundlich und war für alle frage stets sehr offen und beantwortet diese immer innert kürze! 
Super Aufenthalt, gerne wieder!

comments: Excellent. Très gentille chaleureuse et au petit soin avec ses hôtes
name: Beautiful apartment near Lake Geneva

comments: Alex's place is perfect if you want to be close to the city center and discover Lausanne. You're 2 min away from the Ours metro station. The room is spacious, clean, nicely decorated and it has an incredible view. Alex is a great host and will give you great tips for your stay.
name: Room with nice view in the city center

comments: Très beau logement, bien équipé. La vue du salon sur les montagnes est magnifique. Idéal pour des vacances en famille ou entre amis.

perfect chalet for cosy family holidays.

Séjour exceptionnel dans le très bel appartement de Cosette, très très propre, superbement been ' décoré ! Et situé à proximité de tout ! Lac, gare, centre... Merci pour qu'on accueil adorable et (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande vivement !!!! 
Françoise

comments: Aliénor et son mari sont très attentifs et sympathiques, la ville est charmante, près de Laussane, avec tous les services nécessaires, le studio est petit mais a tous les détails pour être confortable, j'aime accepter les animaux! Lucas et moi avons Très bon !! 100% recommandé. Salutations famille!

comments:
Notre séjour s’est très bien passé. Alienor nous a accueillit a l’heure que nous voulions. Elle a était très flexible. L’appartement est petit mais très fonctionnel avec des petites attentions ! Un grille pain, cafetière et micro onde ainsi que de la vaisselle sont mis à disposition ce qui permet de manger dans l’appartement.
Des places de parking publiques se situent à 200m de l’appartement (payant la journée et sinon gratuit la nuit). L’appartement se situe à 10min de Lausanne en voiture.
name: Charmant studio. Bourg de Lutry

comments:
Alienor was very kind and helpful. Lutry is amazing, the apartement is well-equipped and friendly. I enjoyed being there:) I hope to see you again soon!
Thank you!
Niki
name: Charmant studio. Bourg de Lutry

comments: The apartment is truly amazing! It’s been our second time there already and you won’t find a better place to stay in the area! Everything you need is provided and we always especially enjoy the balcony and the view.

comments:
Merveilleux accueil!!! Stephie et Oely  sont vraiment belles personnes, de cette expérience est née une belle amitié! 
La maison reflète la description,  parfaite et confortable.
Certainement recommandé!

comments:
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l'appartement de Marc, très propre, lumineux et bien décoré. Nous ne pouvons que le recommander, d'autant plus que Marc a su se montrer très attentionné en préparant un petit guide personnalisé avec ses adresses, des cartes de réduction pour certaines visites...
Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés! :)

comments: Je vous le recommande
name: Contemporary apartment close to city centre

comments: Jean Richard and his wife were both extremely kind, and thoughtful hosts. They welcomed us warmly, and there was was fruit, chocolates, coffee and tea in the kitchen. The space was large and had a high ceiling. We were a bit surprised however when we noticed that this apartment was a converted office space. All in all, the location was great, and highly convenient, and the bed was very comfortable.

comments: Quite convenient location in the center of Lausanne. Jean-Richard was responsive and helpful in our communication. The place is actually just an office with a  sofa bed, but it did the job well for our weekend there.

comments: Accueil très sympathique rien a dire

comments: Mi sono trovato bene, il proprietario sempre disponibile è lo consiglio

The studio is well appointed and very comfortable.  Cully is a great village within easy access of Lausanne and surrounds.  Couldn’t recommend it highly enough

comments: Anne is very welcoming as a host and a great person to talk to. Her flat in the ground floor of a wonderful old house, located in a beautiful neighbourhood on a hill just a few minutes up from the train station, is absolutely cozy and offers everything that is needed. Her cat Nestor is also a great companion to share the couch with during the cold winter months!

comments: Das Chalet mit drei Zimmern befindet sich in Mitten saftiger Wiesen und Wälder, abseits der Touristenorte. Wir haben uns im B&B sofort wie zuhause gefühlt. Viel Holz und Chaletstyle, gemütlicher Salon und Esszimmer und ein modernes Bad gehören zum Komfort. Ohne Auto zu Fuss in ca 15 Minuten zu erreichen. Das Restaurant in der Nähe ist hervorragend, es macht also nichts wenn man nicht selber muss ;)

La chambre et la salle de bain étaient parfaitement propres et très bien isolés ce qui permet d’avoir sa propre indépendance. Un excellent rapport qualité - prix également ! Le contact a été très facile, Diana est toujours disponible pour vos questions. Je recommande à tous le logement de Diana et Bastien, je reviendrais avec plaisir !

comments: Notre séjour chez Diana s'est très bien passé. La chambre est spacieuse et bien équipée, tout comme la salle de bain attenante. Diane est très réactive, nous recommandons vivement !

comments: Quite simply I cant express how superb this accommodation is, having used Air B&B many times globally, this property, sheer welcoming and kindness of Katherine and overall finish is world class. The refinement, attention to detail and utter class offered in this accommodation you will be hard to replicate!

comments:
Très bonne nuit chez Antonija elle m'a très bien accueilli et ma attendu jusqu'a très tard. 

L'appartement est très propre et elle est très sympathique. 

Je recommande !

comments: Très bon accueil et idéalement situé dans Nyon.

comments:
Le prix indiqué double avec les « taxes » 40€ le ménage...par personne !! Dans 20m2 !! De 67€ la location par nuit passe à 120€ ! Ce n’est pas un particulier mais des pros ! 
Melinda n’est pas là proprio....c’est la responsable d’agence ! Ce n’est pas leur faute c’est celle de la plateforme!! 
Je ne comprenais pas pourquoi elle me demandait de passer la voir ! Maintenant je sais ...180€ de frais et taxes pour 3 nuits et 210€ payes sur la plateforme !! Faut juste le savoir !!

comments:
Bonjour, 

Nous avons loué ce logement sur Airbnb pour un long week-end avec ami-e-s et famille. 

L'"hôte" est une société professionnelle de location. Soyez attentifs au moment de confirmer votre réservation sur Airbnb, car cette société facture, hors site, des frais supplémentaires importants à titre de "frais de ménage" et de "mise à disposition du linge de bain". Ces frais supplémentaires, qui doivent être payés directement à l'hôte, ont représenté plus de la moitié du prix de location tel qu'il ressortait sur le site Airbnb. Cette société nous a facturé CHF 48.- de frais de ménage par personne (y compris pour un bébé de deux ans) et CHF 25.- pour le linge de bain par personne. Lorsque nous avons protesté, il nous a été répondu que ces frais ressortaient clairement de l'annonce de base. Or, ce n'était pas le cas. En outre, selon les conditions générales de Airbnb, l'hôte ne peut pas vous demander de lui payer directement des frais (hors taxes de séjour sauf erreur). J'ai beau eu dire que cette manière n'était donc pas conforme aux règles d'utilisation du site, l'hôte nous a simplement invité à nous plaindre auprès de Airbnb...

Par ailleurs, vous ne recevrez pas l'adresse exact du chalet avant d'avoir valider le paiement des frais supplémentaires auprès de la société. Quand vous recevrez la confirmation, vous constaterez que vous êtes censés récupérer la clef du logement à l'agence de location qui se trouve à une demie-heure en train du chalet lui-même. Finalement, nous avons pu négocier que l'agence nous l'amène à l'arrêt de train le plus proche du chalet. 

Enfin, il y a une cheminée sur les photos comme argument de location, mais ne vous attendez pas à trouver du bois. Il n'y en a pas! Vous devez l'acheter et le monter vous-même. Il n'y a pas le moindre savon dans les salles de bain et nous avons eu droit à une fin de rouleau de papier toilette pour 5 personnes...papier toilette que nous avons donc dû racheter nous-même dès le lendemain. 

Bref, les méthodes commerciales de cette société m'ont laissée une impression désagréable et je ne louerai plus à cet "hôte". 

Magali
name: Chalet Le Hibou

comments: When we first arrived,  there was a big hair ball in the middle of the floor that was missed when being cleaned.  It was disgusting.  The bath tub had mold all around the sides.  The shower curtain had not been changed in years.  The bathroom smelled awful, and the smell seem to be coming from the bidet.  We ultimately covered it with a towel to keep the smell down.  The carpet was really old and had stains throughout.  We were afraid to go barefoot and always keep house shoes on.  The refrigerator was old and had mold in as well.  The mattresses on the beds were at least 20 years old.  This apartment is in serious need of remodeling.
name: Le Mont Blanc 8

comments:
I will start with the positives, the room in this apartment is accurately represented in the photos shown and we were happy with its cleanliness. 

And now... We walked into the apartment to find that the front door is never locked which was some cause for concern,especially in a building that I would not describe as homely.  Then I turned to the kitchen to find the fridge doors ajar with not a hint that it worked (which was correct). Behind the oven there as dust and dirt, and the entire time the bins were not emptied in the kitchen. Then we turn to the bathroom which there is only one large obtrusive issue. There is a massive boiler sitting above the bath, which is conveniently hidden behind the shower curtain in the photos (sneaky). so watch your heads. The walls a thin to say the least, we thought someone was banging on our door In the middle of the night, so hard I  fact I had a headache the next morning. To be honest if you have some extra cash hit up the motel down the road.
name: A2 - Chambre vue route

comments: Nice
name: A2 - Chambre vue route

comments: This is a spacious apartment that easily accommodates 6 couples right in the centre of Villars, a very easy walk to the shops, ski rental and the mountain railway and ski slopes. There are beautiful views from the living room and master bedroom. The host is most helpful with quick email responses. It was all beautifully clean and eclectically furnished; the kitchen too was well equipped. We particularly enjoyed the large stock of games. In the basement is a ski room and a washing machine and dryer that is shared by the buildings occupants but we had no difficulty in getting a slot. Overall this represents very good value and I would wholeheartedly recommend to anyone.
name: Apartment with Beautiful Views in Central Villars

comments: The accommodation is lovingly furnished and offers a magnificent view of the mountains. The infrastructure regarding train connection, shopping facilities and ski lift are good. We felt very comfortable and were informed about everything that was necessary. On behalf of all our fellow travellers we would like to thank you for a wonderful holiday week in Gryon.
name: Luxury duplex entirely renovated for 9 people

comments:
We had a great stay at Lauence's place in Gryon. The apartment uses the space very well and thus fits 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, with 2 of bathrooms ensuite and quite small, and one large bathroom with a combined shower/tub. Very good beds and mattresses. The kitchen is exceptionally well equipped, with sharp knives, many appliances, Nespresso coffee machine, lots of pots and pans, and a large fridge - freezer combination. There is also a dining corner with a large table that comfortably fits 9 people and lots of plates and tableware.

One of the best features of the apartment for us was the fast WiFi and the huge TV screen in the living room wall that included Swisscom, AppleTV and Netflix etc. Kids and adults much enjoyed an evening of watching movies. We did not use the fireplace, although it is operational and usable, which I think is an additional great feature. 

The apartment contains the owners belongings and thus can seem a bit crowded, and I would not recommend the place for any family with rowdy and/or young kids (or adults for that matter) as there is much potential to damage the place and many of the breakable things the apartment is decorated with. 

Overall, Gryon/Villars is a typical exclusive ski resort in the Swiss Pre-Alpes - not very high (so snow is not ensured), relatively old lift installations, by far not enough parking spaces, and quite expensive. This is also reflected in the price of this listing, so I would recommend it as a treat, for an exclusive stay with great amenities, but not necessarily for cost-effectiveness.
name: Luxury duplex entirely renovated for 9 people

comments: Peter et sa famille sont des hôtes très chaleureux et attentifs! Leur chalet dispose d'une exposition ensoleillée toute la journée et dispose de tous les équipements nécessaires. Il est particulièrement bien équipé pour les enfants! Nous avons passé un super séjour en famille.

comments:
Wir haben in einer größeren Gruppe eine Woche im Chalet von Peter und Gritta verbracht. 

Was mir daran besonders gefallen ist:
- sehr sonnig dank guter Lage, man kann sowohl Sonnenaufgang als auch -untergang genießen
- sauber und top ausgestattet
- gute Parkplätze (keine Selbstverständlichkeit auf einem Berg)
- kinder- und familienfreundlich
- und natürlich die netten Gastgeber (Gritta)

Alles in allem es war ein sehr gelungener Aufenthalt, ich würde gerne mal wieder in die Gegend zurückkommen.
name: Chalet Alps Villars-Gryon-les Diablerets

comments:
An excellent choice for a winter mountain holiday. The chalet is brand new and has every possible comfort. Sebastien is a super host and made sure of our every comfort way beyond our expectations- even a beautiful Christmas tree in the lounge!! 
The cooking facilities are great - induction stove and a lovely oven, all modern appliances and the TV is excellent too. 
We used his snowshoe poles and modern ski locker in his garage as well. 
It is a good 10 - 15 minute walk from Les Diablerets village up a steep hill so for those who wish to ski make sure you have your own car. The winter ski bus service is free and efficient to the nearby glacier but it will not help you to get to and from the local slopes. Les Diablerets is a lovely skiing village with many wide blue pistes so it’s great for beginners as well. It is hosting the junior downhill olympics in 2020 and that red slope is fabulous and in amazing condition already!   There is also a 7km sledding route down the mountain that is apparently amazing (there wasn’t enough snow for it to be open yet in December). The snow cannons on the pistes make sure that even if there is little snow, you can still ski. 
I would highly recommend this chalet and this host for a holiday to remember. We will certainly try and return there if we come for another holiday in this area.
name: The apartment by Monts-Chalet

comments:
Nothing to add! The stay at My Yago's house was more than anything we could hope for. We contacted Mr Yago as a group looking for an ideal location close to the Jura and the Lac de Joux to celebrate new year's together. What we stumbled upon was a rare pearl of a location, with the utmost best service and communication I have ever received since joining AirBnB.

Mr. Yago went above and beyond to make sure our stay was successful, being flexible on the check in and check out time, welcome us and giving us a tour of the house when we checked in, and was always available via (Hidden by Airbnb) for any further questions during our stay.

Hands down the best experience I've ever had, and will be looking forward in renewing the experience!

---------------

Aucune suggestion! Notre séjour chez Mr Yago était tout simplement parfait. Nous avons pris contact avec le propriétaire car (groupe de 8 personnes dont un enfant) nous recherchions un lieu idéal, proche du Jura et du Lac de Joux, afin de célébrer la nouvelle année ensemble. Ce que nous avons trouve est tout simplement une perle rare, avec le meilleur service et la meilleure communication à laquelle j'ai pu avoir depuis que je suis sur air Bnb.

M. Yago a fait de son mieux pour que notre séjour soit un succès, en faisant preuve de souplesse en ce qui concerne les formalités d'enregistrement et de départ, nous accueillir et nous faire visiter la maison à notre arrivée. Il était toujours disponible pour nos questions pendant notre séjour.

Sans aucun doute la meilleure expérience que j'ai jamais vécue et sera impatient de la renouveler!

Merci M. Yago!
name: Beautiful 17th century house with large garden

comments:
We stayed 4 nights at Yagos house. The house is beautiful, big and very clean. The fireplace is perfect for cozy nights. 
There is not much to do in the village but there is other places you can visit like, lac the joux, creux du van etc. 
Yagos house is a perfect place to relax with friends and family and the communication with Yago was really easy. Its a very nice Airbnb!

comments:
I had a wonderful time at Virginia’s gorgeous house.  Arriving late at night, driving through a dark country road, I was anxious at first whether I had made the right choice, and I also couldn’t find the house right away.  However, when I texted.  Virginia’s husband came out of the house to show me in and show me around the house.  The house was an absolute beauty.   My jaws dropped seeing the indoor spa (sauna and jacuzzi) and an indoor pool.  Huge kitchen with fireplace.  One flight up the stairs for a beautiful living room with another fireplace, and then on the third floor the living quarters.  And, there’s an elevator inside the house, in case you had a heavy baggage to carry up to the third floor.  Though the accommodation was written “private room”, the guests were allowed access to everything, the living room and the huge kitchen (with dining table), and the spa (the sauna was gorgeous!), and the bathroom was just next to my bedroom), so in many ways, it was better than “entire house” accommodation.   Virginia was a lovely host, and was always available whenever I needed anything.   Breakfast was included in the accommodation and we could serve ourselves to bread and yogurt, tea and coffee.  I had a very nice time sitting down for a chat with Virginia one morning.  
All in all, it was a wonderful place, and I would love to be back again!
Thank you very much for making me feel at home!
name: L’ETABLE. Room No1. Countryside B&B. Indoor pool.

comments: Ayant réservé en me fiant aux nombreux commentaires positifs, je n'ai pas été déçu bien au contraire! Virginia et son mari nous ont réservé un accueil des plus chaleureux. Ce sont des hôtes très attentionnés qui savent mettre à l'aise pour profiter pleinement de leur incroyable demeure! En bref, que ce soit en amoureux, en famille, ou entre-amis allez-y les yeux fermés.
name: L’ETABLE. Room No2. Countryside B&B. Indoor pool.

We stayed at Barbara's place for a couple of nights as a base to go hiking in the local area and it was just perfect. We loved the style of the place and the welcome basket was a lovely surprise! We were particularly impressed with the small but extremely functional kitchenette - it has everything you might need to prepare simple meals. 

Highly recommended!

comments:
Pascaline est une hôte exceptionnelle et nous avons pris beaucoup de plaisir à échanger et partager nos expériences avec elle. Elle a été très attentive à tous nos besoins et nous ne pouvons la remercier assez pour ces quelques jours très agréables ! 

La grange est très belle, très bien aménagée et décorée avec beaucoup de goût. Elle est située dans un village calme, mais les points d’intérêts principaux de la région (Montreux, Vevey, Gruyères, Fribourg) sont très faciles d’accès. 

Les petits-déjeuners sont excellents,  copieux et d’un vraiment bon rapport qualité prix. 

Nous recommandons vivement !!

Would highly recommend Severines place for a vacation.

comments: This is a wonderful representation of what it is like to live in a Swiss fairy tale. comments:
This was our second stay with Raphael, and was as good as the first. The last time it was warm and sunny and we enjoyed a bicycle ride around the lake. This time it was cold and icy outside, with plenty of snow. Raphael worked overtime to make sure the driveway was cleared and safe. Inside the cottage was cozy and warm, with stunning views over the valley, felt like we were in a movie. We enjoyed a walk behind Raphael's house, marveling in the spectacular snowscapes. 

We also caught a 10 minute train ride to Le Pont where we had a delicious lunch on the lakeside.
The cottage is great, warm clean, comfortable bed, super shower and a well equipped kitchen . The coffee machine worked overtime on this visit.

Raphael is quick to respond to any request, but is never intrusive.

We will definitely visit again.
name: Two-room apartment

comments: Beautiful place in perfect location. Close to lake and pool and other lake activities, restaurants, IMD business School, Olympic Museum, etc. The apartment is clean, cosy, fully equipped and feels like a home away from home. Owners Lanfranco and Marina, have been generous, kind and attentive but also discreet and supportive at all times. We would come back any time and do hope to do so again very soon.

comments: Le chalet est très fonctionnel et il y a tout l’équipement nécessaire. Ayant passé le séjour avec deux bébés, il nous a été agréable de trouver tout le matériel qu’il faut sur place. La vue est splendide et très agréable. Pauline est très réactive et réponds à toutes les questions rapidement. Merci, nous n’hésiterons pas à revenir.
name: Chalet met een prachtig uitzicht!

comments: Nice Chalet with enough room for 7 adults. Reachable with public transport and nicely furnished and equipped. The kitchen could really need new pans, knives and a solid cleaning (as is often the case with holiday apartments). Rubbish disposal and laundry rent were overly complicated - the Airbnb host doesn't live nearby and everything is taken care of by a local manager. The two women don't seem to communicate but at least are very friendly.
name: Chalet met een prachtig uitzicht!

comments:
Me and my family really enjoyed staying in this place. We were a group of five adults and found the space perfect for us. The chalet is beautiful, well furnished and very cozy. It has a lot of nice little details and is a very comfortable stay. It is not easily accessible without a car, but well worth the walk uphill if you don't have one.

The chalet is in really good condition with only minor things that could be improved. Hot water does not last very long, so if you choose to stay here it is a good idea to organise showering times (we needed to wait several hours for hot water after 3 of us showered one after the other), although I hear this is something common to most chalets. The beds and linen are not new by any means and could do with a renewal, but they were ok for us for the five days we were there.  

Chateau d'Oex is  a very quiet town (we were there right after New Year), but a lovely spot to relax, have some mountain walks and maybe go skiing to one of the nearby resorts (none of them are close though, you need a car or public transport to get there). 

The woman that welcomed us (Valentina) was very kind and helpful at both the beginning and the end of the visit. 

We only had one problem since at the end of our stay we were contacted by the manager about a lamp in the living room that was broken and she assumed we had done it. The lamp was broken when we got there, and there was an unpleasant message exchange explaining that it had not been us. It ended saying that the owner had been notified and we have not heard from her since (will update this review if I hear back). This was the only problem in an otherwise absolutely perfect vacation.
name: Chalet met een prachtig uitzicht!

comments: great
name: 2 rooms flat with a view in Villars-sur-Ollon.

comments: Perfect location for our ski trip, literally next to the Rochegrises railway stop for the ski slopes, but also a short (less than 10 mins, with a three year old) stroll into central Villars along a pedestrian path. The apartment is excellently furnished, including an incredibly comfortable bed, fully equipped kitchen, and spectacular views of the mountains from the living room and bedroom - the sunsets were stunning. This was a perfect place for our family of three and I would definitely recommend staying here! Aimé was a welcoming and responsive host and even left our young son a little gift - thank you Aimé!
name: 2 rooms flat with a view in Villars-sur-Ollon.

comments:
Very nice apartment with an amazing view. We were 8 Friends staying there for New Years Eve. Even for 8 people the apartment was big enough for this three nights. We did not meet Jennifer and Petra, because they were abroad. But a friend of them welcomed us after our arriving and gave us some
information about Leysin. The apartment is right above the „coop“ and the cable car is reachable in about 15minutes walking (with all the skiing equipment a good workout:-))
We definitly recommend this aparment!
name: Apartment avec une vue sur Les Dents du Midi

comments: We stayed at the apartment in January 2019 as a group of 8 people. The view from the balcony is simply outstanding! Location couldn't be better, train station and ski lift is 10min on foot and the Coop supermarket is just 2 floors below! We were also happy that the free of charge parking spot was provided. The apartment was equipped with one child bed and there was also the possibility to hire the babysitter. We were also happy when we received the 10% discount cards for any sport activity in Leysin.
name: Apartment avec une vue sur Les Dents du Midi

comments: I was so happy to have found Petra’s place. I had a group of 8 people with me who all enjoyed their time and agree with me that this Airbnb was perfect! She met us once we arrived so that she could show us a few things to do in the city and to answer any questions. For those who are interested in snow sports, the ski lift is about a 10-15 minute walk which was convenient. The apartment was a great size with an awesome view from the balcony. We did have an issue with the shower knob getting stuck, but the owner came out to the apartment very quick to fix it. I think this is an important quality because it shows  that the owner is there for you if you have any issues. She also left a bottle of wine and chocolate which was a nice touch. I highly recommend staying here.
name: Apartment avec une vue sur Les Dents du Midi

comments: super appartement pour un week end famille et amis. très pratique et idéalement situé pour les activités de neige.
name: Apartment avec une vue sur Les Dents du Midi

comments:

En revanche, la propreté de l’appartement laisse à désirer: à notre arrivée, la douche était poussiéreuse, certains ustensiles de cuisines et le four étaient sales, et un drap de lit était taché... Dommage, car sinon l’endroit est sympa.

comments: We absolutely loved staying in this well-appointed and wonderfully located holiday flat in the little swiss mountain village of Leysin. We were a family of four, and our kids especially loved the bunk beds in the guest room. We the parents loved the location - with a Coop grocery store on the ground floor and about a 10 minute walk to the telepherique station. Overall we had an absolutely wonderful stay here - the flat is spacious, comfortable, has amazing views and we'll definitely be back again!
name: Apartment avec une vue sur Les Dents du Midi

comments: This was a great place for our stay in Leysin. Warm and spacious and really centrally located. Jennifer was super responsive and helpful! Highly recommended.

Bryan was a friendly host and it was easy to communicate with him. I would definitely recommend this place!

comments:
Appartement très propre, bien situé et fonctionnelle.
Edgar était très disponible et serviable.
Seule bémol, l’appartement est mal isolé pas rapport aux bruits extérieurs avec un casino en face et pas mal de bruits toute les nuits ainsi que les volets qui ne fonctionnent pas correctement laissant passer la lumière dès le petit matin

comments: Bernard's property is awesome. Plenty of space for large groups (we were 12 adults + 2 kids), great location and access to unique outdoors "bains" makes this place a real gem. Also Bernard was very responsive and kind. He is happy to accommodate various needs travelers may have ("bains", paragliding, full catering option, etc.). Thanks Bernard for a great stay, looking forward to visiting again soon!
name: centre de bains et bien être en devenir.

comments: Selon moi il manquait la propret,  la chambre n'était pas prête, les draps pas repassés, ça c'est très,  moyen. A part ça l'emplacement idéal, Mandira malgré qu'absente, a toujours répondue à nos questions et les instructions données étaient rapide et précises.
name: 2-room appartment in the heart of Lausanne

comments: Mandira is a very helpful and kind host. She replies quickly and is very clear with her instructions. The place is in a very good location, close to groceries, trains, buses and right in the heart of Lausanne. Her place is quite spacious and it’s also fully-equipped with everything you might need. Good value.
name: 2-room appartment in the heart of Lausanne

comments:
The rented place did not live up to it's promise.

The most irritating fact was that there is NO separation at all between the upper and (common) inferiour level. NO door  is separting these two levels; instead they are connected via stairs.

As a matter of fact,  if other guests are renting the room on the inferiour floor people could actually  access the "etage privé" - which does not really fit to my definition of privacy!

in addition, the kitchen was not very clean: two pots were dirty, the dishwasher contained dirty dishes and the dustbin was full of trash.

In summary, I can not recommend this place unless you are looking for a better youth hostel.
name: Superbe étage privé dans une grande maison

comments: Тем, кто хочет погулять в городе далековато от центра. Я ездила по работе в университете EPFL, так что для меня расположение идеальное. Метро минут в 15 ходьбы. Комната удобная, кухня маааааленькая. Нет чашек и чайника. Может я плохо искала) в целом на пару дней пойдет)
name: studio lumineux-parquet 5min à pied EPFL, 100m lac

comments: Compact but comfortable and conveniently located, particularly for EPFL.
name: studio lumineux-parquet 5min à pied EPFL, 100m lac

comments: Appartement sympathique et bien situé vis à vis de l'EPFL.

comments: Très bon accueil de notre hôte. Le studio est confortable,  agréablement aménagé et très propre. Une adresse à retenir.
name: Studio South furnished (Rent  3 days to 1 Month)

comments: Logement design, propre et d’exception
name: A Begnins "Appart vue Lac Confort & Design"

comments: Nous avons passé un agréable moment, l'appartement de Fabien est très agréable, la décoration originale, les équipements confortable et modernes. Fabien à été très sympathique et très précis dans les informations donnés, le check-out flexible nous à permis de laisser nos affaires dans l'appartement tout l'après-midi pendant que nous faisions une magnifique balade de 10 km dans les vignes, je recommande ce logement aux visiteurs et y retournerai volontiers. Merci Fabien.
name: A Begnins "Appart vue Lac Confort & Design"

comments:
The apartment is lovely. Located in a new building, it's very well insulated and furnished with style and personality. 
As it's a bit up the hillside, if you have to get to Geneva or Lausanne in the morning during rush hour there can be a bit of traffic to get to the highway, but it's compensated by the great view on the lake. 

Fabien is a fantastic host, very helpful and eager to help. 

Overall, highly recommended!
name: A Begnins "Appart vue Lac Confort & Design"

comments: Excellent apartment, you will find what you see in pictures, furnished with style, clean and overall comforable. Communication with Fabien quick and effective. Good address
name: A Begnins "Appart vue Lac Confort & Design"

comments: Courteous and welcoming host. Lovely, modern apartment with everything you could need. Thank you for your welcome and letting us use your wonderful apartment, Fabien!
name: A Begnins "Appart vue Lac Confort & Design"

comments: Magnifique chalet traditionel, parfaitement situé et parfaitement équipé. Endroit idéal pour un weekend entre amis, avec Jean qui est très sympa et très aidant. Nous le recommandons chaudement
name: Beautiful chalet near Gstaad

comments: Die Unterkunft hat unsere Vorstellungen übertroffen! Wunderschöne/stilvolle Einrichtung. Kann die Unterkunft nur weiterempfehlen.
name: Beautiful chalet near Gstaad

comments: Très beau chalet, bien équipé (mais à l'ancienne!). Il est bien à l'écart dans la forêt, mais quand même à quelques minutes des pistes de skis. Le chauffage est au bois, il ne faut pas avoir peur de faire du feu, mais tout le nécessaire et les explications sont données au besoin lors de l'arrivée.
name: Le Pacheu

comments: Un chalet charmant, nous avons été très heureux de notre séjour.
name: Le Pacheu

comments: Ich möchte mich den zahlreichen Vorgänger*innen, für die die ruhige Lage und das rustikale Selbstanfeuern von Kaminen, Ofen und Herd auch ein Segen waren. Wir waren zwei Familien mit kleinen Kindern und haben genug Platz für uns gehabt. Die Küche ist gut ausgestattet. Schön war‘s!
name: Le Pacheu

comments: Amazing flat for two people with separate sheets on the beds, a nice kitchen and nice toilets. It is perfectly sized for two people. 5 minutes away from Feydey train station and 15 minutes away from the ski station by foot. Host is amazing and very responsive! Parking spot is available.
name: Les Fougeres: a cosy studio in Leysin

comments:
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans l'appartement.
Très bien situé, un point de départ parfait pour visiter les villes à côtés
Nous tenions à  remercier Ali .
Notre séjour s'est très bien passé et grâce à lui nous avons pu découvrir et profiter de la suisse .
Nous reviendrons avec plaisir pour de prochaines vacances. 
Un grand merci Ali

comments: Bonne communication. Bon qualité-prix.

comments: Hôte réactif, l'appartement est accueillant et bien situé. Merci pour ce séjour

comments: Tout s'est très bien passé, Angela est réactive et le logement était parfait pour 4 avec tous les équipements nécessaires

comments: Funktionale Wohnung mit Skikeller in sehr zentraler Lage. Super Skigebiet für Kinder und Skianfänger. Kleiner Laden mit Bäckerei im Ort. Kontakt und Check-in super freundlich und schnell.
name: Les Mosses station ski - Lioson app. 2 pces

comments:
Ines Unterkunft liegt nur wenige Gehminuten vom Bahnhof entfernt.
Die Unterkunft ist geschmack- und liebevoll gestaltet und von einem schönen Garten umgeben. 
Wir waren sehr zufrieden, herzlichen Dank!
